This addition to the Mugler lineup is the first one I have found of all Thierry's A-Men line that can't go 4-6 hours minimally on me. It is often compared to Ultra Zest, but I see (smell) minimal similarity. Here's hoping a 2018 release is both immanent and holds its own.

Your products are amazing. You keep surprising me every time I look at your website and dying to find out what is next. Kryptomint is just another example of what a good job you all do in making men smell good. I have gotten so many compliments on this and all of your fragrance. Surpasses a lot of other fragrances out there.

Without question, Mugler colognes are quality, straightforward, complex, interesting, high-performance, adventurous, scents.

I am always asked what cologne I am wearing. Always--when I wear any of the Mugler fragrances and at times it is a tad embarrassing (long-distance flights by flight attendants, in crowds at restaurants, etc.)

My review succinctly states the truth of Mugler fragrances: These scents are not for the meek.

The day that Mugler weakens or cheapens their scents is the day I cease buying or recommending these exquisite vapors. 

All too often companies listen to the shrill voices out there who are the epitome of weak and complain and complain without offering nary an iota of proof or positive recommendation.

The prominent notes to this strong vibe are the germanium and the complex intertwining of patchouli.

As always the flask and design are top notch.
It’s an “OK” cologne with very little olfactory dimension. It smells like a sweet candy with very little mint scent. The Sillage is moderate and the longevity is moderate.

I can't enter a room without anyone close enough to me tracking me down to ask me what fragrance I am wearing. I constantly have to write down the name and website to find this elusive brand. I love the confidence that comes with knowing the subtle scent I am wearing drives people of all genders absolutely wild.

I bought this on a whim for my boyfriend. I previously had bought him your Amen Classic... wow, loved it on him! I thought the mint version would add the extra fresh, yum factor for summer, I was Very RIGHT! LOVE IT. I want a woman version.
Great for casual summer evenings. It's not too overbearing and the sillage is just perfect. I will definitely be keeping it in my collection.

I knew the second that my angel representative showed me this scent, that I would be buying it for my husband. It's nice to have a variation of the classic. This one smells so incredible, I would have loved something similar for women.
Amazing scent! I would tell it smells like delicate mint tone with dark chocolate undertone. I bought it for my husband, but going to keep it for myself.

I purchased this right at the release and have been using it for a couple of months now. This is a fantastic fresh, clean scent and I will be wearing it a lot this spring and summer. Many are comparing this to Ultra Zest, and while there is some similarity, this would not be redundant if you already have UZ. There is certainly a place for both in your wardrobe especially if you like mint, if you're a Mugler fan, or if you're a collector. Not a beast performer, but still very good. Not sure I'd wear this to work, but definitely good for casual situations. Will definitely purchase again in the future!

I read reviews before purchasing A*men Pure Coffee for my husbands birthday. I LOVE Pure Havane, it's my (our) very Favorite! The reviews said "if you like Havane, you'll like Coffee too". . . NOPE!!! I so do not like the smell, not enjoyable to me at all. I can't really describe it but can say it's not at all like Havane. He has made it his "work" cologne and what's left of Havane is his "wifey" cologne. . .
We are good customers of Mugler, I asked if I could exchange for Havane. . . Mugler failed on customer service as they didin't even respond. . .
So. . .IF you like Havane. . .do NOT buy Coffee, stick with what you know and love.

This is EXACTLY what I've been looking for, and it's relatively affordable. I'm on a tight budget, but I've decided that there are certain necessities in my life that are worth spending my hard earned money on. A Great Cologne Like this is Worth Every Penny, so I feel it's my DUTY to report my findings. And I find this to be One of the Best Colognes I've Ever Worn. It's Unbelievably Sensual & Alluring. I'm a Casual Guy, I'm not a Night Person, I don't go to Fancy Restaurants, nor do I date Glamorous Women. And that's no offense to Women, I just prefer Natural Fragrances that will attract Natural & Earthy Women. I do alot of Home Cooking and I'm an Absolute Coffee Fanatic. 20 yrs ago I used be a Home Coffee Roaster and Roasting Coffee creates an Outstanding Room Aroma. That's what this Cologne reminds me of. The Aroma is Absolutely Delicious. For as long as Pure Coffee is Available, it will be a Mainstay in my Collection. And for the foreseeable future, it will be my Number 1 Go to Fragrance, for my Casual Lifestyle.
Love the fragrance, the smell is subtle and not over powering. Lasts for about 5-6hrs.

I purchased this scent as an alternative to my girlfriends all time favorite, A*Men. I love coffee, and so does she, so I thought it would be worth a shot. Although, the coffee notes are not strong at all (I actually did not smell coffee, nor did she) it was still quite an amazing cologne. The smell is amazingly masculine, has a deep rich note. It rivals A*Men, and it is hands down my girlfriend's favorite. When I wear this out, she cannot keep her hands off me. I'll gladly buy she whole wear house as long as this keeps happening. It's a must buy for all men!

column6: Pure Wood is a forest of sensuality!
column7: Wearing Pure Wood transports you to an enchanted forest! The
Wonderful, smooth, masculine fragrance - yummm! Oh, I almost forgot, sensual.....
This is my favorite scent in this line, makes me feel warm and fuzzy, and always...always get compliments when I am wearing it!

I am so happy that I took a chance and purchased this before even sampling it. I am far from disappointed! I am a female and I love wearing mens colognes that dont smell too manly. I can easily get away with this one. It has a strong scent of coffee but pleasant finish that adds a little bit of mystery to what you are wearing. I cant wait for the weather to get a little bit colder so I can rock this one. I love TM Pure Malt, that is my favorite of all time and I get countless compliments when I wear that one too!

Amen has been a favourite of mine since it first arrived in London in 1996 (having tried a sample in Harrods a woman stopped me in the street and said 'are you wearing Amen?' - which for me is enough motivation to wear it!).

I first bought Amen Pure Coffee in London some years ago. I'm now in Palm Springs, California, where it seems fewer men wear cologne and I'd missed out on the many variations on the Amen theme.

I found Amen Pure Coffee available here on Mugler USA (a 're-release') and bought a bottle. Mugler's order processing wasn't nearly as smooth and efficient as I'd have liked (it was over the Christmas/New Year holiday) but as this is a fragrance review I'll say no more.

As it was in London, when wearing Amen Pure Coffee both men and women compliment me on my cologne. One person said it was 'an aphrodisiac'! Be bold, self assured, and wear Amen Pure Coffee; you will garner attention.

Having described the 'Amen effect', the fragrance itself is of course traditional Amen with more than an accent of coffee. There's patchouli and chocolate (as in the original Amen fragrance) with a delicious coffee note, strong roasted coffee. It is perhaps not for everyone (coffee haters?) and perhaps not for everyday. I would wear Amen in London at work, but I tend to reserve Pure Coffee for the evening.

If you like Amen but haven't sampled the other 'Pure' fragrances you owe it to yourself to try them. I loved Pure Coffee.

Pure Havane surprised me and I have been wearing that at least as much as Pure Coffee. I'm looking forward to trying Pure Malt. Pure Leather, and 2014's Pure Wood.
Great scent for first 15 mins and then completely dies! Gone in less than 1 hr. Over priced and over rated!!
I am so glad this limited edition was brought back - i absolutely love this scent and the way it lingers on my skin.

I love "Coffee" but I can't say what ingredients stand out with the scent since they're a 'secret' by the TM people unlike "Havane" et al. It's NOT an overpowering scent though like many of the A-Men products. I wish "Coffee" was on the TM regular inventory...since I LOVE coffee! I've been a customer for 25+ years and I'm not going anywhere. Thanks Thierry Mugler!

I gave my husband Pure Coffee when it came out a few years ago. It was a limited addition. My husband loved the scent and we couldn't get it again. I am so glad that it came back for the 2014 Holidays. Out of the AMen Collection, Pure Coffee is the best. I wish it was out all the time. Highly recommend. Not as strong as the original AMen scent with a hint of coffee.
Having collected all of the fragrances for men. I had to have this on as well. It did not disappoint.

I am so glad Pure coffee was re issued. I have wanted it forever but it was never available. And boy did I search. I love all the A*men line but my new favorite is by far pure coffee. What I really like is that the coffee note really is prominent in the opening and it fades then comes back. Its just a very satisfying fragrance and IMHO the best coffee based scent I have tried. I have all ready bought a back up bottle and plan to get more. Performance on this is excellent. It lasts forever and it keeps projecting for that whole time. I cant think of a downside. A*men for pure coffee!

column6: Worth every penny and then some
column7:
So if you are reading this you are probably on the fence about pure coffee. Maybe you have seen the secondary market prices on ebay when it was unavailable or maybe you saw reviews saying it wasnt what people hoped it would be. Let me make one thing perfectly clear. Pure coffee is a scent that is magnetic. Addictive almost. You may at first smell wonder what is the hype all about? But trust me after that first full wearing you will be pulling for this bottle and you wont even be thinking about it. Some people feel they dont get much coffee in it. IMHO the coffee is very prominent in pure coffee. What it lacks is the intense tar note that gives it the strong burnt coffee smell in the original A*men. The coffee in pure coffee is just that. Pure coffee. And while I feel it may not at first be as strong as the original the coffee in this flanker keeps coming back where as in the original you dry down to a simply chocolate/vanilla combo after a couple hours.

I honestly think that any negative review on this scent are fueled more for a dislike for the price gouging that was taking place when it wasnt readily available. People were seeing this going for $300 a bottle and their expectations inflated along with the price. But now its a no brainer. My best advice is to try it and more than just one time. You will find that it has a magnetic aura about it that at first may not grab you but will surely grow on you if given the chance. It went from being my least favorite of the pure line to being my number one scent overall in my whole collection. I even bought a backup and plan on getting a few more. Its that good.

Memory may not serve me well, but I remember the original Pure Coffee filling my nose with the rich odor of coffee so rich you could almost taste it! This batches' brew misses by a long shot. None of my friends upon whom I forced a rest smell could even recognize coffee in the fragrance. Further, The flat fragrance disappoints on every count. It is not interesting as. Also, there is no complexity of oder notes that enrich the original coffee offering. Even the packaging fails. The original presentation of Pure Coffee in department stores like Macy's presented the new Angel offering in burlap sacks (with real coffee beans offered for comparison, as I remember the displays). The current offering presents the bottle with a large and tacky foil star, the east appealing bottle design of any Angel offering I can recall. All and all a flat cologne from the fragrance to the bottle display.

column6: A little disappointed in this fragrance
column7: Pure coffee is not of my taste. The fragrance doesn't appeal to me at all. I only purchased it only to add to my perfume collection!
I used " PURE COFFEE" before in London and I am so happy that now available in U.S. highly recommended.

I find Thierry Mugler fragrances surprising. They always start with fierce and displeasent notes, then become addictive and sweet.

Pure Coffee starts with sharp, bitter notes which I do enjoy but its not for everyone. For 1-2 hours, i smell extremely strong coffee and woody notes.

After that 1-2 hours, the addictive heart notes start to get noticed. Very sweet and delicious coffee makes me want to smell it again and again.

Drydown stays very close to skin, it is almost impossible to be detected. But it lasts very well for 10 hours on my skin. So, the life of the scent is 12+ hours on me.

The opening notes are a bit harsh and displeasent. I guess some people will find it unwearable because of those opening notes. But once you reach the drydown, it is worth that displeasent opening notes.

The drydown of the fragrance is as precious and hard to find as the gold in the ads.

Pure Coffee DNA stays close to the Original A*Men and last the same amount of time. Very excited when Thierry Mugler announced a re-release. Buy this fragrance as quick as possible though only USA and the UK are selling it on their websites. Ebay sells used bottles for $200+
This is a great fragrance but a little sweeter than I expected. Still very nice fragrance.
Pure Coffee is by far My favorite. It has a sweet and handsome smell.

Honestly, I was so excited when I received this new fragrance. Initially was a little disappointed. But it's growing on me. And I got a compliment from a woman on it so I'm going to give it a thumbs up for now. It's kind of subtle compared to the A* Men Havana. I love Angel Products. I'm going to try the Malt or Pure Wood next time.
The fresh scent of Pure Energy is captivating. The moment you spray Pure Energy on your skin, you transform into an ambassador of sensory titilation.
Fresh, clean and oh so heavenly! Perfect Spring and Summer scent but I love it so much I want my boyfriend to wear it into Fall. I will absolutely make sure his bottle never remains empty for long.

I am a Thierry Mugler Addict, but who cares! This scent is amazing. It is fresh, invigorating, and very sexy. I bought a bottle for my husband, he loves it and I am crazy about it. I will be ordering another flask soon for him. I would definitely recommend for summer use.
I purchased this for my husband for Father's Day. Havane is my all time favorite.
This is my favorite fragrance !! Havane will always be my favorite!!

column6: Thank you for a great sent
column7: Love it  very good sent very original love it must have in your collection

column6: The leader in the compliment department
column7: I have a lot of Mugler cologne but this is hands down the one people like the most. I wear it at any time of day but for me, it is especially suited for evening and cooler weather. Living in the Bay Area, lucky for me, I have occasions all the time to wear this and I do. When I'm not sure what I'm in the mood to wear, I know I will never be disappointed with Pure Havane!
I like the opening scent of honey tobacco, but love the dry off at the end when it smells like cherries.

This fragrance is one of the best in the world so refreshing and clean!!
Every where I go people ask what's that fragrance your wearing it smells so good on you, and I just smile and say it's a limited edition...

I've been reading the reviews on this particular Pure Havane cologne. And I finally went out and purchased it. For me wearing a brand new cologne the testing site is my office. if I get reaction from anyone, then its a keeper. If I don't get a response, then I chuck it or give it away. Well, this one is a KEEPER!! I waited for the ladies to come in and I received an immediate response to the scent. One of the ladies in my office got a whiff and stated that it had the scent of honey/tobacco/vanilla all rolled into one. Very sexy she added. Jackpot and Bulls eye!! This is the type of scent I've always wanted. On payday I'm going to get me another bottle cause I know it will go fast from where I bought it. 
T. Stewart

column6: It is becoming my favorite flagrance among A-men
column7: I have 5 different flagrance for A-men. Honestly, I was hooked on the whiskey one :) then I discovered Havana and I have to say "les nez" did an amazing job. It's musky, smokey, strong at the beginning and then it slowly fades away in a subtle smell I really really like. The pleasure of the scent without the guilt of having to smoke a cigar or travel to Havana.

Warm, full, strong, manly, smile-inspiring cologne that every guy should try.
1st Thierry Mugler experience, and it was well worth it. I wore it during a very warm season in Nairobi, Kenya.., so the scent wore off quicker during the day than at night.
Blended well with my body and it hung just within the right radius around me, didn't overpower people but definitely got noticed :)
Compliments from the ladies started on day 1.., with some asking openly!
Delightful fragrance, will miss this one since its almost out and I have a '1 bottle-Dont-repeat' cologne policy [it will be years before I can go for it again]
I love this fragrance for the winter months. The scent is warm and sexy

I have been a fan of Angel Men ever since it came out. It remains my favorite to this day.

This Pure Havane is a very close second. It is one of just a few of the Limited Editions that doesn't just play on the original. It is a scent all it's own. 

To me, this is much better than Tobacco Vanille. The fact that it is so much less expensive is just an added bonus.

This one is a must-have.

This cologne is quite different and quite the aroma I was looking for. I'm not sure I could have designed this any better. Looking forward to new and interesting men's fragrances. Oh, and my wife likes it as well.
I purchased this as a gift for my son. Both he and his fiancé love it!! Now my husband wants some too!!!

I'm a 54 year old Military Vet. For the past 15 years I've worn nothing but woman's Angel,absolutely nothing else. Woman know me by my smell, some say it arrives before I do. They as myself loves the way it mixes with my bodies own sent. I've got a large bottle as well as the lotion in my bathroom, smaller Star bottle in my SUV and small samples in my shaving kit. I've gone everywhere with Angel. I was recently in the Forum at Caesar's Palace in Vegas,the female clerk at Versace recognize my scent and asked me if I have tried to A*men. I told her I had not and she told me by all means give it a try.
I did! Now I've got A*men in my Bathroom,SUV and shaving kit along side my Angel. My biggest decision of the day is which one to wear......you've created a Mugler Monster !!!!!

This is a very good scent for wearing out on a late summer night on the town. You have the great top and base notes of A*Men that is augmented with an additional layer of earthiness that has been crisped with the smell of honey. This is a definitely good EDT for wearing at a 5* restaurant or night club on the beaches. This will turn heads.

I am definitely a tobacco fragrance fanatic. My favorite is Harod by Parfums De Marly. This one is definitely close to Harod. This juice has more of a cherry vibe to the tobacco. Its a must have flanker!
One of the best fragrances I own, a must add to your collection.

This has become my go to scent from A*Men. I have been using Mugler products for probably 12 years. I always try the new scents when they come out, but I find myself going back to Pure Havane. I'm constantly getting compliments on it as well. I just purchased my 4th bottle and it won't be my last.
Havane is my favorite scent of the Mugler family! The aromatic formula reminds me so much of the loose tobacco in the airtight container of my father's pipe. Please never stop producing Havane!

column6: My husband loves it and he smells so good
column7: My husband loves it and he smells so goodhe says everybody at work wants to get next to him and smell his neck

I gave this to myseld without smelling 1st, because I read the reviews on the Best Colonges for Men. It rated in the top 10 . What caught my interest was the description with Tobacco leaves and Tonka Beans. I worked in the Tobacco Industry for 31 years and found it fasinating that there was a Fragrance with a desireable note of Tobacco in it . Was curious and took the leap of faith online and bought it . I'm very happy and satisfied with the experiance with this scent. And the "Limited Edition" aspect also steered me into trying it. It has staying power thru sweat and over night sleeping even .
I call pure havane the love juice everyone loves to smell this juice on me
This is the Best! Perfect for Autumn. After the initial sweet cherry scent mellows out you're left with a confident masculine aroma that receives many compliments.

It is very nice fragrance which has a rich and deep smell. Unfortunately A*Men Pure Havane is very difficult to find outside U.S.A since 2014 ! why?

I wrote a review about it on my blog among (Within) the best fragrance for men

here's the link : http://www.aperfume.info/fragrance/best-perfume-for-men/
What can I say, the scent smells heavenly. Very manly but not over powering. It last a long time and you don't get tired of the scent.
My Favorite cologne. Sweet and masculine at the same time. Like smoking a cigar in a honey comb. No other fragrance is like it.
Great to wear when smoking cigars. I recommend this product.
Thank you so much for this blend of cologne. It smells absolutely wonderful on my husband. It is his new favorite cologne.
This is my favorite of all the men's products and the one I have gotten the most comments on.

This is my first purchase from the A*Men line. I actually blind bought my Pure Havane based on the many positive reviews. My local Macy's only carries orginal A*Men, Pure Malt, and Pure Zest. I've sampled all three and they were pretty good, my favorite of the three being Pure Malt. However, I was very interested in trying Pure Havane because the notes sound more to my liking. I must say, once I received my order in the mail and sprayed on that first much anticipated spray on my arm... Wow! I would have to say this is slightly better than Pure Malt, and Pure Malt is a gold medal. Pure Havane is a double gold.

I recently began collecting men's colognes. I bought this gem in the middle of summer in anticipation for the autumn and winter months. After reading all of the reviews, I was excited to try this stuff. Honestly, when I first sprayed Pure Havane on my wrist, I was sort of disappointed. It smelled raw and dirty, and the dry down was...mehhh. However, I did not lose hope and continued testing it on my skin. Now, I think this stuff is freaking amazing!

I believe the problem was that I was accustomed to the "cleaner" linear scent profile of most men's colognes. Thierry Mugler pushes the boundaries with his Angel Men series. His colognes have incredibly unique smells that are FAR different from what other guys are wearing!

Pure Havane opens with a blast of synthetic cherry, honey, and dried tobacco leaves. I can also pick up a very faint burnt resinous note which I assume is the infamous tar note of the original Angel Men. After about 10-20 minutes, PH tones down to a smooth honey tobacco scent with maybe a tiny bit of vanilla in the background. I would describe this cologne is sweet and dirty, but in a good way. With 3 sprays: one on the front of the neck, back of the neck, and chest, I get about 5-6 hours of good/great sillage and projection. After that, it becomes and skin scent of which vanilla and cocoa dominate (kind of sort of akin to the A*Men DNA). You will smell it on your clothes days later.

I believe PH is for the cooler days/night of autumn and winter. If you want to wear this in the summer, I advise no more than two sprays. Heat and sweating can make this stuff too cloying, especially due to the heavy, raw tobacco leaf note. In my opinion, PH gets a 9 out of 10.

I have angel men, pure malt ,mugler cologne and now pure havane! All of these fragrances are amazing in their own way, but I will say that the pure havane got me more compliments the first week than all of the others combined. Blast of cherry on the top notes than it becomes more of a creamy vanilla and tobacco scent that stays with you all day, even after you think it has died down people will still notice it. I have about a fifty bottle collection and this is without a doubt one of my personal favorites!

Pure Havane and Pure Coffee are my two favourites when it comes to a night out and 'making a statement'.

The description says 'honeyed tobacco', but I often have a strong scent of cherries within moments of spraying Pure Havane. Some people online have mentioned this and I agree; it soon changes to a smooth tobacco fragrance but the first 'hit' always puts a smile on my face.

Like Pure Coffee #described by someone as 'an aphrodisiac'# Pure Havane will attract attention. One woman I know says 'I love seeing you, you smell so good!' So be warned, Pure Havane may wreck your marriage.
My this was a blind buy watching dracdoc youtube channel. This is awesome juice. This juice is heavily complicated by The ladies and even more by men
This is my 7th Mugler fragrance and I just can't get away from them. Although this is not my favorite I use it quite frequently and my wife loves it.
This is a great masculine fragrance that I have been using for years.

I purchased thus for my 17 yr old son after he smelled tom ford fragrance which was called tobacco. due to the cost and my love for angel for myself I felt this would be a good one for him to try and it was a success
wears it daily

I bought this cologne for my husband for his birthday and he just loves it!!! I think it smells sooooo good on him. I was so pleased when I ordered the product from this website and had it delivered to my door the very next day. How professional your company is made a good impression along with your wonderful smelling perfumes and colognes. You got my vote:)

I love Mugler's fragrances, especially Angel Men and those scent in Pure line, it's very fantastic, it's very mystic, i had a very complicated feeling, like i just stepped in fairy land, so curious obviously. To me this is heaven, this is niche quality. The combination of the notes is more than amazing, tobacco and honey are kinda classic and masculine, Cacao and vanilla are truly delicious, sweet and quite modern. unforgettable.

I bought this fragrance after using the online application to determine what Thierry Mugler fragrance would best fit me. Already an avid Angel wearer I knew whatever the system said would evoke similarities to Angel yet take it to another level.. I was right even after doing the test 3 times 2 out of 2 Pure Havane was listed as the best one for me. Purchasing sight un-smelled is risky however in this case was righ ton point – the Smokiness of Cuban cigars – the hint of vanilla and cocoa and a ting of honey make this a head turner and winner. If you aren’t used to scents that speak on your behalf as assertive and confident yet subtly sweet this ain’t for you….

I picked this one up after my new signature scent Pure Malt. Which I can't say enough good things about, even rockin it in the summer folks! Anyhow Pure Havane is as close second. Love the A*Men DNA with the honey n tobacco,and the dry down is amazing! Compliments all around the board from every age group.
Love this scent on my husband! My favorite...please never discontinue!!
When women smell this cologne on me it places them in Heaven or Havane !!
I Love it when ladies walk by and come back and ask what cologne is that?

You need to get this one. It is Cary Grant, Humphrey Bogart and Clark Gable in a bottle. You smell like a classic gentleman, not some over the top citrus explosion most men's fragrances seem to be nowadays. The tobacco and vanilla blend beautifully, making you smell masculine and unlike anyone else. This should NOT be a limited edition. It is that good. Buy it.

Guys, you and Thierry have come up with Fabulous scents but this one has GONE TO THE STARS!!!!!!! This is the best of the best. I have worn it in the samples. It stayed on for all day and the hotter my body got....the Havane came back active and won praises. Every male and female asked me what it was. I gladly told them. I am not one who says thank you and do not say the brand name. The first limited edition I wore was the one made in the Oaken Barrels. I was sick for days when it went away. PLEASE DO NOT DO THIS TO HAVANE. I am buying the bottle spray. I always love the samples. I live in a town that does not have the ability to carry your products. So, I go to Dallas and buy it from the Store that is a institution of class and style in Texas. I Believe every one in the USA knows the name but I will not say it here. This is how I got to know Thierry about 25 years ago. I have counted on you to keep this 65 year old man unique. Please keep up the good work and know that I came into this world with baby powder and I will leave this world wearing Thierry Mugler. Cannot wait for the future of your progucts and what you come up with for your loyal patrons. You are the BEST!!!!!

I have purchased 4 bottles of this product... basically because I was told it is limited and will not be made again.... I think that you should continue to make this product and do NOT discontinue it.... I realize this was seasonal or special but guys when you knock one out of the park you need to keep this in the line up !!

I have purchased many colognes in my lifetime, but none I have enjoyed more than Pure Havane. It lasts long and the scent is purely unique. I have never received so many compliments than I do when I wear Havane. It is an exceptional product!

Got no words to describe this scent! Huclier was really inspired by the time he created it! Just awesome fragrance! Love all Thierry Mugler's male line, but this is my favorite! Have no doubt about it! As I said at Taste of Fragrance's review, please, this CANNOT be a limited scent, you HAVE to keep this at the permanent catalog of the brand!
The original A*Men is my favorite men's fragrance. I bought Pure Havane for my Cuban boyfriend and love it. It is a very masculine fragrance without be over-powering.
Hot and smoken fragrance. You won't smell like any other guy. This stuff works with the warm blooded athlete when you want to be more refined.

column6: A man's fragrance for all time
column7:
I happened upon original A*Men during the summer of 2002 while traveling through Zurich Switzerland and immeadiately elevated Thierry Mugler to #1 in my world of fragrance. As the calendar pages have changed during the years since that magical summer, I've looked forward to exploring every new fragrance that Thierry has delivered to my local fragrance boutique. There is one that stands above them all - and that one is A*Men Pure Havane.

Crafted like no other "tobacco" fragrance I've experienced, A*Men Pure Havane provides an delightfully elegant aroma that is at once sublime and pure masculinity. The spirit of fine cigar leaf tobacco is conveyed among a truly unique combination of notes that provides a delightful presence in any surrounding. The spontaneous compliments from waitpersons, relatives, and occasional complete strangers is testimony enough. But even if I never heard a peep out of anyone, I'd still treasure my A*men Pure Havane as one of the simple pleasures of joyful living. Merci beaucoup Monsieur Mugler.

Despite being sweet with notes of honey, chocolate, and vanilla, Pure Havane is certainly masculine. It isn’t super “interesting” but it is so good and something that I’d wear frequently. I can’t stop sniffing my wrist when wearing it. This is how it differs from other tobacco vanillas on the market which are sweet and more feminine and “round”. The herbal, green tobacco and bitterness make Pure Havane more masculine. This is the top, it fades and most of the wear is a vanilla tobacco. I know that myself and many other can wear this fragrance easily. Just get it if you like tobacco fragrances.
The scent of expensive cigars and a fresh smoked pipe all rolled up in one fragrance.

I first smelled Pure Havane on my boss, and I had to asked what he was wearing. It fragrance was amazing. It is a heavy masculine scent and reminds me of an expensive cigar or cigar humidor. The tobacco leaf scent is amazing, but there are hints of sweetness, cedar...it is an amazing fragrance and now everyone asked what my husband wears. I have several friends and family who have now purchased it for their significant other.

I have owned Angel Men since it first came out. I would estimate that I am on my 7th or 8th bottle. It will always be my go-to fragrance.

I started buying the Limited Editions and they have been hit or miss. Best: Pure Havanne. Worst: Pure Leather. 

I do not understand how something can smell this bad. After I tried it the first time, I had to scrub it off. I decided to give it a chance weeks later and put in on lightly and left the house. In the car, hot day, windows up, AC on, I became nauseous. I had to pull off the road and exit the car for what happened next. Use your imagination. 

I have allergies to certain things but a fragrance has never made me ill. 

If you are considering this one, please try it first.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I love A Men original. Unfortunately I am not a fan of the leather version. In my opinion it smells more like asphalt than leather. I would not recommend this.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
Although I'm a big fan of MOST mugler colognes and perfumes.
Pure leather is not one of my favorite. Its a personal preference and its not my type of scent.
Its exactly as stated. Smells like a leather seated car on a warm day.
If your a fan if leather,then I would suggest it.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column6: its warm sweet yet masculine and makes a statement
column7: bought it for bf and he and i both love it. it lasts and the scent gets even better as it starts to combine with your own chemestry. i cant get enough of it i love every whiff of aroma that floats up in the air as he moves and i follow him around whenever he is wearing it which is all the time lately. the pure leather it arousing and sensual yet extrememly masculine,
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Imagine your face buried in a vintage leather jacket and the fragrance of chocolate, vanilla and leather embraces your shoulders from behind. That's Angel leather for Men
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This was a blind buy and when I got it , I have to admit I found it a little strong. But one thing I did notice is that it lasted all day on me. Angel and pure malt will fade, but this one has an amazing life. After an hour, it becomes a really arousing scent. Then with about a week of using it, I noticed how great it worked with my chemistry. I love it. Sometimes I wear it together with pure wood. I would definitely recommend it! Make sure to wear it for a few days and you will see how it grows on you.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
I love Alien and must have used over 6 bottles over 2 years. I have also bought womanity and angel.The spray seems to have a problem with the alien I bought .I had a problem with my spray amd it was clogged and started streaming down the bottle when i sprayed.i used most of my perfume like that.Wiping it from the side of the bottle and rubbing it on my wrist.I bought my perfume at PARCOS an perfume store outlet at Bombay airport.I had paid via credit card so i even had proof.They refused to change my bottle .Was rather disappointed after spending a hundred dollars!i feel my bottle should be replaced by Mugler.i still continue using the perfume in this way.i tried looging on to write an email complaint -but have not been successful.pls forward this to the correct person who can address my problem
I
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This is my second bottle and I would not have normally bought a second bottle because the first bottle had a defective spray and came out in a stream. I bought it at Macy's and they would do nothing to help. Long story short, this is a limited cologne and I will miss it when it's gone. It reminds me of the incense burned in church at a funeral. That may be weird to some, but I have always liked that scent.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column6: A Great Addition To My Collection!
column7: I love colognes and this one is great. It is like a sweet leather jacket wrapping you up in its yummy goodness! It is also like no other cologne I have had before, which is also nice! I high recommend this to try!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: PURE LEATHER like the other A*MEN flankers is amazing! I love them smell of it. It truly does smell like A*MEN & Leather. It is a very high quality leather aroma, not cheap leather. I think this version is the most pleasant to the palette, and the most non-offensive (for those who think the others can be strong). I personally like the strong, bold versions as well. Which leads me to the only down side of this fragrance. Maybe being that it isn't as strong as the others.. it DOESN'T LAST VERY LONG at all.. I get MAYBE 3 hours.. TOP! and for a Thierry Mugler frangrance that is short-lived for sure, but then again, I am a guy who likes to combine original A*MEN (a few sprays) with the original EDP ANGEL (a couple sprays) for that amazingly "ANGELic" aroma. I love all of these A*MEN flankers.. they are amazing, and definitely an important part of my fragrance collection. My favorite is still PURE HAVANE though (Pure perfection). Mmmmm. Thank you again to Thierry Mugler and Company for concocting these masterpieces! A loyal fan, Scottie.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This has become my favorite cologne. It was chosen for me by a woman who LOVED it. When I wear it I get compliments like never before. I wish I had a lifetime supply of Pure Leather...! The only downfall is that it is apparently a "special" or a "limited" edition. It is refreshing and sexy. Thanks for creating it.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: a friend referred this cologne to me and it did not disappoint.
very happy with this great cologne, i am very happy ctmer,

column6: Solid Masculine Scent Without Cloying Residuals
column7: This cologne arrived a bit over a month ago. Previously, I had purchased A*Men Pure Wood and was satisfied. Pure Malt hides a hint of leather underneath the more obvious influences. I can wear this year-round as an evening scent, and it is a splendid autumn and winter cologne for daytime hours.

I bought this scent after seeing an exposition on Thierry Mugler at Montreal's Musee des Beaux Arts and after having read a description of the scent.  Well, the scent is beautiful, but it fades quickly.  I wear cologne for my own pleasure, so that I can sniff my wrist from time to time and enjoy the fragrance.  This just doesn't last very long.
I personally have been wearing Angel for 12 years exclusively. I love this product, when I decided to purchase the scent for my husband I was addicted.
Amazing sent must have in your collection get compliments all the time lasts a long time on my skin
A very unique scent. Smells like a Dunhill fragrance I used to use a lot. Love it!

This is my first of many Mugler buys. My wife and I were shopping and she asked me to spray it on to see how it smelled on me. Boy was it a surprise!!! I loved it, she loved it and the perfume counter saleswoman loved it too! I had to get it! Now I am going to get the pure Havana.

I just want to thank the woman who took my most recent order. Thank you for the samples I requested such great customer service, very pleasant and a celestially special person. I know you told me your name, unfortunately I am terrible with names so forgive me. Well, be Celestially Blessed!
Like all your scents absolutely fabulous. Thank you for the samples also. Over the musk is unbelievable. Mark
Amen i do recommend it to all men trust me you will love it and so will she

column6: you need this in your collection
column7: i've been collecting for about 30 years , since high school. i have notice lately that all of my fragrances smell alike. i also grown bored with smelling most of the scents i have use over the years , so i shop at the mall. over the course of a month of trying out all types of fragrances . this is your clear winner! . it is a stand out in my collection , nothing smells like it. the women love it. i tried it last nite at the club and women where talking to me and giving me hugs like i was justin bieber (seasoned of course). i could have brought from the mall but i brought from mugler . i wanted to make sure this gem is authentic.

column6: a warm spalsh of bourbon with dark chocalate syrup
column7:
On a cool April day I first experienced Pure Malt. That night my lover, Marisol and I were wrapped in a blanket of warm boozy chocolate scents that lasted the whole night. Mugler really created an amazing sensual scent in PURE MALT that has drawn many more lovers of all ages to me. 
A soft leather jacket, a sweet black cherry cigarillo and a few sprays of Pure Malt is all one needs to be mysterious yet comforting and irresistible. Cheers my fellow PURE lovers and God Bless the USA.
If you ever want your women or man love you! You will buy this and wearing it proudly because all hands down this is the best cologne ever created!

I'm actually at this union convention in Illinois and I'm at a meet an greet with the fellas drinking watching the game and having conversations 

But I can't stop smelling myself
I'm very pleased with my purchase of Pure Malt. It's a very beautiful and unique scent. Masculine, sweet but not cloying and long lasting. I will definitely buy again.
It's a beautiful boozy fragrance that is a perfect evening/date scent. I love it!!!

Exceptional! I usually don't do reviews but I had to for this one. By far the best perfume in my collection so far. Nothing smells like Pure Malt out there. I like it so much I sometimes just spray it on before going to bed. It is VERY sweet and noticeable so if sweet scents are not for you I would not recommend it. I wear it at night but I can't wait for the colder season to start wearing permanently. 
And I should mention that I blind bought this and have ZERO regret.

column6: Smells good, but try before you buy
column7: I really liked the smell of this fragrance, but it did not project or last on my skin. Within about 20 minutes it dried down and people would have to literally put their nose to my skin to smell it. So, for the price of this, I wouldn't buy it again, but on someone else's skin, you might get good projection and longevity. So try a sample first and see how it lasts before buying. The same effect happened to me with PL,PC and PW.
Excellent fragrance, a close second to pure havane. This addition will definitely diversify your cologne collection.
THIS IS MY HUSBANDS FAVORITE COLOGNE,MINE TOO!! IT SMELLS VERY GOOD AND STAYS THERE THE ENTIRE DAY
I can't get enough of pure malt I love to spray this juice in cold weather

column6: And a fine spirit it is.
column7: I love the organic scents that come through in Pure Malt, and it's lasting power throughout the day. As a connoisseur of Smoky, Peaty Single Malts, I appreciate the connection that Thierry Mugler has made between a man and the commanding image he presents when using this cologne. I always get compliments when wearing it. I urge every man to try it, and unleash the spirit that awaits you in Pure Malt.
Pure Malt by Thierry Mugler is a great scent.Very inviting,warm,sweet,boozy,and best of all ladies love this one...
Just the right balance. Spicy , yet something sweet. Been trying so many, but haven't found anything like it. So close to me.
Its my second bottle of purchasing. I truly love it, I get tons of compliments when I wear it. You cant go wrong with Pure Malt.
One of my all-time favorites.Followed by Pure Havane

i have experienced a lot of good colognes in my day.. and I must honestly say that nothing has come close to the Angel Malt... I walked into work sat at my cubical.. and within 5 minutes 3 different women had to come back as ask what do I have on... just wait till I hit the club tonight...lol.. worth the money.. it is very strong so dont over do it.. .but this is an investment that is well with it A+

This is one of my top favorite fragrances from Thierry Mugler. Pure Malt is just different. Not everyone wears it, and it only fits with the people who are aggressively fun and mysterious.
Must have for anyone.

I am a female who regularly wears Alein and Angel and always enjoyed the
attention those scents seem to attract; however, it was time for something new. Yes, I am wearing this daily and getting compliments everywhere I go. Completely unique, not too overwhelming... love it!

Great smell, a lot of complements, I am very happy with this purchase,
Thanks.
Every women that smells this cologne on me gotta' have it, The question becomes.... Is it me or the aroma (cologne) they must have ?

Pure Malt is a total work of olfactory art, as it combines whiskey with citrus-tinged sandalwood notes to produce a hypnotic scent. My girlfriend can't seem to remove her face from my neck anytime I wear this and she begs me to wear it regularly. Meanwhile she wears Angel which has the same effect on me. Mr. Mugler has created not just a fragrance, but a powerful drug with very desireable side effects. I hope this is never discontinued!

This fragrance is wonderful. When I wear it I feel so confident. You would not believe how many compliments I get when I'm wearing this fragrance. I actually had one lady follow me around the office building before finally stopping me to ask what fragrance I was wearing! It's my "go to" Fall sent.

This is the first but certainly not last fragrance I buy from Thierry Mugler, it is a beautifully crafted scent. It starts very woodsy, then drys to a smoky caramel whiskey, not super sweet or cloying. It is a man amongst men scent, I mean what's more manly than whiskey? This is a definite buy for anyone looking for something for the fall, the first time I wore this, I couldn't stop pulling up my collar for a whiff, it's that intoxicating.
This is one of the most beautiful and unique fragrances I've ever smelled. I'll wear it for the rest of my life if Thierry Mugler keeps producing it.

This cologne is what a man's cologne should smell like. It changes from opening to dry down but each change is wonderful, at least on my skin. The chocolate/caramel smell comes thru as well as a deep smokiness. It is one of my favorite cologne. For a man it is hard to find something that smells nice and lasts, this does both.

Pure Malt is one of my favorite. I like the clean and unique smell. I have others that cost more but seem to be similar to many others. More than any other cologne I am ask what I am wearing from friends to complete strangers. Being unusual and limited I know when I go out it is different and not something everyone has. It is good to be different.

I love all the Mugler Men's products, but I have to say that that Pure Malt and Pure Havane are my two favorite of the whole A*Men collection. They are similar scents to one another, but Pure Malt, is a little lighter and not as heavy of a scent, as that of Pure Havane- with the tobacco, which stands out. Pure Malt has more of a, almost caramelized liquor overtone, which is enjoyable- and I get many compliments on.

I wear these two different scents on different occasions... Pure Havane, is my going out to dinner with a large group of friends at a nice restaurant, and having drinks later and dancing, scent.- it tends to keep its scent strength and can overpower a small group dinner.. and Pure Malt is what I wear for business dinners, and happy hour meetings, where there are less people, in a more intimate setting.

If you want an good general purpose A*Men scent- which can be great for casual and formal settings, and again, isn't overpowering. I'd go with Pure Malt.
I like this smell a lot! I can't stop smelling myself!
Any and every time I use a Thierry Muglar fragrance I get recognized and complimented.  The scents are not overbearing but rather subdued to the point of attraction!
I have several A*Men colognes, but this is my favorite...warm spicy aroma with hints of coffee and sandlewood. Long lasting also. Highly recommended!
I blindly bought this sent since I love Mugler it is great a must have

I got a sample of this to test try it and this is in the same family as Bond No 9 New Harleem but I believe this is better because it is more complex and the price is just right for this one. You smell honey, vanilla, chocolate, pineapple in the tops just like in Angel and as it developes you begin to smell throughout this whole fragrance a cherried Tonka bean..as this fragrance gets to the dry down you begin to smell the aroma of fresh roasted coffee well blended in...this is a excellent fragrance that should never be discontinued...it is a crowed pleaser and a wonderful edition to the Mugler house.
Pure Tonka is a wonderful scent for an all day wear. It last all day and even change to a more sophisticated scent in the evening. It’s a must have! I love it!

My man has several bottles of cologne I bought him. This by far is a favorite sent. It’s masculine yet airy. Great fragrance great job muller!

FYI I wear all the women’s perfumes. I just got aura. Omg it’s fantastic!

Once again Thierry Mugler delivers an excellent fragrance.

There is nothing like it!

The longevity is unbelievably long. Strong silage.
Second purchase of Tonka! Very bright and long lasting! Nothing but compliments everywhere I go.
A great product, free shipping and quick service ! What else could you want ?
I have received a lot of compliments, the most common is, "what are you wearing."

Bought this fragrance for my husbands upcoming birthday based on the reviews. I sure hope he likes it because i was VERY underwhelmed!
Last Mugler fragrance i bought him was Pure Wood...it smelled fabulous.
While i am grousing, i would like to know why there are never samples of the men's fragrances other than the original? Then i wouldn't have to rely on someone else's idea of what smells good?
This scent is the BEST one to come out since the original Angel. Lasts all day.
I reviewed some you tubers review's on this scent . The reviews were great so decided to give it a try. So glad I did. It's wonderful ,lasts a long time on my skin and gets lots of complements.

Pure Tonka, what a wonderful composition. This is one of my favorites, I give it a 9.5 out of 10 only because the atomizer can be somewhat hard to depress. 
 I made review videos on Pure Tonka and Pure Malt recently, Cfuture is the name of my channel (YouTube). 
 This is definitely gourmand and if you are in to sweet fragrances, this might be what you're looking for. It reminds of a Caramel Macchiato from a coffee house. Opens with a beautiful lavender as well. The Tonka is exquisite!
I don't mention the scent of this one. I love this scent so much, that's why I bought it. But the plastic that is used to make the bottle is not good. It's kind of faded when I opened the box.

I own several mugler colognes and pure Tonka is by far my favorite next to pure havane. This one has an alluring lavender and coffee combo to start. The Tonka starts to creep in creating a creamy feel in the middle. Round it off with the signature mugler DNA with some vanilla. Performance is awesome. Perfect for fall and winter. I'll be buying this as long as they continue to make this. I love it.

I've been using Mugler products for a couple of years now. A'Men is such a classic and this may be my favorite of its flankers. Tonka is sweet and projects really well. There's a hint of smokiness and subtle spice to make it welcoming and interesting but not overly sweet. It's a great balance. The longevity is exceptional. I couldn't be happier with Tonka.

I like to buy the "Limited Editions " for both men and women. My daughter-in-law likes the different colored bottles that the Angel fragrance comes in. She collects the different colors. I love to buy them the fragrance that they will wear. Also I like the fact that your fragrances aren't sold in stores.

OMG!!!I had bought this Amen Pure Tonka for my son for his birthday. And told him do not wear this cologne without your wife! All you Amen guys out there,only wear this if you're married and WITH YOUR wife. And you single guys,wear this if you're planning to marry the one you're with. I will not let my man walk out the door smelling like this without me! The women out here will be going crazy and would want to go home with him! This scent is AMAZING! I is so amazing,that I will buy one for when I get married again! Mugler,you did real good with this one!
Once again you have come through with a great fragrance for men. I love the way it dries down and smells so good for such a long time.
I love the fragrance. I already had Angel, Coffee and Wood. I love them all.
A*MEN Pure Tonka has an invigorating scent. It is warm and pleasant. Among all other A*MEN products, I found it outstanding . It is the ultimate ! Try it.
You guys did it again, another amazing fragrance, I love it.

Wow - one of my top three TM colognes.
Strong but mellow; it just has this amazing scent about it.
Have had a lot of compliments.
Still reading this? Go buy it now! ;-)-
Definitely has the A*Men DNA. After this bottle I would purchase another. Good buy

A new CLASSIC from the House of Mugler! 
LOVE IT!
A new MUST HAVE!

Just for the Helluv' it, I did a lap around the other counters of the Men's section... I can't be the only one who feels badly for the guys who blindly snatch-up the other brands, can I? TM doesn't attempt to lure us in with a picture of Johnny Depp, or some un-named model with a weird look on their face... But rather, the product simply sells itself. I'm more of an original AMen guy--having first bought the Mugler cologne, and have used two of the other species (Malt and Zest)--but one quick whiff of this was all it took to realize that this one's a keeper. Short of paying probably twice as much for one of those "couture" mens' fragrances....there's simply nothing else out there that has the unique properties of Mugler's offerings. 
 However... What's with the "enter your special code" nonsense? This makes my 10th purchase...and entering all of those codes has seen nothing but a couple of pencils find their way to my mailbox.

Amazing fragrance! Beaming with the AMen DNA that's definitely a huge compliment getter, the lavender and Tonka bean really shines in the first hour or so with the vanilla and patchouli making it's mark for the remainder! 
Like most flankers in the Pure line, the longevity and silage are great! 
On my skin, I get at least 9+ hours (3 Sprays maybe 4).
Mainly geared toward the fall/winter genre, but could be pulled off on a cool spring night, if you limit your sprays.

I STARTED WITH AMEN, WOMEN LIKED IT. THEN I WENT ON TO PURE WOOD WOMEN " REALLY" LIKED IT. HAD TO TRY THE PURE LEATHER AND THEY JUST " LOVED IT" . TRIED THE LASTEST PURE TONKA AND "OMG" I CAN'T KEEP THE WOMEN OFF ME, AND I'M A 62 YEAR OLD WITH 6 GRANDKIDS. 

THANK YOU MUGLER
COULDN'T HAVE DONE IT WITHOUT YOU
I ABSOLUTELY love this fragrance!!! the longevity is simply amazing more than 10 hours later and i still smell it!! WELL DONE!!!!!

Tonka is different ,unique in everyway. I love the scent it is not as heavy as malt or some of the tobacco, and can be worn everyday I blend several brands of mugler for my personal scent. it is always a pleasure to have the aroma of the Tonka after I put it on its just plain wonderful

column6: Simple astonishing, the most delicious fragrance!
column7:
I am the proud owner of pure tonka. This fragrance opens up very masculine with a strange yet beautifully blended combination of tonka and lavender. 
After a few minutes have elapsed, a warm, delicious toasted tonkabean, caramel and vanilla scent emerges to create one of the most beautiful smelling fragrances to be released in the past few years.

I am an avid collector of Thierry Mugler fragrances and I thought my collection was complete. It wasn't until i put my nose to this fragrance that i had to purchase it. It is just absolutely beautiful! 

If you are a fan of soft, warm and deliciously gourmand fragrances i can guarantee you this frag will not disappoint! This is now my favorite mugler fragrance, magnificent!
My husband wears Pure Wood exclusively, in great part because I find the scent so compelling. What a wonderful smell!
All perfumes are excellent. But they have a very bad shipping. The last time I paid over night shipping, and it cost me $20 dollars, and it took more than 3 days, and it was a gift.

column6: One of the best from Mugler house.
column7: By far one of my favorite from this house. I rather put this on then A men.

This fragrance is all I expected and more, I cant stop sniffing it. My girlfriend loves it as well. I was anticipating top notch and I was not disappointed. I have been using the original a*men for a few years and I just stumbled on to the limited editions recently. Sent lasts at least 6 hours with only a few spritz.
I love this scent and my girlfriend thinks I smell delicious. Sweet smell of ceder.
The perfume is very nice, but it does not last long in the body like the others.

For me, this cologne upon first wiff was pleasantly oaky for lack of a better word.the longevity for me is around 7-8 hours and sillage is around 3 to 4 hours on my skin. by far not better to me than PL, its beast mode I love it. that's my goto As of right now. I have 3 flankers. 2 pure leather, 1 pure wood and I have a bottle of PM from your mugler website coming in next week. I enjoy this scent PW very happy with the new lineup can't wait for PM next week !
I used all Mugler Product for 18 years ,Start with ANGEL, The "PURE WOOD" is a total Disappointment. Not RECOMMENDED.

Just purchased pure Wood. I have purchased at least 10 Amens so far. I think I'm chasing a dream. None compare to Pure Coffee although I keep trying and hoping. This is probably my last buy until they come back out with Pure Coffee. The regular Amen ain't to bad. Pure Wood is different but does remind me of a Taxi Cab Air freshener. Please Mr. a
Amen give the people what they want!!!

Thank You,

Concerned customer
column49:
Thank you for posting a review! Please note that A*Men Pure Coffee is currently available on mugler.com:
http://www.muglerusa.com/a-men-pure-coffee/M020101009.html

Thank you!

column7:
My husband has every cologne there is and I have found this one to be my favorite.
We got a sample in the mail before it came out , my daughter and I said this was a for sure purchase!
When my husband wears it, any woman we are around get up in his neck sniffing and moaning! It's like a drug!! I love it
It's got that woody, coffee & spice that we crave and love of Mugler.
Huge fan

If you like woodsy fragrance, this is a must. I personally like the amber, sandlewood, etc., scents so this was perfect. The subtle hints of Angel combined with the woodsy aromas is a perfect combination.

If you are bored with men's colognes that smell like hand soap, and thought Angel Men didn't make you feel like enough of a lumberjack, Pure Wood will do it.

This stuff smells like you should be driving your Maserati to a Renaissance Festival wearing a thick flannel shirt on a cool autumn day with a broadsword over your left shoulder and carrying an ax the right.

It's delicious.

Been using for several years and at least three different scents. I compare Mugler products to Apple's products. They are all very well made with care and are packaged like a gem. Never met a Mugler scent I didn't like.

I have never used any of the A*men before because I have heard people going on and on about it so I thought it was one of those things of the moment.

Last month my wife wanted a nice cosmetic bag and I come across Angel for Woman that came with the cosmetic bag. When I get home she was so happy, she used the shower gel and I have never heard smell like that before.

I went to buy one just to try and I come across Pure Wood and up to now I am not sure why I never tried it before. I cant explain but I know I have smell myself so many times today.
I am going to collect all the flavors they have.

Previously, A*Men Pure Havane and Malt were vying for my favorites. (Pure Coffee is but a fevered dream now. It was amazing, but for whatever reason it's not offered in the US anymore).

Pure Wood just blew them away. There's a deep, rich oaky note to this, and the patchouli and cypress combine for a sort of earthy spiciness that thankfully doesn't drown out the woods. There's a hint of sweetness on the back end. Some people tell me that it's supposed to be coffee or vanilla, but admittedly I can't readily identify what it is against the rest of it. I just know that I like it.
Second purchase of this scent for my husband hard to explain just how insanely manly this is.

I purchased this for my husband years ago & could never find it in stores. I was on Mugler’s site ordering Angel for my mom & was elated to see A’Men in stock. I love A’Men on my husband, it is distinct fragrance & definitely a fav for the the two of us.
Is mi problema always in this page one items never come tu mi

column6: THE MOST ORIGINAL FRAGRANCE i HAVE EVER SMELLED
column7: SINCE I SAW THE A*MEN BOTTLE, I KNEW THIS FRAGRANCE WOULD BE SOMETHING SPECIAL AND I DECIDED TO GIVE IT A TRY, IT DID NOT LET ME DOWN, WHAT A MASTERPIECE THIS IS, I USED TO BE PACO RABBANE BUYER, WELL NOW, BYE BYE PACO, THIS IS MY NEW HOUSE OF FRAGRANCES, MUGLER FRAGRANCES HAVE SOMETHING SPECIAL, IT SEEMS LIKE MUGLER ALWAYS RISK SOMETHING TO CREATE DIFFERENT FRAGRANCES, ALL THE REST OF FRAGRANCES I'VE OWNED, ARE THE SIMPLE FRESH FRUITY SCENT AT THE END OF THE DAY, THAT'S WHY NOT ALL PEOPLE LIKES MUGLER FRAGRANCES, YOU HAVE TO HAVE A SPECIAL NOSE FOR SPECIAL SCENTS.

Let me start with I LOVE most of Thierry Mugler's parfum and cologne. That said, I ordered A*MEN original for my husband this last Christmas. It smells incredible...however it lasts for about a half an hour. Completely different from all others that my husband and I have. At first we thought it might be just the awkward rubber flask, which doesn't allow much cologne to come out in one spray, but that's not it. It just disappears so quickly, unlike his Amen Malt. I don't like incredibly strong scents, but I do like to be able to catch a whiff of it when he walks by. To smell this one, you literally have to put your nose up to the skin, and it's faint at that.

This fragrance is intoxicating. I get nothing but complements I highly recommend it only if you buy from this site because I tried other places and were knockoffs. So buy from the source! Buy from Mugler!

column6: I am obsessed with this fragrance
column7: I bought this for my daughter's father for his birthday. I was looking for something different and I have always worn Angel. When I sprayed this on the test strip at Ulta, I became obsessed and could not stop smelling it. I even sprayed some on my jacket and everyone kept saying "What are you wearing?". Needless to say he loved it! I keep smelling my jacket and it is like he is with me now. So sensual
My husband has worn A*Men for several years to the exclusion of all other colognes. It is a sexy, warm and very subtle fragrance that we both love! As my review title indicates A*Men is awesome!!!
Disappointed in the product and received no free samples as advertised.

I casually walked into Nordstrom having NO intention on buying anything. I walked into all departments "window" shopping. I went into the fragrance area and I was smelling various brands and I saw A*Men. I smelled it and I instantly LOVED the smell. It was completely different from what I usually buy. However, the smell was sexy, fierce and would make any lover all over you wanting more.
I recommend you smell this brand and ask for a sample. I guarantee you go back and buy.

I have to say that as a fan of Tom Ford's Oud Wood and Killian's Bamboo Harmony and Intoxicated, I tend to hold cologne at a very high standard. I was actually looking to purchase a new perfume for my wife when the sales woman enticed me to smell Amen. I was hooked immediately. 6 months later, the same sales person remembered me and informed me of the new cologne, Amen Pure Malt. The Mugler line has gone above and beyond my standard and I am now a Brand Loyalist.
My wife is a big fan of Thierry Mugler's Alien so I though I would give A*MEN a try. Wow, I've tried them all and this is the best. I am now a customer for life. Thanks!

I was looking for a new winter perfume ...
Being a Dior fan, it was hard to find a new refreshing heavy perfume that can endure the whole day.
I tried so many brands, no one recommended this for me.
I saw it & went directly to the counter and smelled it.
WOW, it was mind blowing at once.
I bought it without taking the opinion of my two friends.
I highly recommended it for those who have the gut to wear it.
Thank you Thierry Mugler for this perfume.

column6: Rubber flask & not enough men's samples
column7:
The rubber flasks that are used for AMEN are very hard to get the cologne out when it is new and really hard when it starts to low.
I have bin buying this product for many years!
I would like to have someone call me about why, when I but cologne for men I can only get one sample of men's cologne. I'm told that they only have one sample for men. My phone number is 704-258-0154 it would be nice if I could get more men's cologne samples.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column6: Gotten so many compliments on this Cologne
column7: The only problem I have with this cologne is that the rubber on the outside of the bottle is hard to work with when you try to spray the cologne.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
I am a perfume collector, than I can tell for sure that no other brand on perfumery market got the spirit of Thierry Mugler: be different and unique...
By the way, everything they put their hands on, immediatly turns into a top selling product... it´s just incredible!
And the original A. Men represents, for sure, the very best in terms of fragrance quality: it lasts a lot, it projects a lot and it has an awesome smelling! Patchouli, coffee and chocolate, all mixed perfectly!
Be prepared to get tons of compliments after wearing it! :)

Thank you, Jacques Huclier and Thierry Mugler!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Undeniable... leaves people asking "what are you wearing". I love how it mixes with your own sent to create an attractive and memorable scent.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
This is a cologne that I have been purchasing for at least five years and it is the main cologne that I use and love and my wife especially likes this one.
You know when your wife or your significant other loves something you've got it made.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Never got so many compliments on a cologne....threw the rest away...for life
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I've been buying women alien lotion n perfume for my self n daughter for years, as a special gift. I received a simple in mail for men a few days ago. My daughters father birthday is today11/9 , she wasn't sure what to get him so I suggested alien a men, he would've love it, well she couldn't find it at our favorite store, high end store). They asked where I got it, of course though the mail as a sample. I'm hoping it'll be in the stores for Christmas. She had to get something else, how disappointed she was. I will order it online for Christmas. I love Mugler
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Whenever my baby wears his Angel...it's a 5-star time!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
I had a sample for him to try, but he didn't like it....
I think that most people that enjoy Angel, would enjoy this, too.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This seducing offer was worth purchasing. I bought it for a gift, they loved everything about it, from the fragrance that's so awesome to the packaging. You won't be disappointed.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I use Angel for Men exclusively, except for free samples. I have been using it for well over ten years. The fragrance lasts throughout the day and into the evening. It is bold enough to be noticed but subtle enough not to be overbearing.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Bought this for my husband and I love it. Long lasting masculine cologne.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I love to smell this scent on my Guy, I can't stop hugging him!!!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I purchased A*Men for my son. He is a true fragrance fanatic and when I asked him what he thought of it. His response was, "It has such a unique scent. I love it, but most of all the ladies love me!" They sniff me all day long. I think that says it all. He is usually an Obsession man but now he says that he has found a new fragrance, something that he thought would never happen. He wears A*Men very proudly.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column6: one of the best scents around
column7:
I love this scent. I have for years. Its sweet but yet masculine.
I have many mugler colognes,and this is one of my favorite along with pure malt, pure havane and eau sucree for women
This was a gift for the man in my life. He loves it, sexy and in your face yet subtle enough to make you want more.
Such a sensual scent!My husband loves it and i love it in him,this is the?perfect sized bottle for his car and gtm bag,lasts all day

A Men's overwhelmingly strong when you first spray it on. I hate the powerful whiff for the first hour or so but it gradually gets better! Spray it on during the day and you'll smell great by night, as long as you're going to remain casual. If you're planning on getting this, make sure to sample one first. Some people really hate it.
Only bad thing is I never received the samples....

this scent is simply intoxicating. classy, warm, seductive and mysterious. its an all in one scent that lasts and lasts on the skin and clothing. the shower gel energizes your scenes and takes you into the Mugler universe, honest. I don't know how they do it but it makes me feel unlike any other scent out there. this is an absolute MUST buy. I swear by anything Mugler for a reason.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Fragrances > A*Men > Gift Sets

column7:
For over 25 years I have been wearing this men's cologne. I will not wear any other. I have had every shape and size, every gift set, and every toiletry product with this intoxicating fragrance.
There is no other fragrance on the market for men, that smells like this. It is not your typical, same old men's fragrance. Its quite unique. 
If you want attention and want to be noticed, buy this fragrance.
Created by an innovative, designing genius, a true artist!

LOVE this fragrance! I was so excited to see it available again! There is really nothing else like it. It is not a heavy cologne, but a warm, earthy scent that is perfect for everyday use and special occasions. Warm, subtle and alluring.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I was apprehensive about purchasing this one after reading the previous reviews about it being spicy. But I can say that I am far from disappointed! It definitely has a unique spice to it with a firey finish that is very nice!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I reach for this or Pure Malt. I do get more compliments when I'm wearing Taste of Fragrance. The scent is familiar but mysterious, warm and inviting with great performance.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: This is my go to feeling sexy, racy, wanting to get something started" scent. But it does fade fast. I wish there was a mini to put in my purse as a refresher for those long days that turn into nights. It a must try for women. Men love it! , just as much as I do. My guy loves it as well, sometimes I have to remind him its mine.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I am a die hard fan of all things Mugler. But while I loved this scent it was not long lasting and faded very quick. Not sure I would buy it again. Like most of the Mugler Fragrances that I have bought they last all day and I get many compliments. However I am sad to say this fragrance has not archived either one for me.
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I've worn it a couple times during these hot summer days and I've received compliments from fresh, to nice, to different. Definitely can be worn on an everyday basis
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I continue to be a fan of A*Men fragrances. I have truly enjoyed every product I have purchased so far. This, however, is the first one that I purchased without testing it or smelling it before hand. Once again, A*Men has hit a home run. I love this scent and receive compliments every time I wear it. The description is accurate when it says it is "ignited with hot chili pepper paste." It is a fun and sophisticated fragrance combined into one. I would definitely recommend this, as well as, Pure Havane, Pure Malt, Pure Leather and the original A*Men. I can't wait to get Pure Wood now. Thierry Mugler - Great Job!!!!!!
column20: Fragrance > Men's Perfume > A*Men Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Everyone has been very generous with the positive remarks in reference to this fragrance .So yesterday as I was leaving my sisters home after celebrating my birthday ;my niece of 9 years old makes a grand announcement to everyone in the living room ......Uncle June smells so good I mean he really dose and I made a few remarks and had a laugh. While hugging moms she goes in for a long whiff .So the topper is I'm at a café at Penn's Landing in Philly ,I see an old female flame from a decade ago she says hello and before she walks away and says what is that fragrance I just had to ask she says is it cinnamon or what -I really like it . Finally: even my worst critic of all my A MEN journeys though at least 15 years I have known her gave me a compliment and approval ratings. Keep in mind that I have only wore Taste Of Fragrance for the last 30 days or so.
