column7: This is the best aftershave product that I have ever used. It sooths your skin from the effects of your razor without being too oily and greasy like so many aftershave balms. I wish I could find this product in the major department stores in Houston.
My husband loves an aftershave. The problem is that it's not available in any of the major department stores.
Amazing fragrance very unique and beautiful with its trademark DNA
I stumbled onto this scent 3 years ago. Did not know it was a men’s fragrance. I am complimented every time I wear this scent. Has become one of my all time favorites.

the smell it's so unique, fresh, sport and elegant at the same time. The odor last all day. This perfume must be always available and not be a limited edition. The Mint it's not a substitution for a fresh scent like this one.
Love this scent, it lasts a long time. When I wear this scent I am asked alot what it is. I hope you continue to offer online since I never see in stores.

column6: Third time around for the Zest!!
column7: I have nothing but good to say about this fragrance! Works for any occasion my opinion and I will even go far to say for anytime of the year but perferbly during the summer months. Very masculine scent but sexy enough for the ladies to wear also and very different than a lot of the other fragrances out there. Get it!! Get it!!

I absolutely love the Ultra Zest fragrance and I have had many compliments on it, most importantly my wife loves it. Ultra Zest is light enough for warmer temperatures and does not leave a heavy scent but is mysterious and lingers all day. I think it is a must!
My boyfriend has used A *MEN products for a long time. Ultra zest is his favorite. It is never a disappointment of a gift each time I get it for him.
I love this product, please, please don't stop making this.

I really enjoy this scent. I would definitely recommend you give it a smell.
I use this scent in the summer as a flanker.

I have about 10 colognes and they're all the best I can find but this is my newest addition and my favorite. It smells like a sexy musky orange and is so perfect for summer. I can't wait to wear it more!! It was a blind buy for me too and I'm so happy with how it turned out!

I love this fragrance so much. It is an addictive scent. Delicious. The performance is great. This fragrance isn't totally versatile and might not be right for everyone, but I look for any opportunity I can to spray this stuff on.

Wasn't sure I would like this scent over my husbands Amen ...WOW! ❤️❤️❤️❤️This new fragrance! It's the perfect mix of amen and a fresh citrus blend. Definitely going to purchase this for my father in law for his birthday.

I bough it with out knowing what it smelled like, it was a gamble. I wanted to buy a citrus scent and this cologne is awesome. Not overpowering, very fresh and nice. The scent lasts, it won't die after an hour. Later on I bought another one for a friend, he enjoyed it a lot too.
I purchased this, and use it almost every day. I get quite a few compliments about how nice the fragrance is. I particularly like the long lasting citrus fragrance.

column6: Ultra Zest...ULTRA...ZESTY! And I love it!
column7: To be very honest, I've never been a fan of the A*Men line. That all changed when I watched Jeremy Fragrance sink his teeth into this bright orange flask and describe it with such zeal and conviction in his YouTube video. I could not find it in Singapore, where I live. But I finally found it at the Ben Gurion Airport in Tel Aviv in March 2016 and sprayed it on my skin for the first time. It was not love as first sniff, but it grew on me as I walked around the airport. After 45 minutes, my mind was made up and I bought it. It is now my signature scent. Perfect for the tropical Singapore weather.

Wasn't sure that I was going to like this scent. But it's light and fresh scent made me go and buy it again. Well actually my wife bought for me. Both my wife and I only use Angel colognes and perfumes.

I was already a fan of this company my Dad gave me some in a gift basket for graduation over ten years ago and I've been hooked ever since I want to continue to collect all the scents I won't be disappointed.

column6: This is a MUST for the permanent collection !!!
column7: My husband is an Amen addict but now he switched between that and Zest. It smells divine!! Do not let it go away!!!

column6: Needs to be a permanent addition....
column7: I love this cologne. It lasts all day long and it's not as spicy as the original Angel. Please keep this on a permanent basis instead of a Limited addition. I don't know what i'm going to do if I can't find it.

So I am a person who floats between wearing male and female scents. My favorite has been Angel and this holiday I figured I would test out some of the men's fragrances and I completely fell in love with this one! It is the perfect scent for someone like me who does not like super musky or "more male driven scents", but has the brightness to it that most mens fragrances lack! Definitely hope this will be available year round or at least every Christmas so I can restock!!

column6: Except tional product not keeping their word
column7: Thierry Mugler product are excellent as usual, this is the only designer house that I would purchase. Customer service very well spoken and always very polite. But this company needs to keep promises, everytime I've order something I request a sample of taste of fragrance, and the Customer service person will say on I'll send I one. Now keep in mind I've had the pleasure of ordering tom them on four time, with a purchase of 89 dollars each time, I f I believe I'm deserve atleast a sample that I requested everytime I order. Great company Great product. Excellent customer
This is great scent for all seasons in my opinion. I love the amalgamation of citrus, spicy yet warm and sweet for day and night. I give Zest *****

column6: One of the best flanker in recent memory
column7: After the smash hit that is Malt and Havane, I was a little underwhelmed with subsequent creations. Ultra Zest proved that TM still got what it takes to release great flankers! Opens up with an energizing chocolate orange that lasts quite a bit before morphing closer to the original AMEN DNA. I love it!

Like all of the other Thierry Mugler mens fragrances, Ultra Zest does not disappoint! It is clean, bold, long lasting and has such an array of notes, that you feel like you are wearing several colognes that interact in harmony. I have received many compliments about Ultra Zest. I love the entire line! I would highly recommend this one!

column6: Great Clean citrusy scent that lasts!!!!
column7: Definitely my favorite frrom the collection, not overpowering and lasts
Ultra Zest is an excellent change-up to my other A-Men fragrances. Smells great and long-lasting.

Ultra Zest has a multi-level top note and base layer. On the top you get citrus and cedar and as the day progresses, you are greeted with the base notes from the classic A*Men. If you warm up those areas that you sprayed, you are once again greeted with those top notes. People say, "did that cologne just change the way it smells!" The only downside is that Zest does not seem to have the same staying power as A*Men.

As always Thierry, delivers another limited edition scent that is mysterious as well as mischievous. You can clearly smell the blood orange in the dry-down and it's not overbearing in any sense. It draws you in and is perfect for hot summer nights.
I bought it for my husband for Father's Day, he loved it! I love the scent as well. It is my new favorite scent on him. Well done!

This is my first review on anything, but I felt this one deserved a review. I normally loath orange fragrances, for me they are too pushy or in your face. I was nervous when getting this because of that fact, but this is my favorite house and they have never let me down before so I thought regardless i'll get it anyway. I have to say this fragrance is absolutely amazing! In my opinion the orange is blended so well with a leather or caramel note that it negates any orange sharpness that would be off putting. With no doubt you will smell the orange, which to my surprise i loved, and its been infused with the Mugler DNA to make it something really special. I would highly recommend this! I hope this review helps.
purchased for my son to add to his mugler collection

My friend is a Mugler fanatic and was upset when I told him I purchased this product. He came by and all I could smell was the fragrance that he sprayed on sneakingly. People love the smell. You can smell the tangerine once it's sprayed on. Great Great Great
This is a Masterpiece! The orange fresh and that Mugler DNA makes it one of a kind. Awesome juice
This is an awesome fragrance with a citrusy orange scent. The first time I smelled it I fell in love with it and its very long lasting.

Move over A*Men pure Havane, I think I found a new favorite cologne! The A*Men Ultra Zest has subtle orange/tangerine notes combined with the traditional A*Men scent. It is divine. I am ordering another right now.

I received one that was expired. It was orange, with a cottage cheese texture and it smelled horrible. I tried to exchange it for a new one but they said it was a discontinued item and is now out of stock. As I see now, it is still available online. 2 weeks later I am still waiting on my money back, as they would not let me switch it for another product. Horrible and slow customer service! Everyone who answers the phone uses the name "Sherri" so you have no clue who you actually talked to when you try calling to get things resolved. Going back to Nordstrom.
Smell identical to the fragrance. My new favorite parfum. Scent lasts a long time and moisturizes skin.

So I purchased the body cream because I LOVED the Alien body lotion. (esp. the sparkles) but I read that the formula had changed so I thought I'd try this. It leaves my skin feeling incredibly soft and it even leaves a shimmering effect...but it's not a fake glitter dust shimmer. More like "I woke up naked in a dew-dappled meadow the morning after being abducted by aliens!" shimmer. Oh, and thanks for including the little spatula. It makes it wayyyy easier to apply and keeps the precious stuff from collecting underneath the fingernails.

First off when I wear Alien which is everyday as I do not wear anything else everyone knows it is me. They can tell I have been in the elevator or in the hall. Ive been using this perfume for the past 5 years and Im not tired of the scent. Its now my signature scent. The perfume scent lasts for a long time. Everywhere I go I get compliments on it. One of my favorite perfumes by far. I recommend this to everyone.

I first purchased this perfume about a year ago and been wearing it ever since! Every time I wear Alien it turns heads and I get so many compliments love love love it!My favorite... I give it 6 stars hahaha.

This is the only perfume I wear.  I love it.  Everyone always compliments me on the fragrance.

I originally wanted a Mugler scent because they are refillable and collecting bottles is not my habit, and once i find a scent i like i tend not to change it. I LOVE the alien scent. On me it is a very sweet and a spicy floral.

column6: Doesn’t smell. Not the same that I remember.
column7: I love Alien. I haven’t been able to buy it for a while so it’s been a while. I was so excited to get it, but it’s not like it used to be. It doesn’t keep its scent. When I used to wear it people commented all the time. Now you can’t even tell I’m wearing it.  Maybe it’s a bad batch. But it’s not the same. I’m disappointed.
Awesome! great fragrance i will recommend  to anyone just try it

I have been purchasing Alien since 2007.  However, I noticed with the last two to three purchases, the formula seems to have changed.  I was in love with the intense grape scent (I have no other way to describe it), yet now, it smells like a strong soap instead.  It appears as if the formula for the original Alien has changed and I don't understand why. This was the ultimate sensual perfume and my all time favorite and I am left unhappy with the change.
I'm so excited to wear this scent this fall; it's perfect !!
I received a small bottle as a gift and loved it immediately. I get compliments all the time.
I’ve been wearing this scent for a few years and get complimented on it all the time. Loooove the smell!!
I love this perfume. I love how it smell. I receive a lot of compliments about this perfume.
I love this fragrance. I sensed it on another person and liked it so much I ordered it for myself. Not disappointed

column6: Not the same scent from the original
column7: I have been using this perfume since 2007 and it is not the same scent from the original alien the original had Indian jasmine,wood, white amber I’m disappointed that they change the original scent this one don’t do it for me

column6: I’ m in Love with this parfume
column7: I will always buy this perfume because it is my favourite ine, I Love its sence.
Love it I can't get enough of this I have to always keep a backup
This was a Mother’s Day gift to myself  and I just love it!

I've been wearing Alien exclusively for several years.  Never does a day go by when someone doesn't compliment the scent or ask what I'm wearing!  Your service is wonderful, and I really appreciate the little free treats you enclose with my orders!  Thanks for being my go-to place for all things Alien!
I’ve been using Alien (eau de toilette) for a year now, and I decided to get the parfum. I get complimented all the time by both men and women.

I love Alien Parfum and wear it every day, no matter what I’m doing.  The odd thing is that I can smell it on other people, but I cannot smell it when I’m wearing it.  Others notice it, though, and comment on how good I smell.
I have been wearing Alien for several years !  I receive so many compliments !  It is such a beautiful scent !

I received a sample of the body wash, perfume and lotion and boy was I excited. I began the layering process. Shower, lotion then perfume. I almost ripped my skin off at work. This scent was way to heavy for me. I was sitting in my office roasting in Alien I could not get away from myself all I could smell was this scent and all I wanted to do was shower and wash it off. I was so surprised because it contains two of my notes I Thought I was familiar with cashmeran wood which I thought was in the cashmere family and amber gris but I guess the gris in amber makes the difference. When I saw this I thought how can I love Angel so much when Alien has more of what I like? I found out I'm definitely not a chemist. Thank God I only had samples. I have so much loyalty to Mugler because not only do you get 5 samples with every order but I have called and inquired about a particular perfume I was interested in and they have mailed me a sample. That is such business savvy to not be afraid of spending some postage to send a customer a sample and in the long run make a sale on a $100-$200 bottle of perfume. You Go Mr. Mugler. I'm not down playing this fragrance it just wasn't for me. The quality is there whereas this was heavy and Angel is clean and sharp it just wasn't what I like in my fragrance.
Love the name! I love the fact that you can get the bottle refilled. Great and unique smell! A fan for life!

I love the unique smell of Alien! I sampled the perfume as I was intrigued by the name - and purchased a refillable bottle on the spot - which I have refilled many, many times! I never fail to get complimented & asked about my fragrance whenever I wear Alien! It is my "Signature Fragrance!"

Alien is my signature fragrance. People absolutely adore this when I wear it no matter where I go, I get compliments. This fragrance is the best. It makes me feel very special because I know that I am turning heads and people are overjoyed in what they are encountering as I walk into their space, even somewhat from a distance. Joy, oh what JOY!!!!
Hellobbbbbnnbbbtvtftygyfyvhvyvyvubinkbhvhf6hvyvjbjbjbjbhctcvjhjbjb

My world is Alien!

thanks

A nurse was wearing this at the hospital emergency room and it smells amazing. I ordered a bottle the next day. This perfume smells wonderful! Even my husband commented when we smelled it on the nurse.

Imagine if you will. Standing on the Moon. As you gaze above into the dark vast cosmos, you notice the fire dust of a speeding comet as it moves overhead. It almost appears as a dragon, moving so fast that you may lose your footing and be brought to your knees by the sheer force of its' power. Alas it has made itself known to you. by the searing of itself etched onto your skin.... no it isn't a cosmic star, but a dark entity that swooped itself down to leave you as scorched by an Angel. This is the essence of Alien. -Zelda Zoink

used pleasures delight ,for years( estee lauder)TILL IT WAS DISCONTINUED,,
tried so many substitutes could not find one i liked till i found alien.

 joined the circle gift set purchase,
then purchased alien refillable ,could not find the circle code.
love this one!
This is my overall favorite. I have had so many compliments and questions about what I'm wearing because it smells amazing. I love Alien and will definitely be making purchases in the future.
I’ve been buying this fragrance for my wife for several years. She loves it and I love the way it smells on her. It a very soft and pleasant fragrance.

My husband suprisedme with Alien for Christmas!
What a great gift and he thinks the perfume is absolutely tantalizing!

I have a friend who wears this perfume and her entire house (including her dog) smells like it. I absolutely loved it. She bought it for me for Christmas and it smells just as wonderfully warm on me as it does on her. The jasmine and wood scents blend beautifully and last ALL DAY.
Love Alien! I buy this for myself, and other family members. We all receive multiple complements on this fragrance.
The ordering was easy, product is amazing and I would definitely recommend this company.
I have never loved a fragrance like I love Alien. It's like spraying on happiness
Have used this perfume for over ten years. I get compliments on the scent and get asked very frequently what perfume I am wearing.

I've always been very picky about perfume. Back in middle school the only perfume I'd wear was Avon's Night Magic Evening Musk. All the super sweet, froufrou perfumes my friends wore smelled awful to me. 

Until recently I've gone sans-perfume. Nothing really caught my nose. This one, though, oh yes. I wear anytime I'm not at work (food service and scents don't mix). It's nice to spray just a little on after a shower. Not too sweet, just the right amount of warmth. Love it.
My friend told me about Alien product and i decided to purchase it and fell in love with it , I really like the fresh scent and will be wearing it from here on out,I love it one of thee best product,

column6: In love with Alien my first scent
column7: I was hooked the first time I was introduced to alien by a friend!!!

Alien is the most mesmerizing perfume I have ever had the pleasure of using.
It is definitely not overpowering yet remains for hours and hours.
I highly recommend that you try Alien and Angel and see which you might prefer. I TOTALLY ADORE ALIEN....!!!! It takes me to other worlds.

A friend was wearing this perfume and I thought it was Amarige by Givenchy. She laughed and said it was "Alien". I had to try it and I have to say that it's a yummy, soft, lasting scent. I like the refillable bottle and the cute, free inscription. If you're looking for a fresh new scent, I highly recommend Alien.

I really like the smell of this perfume but when I wear it I can't smell it on me. That is not the case with Angel. With Alien, I ask people if they can smell it and they say kind of. Not sure why that is. I am disappointed that for this price I am unable to detect it on me.

My son bought this last yr while in Las Vegas and I loved it. He bought me some in the summer and at Christmas he surprised me with another big bottle of it.. Alien is my all time favorite and I get so many compliments from both men and women when I have it on.
This fragrance is great, long lasting and receive many compliments!
Signature Scent! Absolutely love Alien! Get asked what I'm wearing every time!

I have worn Alien since 2005... I have constantly been stopped and asked what I was wearing... It has become my signature scent... I LOVE Alien, and wear it everyday... Thank you Thierry for such a lovely scent!

I was a big fan of another brand and have been using it for years and years until I came across this perfume and fell in love with it!
I'm so obsessed with the smell!
My co worker even said I smell delicious! 
I have two bottles now for refill, so so happy with this smell!
Please don't ever discontinue this product ever!!!!
I promise I will be loyal! Kiss!
I highly and super recommend this product to anyone! 
You'll be obsessed like me!
FYI-I'm a real person with real opinion:-)
My husband bought this for me (first time ever sensing this fragrance), and I must say I am obsessed with it to an unhealthy level! I cannot imagine wearing ANYTHING else after this!!! LOVE IT!!!!
The smell is so nice it makes ice to melt ,I love it i love it
Dear sir/madam my wife usually mix equal two kind of models perfume "Alien & lamour_lalique ".THAT IS VERY GOOD SMELL.May be you product mix two those model? thank you for your attention.

Love this stuff and wear it everyday. It's not overbearing and a relaxing scent. Hope it is never discontinued! Thank you for such a wonderful fragrance!
I love it. My coworkers give me nice complements. Not over baring.

column6: Makes me feel like a million bucks
column7: I get some many compliments when I where this. People, men and women alike tell me how good I smell. I even spray some on when I go to bed. I just cant get enough of it!

column6: I receive a compliment every day that I wear this.
column7:
I bought the Diva set online in Oct 2015 (9 months ago). I bought the big bottle at the mall. There is not 1 day when I wear it that a stranger doesn't compliment me. I work in a hospital, so I see strangers each work day. Even a crabby coworker who has never spoken to me said "You smell so good". It is a quality fragrance in that I never use more than one or two sprays, it lasts all day. I found it bcuz I asked a stranger what smelled so good in the room, she told me it was her perfume Alien. Of course I never forgot the name & I love it.
It smelles like Jasmine & fresh air. Sometimes I just smell the bottle for a smile, I close my eyes-smile & I think "AHHHHH", that's how I feel when I smell it.
I'm fall in love with this perfume, I could wear every day!!

I was introduced to this scent by a sales person inside a Macy's about 2 years ago. I remember it very clearly . It changed my life I just knew i had to have it! I get endless compliments every time i wear it. But even if I didn't I would not stop wearing I feel incredibly clean and sexy wearing it! Must admit sometimes when people ask me what I'm wearing I hesitate saying the name because I wanna keep the scent to myself haha
I just love this one, everything I thought it would be and more!

column6: Alien is the most complimentary fragrance ever.
column7: I highly recommend this fragrance. I get so many compliments every time I wear this. Alien is the best fragrance I've ever worn. I have used many other high end perfumes and this one captivates those around you. Best ever
i've been wearing both angel (since 2002) and alien (my signature scent!) forever, LOVE them!!

Whilst doing my weekly shop in my local supermarket, a lady passed by and I was in awe of her perfume that I turned my shopping trolley around and followed her to ask what the name of her perfume was. She replied its "Alien " and told me I was the third person to ask her that day. She also told me she sprays it on her scarf and leaves the scarf in the living room and the beautiful fragrance is still there the next morning. Needless to say I couldn't wait to get to the chemist to get some, but guess what ? they were sold out and had to wait for an order to come from England. I had travelled to the next town to get it and now I'm being asked what perfume I wear. I never used perfume before I discovered Alien, but now I carry it with me everywhere. Thank you so much for such a wonderful fragrance.

I received a sample of this in the mail. Unlike the many other samples that are on a piece of paper, this one came in a little sprayer, classy! To say I loved the fragrance is an understatement. I have not used perfume in years because most women's perfume doesn't smell good to me. Not this one, I wear it every day. Thank you!
Amazing!!!! recomended this product, i had been using it for 5 yearse
I really liked the product it is the best I ever used.

I have worn this and Angel since they first came out. I alternate them. Nothing else smells as good. They have strangers coming over the room to ask what scent I am wearing. A little goes a long way and is unique amongst common scents.
Adoro este perfume! marca muita presença e todos querem saber qual perfume estou usando, pois é muito gostoso!
I'M ASKED DAILY WHAT ARE YOU WEARING!! LOVE MUGLER FRAGRANCE. I CHANGE BACK AND FORTH WITH ALIEN & ANGEL. IT'S MY GO TO FRAGRANCE FOR 20 YEARS
I love this scent it last so long and makes me feel pretty!
<3. Love this one!! I've been wearing it for years.

I saw the sampler in one of my magazine subscriptions about 2.5 years ago and really like the unique fragrance of this perfume. I was also attracted by the fact that the bottle is refillable and can be easily refilled at any Macys locations. I also got the body lotion from this line which was absolutely great!
I must admit, the other sample fragrances that I got with my purchase weren't as great.
column28: Toluca Lake, Los Angeles, CA, USA

column7:
Love love love this scent, once used and fell in love
This has been my perfume choice after just a try
Was a Chanel '5 purchaser for years. Samples Alien and
I was sold, brag the name and scent to all my co workers
And friends.

column6: Love the scent engraved bottle broken on arrival
column7: Got an engraved bottle for this perfume for my daughter for a Christmas gift. She was thrilled to open it but the bottle was broken when she opened the box. I understand things happen but it seems someone should have noticed the gold plastic bar was broken off the bottle when they did the engraving... waiting to hear from customer service....But the scent it very nice and she loved the lotion and samples that came with it.
Love Love Love this Perfume. It's exquisite. Many compliments both female and male. Enjoy the shower gel along with the body butter, too. My Favorite. Gotta try it... you'll be hooked.
I was given this perfume as a gift and love it. I have received several compliments on it, from both men and women.

I was out of town and I had forgot to pack any perfume however I always keep samples that I pick up from Macy's so I sprayed on the Alien... too my surprise as my husband and I were on the escalator in the airport he said to me...whatever you're wearing you need to get a years supply because it's driving me crazy! need I say more!!

column6: So happy I found my favorite fragrance - ALIEN!
column7:
I found your Alien fragrance in a fashion magazine tab, loved it and now have been wearing it for 2 months. I love it!! I am amazed how beautiful the scent is. My husband is also in love with the scent. When I wear it, I feel happy, content, sexy, clean and fresh. I put it on before bed so I sleep in beauty. I am so happy I found it. I get many compliments when wearing Alien! This is my new #1 and this scent has beat out my old favorite and is much more affordable. I am purchasing this scent for holiday gifts for all the women in my family.
Thanks so much for creating this beautiful fragrance.
J Battista

Hello Mr. Mugler/team.

I have to say that I’ve been wearing the Alien (found it in a tab in a magazine) fragrance for the last 2 months.

I love it!!

I cannot believe the scent is so beautiful. My husband is in love with the scent more than me. When I wear it, I feel happy, content, sexy, clean and fresh. I put it on before bed so I sleep in beauty. I am so happy I found it. People have never complimented me more with smelling great than with spraying this scent. Thank you so much for a great new scent. This is my new #1 and this scent has beat out my Cartier Baser Vole.

I am purchasing this scent for holiday gifts for the gals in my family too.

Thanks so much for creating this beautiful piece of work.

June Battista

column6: Alien Review FIVE STARS for sure!
column7: THIS IS THE BEST EVER. I wore it to a gathering of 10 women and they ALL asked me what I had on. I LOVE IT.

My best perfume ever one me! The smell is just awsome! I did buy my first one for around 10 years ago. And sense then, i cant count how many perfumes i have bought.

For the women who say it dosent smell one her. I dont know if she talking about herself our friends telling her. The point with perfume who,s exellent for you... is that you shall NOT smell the perfume your self. Then when u cant smell it- It maybee your Nr1 perfume. And i have to say... If you buy EDT, the smell will always faite / go away after short time. Thats the reasson EDT always is cheaper.

I will continue to buy my Alien Eau De Parfume (only perfume, not EDT) I have bought and tried many perfumes in my life... Nothing can beat this one :)

When ALL your friends ask you what perfume you use...and also stranger one the street...its a huge compliment!

I LOVE and Adore my Alien :))

I have also used the body cream and body soap....higgly recomanded also.
This fragrance Smells good but does not stay with me

column6: You NEED it in your life
column7: I first came across this perfume about 9 years ago and at 18 I remember thinking it was too musky or too "old" smelling but, I swear I could not escape the scent for the life of me. I worked the next five years in the mall and I promise you anytime someone wore it I knew right away it was Alien, I never forgot the scent and it became sort of nostalgic for me. Finally now at 27 I realized that I had fallen in love with it over time and there was nothing else on the market like it. I LOVE how long-lasting it is, which is a rarity, but most of all the scent is priceless. It's the perfect mix of sweet and musk and I find it almost euphoric. If you're contemplating buying it, DO IT, I see this becoming my go to from now on and I've only owned it two days.
Amazing, this perfume is just Amazing smelling. I would give it a 10 STAR!
I bought this as a gift for my wife after seeing it in the Glamour magazine. She love the fragnance and I love it greatly. It is an excellent perfume that I recommend to everyone.

I was a little disappointed because the smell does not seem to last. I understand the skin chemistry and so forth the scent does not last. I love the angel product so I really was expecting this scent to linger a bit more than it has.

However, the bottle is absolutely beautiful. Thanks
This is the best perfume I ever used. It lasts all day and I get compliments from men and women all day. Thanks Thierry
This scent drives my boyfriend absolutely crazy! Thank you!
The perfume is really good. I recommend one hundred percent. The people has to try Alien. Amazing. Thank you mugler.

column6: Had to Replace the Beautiful Purple Bottle
column7: I have been spraying this intoxicating fragrance on my body for so many years that the sprayer finally gave out. I immediately ordered a new container and a supply of this beautiful fragrance, and actually unscrewed the top of the "broken spray" each day so I did not have to go even one day without my Alien. Men love this fragrance--I have been stopped on the street and in stores to be asked the name of my perfume. Of course, I will only share my "secret" with a woman if I am sure we will never inter-act as I love being the only woman in the room wearing Alien. There is no other product that compares with this delicious fragrance. Once you wear it, there's no going back to any other!!

column6: Elegance, confidence and grace in a bottle
column7: I received my first bottle of Alien for Christmas. I am quite particular about my scent, and Alien is by far my most prized. Each spray exudes a soft, delicate scent that lightly blankets my skin. When I wear it I feel like I have confidence, grace, elegance and a bit of mischief. I may not wear a diamond necklace or strand of pearls around my neck each day, but Alien makes me feel like no matter what I wear I'm always going to be out of this world.

I don't know how I was first introduced to this perfume, but I'm glad I was!! I just recently purchased my second bottle of Alien. I can't live without it. It is such a unique & wonderful scent that has long-lasting staying power!! Although I could use this perfume everyday, I tend to save it for special occasions....it's like my little black dress.....just perfect!!

I have been using Alien since it was first release (2005). Every time I wear it, which is about 95% of the times, someone (men & women) always tell me how fabulous I smell. It's my #1 Parfum!!
I also wear the Eau de Parfum Angel Innocent (1999).
I'm definitely a Thierry Mugler fan. :)

This is THE one and only perfume I wear... for years....
I love how it gives me this unique smell....
Everyone would ask me what I am wearing...
wherever i go...
I LOVE LOVE it!!!

My favorite perfume, can't live without it.
Alien is my personal favorite. My mother uses Angel for as long as i can remember, i grew up loving this presume!!
Veliki sam ljubitelj parfema, vec godinama koristim Alien i jos uvek ne zelim da ga menjam jer bolji ne postoji na trzistu.

I love the perfume scent but I had problem with the bottle. After a while , not even used up half of bottle, the spout gets soft and gummy. I think material of spout and surroundings are plastic and whatever chemical in perfume melt and corrode the spray spout. It doesn't spray out anymore. I checked some department store display and also noted some softening and gummy spout too so it's not just my bottle. I contacted customer service but the rep only replied with " we will look into it" and nothing happened after. I had to purchase different bottle and change into it. Absolutely love the smell but not happy with bottle design and the costumer service I got with the issue. They should make the spray bit metal one like womanity bottle.

column6: Alien Product Parfum Lotion and Gel
column7: I prefer this fragrance over the other products and enjoy once you layered gel, lotion and parfum is a light smell that carries throughout the day! Please do not discontinue these products as this is my first Thierry Mugler experience!

I just purchase the Alien Spray as a birthday gift to myself . It has made me fall in love with myself. For me it is Un- Wordable. WOW.
Thanks Mr. Mugler.
Bought the angel gift set. Gave it away because it was not a scent for me. Could not even find one of the scents that I even actually liked. Hope you have better luck than I did.

My husband just got this for me for our anniversary in St Thomas. I love it!!! And most of all he loves it. I have had so many people ask what perfume I'm wearing, it's great to see their reaction when I say " Alien". Thanks for making such a great perfume
I get stopped by strangers asking what scent I'm wearing. This happens nearly every day. I have been using it for about 4 yrs and will hardly ever wear anything else. I'm a die hard alien user.

I purchased this perfume in May 2012 at the airport when leaving Tahiti as I just loved the fragrance.
Unfortunately the lid/spray dispenser started to melt. The whole spray area became soft and made the use of the sprayer very difficult. I have had to pour boiling water over it several times just to keep in clear so be able to spray and not wash myself in the perfume.

Lets hope the next time I purchase this fragrance (which I will) the design to the spray area has been fixed.

I got a sample at Nordstrom and fell in love...told the lady that gave me the sample . I had to have a bottle and if there was any gift sets for the holidays, I want one. Sure enough I got the best christmas present this year my gift set of alien. So many compliments thank you. Been wearing angel forever. It was time for a new scent.

I have worn this perfume for at least 2 years. Every time I have it on, I get stopped and asked what I am wearing. I have received multiple compliments from both men and women. It is the first perfume that I have worn that stays on all day long. I highly recommend it. Definitely worth the buy!

In a saturated mess of fragrances, Alien truly stands out! I was first intoxicated by this scent at a NYC hotspot as the hostess shuffled groups to and fro. After she passed for the 6th time, I asked her politely what that divine smell was! The words "Alien by Thierry Mugler" parted her lips and its been my best kept secret since that moment over 8 years ago. While I've heard some dislike it on themselves, everyone I pass while wearing it (everyone I've come across in 8 years-I stopped purchasing other fragrances!) says I smell delicious. After having a few friends go out and buy it, I keep the name of this scent to myself! I find it absolutely captivating and love that nobody can put their finger on it! Maybe its just my chemistry mixed with the notes, but it is truly magical and I thank the 2 creators with every spritz!!
I bought this and it so cute. The bottle very unique, and I'm so glad its refillable because I want to keep using it as my perfume bottle.
I have worn Angel for years, always receiving compliments. Tried a sample of Alien and fell in love. It’s my new go to. Love it!
I bought this when it came out I Love the Alien collection anyways. Compliments on it every time I wear it. If you haven’t tried it you should

I got this fragrance and bottle back on black friday with the original box and I was blown away by how pretty and unique this bottle is! Every bottle is made different so no one has one that is like mine. I like that concept and personalization to the fragrance. And Alien is one of the best original pillar fragrances in this house. I highly suggest if you don't have Alien this is a wonderful time to get it and if your a collector this is definitely worth having!

When I called directly, they didn't even offer to hold the promotion until the item came into stock.  Not a very family thing to do...................improvements are needed on customer service.

Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I absolutely love this parfum! The sent is amazing and it lasts forever!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I have been wearing Alien for years and wherever I go, men and women tell me how good it smells. In the middle of a root canal, my doctor asked what I was wearing to purchase for his wife! While visiting a friend in the hospital a nurse came in the room to ask the perfume! I asked them if it was too strong and they said it just smells fresh and very good. So it is my perfume, I guess forever, because I never received countless compliments before with any scent. I wear it every day.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I got a sample in a magazine and fell in love! I am not very knowledgeable in the world of being a girlie girl and have only ever used perfumes and body sprays from B&BW so this is my first REAL perfume. I LOVE that the bottle is refillable. Now, if only I can convince myself to wear it more often than to church on Sundays. I am very frugal so I conserve more than I should.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column6: Love that I can refill my own bottles
column7: Love the fact that I can refill my own bottles without having to return them to a store and wait on associate to assist me. The price is a lot cheaper than the the stores in the mall, I filled two 2 ounce bottles cheaper than the store fill in the one 2 ounce bottle same product. I am in love with this wonderful smell and get the most comments on this fragrance .

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Alien has been my go to fragrance for years. When I wear it people are always commenting on how good I smell. The fragrance is sensual and fresh. I simply love it !!!! For ladies everywhere, wear this fragrance by Designer Mugler and it will be your signature perfume forever. I know it is mine.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I am an Alien fan and will never settle for anything that is not genuine. If you want to save money and still get your Alien, buy the refill. Please do not fall for those online sellers who sell it for 50% of its price.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I received a sample in a magazine & as hooked! The fragrance does last all day & is wonderful.I’m sensitive to a lot of scents but this I can wear without a problem !

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Mugler goes beyond the line to help in any way they can to make their customers happy. Customer service is excellent and their helpfulness is ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. If you have any doubts just give them a try, you will not be disappointed.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column6: Alien smells awesome and lasts a long time!
column7: Whenever I wear Alien or any Thierry Mugler product, I have my friends asking me what I am wearing. I am addicted!!!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Alien is my go-to fragrance. Always receive compliments when wearing it. The eco-refill bottle is very convenient!!

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottles Gift Set
column6: Customer service is admirable and exemplary.
column7: Product longevity and sillage live up to their reputation highly recommend working this company.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottles Gift Set
column7: This fragrance is irresistible! I get compliments all the time and often asked what I am wearing. I honestly hate to tell them, sometimes I fib.

column5: Alien Eau de Parfum Refill Bottles Gift Set
column7: Like the title says; this fragrance is iconic. Projection is great & wear is unbelievable.

This is another beautiful, amazing fragrance from Mugler! This is officially my second favorite perfume with Mugler Angel being my number one. This is lighter & more femine than Angel but is very, very pretty and nice. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this. Thank you Mugler!
I am a perfume collector. This is a very nice rendition of Alien. The Jasmine note in this eau due toilette version is gorgeous. I like this a lot.
I’ve had this perfume before and loved it. Missed it so much I just bought it again. In love!!!

My husband first purchased this for me and I was smitten. Never have I had a fragrance where I leave the room and come back and say to myself "wow that smells good". Nor have I worn a fragrance that all day I would get a wisp of the fragrance - well not until Alien. No matter when I wear it general to work or for a special occasion I always get the same response "....you smell really good, what are you wearing..". Then total surprise when I say Alien by Mugler ...."ALIEN", then a whole conversation about my discovery of the fragrance. When my husband first purchased I stupidly threw the packaging away and found out later about The Circle and refills. I purchased again yesterday and now I am a part of The Circle. Thanks TEAM Mugler
my wife has alzheimrer but she always liked the fragrance.
I am disappointed with this product.....the scent evaporates within minutes. Maybe the lotion is better.

Alien is my absolute favorite perfume ever! I love ❤️ it and I am so thankful for this easy to order page. Thank you for the samples it helps to get and idea of the other fragrances you have.

Thank you Tina

I work in a pizza place. Every day, I come home smelling like old pizzas... 

Well, in all honesty, that should be past tense now. I put some of this bad boy on and hoooo boy, it lasts throughout my entire shift and negates the smell of the source of my eternal torment. I walk out of the restaurant smelling as good as I did when I walked in.

Not only that, but it smells great! It reminds me of this perfume my grandma would wear every now and then to church, but less... grandma-y. It smells like good times and happier days. Smells like someone's about to get spoiled with candy and toys your mom doesnt want you to have.
amazing i love the smell of the perfume amazing i would love to buy
I have had 3 Alien perfumes.  This is a gentler version of the original.  I adore all of the fragrances

I was looking for something a bit different from what I normally wear. I had almost given up having not found anything that strikes me as different at the perfume counter when I spotted a pretty bottle and picked it up and smelled it. The sales lady introduced me to the different Mugler options, each having its own unique scent. I was looking for a scent for Summer and the Alien Esau Extraordinaire smelled like sunshine in a bottle. I love it! I also love that I can refill the bottle and continue to use the beautiful bottle.
For me, it is definitely a work-day type perfume. It is a little more flowery than what I like. Original Alien is more sweet and this is very different than that on me. It is just OK from my opinion.

Just got this for my Birthday, love it. I want to try the others as well.
Got a sample in my Marie Clair magazine.
Had to have it.
I will definitely try them all.
Thank you for this fabulous fragrance.

I wore Angel in the late 90's, then the Mugler scents seemed too strong and overwhelming as I got a bit older. I have been searching for my next obsession and was disappointed, it has been some 5 years of searching. I don't know how I missed this in 2014 (probably because the bottle was always gone from the perfume counter), but my search is over. This is the next "it' for me. Perfect in every way, the Alien is all still there, just more refined and softer, with the most perfect romantic citrus note that I can imagine. The scent lingers on close to the skin in the final hours. This is one that would be a must for me in a perfume version, too beautiful. Really a masterpiece.
I had tested this is a store before I bought it for my girlfriend and it smells perfect on her! No matter what situation this fragrance is amazing all around from the top to the bottom note.

Something about this scent pulls at my childhood memories, and I have to this day been unable to place it. It's comforting and warm, a mysterious and bright scent that I've fallen in love with. I thought Alien was my signature, but Eau Extraordinaire may win over.

Lovely for everyday wear.
Lovely for any special occasion.
Just lovely!
I love the light scent that stay with me to be admired by many through my daily travels. Womerful...Woman+ wonderful= Womerful scented! :-) :-) :-)
column28: San Francisco Bay Area, CA, USA

column7:
I adore Alien Extraordinaire!! I recieve so many compliments when I wear this.
I usually wear an edp but this smells so good that I cant complain about anything.

column6: Best eau de toilette for the eau de parfum
column7: I fell in LOVE the moment I was given a sample of Alien. I have been a Chanel No. 5 woman all my life, until the day I became entranced with Alien eau de parfum. I find the eau de toilette to be a perfect compliment to the eau de parfum. I use the eau de parfum to start my day and freshen it with the eau de toilette. The bottles are works of art and the concept of refillable bottles is pure marketing genius, as well as environmentally responsible. I thought I would never change scents but that just proves 'never say never.' Everywhere I go women AND men ask me what that glorious fragrance is, and they are literally overwhelmingly complimentary. Please, go experience the scent in person and you will discover how true this review is!

This is a beautiful, feminine, pretty fragrance. However, it has zero staying power. After about 30 minutes it almost completely faded away. I even layered it over the original Alien shower gel, body lotion, and body oil. I know it is an EDT, so I'm not too surprised, but it do prefer EDP for their longevity. All in all, a delicious fragrance that I will just have to keep on hand for re-application throughout the day.
Alien is my favor perfume!!!! I have used since it came out the first week and I purchased every one that comes out for the past 7 or 8 years! I LOVE IT!!!!!
This was a good winter scent. My fav is still original Alian mixed with Angel.
Beautiful.... Love this.....one of my favorites. Highly recommend this fragrance

What I mean is just like the original Alien, this fragrance is totally unlike anything you have on your counter! Your peers notice this more than you just by walking around. Please don't let the fact that this luring concoction is toilette because this beautiful scent stays on my skin all day! Thanks for the wonderful cost & the fact that this is a refillable bottle is genius!
This is now one of my all time favorite perfumes! I absolutely love it!!

column6: Beautiful, light scent. Perfect for warmer weather
column7: I am new to Thierry Mugler scents and am so happy I discovered this scent. I was looking for something light, fresh, sweet, but sophisticated and intriguing as well. I really liked the original Alien, but when I read the description of Alien Eau Extraordinaire, I knew it was the one for me. I ordered it without even smelling it first. I love that it captures the floral of the original, but has a more citrus twist with the bergamot notes. LOVE IT. I will be wearing this all summer for sure and I get daily compliments from friends and strangers alike when I wear it. I will subtract a star for it's longevity. It is more of an eau de toilette and doesn't quite to seem to last the day, so I put a little in one of those sample spritzers to carry in my purse just in case...speaking of which, I was really surprised to read the one star review until I read it was about the glass bottle breaking in a purse. It's glass. It's meant to sit pretty on your vanity or dresser, not bang around in your purse. That's why I suggest using those sample spritzers or getting a fancy atomizer for travel.

I have used Angel since 1998. None of the other fragrances were as appealing to me as Angel........until now. This is the most beautiful scent I have ever come across. Winter I will always wear my Angel.....but for summer......Alien Eau Extraordinaire will be my go to!

Love angel been wearing it for 15 years. Perfect size for purse
But it's glass and it broke all over my purse.never even used it.it shouldn't be glass to be put in purse and bang around.very disappointed
I Love Alien  new product .. all Terry Mugler product are smell very good
Baby....I called you many times and you didn’t pick but I didn’t get angry and I didn’t say I am not your priority...smiling
Beautiful scent with the added shimmer is awesome. Shake to get best results. Bottle and presentation is amazing as always. Great summer product.

This is one of the most beautiful perfume bottles I have seen. To have this bottle engraved gave me the desired to get it for my little granddaughter. I am a perfume bottle collector and this bottle will enhance my collection.
My sister was very ecstatic to receive a monogrammed bottle of Alien golden shimmer for her birthday...best gift ever!

column6: Not what I expected........but I love the shimmer
column7:
Unfortunately I am disappointed this is not the Alien that I love to wear everyday; if it
wasn't for returning inconveniences I would send it back and get my regular Alien, its just not for me...i love the bottle, I love the shimmer but the fragrance is not for me....
Tried this for the first time & love it!! It works well with my Alien & Angel body lotion and shower gel!!
Love this sexy fragrance! This is a great fragrance for summer evenings or for fall and winter all day too bad they don't make a lotion in it
This is amazing I love it!!!I will buy this product forever!!!!
I love the fact that you can get a refill for my alien eau extrodinaire.  It saves waste of those glass bottles and it saves me money!
Good to have a refill bottle on hand, and don't have to buy whole new bottle.

I was truly disappointed when I received Alien Eau Extraordinaire set. The sent was to soft for me. I have loved all of the order scents that I have ordered or received as gifts.
 I thought I was getting a good deal because of the price, but it was not worth what I paid for the set.

Smells like a summer version of Alien without straying too much from the original. Gorgeous and highly recommend if you are a fan of Alien and want something that doesn't feel too heavy for everyday wear.
Love this scent and a beautiful bottle. Will definitely buy again.
IPad was okay enough. It could still be better though.
Bought this on my return from Portugal and even my husband said "that smells nice"
I immediately bought this after receiving a card with the scent. Different from everything else I have. Truly refreshing.
Three women last week told me how wonderful I smelled. I really really love this smell.

I purchased Alien Eau Sublime for me originally thinking it was Alien I had purchased previously. It wasn't, but rather than return it I gave it to my daughter who absolutely loved it. When I smelled it I knew she would love Alien Eau Sublime.
I'm in love with this and have already recommended to my whole group of friends but why is this scent limited edition?? Does this mean; once it's gone, it's gone? STOCK ME UP!

Alien Sublime is a great new summer scent. My daughter and I both use It. Nice clean scent for the summer.
A must if you love Thierry Mugler.
Very unique fresh smell thierry mugler fragrance is the best and the only fragrance I where.

A nice burst of citrus, very refreshing and lovely. 

Another hit for Mugler.

Bought this travel size to hold me over until Christmas full bottle and I'm not sure it will last with wearing it everywhere, even to sleep! The jasmine and amber combo is addicting and evokes the feeling of being relaxed and confident at the same time. It's a deep mysterious scent that is not like the fruity sugar perfumes on the market.
I love my Alien scent and thissize fits perfectly in even a tiny handbag!
I would definitely reorder this! Mugler  never disappointed me!

column6: Perfect travel size for my favorite perfume
column7: I absolutely love Alien. It is my favorite scent on earth. I get nonstop compliments when I wear it which is always. I love this small travel bottle for my purse.
Amazing perfume! One of my all time favorites. Love all Mugler perfumes!
I am in love with Alien. It is my favorite scent and having it in the beautiful portable bottle makes me so happy. It is sturdy and refillable as well.
This is my second purchase of Alien Eau to go!!! I love the smell on me. My new favorite!!!
I love the "sophisticated jasmine" scent of Alien.  To have it in such a convenient purse size is so much the better! Thank You, Mugler! - lavrose

I’ve had this in a to go format for the last six months, and it is a constant companion in my purse or overnight bag. Alien is my signature fragrance, but I don’t always have time to apply it from my main bottle on hectic mornings... enter this beautiful atomizer. From everyday to epicurean in a moment!
I have not used any other perfume other than ALIEN. And I won't ever again.

column7: This perfume makes my surrounding recognizable . Everytime i pass by people look at me and said ur smell is so amazing.... unexplainably ....... Thanks Mugler. I super loving it !
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances

column7: It's really a compliment when even at 66 years of age I'm still getting compliments from both men and women, young and old, about the scent I'm wearing. "What are you wearing, you smell delicious!" I'm wearing Alien by Thierry Mugler! I've been wearing both Angel and Alien, and Alien is still my favorite! Wish it was around when I was in my 20's! Thanks to all who were inspirational in making such a beautiful fragrance! It is truly, out of this world!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances

column6: The refills smelled like pure alcohol!
column7: I decided to order the alien refills as one of my gifts from my husband for my birthday even though I wasn't fully out of my original bottle. Well it just so happened that I finally finished my perfume bottle about 2 months after I ordered the refills. When I opened the refill bottle, it smelled like pure alcohol. It smelled fake and it does not smell the same as my original bottle. Needless to say, I called about getting a replacement because maybe I've gotten a bad batch. I was very upset when the customer service rep told me that there was nothing they can do about it, she was not able to replace my order or exchange it for me. Who waits until they run out of their favorite perfume to reorder? I never run out of anything so it's in my nature to always have more before I even get close to totally running out of anything, big mistake. I'm stuck with two worthless bottles of alien refills. I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances
column49:
We are very sorry to hear about this and apologize for the inconvenience! We will be sending you an email privately to fix this issue. 
Thank you!

column7: I must say that Alien by Thierry Mugler is truly one of a kind. Over the years, I have purchased several fragrances and some are my favorites. But Alien trumps them ALL!!! I have never ever received soooo many compliments in my life!! I love this fragrance as well. It is truly amazing!!!

column7: I love the fact that my Alien products are refillable. It is a wonderful feature.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Alien Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
I have loved Alien since I began wearing it years ago. It is the only fragrance I will wear. I have gotten compliments from countless people about this perfume. People I do not know come up to me all the time to tell me how great my perfume smells, and ask what it is. I always recommend Alien. It became part of my life/style years ago and I have no intentions of wearing any other fragrance.

The refill bottles allow me to spend less money, and get exactly what I need, without getting new bottles every time I purchase. I have about 10 bottles at home that are empty from all of the department stores who told me they could not refill, that I had to buy a new bottle. That is why I am now just buying from you directly. THANK YOU.

column7:
The product it's fantastic. I love it. smells really good.
All the persons stop me and asked me about the brand of the product.
Thank you Mr. Mugler
This my favorite perfume! It works for any occasion, any season. I always receive compliments when I wear it. Love it!

I was waiting on a flight home from London in 2012 and spotted this at the airport gift shop. One whiff and I was hooked. Bought it immediately. The aroma of Alien Essence Absolue describes my soul: Deep, mysterious and full of feminine power. I am at my best when I wear it.
This is my winter fragrance. It is warm and feminine and long lasting yet not overpowering.

Thierry Mugler, the only man on Earth who captured the Divine Essence of Heaven in a bottle. Unbelievable. Opening this fragrance is a spiritual experience. I bathe in this explosion of the senses. Born Again every morning. -Zelda Zoink

Wow..so I owned this bottle before years ago and didn't have it anymore and I just got a sample again..and this is wow..I really wished they sold it in the 2oz bottle version as I would be apt to want to own that one versus the 1oz version..this is smooth jasmine with a cherried bourbon like vanilla..the jasmine from the original is still there but the smooth fluffy cloud of vanilla really transpires over time..and it lasts for hours and hours even on your clothes..after all these years I really want to own another big bottle of this again because I began liking it more than the original Alien..and that one is amazing too..actually I've owned them all before in their own unique way whether the original or a flanker of itself..this one is a worthy purchase..if you love vanilla and jasmine together with a cherried rum like feel..your going to adore this one! Mugler never discontinue this and please offer the bigger sizes..I just bought some smaller sizes elsewhere because i thought you were out of stock and discontinued it..don't discontinue this and the bigger sizes for those who want to have the choice to do so...same with Womanity..or any of your fragrances..leave the option to which size we can choose and not limit us..either way..this is a must have..I just got Womanity in full size..but man when I smelled this...I started gravitating to this more..I can't be without this or Womanity! Good job Mugler on this one!

Got this as a sample and had to have a bottle! I wear Angel and I spritzed some Alien Essence Absolue over my Angel and WOW! Smells fabulous and I get compliments on the duo! I used to also wear the original Alien, but I really love Alien Essence Absolue, will continue to wear this as long as I can get it!
This is the best fragrance ever!!!!!!!!!! Please do not discontinue!!!!!

I purchased this back in 2012 when it first came out. The bottle was 2oz. not 1oz. I also purchased the special bottle with the diamond looking stones on it.The body balm that is no longer available I went through 3 of them. This is the perfect fragrance for me.It smells like woods,jasmine, amber,it has a myrrh note in it that makes it smell like a smokey vanilla.When you first put it on its loud but not as loud as the Alien de Liquor. Dries down soft to a smokey vanilla.Sprayed on fabric it lasts all day.The body balm was totally the balm.Smelled like smokey vanilla on dry down.I hope that they continue to keep this online. Would be ashame to discontinue it. It is a real classy fragrance that I get complements on.Even from those people that complain about scents and every thing else.

column6: My signature.... recommend to a friend??? ummmm
column7: I receive so many compliments when I where this. It long lasting on me and the smell is unreal. Super Sexy and mysterious! There is just something special about this one! PLEASE DO NOT DISCONTINUE this.... its been out of stock for awhile... WHY! Can't get it at Macy's either. they don't carry it. DARN IT!
It smells absolutely wonderful but it does not last. Beth expensive for a perfume that only lasts a few hours at the most.
This is fantastic! Great fragrance, long lasting! I receive many compliments on this! Love it!

I bought it without trying it, just based on the reviews and knowing I like Alien, and jasmine. This is different than regular Alien, not as sharp, more of a sweet scent. Very pretty. Love the bottle and that I could get it engraved. Sadly, what I have noticed with all Mugler perfumes I have bought the past few months ( Alien, Alien Essence here, regular Angel, and Angel Absolu ( I think that is what it was) ... none of them have staying power anymore. Is it me? I try moisturizing before hand too.... hmmmm, no one comments or anything, and I know its not because the scent is bad! The scents are in no way bad, all 4 actually are beautiful. Well , as they say, I wear perfume for me and my spirits and this as well as the other 3, are wonderful I did take one star off though, because the staying power is very much lacking, while the scent itself is lovely and happy.
I first tried a small sample of this and then had to buy the larger bottle. I LOVE AMBER! Wow this really surprised me how it smells once on -- warm and sexy!

I'm an Angel gal and have been for twenty seven years! I purchased Alien and thought it was nice but stuck with my Angel as I thought nothing could match up!! I purchased this scent during the Christmas sale and I'm in LOVE!!!! This is now my signature fragrance. I'm stopped everywhere I go with ladies wanting to know what I'm wearing. I have to order it but that's ok! I kind of like the fact that it's not available in many stores!

column6: ALIEN ESSENCE ABSOLE!!!!! LOVE IT ! LOVE IT !
column7: THIS IS MY FAVORITE! Always have people ask me what I am wearing. My husbands & grandchildren Love it too! when my grandchildren were babies & toddlers their mothers always said. I love it when the come home from NENE's because they always smell sooo goood just like her. Will always love this. i did get a sample of Angel Muse I think I am really gonna like it too.Merry Christmas to you all. Donna Naegle, Little Rock, AR 72205
This has become my signature fragrance. Occasionally I wear angel. These fragrances demand attention , in a beautiful way!!!
I love- love- love this scent, please bring it back to the stores or even online. I was very disappointed to hear that this fragrance was not going to be available any longer.

Amazing ,I AM in love with this product:) I using Angel,Alien and Womanyty.
Every day people ask me ,which parfume I use.
I choose Mugler ....................every moment,every second

I want to use every day!!!
Is amazing...
Definitely need try the body lotion too.

column6: This is my night time going out parfum
column7: I love All Alien products Every time I go out daytime or night someone asks me what I'm wearing. Everyone loves it especially me

I purchased this bottle of Alien and wanted to refill, but the store I went to did not have and did not offer to find me a closer location to refill the bottle. As well she was trying to talk me out of refilling, and making a much smaller purchase. Where can I get a refill of this in the Minneapolis area, but I do not want to go to The Mall of America. Thank you
Over the years I have used quite a few perfumes but this tops my list. It is sensual and powerful yet not over-bearing. I just wish I had discovered it earlier

I sprayed a bit on my wrist at the store and walked around the Mall. It smelled better and better as the day went on. I was wearing a coat and my sleeve rubbed on it. I could smell it all day the NEXT DAY and it got on my skin again!!! So much so that I was asking people at work what they thought of the smell. Everyone love it.
Its has a distinct smell, it might not be for everyone but I LOVE IT. GoING to get my 2oz this weekend. I like musky and this fit the bill.
Based from the sample i received with purchase of other item this smelled delicious. It lasts all day and a tiny bit spilled in my car and i can still smell it! Would absolutely purchase this

Love this nectar fragrance! Sophisticated and playful. I t is my favorite! Not too heavy, just perfect with my body chemistry.

Recently, I was in Nordstroms Chicago and tested new Muegler leather and I dont know the other by name, but is is fabulous. Please let me know what it might be.

I thought the original Alien was good enough until I tried this! It was a blind buy because of the beautiful crystal bottle. I love pretty much all the notes so I figured there was a good chance I'd like it, other wise i could refill it with the original Alien. It turned out to be much much better than Alien. It is more intense than the Alien but mellower and smoother at the same time. The dry down is much more sophisticated in my opinion and it is just all around better. I think I'll go for this instead the original Alien in the future. Also I have to mention, this bottle is actually 2 fl.oz instead of 1 fl.oz as stated in the description. I had my suspicion when comparing pictures of bottles, I'm so glad I was right. This bottle is definitely worth 8 dollars more!

column7: My overall favorite. Such a magical amber fragrance, please keep making this!

column5: ALIEN ESSENCE ABSOLUE Eau de Parfum Intense Refill Bottle
column7: I absolutely love Alien Essence Absolue! My everyday go to along with a spritz of Angel. I get so many compliments on this combo. I hope they make it forever!

column5: Alien Essence Absolue Intense Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: We waited until Christmas morning to exchange our gifts. She smiled after reaching into her Christmas stocking to retrieve an unwrapped box containing 2 ounces of Alien Essence Absolue Intense Eau de Parfum. I retrieved her empty vaporiseur and we refilled it by the vanity in the master. Oops! She watched as one precious drop managed to escape, while a full ounce of the precious nectar was bringing her vaporiseur back to life. We both love this fragrance, and having it back in our lives again is something we truly appreciate. Thank you Thierry Mugler for your exquisite taste, your gift of design excellence, for this heavenly fragrance that we've both come to love. And by the way, we've noticed that the fragrance of that one single escaped drop that had splashed on our vanity yesterday morning continues to linger. This is an amazingly high quality parfum.

column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Alien > Gift Sets

column7: The first time I tried Alien fragrance, I felt like it was meant for me. It touched the inner most part of my soul and made me feel complete and exhilarated for the first time in many years. Since then I have tried many versions of Alien and each continues the journey to finding the real, sensual me that has been missing for some time. The Eau de Parffum, Body Lotion and Shower Gel create a complete aura surrounding me and the new Radiant Body Cream is like the cherry on top of the cake. This combo pack is perfect for travel or the new Alien client.

column6: This product it is the best
column7: I love alien gone to bed I have a lot of others you name it I got but none to me as the alien whenever I go out people keep asking me what are you wearing you smell so good and because I got so much compliment as soon as my bottle is empty I refill it love it love love it .
I smelled it at Macys and had to have it I have all mugler collection I love it.
I own several perfumes from Mugler, OMG! THIS ONE IS AMAZINGLY PUT TOGETHER. I NOT ONLY LIKE THE FRAGRANCE, I LOVE THE BOTTLES THEY COME IN.
Never disappointed love this brand of perfume.  I have so many different ones.

column6: Perfect! Supreme spring and summer floral!
column7:
I had quested for the perfect floral,  journeying through various counter top samples, sniffing a Bloom and Daisy here, and a Si Fiori and Est Belle there, and on and on, until I felt tangled in night-blooming jasmine and jungle-gardenia vines, overgrowing an impenetrable hedge-rose. I wandered home discouraged, with itching eyes and a headache.  
Then I recalled the next day that I had a sample of Flora Futura.  Duh!!  And I wear the core, traditional Alien fragrance which for me is a mysterious, hypnotic but unobtrusive presence. She's able to be worn 24-7 without offense to some of those Sensitives in close environments, and to the delight of Connoisseurs, Aficionados and/or just the Curious.  
And I'm very happy with the core Alien fragrance, but had wanted something new, fresh and hopeful after the long winter.  I'm not sure how to express how lovely this new floral Alien is, except maybe to recall evenings in Guadeloupe with time, and a gentle pace and the ever present evening songs and fragrances. Yes.  It's like that.  Just like that...
This scent lasts forever and never changes on my skin love it!
I have been looking for a softer scent...and this one fits the bill !! I just love the creaminess of the scent especially after dry~down. It's so lovely and calming to me...Beautiful fragrance

I've lived in the Mojave and Great Basin deserts my whole life. I know the cactus flower in this is tropical, but this immediately brings to mind desert flowers in spring. It brought back so many wonderful memories.

It really does smell like a desert oasis in springtime. I absolutely love it.

The only problem with it is that it doesn't have the sillage or longevity of the original Alien. Since my skin eats fragrance, that's a big deal for me. So unfortunately not full bottle worthy for me specifically, but if you don't have difficulties with fragrance disappearing on you, this is absolutely beautiful.

Though this is a lovely product it is not at all like my wonderful Alien or Angel! Very heavy on the floral which I do not care for but it would be nice for someone looking for that type of scent. It is beautifully packaged and a fine product but from now on will stick to my old favorites!
This is an amazing New ALIEN FRAGRANCE. One spray from this beautiful bottle and I am hooked!
I like the fragrance but the scent doesn’t last very long so I think that I will stay with the Parfums instead of the Eau De Toilette

I actually like this better than the original version. It has a strange, subtle buttery warmth to it that I find myself really attracted to. Very rich and decadent. It is definitely Alien, has as everyone says the Alien DNA, but with added warmth and richness. I recommend it. Very neat packaging as well.

I have a few Alien versions and this version is amazing with the leather. The first note you smell is a very smooth and well balanced leather with the jasmine and amber notes that come right behind it and it really enhances the fragrance and makes it much richer and long lasting..I am really considering buying this in the future but i highly recommend it..its phenomenal.

Originally, Alien was my favorite perfume, but when Thierry Mugler announced the release of Alien Les Parfums de Cuir (Fragrance of Leather), I ran out to smell it. I quickly realized that leather was the one thing that had been missing from an otherwise perfect perfume. It now feels complete.
This is pure heaven to my nose. If I had to smell one thing for the rest of my life, let it be this. There just isn't anything like this perfume in the universe. I love it, I love it, I love it. <3 <3

Absolutely in love with it! I’ve been using original Alien   For almost 10 years ant fusion is a great addition to it. Not a great difference in smells but you can definitely catch that wood/cinnamon scent.
This scent is soft. It is not over powering. I can’t smell it on myself. I have received compliments of how nice I smell.
Love the long lasting subtle fragrance and red bottle
I loved Aura so this is with a cinnamon tone making it my current favorite scent.
I recently purchased Alien Fusion.  This is a softer calmer version of Alien, which I love.  Original can be too strong at times.  This is calmer.  I like it
I’m so happy I tried another one of the Mugler scents.... I’m always getting complimented on all scents!!! Another great one!!!! Just keep them coming ❤️
Alien is an amazing scent, Alien Fusion is a lighter summary form of alien
I just love all of Mugler Fragrance just so unique long lasting Beauty's

This fragrance is warm, exotic, and citrusy. It's a nice fragrance for an afternoon tea, a book club meeting, or something like that. Not something I'd wear on date night, it's a little too bright. (I prefer the Alien Oud Majestueux or Alien Musc Mysterieux for date night.) It is good for daytime wear though.

My husband bought this for me for mother’s day, I absolutely love love love it. The bottle is absolutely beautiful, it doesn’t feel cheaply made, it feels nice in my hand. The smell is lovely. Not too strong, but literally two sprays lasts all work day. I get compliments all the time, even after a few hours into the work day. I can’t wait to order more Alien scents, I will be ordering my husband one for Father’s Day so we can both wear our scents.
I have worn this several times now and am extremely please with my purchase

column7: Purchased for the wife for mother’s day. It was a hit from opening. Hasn’t used anything else since. Not even womanity which was her favorite.

column6: All that I expected  and more
column7: A subtle hint of vanilla gives warmth  to the fragrance making this version of Alien my new favorite. I love this one!!
I just got the new fragrance Alien Fusion. I am in love, I couldnt put it down. The Falcon Talisman bottle is a genius vessel. Its Mine! So happy with this in my mugler collection.

I sprayed this on me from a tester at the store on two different occasions. I am IN LOVE - I purchased it from the Mugler website right away! This scent is so divine, very sexy and romantic. I could smell it on me hours after, not sure why people are complaining about the longevity, I think it has a lot to do with body chemistry. This is by FAR my one of my favorite perfumes!

So disappointed in this scent.
Nothing how it’s discribed
Unfortunately I had to return it bcause I did not like the scent at all. I was very disappointed. However I do love Alien. I get so many compliments on it

The original Alien has been my signature fragrance for years and I have really enjoyed a few of the other flankers because they have heavy scents that last very long. This one has a very similar smell to the original except it has more of a sweetness. It is a nice smell but it doesn’t last long at all, so I wouldn’t purchase it again.
I love  Alien and Aura  so when I saw this one coming out I could not wait to get it. Love the smell , love how it works on me..thank you !
I am an Alien enthusiast. I have true nearly all of them and love them all! This one though, is now my favorite! Alien, Aura and Womaity are my top 3 go to smells everyday and evening!
I bought this after my neighbor gave me a sample to try. It smells divine. I love it!

Smell's fantastic and long lasting.  I'm a huge Alien fan and this has the Alien DNA with spices and tuberose mixed in, I love twist this one has.  The bottle is beautiful like with all Mugler perfumes but the red really stands out. Keep up the good work Mugler!
Received several nice compliments but found the fragrance didn't last nearly as long as original Alien.

I am new to Thierry Mugler. Just bought Angel for the first time and loved it so I tried Alien Fusion. I want a perfume that lasts and both of these do. Fusion is much more spicy and less sweet... which I like. The dry down on me is much different than the inital scent , so dont be shocked at the inital spray on. Highly recommended if you like spice/oriental.

I love the original Alien and was a little hesitant to try this one because I do not care for some of the other variations (flora futura) but this one is fantastic! I still prefer my original Alien but will also continue to use this one. My only complaint is that it isn’t refillable. I am hoping also to see the line expanded to include body lotion or cream.

What original Alien is to jasmine, Alien Fusion is to tuberose.

I mean, just in-your-face, knock-you-down tuberose.

And for someone like me, who has never smelled a perfume heavy in tuberose, it was a bit of a shock. Even a little exhausting and nauseating as time went on (it lasts for HOURS).

I tried again, this time using a much lighter hand, and it was beautiful. It still takes some getting used to, that tuberose is really strong, but still gorgeous.

I purchased this set and came in a wonderful packaging! Very well packaged so nothing could break. Design box display once it’s open looks very classy! I love wearing this during winter! A lot of men from different ages have asked me what perfume I am wearing since it smells really nice! Love that I can refill the bottle when empty . Great scent Mr. Mugler!
