column7: I didn't think Alien could get better but Liqueur de Parfum is a treasure! I received this as a Christmas gift from my husband, lucky me! He loves it on me and I get complements from co-workers and strangers alike. They say they can smell my perfume in the elevator and know it is me- it is unique on each wearer. Thanks for such a wonderful fragrance!

Wow I've been wearing Angel for over 20 years. It has been my signature scent. I ALWAYS get compliments ! I decided to try this a few years ago and I've fallen in love with it! This mixed with my body chemistry makes it my own. I've turned many women on to Alien Liqueur( as i do with Angel) and when they get it they like it but they say they don't smell like me per se. Thank you Thierry for the way you've left room to make it our own. I'm a customer for life. Its the sexiest scent ever !
This is one of the best perfumes I own! I get compliments everytime I wear it. From both men and women just love it!
JUST ONE OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL SCENTS I'VE SMELLED IN MY LIFE! LOVE IT... LOVE IT... LOVE IT...

I was blown away with the scent and the affordability and quality of this Perfume and the Designer Perfume Line. It was a great buy and will surely buy more of them from this website! Thank you Mugler USA! A proud customer!
Oh, Alien!! Such a mesmerizing scent!! I get sooooo many compliments each time I wear it!! Anyone in doubt about this fragrance, I'll put your mind at ease.

I didn't think anything could be better than Angel and that is still a scent that blows my mind each time I wear it. Well Alien is just as breathtaking but with a completely different unique profile. This scent is soft but powerful, it lasts all day for me and I love when I spray on a sweater and I open my closet and smell it again. This is an all year scent in my opinion it is soft enough for spring/summer and has the strength to be a fall/winter scent. I has a powder type scent but sexy at the same time. Hard to really explain both Angel and Alien other than to say unique, sexy, unforgettable. I received a sample and couldn't stand to be without it after 1st spray of that sample. It is that good but I'm not surprised.

Ok..I have always been a Angel girl. I wore it for years and still do!! Still LOVE my ANGEL... It was my 1st LOVE. Then the HOT new guy moved into the neighborhood named ALIEN!! I never ever have a time when I'm wearing this fragrance that I don't get tons of compliments... ALIEN my new LOVE!! This gift set is a great deal it gives you all the items you need to layer your fragrance, which in my opinion truly makes all the difference. Honestly I'm just a Mugler girl period. I love the refillable bottles,the 5 free sample's you get when ordering from TM.com and the customer service is phenomenal!!
My next TM fragrance try will be .... Womaninity
ALIEN IS A MUST HAVE in your fragrance collection ... ANGEL too!!
Hope this helps,
GaGirl

column7: The title says it! The bottle is nice in appearance, although I didn’t expect the cap or top to be made of plastic, when the rest of the bottle is glass. So, I suppose I expected the bottle to be a bit higher in quality, but it is still esthetically pleasing. Since the bottle is refillable, the cap comes off, but it fits a bit loosely, and moves around a bit, which I don’t like. The scent however, is lovely, definitely stronger than angel, and I feel it is a longer lasting scent too. That being said, a little goes a long way, so it can be overpowering if you use too much! I was pleased overall, as I hadn’t sampled this scent prior to buying it. I trusted the mugler brand, and took a chance. Needless to say, I wasn’t disappointed in the overall quality of the product.
I love Alien. It’s so different. Makes me happy! Highly recommended!

My first love is and always Womanity.When I recieved the sample of Alien Oud Majesteuex,I fell in love a second time.It is simply out of this world. It is classy,soft albeit strong enough to wear for a longer period. The fragrance is captivating and stands out. What I love about it is that it is unique just like womanity. column6: Did not live up to expectations!
column7: I am still trying to get acquainted with this version of Alien. I have different takes on Alien. All the major Alien fragrances and limited editions too, to include aged in oak barrels and another with leather. Loved them all! Always have received oodles of compliments and people asking what fragrance I am wearing. I no longer can smell the fragrance on me and don't even think others can either, so surprised when I am stopped and asked what I am wearing. But... I am having trouble adjusting to this Alien with Oud. No compliments received either, so wonder what others are smelling. Wish they would have had a smaller size, as I am not sure this is going to be a good fit.

column6: My all time all time favorite Alien
column7: Recently I got into an OCD mode and bought almost every version of Alien there is to be found since I love the original Alien so much. But alas I was disappointed by the overly cloying, nearly cheap smelling, powdery sweet wannabe's that smell a far cry from the original (i.e. Licquer, Absolue, and Taste of Fragrance)- yuck! Then I ordered this one and I may never wear anything else. It is actually better than the original quite possibly. It has this lovely woody, spicy, vanilla dry down that keeps me smelling my wrist over and over. It's a little more straight forward than Alien to me, if that makes sense....like all the beauty of Alien in one vein and the Oud in another that come together to make a simply heavenly and elegant fragrance that's both sophisticated and sexy. I believe this could even be worn by men and might try some out on my own guy.

I have been a faithful fan of Alien since it first came out, but the first time a smelled Alien Oud Majestueux I FELL IN LOVE!!
It's scent like no other! I hope Mugler doesn't discontinue it, EVER.
I ordered and reicieved it in a beautiful package, day before Mother's Day...it made my holiday even better. 
I wear original Alien on one side and Majestueux on the other side.

I am an Alien devotee for life so I decided to give this limited edition of Alien Oud Majestueux a try. The package is beautiful and very high quality, as expected. It arrived very fast and beautifully wrapped. The perfume itself is a spicy - the first word that comes to mind is Turkish or Oriental - interpretation of Alien. It's definitely a heavier wear than Alien (which I think has more of a powdery/vanilla scent), but it also lingers a lot on you and on your clothes, so if you like heavier, strong scents, this is for you. I would say the base is still Alien but the high notes are definitely heavier Oriental, amber ones. I love it and have been wearing it every other day just because I like to change things up depending on how I feel. Lovely addition to my Mugler collection on my vanity!

amazing , not ordinary

I’m assuming this will get censored too but I will not ever again purchase your product. The fact you won’t post an honest review or even respond to my dissatisfaction with the service I received is exactly what my point was in my previous review. I will take my money to a company that values its consumers. There was no part of my review that “didn’t meet” any guidelines aside from you not wanting to post anything that a new consumer could think reveals how you really care about who’s purchasing your products. Too bad too because as I stated in my previous review I actually enjoyed your product just didn’t appreciate the lack of diligent service.

column6: Perfect for on the go application
column7: Love the Alien scent, just the right balance without being overbearing. The stick is a really awesome concept, makes me feel like I’m getting more out of it. I was a little disappointed with customer service however, as I’m the type of buyer who likes to go directly to the source instead of your average Ulta or Sephora. I did not receive my initial order, I had a hard time getting ahold of anyone, and when I finally did (3 days after it hadn’t arrived as the website requested) they asked me to wait another 3 days and I just did not like the way I brushed off like that. If I’m going to be investing in a product for refills I don’t like the idea of not having the assurance my purchase is cared for. They finally sent me a replacement, but it was almost 3 weeks total since my order before I finally received my product. Overall not a bad product though.

I came across Alien perfume about a month ago and had to smell it. I found MuglerUSA.com and ordered the perfume pen. This is absolutely perfect! I can carry it everywhere, use it anytime I want to and because it's a solid, I dont waste any of this perfect scent on anything but my skin. All the samples that were free, are to die for as well. Thank you for a groovy shopping experience. I am a lifelong fan now!

Easy carry in the pocket or purse to pen a joyful, sweet and silky phrase to oneself or another, or to freshen fragrance while traveling. 

Had just discovered that my old travel-size Alien was made of glass, when it hit the tile floorI Didn't know, as it was white with a gold cap and black plastic sprayer. No harm. Almost gone anyway. And thus my sad "oops!" led to discovery of this little gem of wonder. And in the distinct Alien signature purple and gold, it's pretty too. 

Yes. These lovely pens are Holiday gift giving solved! Hmmmm,,, do you suppose it glows under club light effects?

column7: I was able to get this gift set and it is one of the best of the best on the Mugler site. It comes with everything in one from the body cream which is extremely moisturizing and it smells like the sambac jasmine but even grapy with a mix of fruit punch but very sophisticated..the hair mist smells just like the perfume and better suited for the hair and the body wash smells like the scent as well and the perfume itself is amazing a mix of sambac jasmine, vanilla, and orange blossom..this is a grapey white floral fragrance that lasts a long time and you will get so many compliments...and the bottle of Alien is like a piece of art..the box lights up when you open it..this is such a fancy gift to have..I love it and feel special to have it! You can't get better than Mugler fragrances.

The Radiant Body Cream is thicker and softer than the Body Lotion. I use it morning and night all winter pretty much over my whole body. I love it you don't get an over whelming fragrance even putting it on all over. When I go out I use the deodorant and a light walk through spritz of the Perfume from the Loyalty kit and people have to be very close to notice my perfume. But notice they do I work part time in a Jewelry Store and the rest of the week in our Property Management Co and men and women both will ask me what I'm wearing, they have never smelled anything that smelled so good and did not over power the room. When I go to the Chiropractor and lay on the damp heating pad before my treatment the heat brings out the fragrance and the next person in the room asks what kind of air freshener they use it's wonderful and the tech says it's not air freshener it just Bonnie we love it when she comes in it lasts a long time.
Satisfied Customer
Bonnie

column7: My dearest friend gave Alien to me. I love it and the fact my birthday stone is amethyst makes it more special. This is my new signature scent.
Perfect size for purse and of course the perfume is wonderful!
This is the perfect size to take Alien with me everywhere I go, and I actually prefer how this dispenses over my full-sized bottle.

I bought this specifically to travel with; however it also works great as a perfume that I can keep in my purse for when I am out and about and want a refresher spritz. For travel I don't like packing my full size bottle in my luggage as I am afraid it will either get broken or stolen; they are just to expensive and awesome to have that happen! This little 2 oz. size is perfect for going thru airport security as it meets the TSA 3 oz. or less rule. As a plus it is $33 cheaper than the actual purse version that Thierry sells. Win Win!!
Everytime I spritz this on, I feel like an island goddess, in step with the the swaying palm trees.

i totally fell in love with Alien on a trip to Vienna! The day i discovered it, a friend asked me what i want for my bday so i asked for Alien perfume! Since then i have not used any other perfume (and i am a Mugler fan!). This little stone is perfect for carrying in my handbag and i can have it everywhere with me! Totally in Love!!!
This fragrance last all day. My other half loves it. I receive compliments all day. Especially from men!

The Angel body oil is just wonderful! I got it to use in the winter months because my skin gets so dry. To my surprise, it worked great! It was not greasy and did not ruin my clothes, when I put them on! It went on smooth and silky! Made my skin feel so good, not slimy! Plus, it smelled so good...I didn't even have to wear the perfume....it was scented enough! I can't wait to see how it works for the summer...when I have a little tan!

I hope they make it for Alien soon...it's definitely a winner!

column7:
I have worn Angel for many years now and do not intend to change because the fragrance works well with my body chemistry. After saying all that, now I am an even bigger fan of Alien, now what do I do? Guess what? I have added Alien to my collection and now my collection is complete. Thanks Thierry Mugler for your fabulous fragrances.

Rosie Holmes, RN BSN

column5: Alien Signature Fragrance and its Gold Cuff Bracelet
column7: Sweet and beautiful :) Full of Love!! Even beautiful for an Alien ;)
The bracelet is old no shine in gem, old chain:-( I put it in Goodwill...
Bought this a gift for my daughter and she loves it, the bracelet a little bit big but the fragrance is awesome. Highly recommended!!!!

The Alien perfume smell amazing, just as always. The bracelet however looked a little old/worn out and the stone cut was different from what is pictured. However I am happy with my purchase :)
LOVE ALIEN

I love Alien Sunessence. I purchased a 0.27 floz spray of this and it smells amazingly wonderful. I now want it to be my signature scent. I hope I can get a large bottle soon. I am almost 53 yrs old and to me this is my favorite scent.

I like the fragrance immensely! It is woodsy and people comment on my scent when I arrive. The only complaint I might add is that the actual product does not last as long as the samples did. When I used samples, they lasted all day. When I use the bottle I ordered, it seems to fade more quickly. However, I LOVE the scent.

column6: Best perfume I have ever owned
column7: This is by far my absolute favorite perfume. It smells amazing and I always get complements on how great I smell. Worth every penny. I love the set with body wash and lotion too. The bottle is refillable too at a cheaper price. I also got 5 samples and free shipping. And it shipped fast. I give it a 10 out of 10!!!

column6: I'm in love with the Alien!!!
column7: I've been in love with this fragrance since I first smelled it. It Alientastic!!!!

I love Alien and Angel both and collect the different bottles. I had wanted the Talisman for my collection for quite some time and decided to treat myself. As always am delighted with the bottle and the fragrance. My collection is so special I have even bought display shelves for it and the Talisman bottle really stands out!

I have worn Alien for a long time and now my 16yr old daughter steals it. It's a great scent and last a very long time, even after washing your laundry, the scent will linger. Alien is always highly complimented by both the young and not so young.
Alien has landed on its perfect pedestal - just as perfect as Angel with its stand! Don't know what took so long for this - LOVE IT!
This version of Alien has a great end note of butter and caramel that really enhances the scent. Please make it a regular scent with it's own body butter or lotion!

This is the perfect addition to my Alien arsenal. The salted butter caramel adds a warmth and depth that the original Alien doesn't possess. As it dries down, it becomes this wonderful blend of sweet and seductive, while still retaining that unique Alien signature. Very happy that I took a chance on this.

column6: CAN YOU PURCHASE REFILL FOR THIS????
column7: Love this product. Can I purchase refills? I have 2 bottles. It would be nice to be able to refill them instead of buying a new bottle everytime.
Every time I wear this someone stops and asks "What are wearing, you smell wonderful." I wear it daily!!

I absolutely love Alien, It's the best perfume I have used and the men love it!!! I was walking around at a store shopping and I noticed that there was a a man following me, I didn't know what to think, so finally he came up to me and said"maam, what are u wearing? lol I was like a shirt and jeans and he said no I mean what fragrance do you have on and I said Alien by Thierry mugler... he said you smell so good that I couldn't help but to follow you lol. He said can I just stand here for a minute so I can smell you and I said sure if you want to. So as he was standing there I wrote the name of the perfume down for him and told him to go to dillards to get it. so that following weekend I ran into him again and he told me he bought some for his girlfriend!!!!!! YAY!!! I WILL NEVER WEAR ANYTHING ELSE BUT ALIEN!!!!!

My husband bought this fragrance for me over 6 years ago and I fell in love with this scent. Every where I travel someone tells me I smell beautiful and ask the name of the fragrance. I tell them Alien by Thierry Mugler and I smile.
Beautiful fragrance. This set is really pretty. Would highly recommend this gift set
Beautiful bottle and unforgettable smell Very rich fragrance My favorite parfume

I love Alien Fragrance. I receive so many compliments. Everyone always asks me what I'm wearing. Certain fragrances do not smell right with my skin chemistry, but this fragrance holds true to its original smell. This fragrance is amazing. The bottle is so pretty too. Please never discontinue this fragrance.

My favorite drag performer was drenched in this luxurious and mesmerizing scent so I immediately ordered it and it did not disappoint. 10 out of 10 recommend. It really does smell divine, like something a goddess would smell like (which she did). STUN.

I was thrilled to receive my Alien Divine Collector Perfume. Love the designer bottle. An extra plus was the free Alien Gift set with cosmetic bag. Alien is my favorite Perfume. Always get compliments when I am wearing it!
I love this fragrance. It is very pleasurable and sensual.

column6: A fragrance that is out of this world! ☆Heavenly
column7: Hello there. My name is Julie Smith. I have been a perfume collector for many many years. I have a dresser that the whole top is nothing but perfume. My family says I have a problem. Lol. When I was introduced to my first experience of the lovey Alien, I fell in love. I cant tell you how many complaments I get. Most of the times they want to know the name of what I have on. I always say" The Thierry Muglar line "Alien". I tell them all about it and where to go purchase it. I didnt just stop with Alien, I had to try the other's. My next purchase was Angel. I do love it but Alien was still my favorite. Sometimes I mix them both and wow its awesome. I have most of the whole line of the women's fragrances. I have a separate area for just my Muglar line. I sometimes tell stories of Thierry. He is a real inspiration to me. The outfits and the bottles are fabulous as well. My wish before my death is to be able to visit Paris and meet him and his team to see the majistacl being made. I hope God has this perfume in heaven. I thank you for wanting my experience . Sincerely yours, Julie Smith♡
This is a beautiful set and I love the body creme...I always purchase seta that include body creme as it really makes the scent last and smell its best
In the summer when I wear relaxed clothing, I will spray on some Angel Aqua Chic and smell as if I spent hours pampering myself. Perfect all year round too.
Recherche the Eau de Parfume in Womanity "Fragrance"...!!!
This angel smells different than the original. It has a sparkly effervescent feel. I love it!!

I adore the freshness in this scent with the combination of the classic Angel..the citrus is so fizz like with that patchouli...nothing tops this for a summer scent..i wish they made this as a regular year around scent in an EDP version i would buy this stuff in full size forever if it was like that i love it that much more than the regular Angel...either way this is going to stay in my collection for as long as i can enjoy it i do hope you make Angel flankers like this more in EDP the fresh citrus notes is a breath of fresh air..nothing like this out there..
Totally love this scent!! I order it all the time!! Use all the angels but this scent is so sexy..

column6: Favorite day time and summer scent
column7:
Appealing, light, wonderful for daily daytime and a light summer 
fragrance.
I have been a fan of Angel since it was introduced at Sacks and it is my favorite for night time and special occasions.
I always receive compliments for both products!

I have used Angel as my signature scent for many years. This beautiful scent is a lighter version. It is the one I use most often during the warmer months of summer. The bottle is gorgeous and I couldn't wait to add it to my collection.
I purcharsed this product while living in Gemany, and became a slave to the lovely smell that never leaves and is not over powering. This is a Lady's scent.
This is absolutely great for summer. It is the lighter version of the regular Angel and has an added soft freshness about it. I will definitely wear this all summer long.

Not only do I use exclusively Angel and Alien I also collect the new and unique presentations when offered.  This is delightful, my only complaint being I have yet to find the perfect way to display it to best show off the delightful shell!

Angel has been my signature fragrance for many years. I love to layer the scent so it lasts all day. I truly feel special with the Black Brilliant Star because it is so elegant in design and appearance. Thank you - being a Mugler Addict is my special place.

Besides being filled with the most wonderful smell ever, this star in the black hard case solves all of my traveling problems. I don't worry about spills or breakage.
So you see, I received functionality, beauty and most important the perfume of angels when I purchased the Brilliant Black Star.
This is the perfume my daughter wears and we both recommend it to all of our friends!

I thought it was a bottle filled with the Angel perfume in it, but it was just a cover to go over the original Angel star. I would not have purchased it, if I knew this. I believe it is my mistake because I did not read the information correctly when purchased.
I love the fact that you can replace a new bottle in the case, or, you can just use the case as a sparkling piece of its own!
I have worm all of Thierry Mugler products and I love all of them

A perfect center attraction for the mirror tray on my dresser, this star will JUST fit into the original silver star holder I bought years ago. The crystals sparkle beautifully against the contrast of the black case. I would have given this piece five stars if it were a little easier to open( it DOES get easier each time it's used, however). Press on the button on the right side while prying the case with your fingernail near the top or bottom of the case.
This piece is stunning. The crystals are amazing. Has to be seen in person. My absolute favorite in my collection.

column5: Angel Book of Magic Gift Set
column7:
I loved this gift set so much that I also gifted one to my mom.
I have been wearing Angel for over 20 years, and my mom has been wearing it for 7 years.
Angel has become a part of The family!

Thank you.

JC

column5: Angel Book of Magic Gift Set
column7:
I love this set. It has all my favorites from the
Shower gel to the lotion topped with my favorite
Perfume. Best Mother's Day gift ever from my
favorite man.

column5: Angel Book of Magic Gift Set
column7: I got this set, as a surprise gift from a gentleman. WOW!! was I blown away. LOVE the set!!! So HUGE Kudos to the Gentleman & this gift!!

column7:
This is a really good deal!
I love this fragrance it is so unique and the box is so beautiful art deco style.
I got what I wanted for Christmas this year!

column5: Angel Book of Magic Gift Set
column7: I bought it in Rome today...it is extrordinary! I think i will never change parfum from now on :) love angel!!!!

column7: I got this set for Christmas and I love it!! Angel has been a favorite of mine for years as well as innocent. What I loved about this set is the Size of the refillable EDP as well as the lotion and shower gel sizes, the price point is great and easy to travel!!! LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT!

THE SMELL CAPTURES THE ATTENTION OF EVERONE AROUND ME WHEN I WALK INTO THE ROOM!

column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7: I've been using Angel for years. I get many compliments and usually hear "Love the Angel!" The set is great; you can layer the products. I'll probably use this forever!
My son, William, ( who is 27) always says he knows when he is home because the house smells like Angel and that means, MOM! Thanks for making my house a home!

great gift box she loved it worked so well
she wished she had another one
the best body cream on market. carries the angel scent but not overpoewering

This set is perfect for travel. This was the first time I have gotten through check-in without having something confiscated. It makes being away from home so much nicer if you have your own cosmetics. I love the Angel scent so much that I wear it to bed so the sheets will be lightly scented. This collection is wonderful and the cosmetic bag is a lovely extra!

I started wearing Angel about 5 years ago. Love this set. I was going to buy as a gift and decided it needed to be a gift for me :) Angel is my signature scent and is the only perfume that I wear because it stays with me and I always get compliments when wearing. It will definitely be my go-to forever.
I absolutely love this gift set and the fragrance is phenomenal!
I love this fragrance! Why is it out of stock? PLEASE don't discontinue it!!!!!! I have recommended this product to many women and men who smell it on me. I am positive some have purchased.
Yes, it is expensive, but well worth the cost. The exquisite bottle holds the enchanted one-of-a-kind fragrance. Love it!
Very nice...compact...for on the go! Amazing product to die for!

I bought this for my Mom for Mother's Day and she Loved it! I have worn Angel for over 18 Years, and she haas always liked it. Then her hubby smelled it on her and really liked it! The extra samples were great as he was able to try the Men's versions, which they both enjoy!
This is a beautiful gift set. I love the pocket book size vial. This is truly a wonderful set

I purchased this product because it makes a great collection piece and sampler before buying larger amounts. I had given a set to a sister who loves the product line. If you want a fragrance that could represent you in being your "Signature Scent," then Angel is the one...
I really enjoy my collection of miniatures. They are so cute and convenient. I am glad that I decided to purchase. Thanks
This package has something delightful for everyone, there is no woman who would not be thrilled.
I have been wearing angel for about 5 years . I have three refillable bottles. This is a great buy . I wish I had ordered more sets . I kelpt them all for me no gifts . Sorry friends

column6: My favorite scents in one gift
column7: This is a perfect gift for the person who has everything. These classic fragrances is perfect for the introduction into the Angel world.

Knowing what a Mugler addict I am, my little sister got this for my birthday! They're like four dazzling diamonds littered above my boudoir among my other favorite Angel products. Thank you Mugler, and thank you, Su!
I love the set I purchased.Now I have an Angel in every room and in my purse!
ANGEL IS MY ALL TIME FAV. N I AM GLAD TO BE ABLE TO GET A VARIETY IN ONE SMALL PURCHASE.. THANKS A BUNCH !!!!!!

I absolutely love the smell of Angel and have received compliments ever single time I leave the house wearing this beautiful fragrance. I was introduced to the scent at a picnic where a lady who was sitting close to my table was wearing Angel. I asked and went out and bought it the next day and have been wearing it ever since. Try the smaller versions to see which one suits you best.
Thanks for this sample size Angels. I bought this for my friend, a Christmas gift.

I'm totally in love with this fragrance and wen I use it people love the smell too . And everytime that I can I get it and stay long in you plus is perfume so you put it in the morning and still smell in the evening .
This was an amazing buy. A great deal for all the products

column6: The Very Best of the Best
column7: I have used Angel from day one and use nothing else Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I love this set it gives me the opportunity to carry and wear my favorite sent all the time

I just love my Angel Deluxe Coffret of Miniatures! Although one was damaged I still have the other 3. They are great for traveling too. I use to wear Angel a long time ago and now I'm back because it's classic and a wonderful scent

i first discovered Angel on a trip to Paris - in the 90's . Was so upset that it wasn't available in the States at that time. It has been my only perfume all these years. . nothing compares! It is truly heavenly and appropriately named.

column6: One of the best gifts I gave, and bought for mysel
column7: Since I was first introduced to Angel over 5 years ago, it is the only brand I use. So many compliments!
Nice way to have a travel size perfume. Also a good way to sample the product and not to mention a great idea to use as gift and a way to lure new fans.

The reason I bought this cuties is because it brought back memories of my first tiny angel star. It was the only size I could afford back in the nineties. Now I have a much bigger angel stars and I get them refilled often. I have tried other perfumes but I guess you could say angel is my addiction I just can't stop using it.
Everytime this is worn this is complemented, I even left the building and was called by someone that knew me and other people in the office wanted to know what scent i was wearing.

column7:
I like this set very much, even the box is beautiful.
Right size to take with you on vacation.

column7: I love this parfum and I've been wearing it for years

column7:
the best perfume ever :)
out of each set you get a little bit of everything
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7: This is my number one fragrance. I get compliments all the time. This is a new one and it do not smell like my others. I usually smell me and I usually buy one. Never bought the Twofer before. But this one is off. Not a Happy Camper. I want to smell it too.
I first purchased Angel for my 40th birthday, now 65 and still use it,,my husband also uses the male line..thanks
The Perfuming Body Lotion is so deliciously subtle that you will love it!
It is nice to know I am using out of one bottle and have a new one waiting for me on the shelf. The offer is well worth the money.

I always love the Angel products its been my absolute favorite now for years, I not only get two for one when theres promotions but also the freebies like 5 trial size and shipping...
;)
Love this body lotion great price I am always asked what I am using
I have been using Angel Body Cream and Body Lotion for the past 8 years and would never change. no matter where I go its r4ecocnised and admired. This offer was awesome.

Angel is the ultimate contradiction in that it evokes mixed emotions. Is she a good Angel, bad Angel, or a little of both? It's an aroma that turns heads, literally causes people to stop you, & spontaneous utterances in crowds like "is someone wearing Angel". "I love that stuff" "what's that fantastic smell"
It's beautiful, bold, soft & chic. It's both very innocent, yet sensual on the woman who wears it.
Whenever I wear it, I feel comforted just like a girl, when I'm on the town I feel sure of myself because it leaves a trail that says "she's worth it"
Both men & women love it, plus it's appealing to a wide age range.
Highly reccomend even without the parfum. The lotion has enough magic to stand on its own. This is a fantastic price point as apposed to 2 X $55 plus sales tax.
I love this lotion, light cream but smells beautiful all day

I can't tell you how much I've enjoyed this fragrance over the years. It's a subtle yet sweet smell. I'm 74 and every time I go out with it on, somebody invariably tells me how wonderful I smell. I especially love the lotion because it lasts a long time. I travel all over the world and never ever leave my Angel at home. Where I go, it goes!

I always have Angel on my bathroom counter top. I never miss an opportunity to replace the body lotion and I always try to purchase the Double Indulgence Offer. The body lotion is so fragrant and beautiful, you don't have to layer it with the perfume, it will hold its own - on its own.
I love this. I wish you had body wash and body cream.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I have worn NOTHING but the Original Angel for nearly 25 years!  Have tried other fragrances and never felt RIGHT. I was getting a refill and just happened to pick up the sample for THIS, tried it and was SHOCKED that I was in LOVE and no longer want to wear anything else!  Please don't discontinue, this one REALLY needs to be a new staple in the line!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: Just bought this after being away from Angel for 10 years. Love this version. Youthful, fun, and DELICIOUS!!

column6: Bottle is beautiful and smells fantastic
column7: This perfume has a light, sweet scent of vanilla and a lot of grapefruit. It is an all day and evening scent. I love it.

column7: I love this fragrance! I have been a fan of the Angel fragrance for many years & was pleasantly surprised to find this fragrance it is sweet & not quite as bold as the original scent. I hope it is available for a long time rather than just a limited time.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I love all the products and remember the launch when I worked for Nordstrom. I will try others but I'm like NO! Angel all the way! I love my Angel!!! It's my fragrance and I love the body products!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column6: My go to summer vacation perfume
column7: This was my first Mugler purchase and I am beyond pleased. It lasts all day and night on my skin and works very well with my body chemistry. I get nothing but compliments from women and men when I wear it. Very sexy and summery. It reminds me of my country, Barbados <3. I have noticed that if you stink and put this perfume on it will amplify any 'mustiness', it's happened when I sprayed it on a coworker. Obviously, such a parfume isn't for that purpose, but just be weary. This is a very unique fragrance, unlike any other 'summertime' scents I tried. I would buy 10 if I could afford it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: Please don’t take this one away.  I have been wearing Angel for over 20 years and this one is the absolute best Summer version of any Angel fragrance ever.  It is addictive and I just can’t get enough.  Completely embodies Summertime and warm rays of the sun.  Just yummy.  It would be a wonderful body lotion and it desperately needs to be in a parfum.  (It isn’t the longest lasting like most Mugler fragrances, which is my only complaint.)
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I have loved Sucre over the last couple of years, but Eau Croisiere is fabulous, love the citrus flavor of my Angel!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière
Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I've worn Angel for years now, but frequently feel as if I want to switch things up during the warmer weather. I got a sample of this in a store, and loved it. It's got grapefruit/citrus notes on top, that make it feel perfect for summer, but still has those lovely, warm Angel-y notes underneath. And the bottle is gorgeous!

column7: Thought I was ordering Angel Eau De Toilette.  Returned it. Did not like Croisiere.

column7:
Wonderful !!
Stays with you all day , Definitely recommend it

column7: I first bought this right after it came out. Then I went to my Nordstrom's store to get another bottle because mine was running low and they said it had sold out. They were not sure if they would receive any more of it, so I ordered it straight from the source to make sure I had enough to last me for a while.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column6: It’s a nice smell, but not the best.
column7: I bought this a couple of months ago smell un smelt, hoping that would be a lighter, summery Angel. I absolutely LOVE Angel and a little goes a long way, and it makes a statement. I also am a big fan of Alien, so I thought The risk would be worth it. This Angel Eau Croisiere is very subtle and *sniff* forgettable.  The smell doesn’t last and you have to put a few spritz to even smell it. Trust me...I am sensitive to smell so that says a lot. As I said I hoped this was a lighter Angel and it is, but much too light. I like it enough, but won’t repurchase it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: Been wearing original Angel since a coworker wore it in the 90s. Interested in a new favorite but nothing inspires.  Am trying the new Eau Croisiere and like it’s said, it’s a lighter, fruity, warmer weather kind of scent.  I always look for earthy, musky, sandalwood, vanilla, patchouli -ish exotic scents so fruit is not something I’d usually go for.  But this one doesn’t howl with strawberries and key lime.  It’s softer, more subtle and I’m liking it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I can’t get enough of this scent it reminds me of a vacation in the Greek islands!  Love!

column7: I bought this a couple of weeks ago and don’t wear it very often because it dissipates quickly and I would rather not waste it. I am surprised because Angel is actually one of the longest lasting scents I have. Both are a little pricy, which I don’t mind as long as they do last, but when they are gone by time I get where I’m going that just doesn’t work for me. The bottle is a little too big to carry with me and in the heat I’ve already had one explode from leaving it in my car so I just don’t wear it. A little disappointed to say the least.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: I absolutely love the fresh citrus scent but was disappointed that it did not last long, I had to reapply throughout the day.  Would love to see a body cream or lotion to layer with the fragrance.  Perfect for the summer!!!❤️
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7:
I absolutely love this scent!  It's a unique tropical scent that feels very summery and sexy.  Light, sweet, delicious, and refreshing!  The grapefruit notes are noticeable, but subtle.  It ends with the smell of the original Angel.  
This lasts all day on me and my clothes.  It's not as strong as the others, but it is strong enough.  For me it is perfect because my sense of smell is sensitive.  I love Aura and Alien but can only use a little because they are so strong to me.  The original Angel doesn't smell that great on me, but this one does.  It really is a unique tropical fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: Wish it lasted longer ! Fades in 2 hours after application. Nice and sweet but still angel. Perfect for summer days.

column7: Love it  so refreshing for summer  love the fact that it has angel and the grapefruit is perfect

I was excited to order this as I love the summertime and love to cruise as well. I believe they went way too heavy on the grapefruit tones. They drown out anything else. They overpower the mango. column7: Mugler did it again!!!! In love w this scent!!!!!!!!

column7: I have been wearing Angel since 1984. I stumbled upon it at a Marshall Fields in Chicago. Everyone commented on how delicious I smelled. My husband would get upset when men would comment on liking my scent. Then women began to comment. I looked forward to new comments as I continued to buy it. Then I found it in Nordstroms in LaJolla, Ca. I then bought Angel for Men Amen for my husband. His clients and customers loved it. We divorced and I got custody of the Angel. Now I've found this new one. I absolutely love it. As usual, people want to know what I'm wearing. Looking forward to increase my Angel products in this line. Yes, I am an Angel.

column6: Warm, juicy, and sunny!  Perfect for summer!
column7:
This starts out with a sweet/tart grapefruit scent blended with a ripe, juicy mango.  It is so fresh that it seems like you can smell the oils that spray in the air when you start to peel a pink grapefruit, heightened by the sweet and authentic smell of a mango as if you just cut one in half and bit into it - you get a blast of the sweet juice as well as a touch of the fresh outer rind.  It isn't a synthetic or candy-like sweet scent, just a fresh and juicy one.  The citrus and fruity notes last into the mid notes as well, which I LOVE, because it's so hard to find a citrus top note that lasts longer than 10 minutes!  The bottle is just gorgeous, and the colors match the scent of the fruity top notes perfectly.

It stays juicy and sweet but as it dries down you get just a hint of the Angel DNA - muted but still present.  The patchouli is in no way a "dirty" one, it adds a green warmth that just emphasizes the overall sunny, tropical vibe of this fragrance.  It's like warm, well-tanned bodies on a sunny island, dancing in the sunlight while drinking tropical drinks!  I don't get a sticky, obvious praline out of this fragrance but there is definitely a sweetness that lasts through the whole experience.

On my hair and clothes this eau de toilette lasts about 4-6 hours tops so I usually spray it again at lunchtime, but it is SO lovely that I don't mind having to reapply.  In fact, this is the first time that I have ever bought a back-up bottle of ANYTHING immediately after spraying for the first time!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column6: Sunset Paradise: Please Do Not Discontinue
column7:
I have been wearing this perfume almost daily, and that is significant for a fragrance chameleon like myself. I know it's a limited edition, but I want this to be permanent-- it is so good. I'm not even a huge patchouli fan and I am in love. The praline notes combined with mango, grapefruit, and blackcurrant feel so right! I also appreciate being part of the Mugler Circle, as it makes me feel like a valued customer. See excerpts from my Fragrantica review below: 

"Angel Eau Croisière was a must-try for me. The sunset gradient bottle and vaporwave aesthetic almost sold me on the spot. Upon first sample spray, it felt avant-garde yet right. Full disclosure: I lean toward light, fruity, and gourmand scents....

"...Angel Eau Croisière is sweet and fruity ("energizing facet") enough to please me. Its earthy depth does not turn bitter or strange ("voluptous facet"). It is fun, intense, and non-cloying. I was worried about the drydown, but it molds to my skin chemistry like a soft hug. It does not smell like a child's cupcake; it smells like an adult's semi-sweet dessert.

"Eau Croisière definitely is an Angel flanker. I like the original Angel, but it can be... loud. Eau Croisière is fresher, less earthy, and slightly less sweet than Angel. But it still has the sweetness of ripe, juicy fruits. I wonder if Angel Fruity Fair is similar? I hope Eau Croisière stays in the Mugler line for good!

"Tl;dr: Angel is a bold femme fatale. Angel Eau Croisière is Angel's understated sister. Angel sings a siren song, while Eau Croisière sips on a tropical cocktail and dreams of mischief."
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel Eau Croisière

column7: WOW. I was excited to see how mango worked with Angel, and it was better than I imagined! This smells really bright and tart (can definitely smell the mango, grapefruit and black currant) with a warm sweetness keeping it grounded (praline for sure). It mellows out a lot with time. Amazing in every stage of development: tart, fruity, bright, sweeeeet, warm, creamy, woody. This is one of the few scents I've smelled where the citrus/tartness lasts for a loooong time... Several hours. Very little patchouli to my nose, noticable late in the day/the next morning. It's so smooth and energizing. It smells wonderful in the freezing cold of winter, but I am anxiously awaiting the chance to smell it in the warmth of spring and heat of summer... I truly hope this one doesn't stay as a limited edition but becomes a constant in the Angel family. Mugler, PLEASE consider making this scent in your full range of products: body cream, body wash, candle, REFILL!!! Oh, and the bottle... stunning.

When it gets hot in the summer you will be able to spray this all over to be refreshed..it doesn't smell like the original Angel at all but is a new twist in the Angel line..I really am considering getting this one..the bottle is lovely from the pictures and I love the We Are All Alien rainbow ombre bottle concept and this is in the same family as that one..It is a lighter fragrance but that is to be expected with an EDT. If you love fruity fragrances and you love tropical notes I think you will enjoy this one..the bottle in itself will give you a smile. Perfect for spring to summer. Thanks Mugler for the samples and great customer service!

column6: Gift from my son in 1992 for Mother's Day.
column7:
My first Angel was given to me in a silver star shaped gift basket with this 2.6 fl & the miniature bottle, plus some other samples for Mother's Day by our youngest son after his graduation from the university w/his engineering BS. in appreciation for our help in support of him during his two asso. degrees and his BS.
He later earned his Masters in Accounting/Management from Kettering University, Flint, MI while working at his first employers business connected w/ Gen. Motors. He lived very fugally while attending school and paid back the small amount of loans he incurred within 1 1/2 years after graduation, plus what we had contributed before he allowed himself to spend money on himself.
He told his father and myself that he and his brother and two sisters got their work ethic from us. Because we never took on more debt or bought anything we could not afford. It proved to be a good lesson in living and saving.
I considered this gift and his compliment a wonderful way that he let us know he appreciated us during the long stretch of hard work and denial of immediate gratification that made him the man he is today.
Since receiving Angel from him in this refillable bottle, which I have saved, I have since purchased the star bottle for myself and the silver flask with Angel for Men in it for my husband on a trip out west some years later. We really appreciated the service at Nordstrom's in Las Vegas who presented us with some extra treats of Angel for our purchases which included a beautiful complimentary black tote bag with the store's logo on it as well as quite a number of samples which were handy for traveling. I purchased another star bottle for myself for this coming Christmas and will enjoy being able to treat myself while wearing it. Thank you Thierry Mugler for a most enjoyable long-lasting fragrance for many years.
Oh, I also came across the dusting powder by chance at a TJMAXX and grabbed it as a real find, but haven't seen it on the market since. I also found the body butter for hair and body and still have some of that. So you can see I am an Angel Lover even at 80 years young.
E. Hawkins

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column6: You Changed the Formula for Angel---Why?
column7: I have worn Angel Parfum since it came out in 1992 and get compliments on it wherever I go. I have tried the "eco-refill bottles" TWICE, but they do NOT smell like Angel. Obviously, you must have changed the formula. Why would you change something that was so PERFECT? Before I throw any more money away on Angel Perfume that really isn't like the original Angel, please tell me if you will bring the previous Angel back. Obviously, I LOVE it, since I have been wearing it for 26 years.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column6: Angel Perfume - Bring back the old formula
column7: Just bought a new bottle, spent $180 to pamper myself and was so disappointed. They absolutely changed the formula. That was the best thing about Angel, it would last all day and the scent would stay on your clothing until you washed it. Been using it for over a decade but I guess it's time to re-evaluate. PLEASE GO BACK TO THE OLD FORMULA, that's what made this perfume special and worth the money.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column7: I've worn Angle for over 20 years and always get complements from everyone!! I just got a new bottle and am not happy with it AT ALL. Please go back to the old formula it was much better!!!

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column6: What happened to the Heavenly smell?
column7: Have worn angel since it first came out. Just got a new bottle for Christmas and am very disappointed. The perfume smells watered down and does not last. People would always compliment when they walked by but the scent is barely there now. Very different. Not my Angel anymore. This was by far my favorite perfume ever. Please bring back the original Angel

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column7:
I have been using Angel since it first launched and only perfume I wear.
My husband loves it on me and always get compliments!
I recently bought another bottle last week since I have a tiny bit left in old bottle. Too my surprise, it did NOT smell the same at all.. NOT like the Angel I've used to all these years!!
 What is happening and why did you changed the formula? ( Always buy it at authorized store )
My husband asked if I had changed perfume and why am I not wearing my Angel perfume!! Went to exchange it for another bottle today and it still doesn't smell like the old Angel. ( compared it to my old bottle)
Why the formula change?? Please bring back the intense sexy OLD Angel formula we all love!!

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column6: No the same Angel I used to buy
column7: The formulation has changed. The chocolate patchouli notes are now minty and medicinal and the new bottle I received reminds me of all the knockoffs. I am so sad that the original Angel "wow" factor is no longer. I wish I could find "my favorite fragrance" again. It's gone.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Heavenly Star
column7:
I am very disappointed that I received the bottle with my engraved words on the receipt but not on the bottle. 
I waited to find just the right amount I desired online on different sites and department stores due to the fact this is my favorite perfume; however, the fact that I found a great size and that I could have this bottled engraved, really made me happy because it seemed fun and more personal. 
Upon receipt, I opened the package immediately because, as I said, it was purchased for me and I really needed the perfume by this time after taking much time to seek out just what I wanted.
I actually called this company immediately twice, and unbelievably, there was a message on the phone that they were having difficulties with their phone system (The angels were indisposed or some ridiculous message).
Amazingly enough I never received a phone call back either. 
I would avoid purchasing from this company.
I will ask my credit card company to request my money be reimbursed.

column7: I have used Angel exclusively for 20 years now.  My mother was tragically killed by a reckless young girl driving and not paying any attention when it came to a 4 way stop.  She broadsided my mother's car and killed her.  When going through my mother's things a few months later, she had a bottle of Angel on her dresser.  I smelled it and thought what a beautiful fragrance.  I took her remaining bottle home and found through varying experiences what a distinct fragrance it had.  People would stop me and already knowing it was Angel or inquiry about the lovely smell.  I have never ever worn any other fragrance in all this time.  I feel like my mother is will me all day long.

column6: The sold bottle not the same as the store tester
column7: I became a loyal customer of the Angel perfume in 2001 when I first tried it at a Nordstrom store on the East Coast, USA. While I have purchased other Thierry Mugler scents, I find that I resort back to Angel eau de parfum as my favorite choice. In the last year or so, I have noticed that the bottle sold does not stay as long as it used to and is not the same as the sample in the store. I expressed my concern to both Nordstrom’s clerk and Macy’s clerk but nothing they could do short of selling me the sample bottle, which they could not do. After a 6 months hiatus, a few days ago, I purchased a new 1.7oz bottle of Angle eau de partum, for $120.00 from Macy’s store on the East Coast, in the hopes that things may have changed for the better. Unfortunately, the problem endures as the store sample stays on much longer than what was sold to me. I am very disappointed as Angel is my favorite.

column5: Angel Eau de Parfum Shooting Star
column7: While in Paris in 2008, I was given a sample of Angel. I've used no other perfume since! People stop me in malls, home improvement stores, parking lots, events, etc. and ask what the wonderful fragrance is. Just this weekend, I was waiting to go into a luncheon and a fellow complimented the perfume I was wearing. Word got around that he liked to "smell me"! I have been wearing Angel since its inception. However the reinterpretation leaves me disappointed. I miss the deep woodsy notes from the original, I miss the stronger note of Patchouli. I don't like the sweeter, more prevalent notes....... in the new version. The tropical fruity notes are almost too much at times.

The original was such a wonderful, unique scent, I wish you would stop the changes. It would linger for days, and the scent of Patchouli was always there.....its missing now. I now add a drop of Patchouli on my skin to compensate for the difference.

I wish you would go back to the original version.....it was much more seductive and alluring. Change is not always good. Why mess with perfection?

column6: My experience with Star Perfume Angel spray
column7: I found this perfume sample in a Cosmopolitan magazine and loved the smell of it. I asked my husband to purchase it for me for Christmas but when I received it, it smelled different.It was so concentrated and so strong that the room I sprayed it in has to be aired out. I then sprayed it at work in a closed space of cubicles and all of my coworkers started coughing and choking. Of course I was totally embarrassed because I was the butt of the joke. I overheard comments like I took a bath in paint thinner or got scrunched up faces looking at me. I don’t know if anyone else has experienced this but I am writing you to tell you about my experience with with the Mugler Star Perfume Angel Eau de Parfum Spray – Shooting Star. I wanted to love it but just couldn't.

column6: A New Great Addition By Jacklyn's Perfumery
column7: This is the bottle we have been waiting for! It stands up and looks amazing. The scent is a new edition to the Mugler house. A whole new twist. This is not the Angel Edt we know but a whole new fragrance mixed with the Angel DNA. It has red berries so it's juicy and smells citrus like. Think of Angel meets Angel Eau Croisere limited edition. It is also light and fluffy just like the advertisements suggests of it resting in the clouds. When you first spray it it smells slightly like cotton candy and the juice inside has a slight pink tint to it. As it develops you can smell the same hazelnut chocolate from Mugler's Angel Muse. This is a nice new edition to the collection. I do wish also they would of made this Angel a new edition all on it's own because it is different enough and left the older Angel Edt for those who like it but this maybe the new direction Mugler is going to follow in with the trends. Overall, I like this new edition and welcome it and I think many others will not only enjoy this fragrance but the aesthetics of the new bottle for sure!

I am a huge fan of Angel Eau de Parfum and all the Angel fragrance line. With Angel Eau de Toilette once again Mugler flies me to another wonderland of coziness, sweet dreams, joyful memories and sweet smells that I love and wouldn’t like to leave. Thank you Mr. Mugler

This is brilliant & I hope this one stays around & never goes away :). If you love Muse, or EDP this will not dissapoint.  I hope you love her as much as I do!

Copied from my Fragrantica review:

"The fragrance gods have smiled on me today. 

"Mugler was kind enough to send me a free, unsolicitrd sample of this gem for being part of the Mugler Circle (seriously, join it asap). As I have said before, original Angel EDP is "a like" but gets way too earthy on me at times. 

"Sweet and tart fruits? Check.
Praline? Check.
Bright freshness? Check. 
That signature Mugler patchouli? Check, but ever so subtle like I like. 

"Also, I am going absolutely gaga over the mandarin and peony combo. Peony is one of my favorite flowers in both scent and aesthetics. 

"This EDT makes me feel better about the sad likelihood Eau Crosiere will be discontinued someday. I think I love Eau Crosiere a bit more (it is less tart and more gourmand-fruity) but I love this too. And look at that gorgeous pastel bottle! 

"Edit: Drydown feels similar to the initial blast, though peony and mandarin are less pronounced. It is still a bit tart compared to Eau Crosiere, and I wish it were less so, but it is still gorgeous.

"Edit 2: Also, this seems to have an even softer patchouli compared to Eau Crosiere. Whether that is a pro or con is up to the wearer."

Thank you, Mugler, for all the free gifts and valuing your customers with quality products that make us smile.

It's a good thing I got a sample in the mail because I got to try it! If you love Angel EDP but want something lighter for summer this is the one to go for. It's soft, feminine and very seductive. Just placed an order on a bottle and can't wait to get it

I received my sample in the mail a couple of days ago and decided to where it to work today. When first sprayed on it smells a bit like the original Angel but as it dries down it turns into a softer, powdery version that is subtle yet noticeable and it lasts all day. I can’t wait to buy a bottle.

I got this new fragrance as a sample and have been wearing for few days now. I was not happy with previous eau de Toilette edition that smell so different. This one is a winner for me! Not overwhelming, but still sensual and long lasting. Ordering a full size!

I really liked the older Eau de Toilette. It was a lighter version of Angel that had more of the fruit present. I received my sample from Mugler and this new version smells almost exactly like Alien (maybe they made a mistake at the factory).

While I like Alien, it’s way to heavy for summer, and any EDT should be a lighter, fresher balance of the EDP, similar to Angel Eau Sucree or Fruity Fair.

If you love Angel, give this a pass. If you love Alien, give this a try. 3 stars because it smells good, but doesn’t smell like Angel.

I have been wearing Angel for many years and it's my absolute favorite cologne and perfume! I love getting it online as I can get some extras like samples to try new products. Muglerusa makes it easy!

I love, love, love Angel Eau De Toilette! It is soft and subtle ~ yet a little spritz goes a very long way. It wafts in the air and leaves smiles on the faces it touches. I always make sure I don't run out! Wish I had stock in this product!!
I love it !!! I really like this perfume. My favorite!!

Love this for the summer. It's a little lighter that the partum.
Lasts all day.

I bought this because my friend uses this and she always smells SO GOOD! I feel mine is very watered down or something. No matter how much I use, it doesn't smell like anything on me after the first 5 minutes. Expensive for no smell! QUITE FRUSTRATED! The samples smell better on me and last all day! What's going on???? Wouldn't buy again. That's for sure.

I love this product, it is my signature scent and I always get compliments. I ordered the customized engraved bottle as a gift. The product arrived quickly, looked beautiful, was nicely packaged and was very well received by my friend. Terrific purchase experience!

love angel -- have worn for years -- when I try to switch, everyone notices, including myself.

love love love

I have been using Thierry Mugler Products for about 3 years and I must say this fragrance is one of my absolute favorites and a signature scent. It lasts long and is so sensual. I recently got a new bottle for my birthday and I am in love with it. Highly recommend it.

I have the original Star , but when I bought this new one, was amazing, because is more easily to refill , to stand up, and elegant design, I will buy another one for a family member, thank you for your fabulous products.

When I'm not buying perfume, I write and recently had a book published, so what better way to treat myself and celebrate but with my favorite scent - Angel? I even had the bottle engraved with my pseudonym!

Love the fragrance and get many compliments plus it lasts a long time. 
I can also say Mugler customer service is extraordinary.

This perfume is a little similar to Angel but a bit more subtle. I love them both but this may be my new favorite.....it smells delightful!!! Thank you, Thierry Mugler, you've done it again. I smell delicious........
Love it...came quickly, packed nicely and the names were clear and printed great.
I've been wearing this scent for years and will continue to do so as I get many compliments.

column6: Angel's New Bottle Design and My Favorite Scent
column7:
The exquisite oriental gourmand heart design of the new Angel bottle is a masterpiece! J'adore the unique magnetic locking top. And my engraving of my name that I requested in my order turned out perfect! 

And of course the sensuality of Angel parfum is spellbinding. It is my forever scent. Every time I wear it someone says to me, "you smell so great." I then tell them it's Angel so I am sure that you've received a lot of new customers esp since I've worn it for over a decade or more!

I started off wearing Alien, which I still wear, because I found Angel to be a little too strong for me. When I tried the Angel Eau de Toilette, however, I fell in love! It has the beautiful scent of Angel but in a lighter version.

Hi. My name is Betty and I am an addict. I am totally addicted to my ANGEL!! And I'm not ashamed. I'm proud! This fragrance is truly delicious! I've been wearing Thierry Mugler's fragrances for years. Could not and would not want to live without them. Then lo and behold Angel Eau de Toilette was born. And I am happier. Didn't know that was possible.
Christmas my favorite time of year. for obvious reasons. There will be ANGELS under my tree. I CANNOT WAIT!!!!

column6: Simply, the BEST of them all!
column7: I have tried a variety of the many Angel scents, but this has got to be the VERY BEST! It is soft enough for day wear, office wear, even gym wear! Perfect for evening as well. Not overwhelming, just subtle!

column6: A bit of my essence in a bottle.
column7: I wore Angel Eau de Parfum Spray Shooting Star for years, there is simply nothing like it. I also have allergies so I am sensitive to many things, after an injury forced me to stop working, I no longer had to wear business attire, my Angel Parfum was part of my attire, I stopped wearing it after it ran out. I would find myself picking up the star many times as the scent called to me, I told myself I was saving money, my soul was telling me something else, I'd have flash backs relating to the fragrance. I ordered a sample of Alien on line, my soul wouldn't have it. I ordered the Toilette, it came in a wonderful box, presented as though I were a queen, my soul soared, the scent is lighter, it is still my Angel. I will not give her up again.
I never received the travel size Angel I was suppose to receive with my order. I did get the samples.

This is light and refreshing!! I live in the desert and when it's really hot this is the perfect fragrance. I am an angel girl all day long and this is perfect for daytime. In the evening I take out the star!! Muah!!

column6: ANGEL Delicious Valentine's Day Gift Set
column7: I am always afraid my big Star would get broken if I took it traveling. So, I ordered this set to try the lotion but to also take along the "small" star on vacation. So now I have my Angel everywhere I go. Nothing is better. My big Star rests safely on the dresser.

I LOVE this scent. , I purchased the original Angel when visiting France in 2001. Back in the states, several years later, I discovered Angel Eau de Toilette and had to have it!
This fragrance is subtle version of the original . "You smell so good" is a phrase I never tire of hearing.
Thank you!

column5: ANGEL Eau de Toilette Refill Bottle
column6: Love this fragrance so sad it is changing
column7: So sad that they are changing the formula for this scent. I discovered about a year and 1/2 ago. Thankfully I purchased a refill right before they switched it so I will be good for a good while. Then I guess I will have to see if i like the new formula

column5: ANGEL Eau de Toilette Refill Bottle
column7: I’ve been wearing Angel since 1996 feel in love with it and am still wearing Angel I get compliments almost everyday I enjoy Angel Eau de Toilette in the summer for a lighter  fragrance I love that I have the refill bottle So I can fill the one I need say for a weekend getaway not having to take my large bottle Thanks for this wonderful product FOREVER A  dedicated Angel Woman

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column6: Glad to be able to get this online!
column7: What a great way to purchase Angel. My daughter and I have both loved Angel from the first time we bought it in New York over twenty years ago. I appreciate the way this refill arrived so quickly with great packaging. I plan to only buy it this way.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: If you have the refillable bottles, this is absolutely the best refill bargain by far. And it's directly from the manufacturer so you know it's going be the real thing.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: Love this fragrance, lighter version of angel! Scent last longer on me than the perfume!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column6: First fragrance I've been able to wear in years!!
column7: Since menapause, I have been unable to wear any perfume without it turning acidic and horrible. This new Angel (eau do toilette) smells wonderful on me. (I cannot wear however the original Angel...) My only wish is that they will come out with a body cream with the new eau do toilette fragrance so I can layer it!!! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this fragrance!!!! :)
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column7: I am never without Angel refill especially for unexpected travel I do not travel anywhere without my ANGEL

column7: I love Angel and have been a customer for years. This is my first purchase of the Eco Refill, and I want to kick myself for not purchasing it sooner. I love that Thierry Mugler offers this and everyone should purchase.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: I love Angel and am so thankful I can buy the refill for my Angel Star. I get so many compliments whenever I wear this. It also lasts on me which a lot of scents do not. It is my all time go to scent.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: This product is so sweet to smell. I get so many compliments on a daily basis.

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column6: Bad information on Thierry web page.
column7:
I bought this product to refill my star bottle and is not possible.
I can not open the bottle in order to be refill.
In the web page they don't talk about special kind of bottle to be refilled.
I already register my original bottle purchase and I assume Thierry know what kind of bottle I have and if possible or not the refill in order to don't sell the refill to me.
I don't know why advertise on product as ecological if you can't really refill your old bottle - this a fake advertising.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: YES! I have worn angel for years and always get compliments. ."you smell so good"! An I always smile and say that's because I am am angel! ..I order online because it is convenient and I usually receive my order in less than a week! What more could I ask for! ! I have also ordered gifts and had them engraved. .that's awesome! ! Thank you. ..thank you! !

column7: I am use to wearing Angel perfume and I thought this would smell the same, well it does not at all. I will go back to what I usually wear. I still love your products. When your use to something special don't change.And notallproducts smell good on everyone.

column7: I love this option because I have many stars to refill and it's cost-effectiveness keeps me smelling wonderful all the time

column6: Feeling hey Charming women with this perfume
column7: From the beginning I get in love with the aroma, I prefers the original, but I'm thinking to try another one, The package is elegant, and your service is amassing, i'm waiting to fill the virtual bottle, thanks for your service, I recommend your products to everyone .

column7: I've been a customer for almost one year and I'm so happy that you sell the refill for the bottles!!

column7: I love this fragrance. It is my favorite. Even better is the company goes green, allowing me to refill the bottles. xoxoxoxo

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: A special scent that works year around. The refill bottle is a great value for filling the comet that sits on the vanity and my purse size spray. Totally fem!!

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: I love Angel and I get a lot of compliments when I am wearing it. I hope you never discontinue it
