column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7:
I have been wearing Angel for at least 20 years and love it - it is so subtle and yet tantalizes - I just mist - and get tons of compliments all the time...
good job Thierry
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column5: Angel Eau de Toilette Refill bottle
column7: This is a great value on my favorite perfume. This is my choice for the summer.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column7: Just a little sway away from my everyday Angel of 15 years.....heavenly

I work at a beauty store and we got this fragrance earlier this year. I instantly bought it and I have been wearing it everyday since then. At work I got so many compliments from my co workers and especially customers. its the best fragrance in the world. I'm disappointed that my store doesn't carry it anymore. I wish it was a permanent fragrance. most of the customers liked this version of angel better than the original one.

column6: I am in love with ANGEL EAU SUCRÉE!
column7:
I absolutely adore this scent!
 I just recently found ANGEL EAU SUCRÉE while shopping Duty Free in Montreal, Canada. I find the scent alluring and stays with me much longer than my regular Angel. 
Please add cream, hair spray, etc to line and make it a permanent member of Angel scents!!!

If you haven't tried, give it a try - I highly doubt that you will regret it.
The only regret I will have is if it isn't added to Angel's permanent line...now, that, would be a sad day!

I received this as a gift and I've been a HUGE Angel fan for many years now, so I was hesitant to try anything else, BUT I was pretty impressed. I love the smell on my skin and for me, it lasted until the next day believe it or not. On me, it smells a bit fruity in the beginning but it still has that signature Angel scent I have grown to love. I will definitely buy a few more before they sell out.
Have angel. Muse and alien. This fragrance lacks depth. Sorry I made the purchase. Love love love angel and also muse
The Fragrance is beautiful, very light, the right combination for summer. But unfortunately does not last long.

If you are an Angel fan as I am you will fall in love with this new scent. Clean and fresh perfect for summer.
Can't get enough of it I wish they would make a lotion to go with it.

I purchased my first ANGEL in Paris in the 1990's....SUCRE
is similar to that fragrance that I fell in love with...Angel reps
swear that the formula has not changed but SUCRE reminds of 
the differences,,,Thanks for the memories...

I have been a wearer of this product for a very long time and nothing else compares! It may be a bit costly for the average house income, but I make it work ... I buy for my birthday, Christmas etc... LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! Happy Birthday to me 6/1
This is all I wear. I can’t find any other scent I like as much as this one. I’ve been wearing it for years and I don’t know what I’ll wear if they ever stop making this.
I like this scent almost as much as the traditional Angel and Alien if not more! I haven't received any compliments as of yet but I like smelling it all day! It puts me in a great mood!

I love this scent!!

Please never stop producing this!!

Love it! Layered with the Angel Body Cream, I am stopped and asked what I'm wearing! Long lasting and not over powering. 

Just the perfect amount of 'Angel'!

Love Sucree for the warm summers in New Orleans. 
Angel eau Sucree reminds me of a seductive Whisper. 
This fragrance has really attracted attention in a positive way.
I like this much better than the original.Its soft and sweet just how I like my fragrances.Please please make a body oil and body powder exactly with the same scent.
This perfume evolves from the angel scent into a sweet vanilla to light cotton candy. Wonderful for everyday wear. Everyone always says I smell so good. I got my mom and mother in law hooked too!

Limited edition, I hope not. I love this fragrance very much it's everything and more. It's sweet sexy and just feminine I've had tons and tons of compliments almost fell famous. It's my forever favorite. I will restock.

Received Eau Sucree as a sample when ordering my Angel Perfume and absolutely love this scent. It is a cross between Angel Innocent and Angel with a little more sweetness to it. I hope it joins the lineup of regulars.

I personally don't like angel, but this flanker is yummy. It does smell to berries and sugar without being cloying. It lasts a long time and has moderate sillage. I would buy again, it is one of my favorites.
Something new and exciting! Angel has been my go to perfume but decided on something a little lighter for summer. It has met all of my expectations.
Another one here that hopes this perfume becomes part of the permanent lineup! The perfume is strong and lasts forever on me, and gets a lot of compliments! I need this to be in my life permanently!

I love this scent. I'm on my second bottle and going to purchase another. It's light, sweet but still has the Angel signature scent. I hope this stays in the permanent line and I hope they will come out with a lotion/cream and shower gel. Pure love for Angel Sucree :)
Absolutely love this scent. Have been wearing Thierry Mugler scents for 15 years. This is my favorite. I know it's a limited edition. I hope they keep it around and create some lotions or powders.

I absolutely love this perfume. Its such a warm and sweet smell. I hope it doesn't go away because it is one of my all time favorite scents. Though I do agree with others about wishing the scent stayed longer. A lotion would be amazing in this as well!
This is my ultimate favorite from the Thierry Mugler collection.

Sucree is a new scent that I absolutely love. A very light scent that lasts all day. Beautiful bottle. I hope Sucree is a scent that stays around longer. If not, I will stock up on it. For those who only wear Alien, they should give Sucree a try.

I have been an Angel wearer for years and I've had several versions. i purchased this one on my way home from Europe this summer in London at the duty free shop. my thought of the initial spritz to my wrist was ahh....its okay. after walking away and allowing it to settle in OMG!!!! I COULDN'T GET BACK TO THAT COUNTER FAST ENOUGH!!!!!! Generally speaking Angel is a scent that I wear fall/winter, but this one has a frosted/refreshing yet seductive and sexy combination. I think I wore it for the better part of two weeks straight when I came back from vacation. And although I don't wear scent for anyone other than myself I will say the compliments from men and women were countless.

This is the absolute best of the Angel line. I received a small sample of this and immediately came here and purchased it. I normally wait for sales of fragrances, but bought this one full price and don't regret it. Every time I wear this people come into a room I'm in and exclaim that it smells so good. Later, when they realize it's me, they are surprised that it's Angel.

The berries are strong at first, but quickly become warmed by the sugar, with a hint of the lovely Angel base. This one has quickly become my favorite and I hope they never stop making it!

column6: Hard to keep this one a "Secret"!
column7: Wow! This product is a home run. Hard to keep it a secret when you smell amazaing wearing it. I've replenished my supply and have purchased as gifts for friends since once they've experienced the fragrance... they are hooked! Would love to see it as a permanent member of the Angel family!

I have used Angel for years and years. Angel Eau Sucree carries the same base fragrance, but has a sweet, light note. It is perfect for the summer. Unfortunately, this fragrance doesn't last all day the way that Angel does. I find myself wanting to reapply it during the day. When this bottle is empty, I will go back to my tried and true Angel.

My sister wears & loves Angel. It smells nice on her, but isn't quite right for me. I saw this perfume & thought of her. I tried it on in the store & liked it. The longer it stayed on my skin the more i loved it. Went back to the store & purchases it a couple of days later. I don't think i have liked a perfume this much in a long time or maybe ever. It is warm & yummy. Stays on my skin well. I really don't have anything negative to say about it. Please make it permanent!!!!!'

I love this new scent! My sister has worn Angel for years and I love it; not wanting to use the same scent I went to Innocent. I love the scent of innocent but it just didn't stay with me in the same way I can pick Angel out on others. Alien is also nice and stays with me longer yet I like it, but unfortunately do not love it....Sucree....the first spray, I was in love with it! I can't wait for the lotion and shower gel to accompany it; I am hooked, please keep this scent and give us more products!! Thank you Thierry Mugler for the whole Angel line!

column6: Gorgeous but Not Very Long Lasting
column7: I have many Angel flankers and this is possibly one of my favorites next to Angel Innocent. I'd give it a perfect 5 if only it wasn't gone within a couple hours from my skin. The berry top notes are luscious and the heart and drydown are like a pillowy sweet Angel cloud. But it just doesn't last long enough or have the sillage necessary to rate a perfect score. An "Intense" or edp concentration would be very welcome but I do love Eau Sucree even if it is short and sweet.

column6: LOVE THIS MORE - PLEASE MAKE IT PERMANENT
column7: All I can say is I like this so much more than the original Angel and I am freaking out about it going away. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE MAKE THIS A PART OF YOUR PERMANENT LINE!!

column6: Love for Angel Eau Secree forever
column7: I didn't like thiss scent when I first smelled it. I said to the lady who was helping me out at the counter that it smells nothing like Angel. I wasn't sure if I wanted to purchase it but asked for a sample of Angel Eau Secree anyhow just to try it. Oh boy, this scent grew in me. I knew i had to come back to the mall to get it the next day. I purchased one bottle at first. I loved it so much that i decided to buy two additional bottles of Angel Eau Secree a day after my initial purchase. It might sound crazy but I'm addicted to this scent so bad that I have to stock up on it before it's gone. Please...please make Angel Eau Secree a permanent line!!! Thank you.

This is one of my favorite flanks and I have almost all of them. For those of you that feel Angel is too strong this is the one for you. It starts off fresh and finishes sweet all the while you can still smell what we all love about Angel. If this had longer staying power I would give it 5 stars, I am so disappointed that it only lasts about 3-4 hours. There has to be a happy medium from the original that lasts forever and this even if it is a ODT. Maybe if you could layer it I would enjoy it even more.

Love at first sniff! :D
Wow - this is truly a delicious scent that is perfect in every way (in my opinion, at least). It is sweet, but not overwhelming or sickeningly so, it has the patchouli that makes the original Angel famous, but it's subtle in this mix - so I still get a little touch of 'Angel' but not in the same way. The Meringue/Vanilla is simply to die for - smells just like a meringue coming from the oven. The berries are wonderful too and blend in well without taking all the attention from the other notes. I haven't loved a fragrance this much from first use in a very long time. I will be wearing this a lot, as it feels it would suit a variety of events and situations. It's unique from my other gourmands, so to me it's money well spent.
My only frustrations? That you can't get a stronger Eau de Parfum (the Toilette lasts ok, but it won't be the one-spray lasts all day sillage-monster of the original) and that it's limited edition - time to stock up!

column6: Great scent, does not last long
column7: I love the lighter sweeter scent of this, but on me it does not last long at all.  Would love to see this in an Eau de Parfum for longevity, my try this with the philter but hope it doesn't alter the scent!
Everyone at work mentions to me that they can tell when I've arrived to work. The scent lingers and my steps can be traced!!!! I love the compliments and feel AWESOME with any ANGEL product.....
I just love this perfume! Highly recommend if you like gourmand fragrances.
I have received many compliments while wearing this fragrance

Hi! I have a doubt...I have the perfume ANGEL EAU SUCREE but I don't know what is the limited edition year. What's is the colour of packaging 2016? and the limited edition 2015?

Thank you!

Does not have the Angel sprit scent to it. The fragrance disappointing to me. 

I was looking for more of the Angel scent.

Angel Eau Sucrèe is such a delicious, juicy, joyous perfume. It is quite fruity at first and then it dries down to a magnificent vanilla. It is beautifully blended and very refreshing for wear during hot days. One spray instantly lifts my mood.

I HAVE ANGEL, ANGEL EAU DE TOILETTE, ANGEL MUSE, ALIEN SUN ESSENCE (DISCONTINUED), WOMANITY, AND ANGEL EAU SUCREE. I LOVE ALL OF THEM BUT THE SUCREE IS MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE. I CAN'T GET OVER THE BEAUTIFUL MIXTURE OF BERRIES AND PATCHOULI. I WILL WEAR IT FOREVER. PLEASE NEVER STOP MAKING THIS. IT NEEDS TO BE A REGULAR AMONG ALL THE OTHERS.

I love, love, love this Angel Eau Sucree 2016! It has a sensuous, seductive scent. It smells so good I want to take a bath in it. This is wonderful ~ can't stop spraying & smelling it's luscious scent.
I love how this scent changes. Slightly sweet yet alluring and a bit softer than Original Angel. A must have for any Angel fan. Perfect for all ages.

This is the sweetest Angel ever! My favorite .But there is some freshness in it also. Very long lasting for eau de toilette ! My favorite. Works well with all original Angel products like bidy lotion , hair mist,ect. , love this perfume!
Love it so much! Is The best ever had, amazing!!! La amo!!
This fragrance is just right for the hot summer season; not too heavy.

This Eau Sucre is an amazing addition to the Angel selection! I fell in love with it immediately and have received so many compliments. I am still able to enjoy it the next day after applying, when I wake up and smell it still is wafting through my hair I know I am going to have a great morning.
I love, love this cologne! It is awesome and everyone compliments me every time I wear it!

This is an Eau de Toilette, therefore it doesn't last long on the body. It smells nice but there are many that smell even better. The promotion of this cologne really got me interested but I'm fairly disappointed. I wouldn't buy it again. I still love the Angel perfume.
So delicious and mouthwatering! And the bottle is beautiful like dipped in sugar. Everywhere I go, people stop me to ask what that decadent smell is. This is the perfect addition to my collection!
I use many high end perfumes, and this one surpasses some of the best.
Smells good as always. Very pretty container. Perfect for on the go. I love it!
My friends tell me all the time .... you smell so good, what is that?   So I usually give the travel size as Birthday gifts!   It’s perfect ounce for airplane travel and not too costly.
First tried this from a sample and fell in love with it!
This is just the right size to travel with.  Love this perfume.Smells so good on me I even got complements from everyone.
My second purchase of Angel Eau to go. Love it & it makes packing my carryon so easy.
Angel eau de Parfum us my favorite ! The inconvenience of the shape of the bottle makes it difficult to travel on plane with due to the pointing shape.

column6: The best fragrance in the world
column7: I love Angel. I have worn this fragrance for at least 18 years and I am more in love with it everyday. It's truly intoxicating. Thank you.
My Angel on the Go is fantastic. I am traveling weekly and I can pack my scent in my purse.
Perfect size & design for travel or just keeping in my purse. Does not leak, so I much rather have this than a small vile of perfume. As all my angel products, it is heavenly!

column6: Love this scent on others...just not me
column7: I love the smell of this on other people, but it's not good on me.

column6: So in Love. Makes my day better just to wear it.
column7: I discovered this through a review and I am so happy. It is The Exact scent I have been searching for. Sexy, Ethereal and just Delicious.
I like that this bottle is refillable and fits in my purse. Its a cool design.The scent is my favorite. Its not too strong it is perfect.
My go to fragrance! I love it! Will never buy it in any department store again!
I love this perfume... it’s a delicate fragrance and lasts all day.  I like to travel so this is a great addition to my pocketbook

I usually take a little bottle with me when I travel.  It’s a bit cumbersome trying to get the little plastic stopper back in the bottle.  This solves all those problems. I’ve worn Angel since the scent first came on the scene.  I only wear Angel.  Thank you for this great  bottle.

I love all of your perfumes. I've never had a problem but this last order I didn't get my samples even though I selected them it won't deter me I will continue to order from your website . I just hope future orders will come with what is promised.
Love this fragrance,longlasting,always go back to this fragrance

I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE MY ANGEL!! I have been wearing it since October, 2004 and KNOW that it is the scent for me! People know I am coming or that I have been there, because of MY ANGEL! A gentleman once told me: "You smell so good, you'd make a BISHOP kick out a stained-glass window!!" LOL! I sweat MY ANGEL scent!! I also think it is such an economical idea to be able to go to The Source for a refill! I enjoy shocking & amazing people with the story of The Source!! MY ANGEL...

column6: Seems to get better every time I use it!
column7:
I order the handy purse spray a few times a year. I have COPD and I
can tolerate the Angel scent without any problem. My next favorite
is Oriental Express ---- I love it and am only able to get a sample of
it. I would buy a bottle if it weren't so expensive - I love it! Hopefully,
they'll offer something in the not too distant future.
Love these. I bought two. For my purse and when I travel!!
I’ve been wearing Angel ray de Parfum for more than 25 years. It’s nice to have a refillable spray to carry and travel with.

This one is a little different! I have to admit that I wasn't sure at first, and my husband did not like the smell on me. I decided to give it another try...and eventually the smell does get better. I really thought that the Beautiful Green bottle and the fragrance were perfect together! It's a smell that makes me think "green" for some reason. It's probably the rhubarb, but it almost had a slight medicinal smell to it at FIRST. IT got better. . #Spondered
 I WAS NOT COMPENSATED FOR THIS POST; HOWEVER, I AM CREATING THIS POST AS PART OF A CONTEST

I recently purchased a gift set and one of the products was broken, you replaced with no problem, and I want to Thank you so much. I love all my Angel products and will continue to use them. Thank you so much
My wife likes this product. She would like it to be a little bigger and be able to refill. Lynann has been using your product over 25 years.
Love the Angel Eau to go ... does not take up room in my pocketbook, and I always leave a great fragrance when I enter/exit the room!
Received my Angel wrapped perfectly and completely untouched by the mail!! I expect nothing less from Muglerusa!! Love my Angel!!!
Great eady to use and compact eady to take anywhere

Perfect for travel. 
Although price is a little bit expensive for the quantity. 
But the smell makes it worth.

A month or so ago, I called Thierry Mugler's office with a special request.
I have been ordering the purse spray of Angel for some time now and
and have been so happy with it. You see, I have Emphysema and my
body can't take much more than a small squirt here and there. Of
all the samples that I tried, the Oriental Express was the best for my
breathing so I asked the unfriendly lady, Tina(?) if it would be possible
to get 5 Oriental Express samples. "No it can't be done", the order goes
to the Warehouse and other lame excuses. I hung up and was really
disappointed that an exception couldn't be done for someone who has
extenuating circumstances. The world is so difficult. I'm nearly 65 and
have a few more medical problems. I placed the order online, like usual.
It didn't pay to call the office in NYC and be disappointed by a super snob!
Love this size, especially when I travel. Could t find it in my local department store, but ordered on line.

This is the best Travel companion , the bottle it`s REFILLABLE , just PULL OUT the WHOLE black part that separates the Bottle from the black part , where it sprays the perfume , and if you have one of those little FUNNELS from Thierry Mugler just fill it up again . Make sure you do not overfill , as you have to put the black part back , and just make sure its tight and it doesnt drip the perfume .

column6: When you travel with carry-ons only
column7: As I do short travel flying to Vegas Friday and back Sunday and only bring a small bag, what can be better then have your favorite perfume small enough to the allowed on the air plane .

Just some of my favorite scent to take along with me in this compact size adorable spray. And everywhere I go compliments come from men and women. When you order from this site you don't have to worry about it not smelling like the real thing as I have found with some sites. Free shipping and free samples!
Simply enchanting! My favorite scent. It's soft, fresh and natural. Definitely will reorder. A plus rating.
This perfume smells amazing!! Every time I wear it I get compliments!! This would definitely be a great gift for someone special in your life!!

This fragrance is just simply exceptional. The only thing is that the price for this tiny amount to be able to carry it with you is uneccessarily higher than it should be. I'm also in agreement with the prior commenter that this should be refillable.
Also, the cap doesn't fit as snug as I'd like it to, but it shouldn't be a problem with leaking. I just need to be careful.
Just another awesome way to make sure I am always wearing my favorite fragrance. In my purse, in my car, in my nightstand. Love my ANGEL!

I purchased the Angel Eau To Go for a trip my husband and I were taking to Europe for three weeks. I did not want to carry my regular star size bottle.
This worked out great. It took up little room in my suit case and was so easy to use. If you are taking a trip for a day, week or month, I recommend you take this small travel perfume spray. I loved it!!

GOOD FOR TRAVELING :-)
VERY RECOMENDED :-)
.......

I've been wanting to contact you but I had some family health issues to deal with. I love angel. However every time I use this it leaks I feel like I'm losing money every time I spray $25. For a tiny tube is a lot of money for me. I don't make a lot of money.

I was introduced to Angel years ago by my oldest sister. She gave me one of the samples and I just fell in love with this fragrance. Everytime I wear it I always receive compliments, "what are you wearing, it smells so refreshing!" In addition, everytime I wear it it gives my senses a boost! It is a light fragrance and I really enjoy it! Thanks to my sister! I would recommend this product and the others.

This pen-sized "ANGEL" spray by Mugler is perfect for my handbags! I keep one handy all the time. It's my favorite perfume and I use it 95% of the time! It never, ever ceases to get compliments from women and men alike.

It fits in a purse, or better yet a pocket. It probably fits anywhere. It's unbreakable. It's Angel, in all its delicious glory.

If only it were refillable...then I'd have given if 5 stars. (Surely the artists and scientists of Maison Mugler can come up with a way to refill these from the Source or the refill bottles?)

I love the convenience of having something small and as slender as my lipstick smell so good...carry it everywhere with me so my husband is always by my side! He loves how beautiful and sexy it makes me! Thank you Thierry Mugler...your my Angel!

I sent my reciept in April of 2014 for a credit on filling my bottle on line of Angel Perfume. I have yet to have that done and have contacted you countless times and nothing has been done. So because of that I am giving you a negative review.

Great product. Angle is my signature sent. I have been wearing it for over14 years. The Angle EAU to go is very convenient. It's easy to find in your purse, it doesn't leak out, and that little tube hold a lot. I love your perfumes. Thank you for making me a better me. Kelly Gracey
This is my signature fragrance and I love having a portable applicator in my purse. I get constant comments on how good I smell. I simply love this fragrance.
perfect for the smallest purse or any make up bag..just wish it was also refillable

column6: Excellent Angel in purse size.always getting asked
column7: I am always getting asked what r u wearing same answer Angel. Only need a little for all day wear. Love it

I love this fragrance! People ask me all the time what fragrance I am wearing. I just pull out this little bottle and show them! Love, love, love!

I love this perfume. The refills are amazing because you don't pay for the bottle you already have and they are refillable. Great thinking on Mugler's part. The refills are very handy and quick to take care of. Place a piece of clothing under the funnel and bottle once you are refilling your bottle because you will have a little spillage and that way it will fall on your piece of clothing and not be wasted on your counter. I always place clean undergarments under the bottle I'm filling so they will smell beautiful all day.

column7:
The product I purchased direct from the web page was tainted or stale. It had a sharp, fuel-like additional odor that ruined the Angel fragrance that I had been wearing for a year and loved. No big deal, things happen. Except that when I returned per their instructions, their 'specialist' could find nothing wrong with it and they sent me back the same opened tainted bottle. Multiple communications followed but they refused to refund me. I had to dispute through my credit card company to get refunded.

I'm not sure if I was more embarrassed for them or offended by them but their poor handling of this situation has pretty much turned me off the brand. IF I ever buy Angel again, it will be through one of the department stores that I know will replace or refund me for spoiled product.

I have so few things that I really want for myself. The ONE exception is my Angel Perfume and Angel products. The first and sometimes only thing I ask for on my birthday, anniversary or Mother's Day is any Angel item. I have been using Angel since late 1990's and have NO desire to try any other perfume. I am always asked what I have on and have even shared samples with others so they can try and hopefully purchase. The aroma is not just refreshing, but also soothing. Thank you for this "Heavenly" fragrance and glad offered in more than just perfume.
I received yesterday this birthday gift that my husband and my little son gave me and I was totally in love with this fragrance ❤️

This scent is a welcomed addition to all of the Angel products on my dresser; however the design of the bottle is what really intrigued me with the old fashioned sprayer design but the picture is very misleading. The picture shows a deep rich blue bottle thats vibrant and mesmerizing with raised stars and other galactic things looking raised when in actuality the bottle is nowhere as pretty in person it has a dull frosted matted finish and the stars and galaxies are recessed and clear not shiny but clear and be sure to note the arrow on top of the sprayer to open it up so you won't think your bottle is not working properly. I'm going to keep mine and use this scent to layer with other angel scents. I didn't know there were so many different kinds of Angel scents. The Eau Sucree is amazing. This is a lighter Angel scent not sharp like the original but still nice. But when I took mine out of the box I was like what is this, but what you gonna do? Win some lose some the bottle is just not as pretty as it is pictured.

I recently purchased this scent, mainly because I LOVED the bottle. I received a SAMPLE of it with my recent purchase and discovered how much I enjoy it, also!! I cannot wait to place it among my ANGEL Shrine...along with my many different shapes and sizes of the refill bottles I currently own! PSST!! It is a SECRET 2018 Christmas gift from my husband ;-}

column6: the perfum is a dream but the bottle :'(
column7:
My husband gifted me this expensive perfume. We both fell in love with the scent despite the poor designed bottle that did not look like the pic and it was a process to make the vintage tip spray, it always needed more than one try.
We went on a trip and I packed the bottle in my suit case like I always do with my perfumes. 
As soon as I arrive to my destination I open the suit case and it all smells like the perfume, nothing broke but from the vibration on the road the top came off. There is not even a refill why would they make it open so easy!!!
I can't even tell my husband that his gift got messed up less than a week later.
I love Mugler but they did not do a good job with the bottle at all
Amazing fragrance. I just love how this fragrance makes me feel. This fragrance is a winner.

While I do enjoy this version of Angel, the atomizer is truly a disaster. I purchased this based off of a sample I received from prior purchases of Angel (my favorite). The small spray sample was intense and intoxicating, just like Angel but seemed a little "deeper". Once I ran out of the samples I had, I knew I had to have this. However - the atomizer is just a disaster. It barely dispenses and is an utter mess to handle. The intensity definitely seems lost with this - I don't know why - but I can only blame it on the atomizer and poor application. I won't purchase this again unless it comes with a changeable top (traditional spray application). Not worth the $145 I spent considering I barely use it due to the ridiculous atomizer.

column6: Actual product is great but the mister is not.
column7: I fell in love with the new mister only to find much of my Eau de Parfum on my night stand. I'm not sure where it's leaking from but I'm not able to stop the leak and at $135.00 I was not happy. I did try to get some satisfaction from the company but was told to contact the store where I purchased it. I did just that and they told me to contact the company. I gave up!
Absolutely beautiful in every way … I cannot stop smelling my arm where I sprayed … I've stocked up on this beauty and I suggest y'all do the same — you won't regret. cheers!

I first started using Angel about 22 years ago. It was so aromatic and luxurious. Over the years it changed a little and became less aromatic. THIS IS THE ORIGINAL FORMULA!!! My chemistry and my senses were awakened to the truth RIGHT AWAY. This scent took me back to the first year that I purchased Angel! The SENSES CAN NOT BE FOOLED.

column6: This is a wonderful addition to the line
column7: It is indeed warm, intimate and intense--less sunny and sweet than regular Angel so perfect for the evening. Don't miss out!

column6: Adore this Angel for the night
column7: I adore this bottle and the fragrance. It's so very special and lucious!!! A must if you are an "Angel" lover.

PTHIS IS SOOOOOO YUMMY SMELLING.it smells different on me that regular angel perfume. I was babysitting my grandson amd he dump my almost full bottle onto the dog bed do i just haf to buy another! At least the dog is enjoying it!7

I have been eyeing up this bottle for quite a while and finally made the splurge. This simply smells like a softer version of Angel edp, and there's no need to fear overspraying it. I was disappointed, however, that the atomizer on MY bottle is black - looks blue in the online photo. A silver or light blue would seem to blend in better with the entire look. Still, I'm happy to add this to my extensive Angel bottle collection!!
This perfume has a beautiful scent, but has no staying power.

I have worn "traditional" Angel perfume for years. Honestly, I was more intrigued by the vintage designed bottle than the contents. However, the scent is light, exotic and different than my staple Angel fragrance. The scent is not too heavy and lasts for hours. I receive compliments galore but am most excited with the newest addition to my Angel collectibles!
I don't ever want to stop smelling like this! The scent is somehow magical, yet cozy and it lasts so long! People always comment on it.
After an initial issue, which was totally due to my not paying attention, this scent is luscious. Years ago I had spray perfume bottles and this is so much a memory for me. Thank you!

If you are an "Angel" fan, this is the PERFECT version of this classic fragrance. The balance of scents is perfect! Not too heavy, not too light. The bottle is amazing. This is truly the long awaited masterpiece of the Angel line!
Love this scent!! I would recommend this fragrance to everyone.

column6: Christmas bauble or apple on a stick???
column7: The frangrance is exceptional however, the design of the bottle definitely is off and frankly ridiculous. Wish they would bring back Theirry Mugler as artistic director, Angel has never been the same without him.
gorgeous! atomizer is classic and classy looks great on my dresser

I am not one to keep buying the same fragrance just to have a different bottle.. This is why I LOVE Angel b/c it is refillable and I don't have to keep buying another bottle! I know many ppl buy the different Angel bottles to collect them, but for me it is unnecessary.. However when I saw this bottle and it said that it was a variation of the Angel I just had to have it, plus there was a sale. I will say I expected it to have a slightly different smell. I guess something more full, maybe a tad bit more vanilla or cinnamon or something like that.. Although I am not to fond of straight vanilla scents I do like them in various parfums. So although this is an intense version of the regular Angel, I was looking for something just a tad bit more sultry since it is for the "night". Nonetheless I am not unhappy with it, b/c the bottle alone is just what I like.. I like having that old school air pump on my bottle makes me feel regal and elegant. 
Just a side note make sure you twist the pump or you will just be getting air coming out.. When I opened mine and started to pump it I thought it was broken until I saw the arrow. You only need to twist the top part. So all in all it is a great purchase for your collection if you collect the bottles, if not it is still a great purchase to have a more intense Angel scent.

Bought this as soon as it was released & knew instantly thAt current Angel lovers would like it but new fans too. Highly reccomend for those who are new to Angel & those who want love Angel but simply can't wear the original. The perfect balance for all age groups it Wears beautifully with all Angel body products.
A Classic.....

This version of the fragrance is, simply put, INTOXICATING!! I was never a fan of Angel, but this one hooked me in. Everything about this edition is true beauty, from the feminine design of the bottle, the frosted and etched glass, the position the bottle sits in, its a star, yet its a planet. There is so much beauty in this bottle, between the delicate, sexy, sensory experience the fragrance takes you on to the details of the bottle... the bottle.. the bottle... the bottle, I simply can not say enough , it should most definietly win an award.
After cleansing my face and performing my nightly rituals, I spritz my night time Angel on and mist my pillow. Nothing like Angelic dreams all the night long!!!! This is a must try!

This new rendition of Angel, my favorite scent in the world, makes my evening something very special. With an application of Etoile des Reves on my body,
I begin my evening routine, slowly heading to bed time with a heightened sense of glamour. I slip between my sheets and prepare to dream of an un-imagined world of luxury and charm. I awake with a realization that the world is indeed a very glamorous place, and is the place where I live.
Thank you Mr. Mugler.
Beautifully rounded in all the right places. A Sensual and perfect addition to Angel.
This is a wonderful addition to my Mugler collection!! The fragrance is simply lovely & the atomizer bottle is magnificent!! Highly recommend for first timers and/or Mugler Celestials!!
I love this. Its light fragrance is so incredibly pretty and the bottle I beautiful
A perfectly balanced finely nuanced version of Angel. Had to have it within the first few weeks of release and I'm very happy!

I absolutely love this perfum. 
I recommend this perfum in a heart bit! It is a light, sweet and sensual perfum. Perfect to use at night. 
If you love the original Angel perfum you will love this one too!

Andreia

This may be for the night, but the Angel in me says - spray all day if you like, and I will. Still intense yet rounded off in all the right places this Angel will make you feel irresistible & u will be to anyone around you. YES! - I reccomend this to everyone. This may be the way to reintroduce or introduce people to Angel as it falls into a sweet spot of perfection or "just right" I love everything Angel. Both men & women ask me what I am wearing or say- you smell wonderful . Extremely empowering not to mention appreciative to have found a signature scent that works for me. Angel 'ETOILE DES REVES ' sweet, sexy, creamy, dreamy, flirty & slightly crisp- Enjoy your new celestial nights with this new Angel, friends - xoxo Amy

This may be for the night, but the Angel in me says - spray all day if you like, and I will. 
 Still intense yet rounded off in all the right places this Angel will make you feel irresistible & u will be to anyone around you.
 YES! - I reccomend this to everyone. This may be the way to reintroduce or introduce people to Angel as it falls into a sweet spot of perfection 
or "just right"
 I love everything Angel. Both men & women ask me what I am wearing or say- you smell wonderful . Extremely empowering not to mention appreciative to have found a signature scent that works for me. 
 Angel 'ETOILE DES REVES ' sweet, sexy, creamy, dreamy, flirty & slightly crisp 
Enjoy your new celestial nights with this friends - xoxo Amy
My honey loves it, I have bought 6 for her plane to buy another this yr.
This came so beautifully packaged love love this fragrance

Sexy yet very appropriate. I see it as very Mugler because it's a fragrance that a teen to a more mature lady like myself can wear. It is confusing to say what I just did but based on what my daughter has explained as Thierry Muglers way of thinking, it makes sense.

We both would like another stronger version of this wonderful fragrance. Not loud, just more noticeable further away and richer so that it lasts and lingers.
Thank you !
Love the bottlel

There's nothing else like it and I loved it.
 My daughter loved it too, so we hope you we will release another version that has a bit more projection that lingers longer. This version is one of a kind and that is precisely why I / we would like MORE with a little extra kick for the next Angel Fragrance of leather But do give us warmth with softness too.
Thank you
Mrs. H

It was a dream come true when this was released. It's perfect for all Mugler enthusiasts, collectors, and most importantly - NEW Customers.

If you want something that's a bit softer but not at all boring, try this! It's actually a nice unisex fragrance. It reminds me of spraying my boyfriends cologne on my leather jacket. This makes it both sexy & chic.

 exquisite bottle that shines with detail
Oh, then there's the fragrance that is unique! warm, soft, with a hint of sexy leather that does not disappoint. Love this 4- ever......

Please bring it back. Also, may we pump up the power for those of us who like more projection. Extra Vanilla or musk maybe? It's difficult for me to describe what I would like added but I think creamy like your new muse does after it dries down. No floral & not more citrus but something spicey that blends well with creamy and sensual musk notes. 

Just would love to see this again - smoldering with a "you'll never 4-get me" glow lingering behind..
What a luxe experience. Its the original Angel dancing in the background as sumptuous leather takes center stage. Truly a decadent adventure. One of my personal favorites.

column6: Love, love, love!! This is my signature sent
column7: I absolutely love it! I have been wearing Angel since it launched in the USA! I must say though, this was the first time I wasn't able to enter my secret code and even called customer support and got no response. That I am disappointed with

I took a chance on this since there was no way to smell or test it before purchase and I am ABSOLUTELY in love. I agree the smell is an earthy version of Angel and perfect for the fall/winter season. I really hope this becomes more than a "limited edition" otherwise I will have to stock up.
I love Angel Parfum and the scent of Leather. This Parfum is amazing. Highly recommend to any Angel lovers. You cannot go wrong with this purchase.
It smells masculine yet feminine. Love the earthiness of it! Not overpowering, but softly wraps around you and stays. A subtler uptake on Angel.

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7: I will not order this again.   This is my least favorite of all to this date.

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7: I got this last year and I love it!!!  Can’t be without it!

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7: I have all the Mugler perfumes, but Angel is my signature scent. Everyone loves it and no migraines! This one is similar to the Angel Sucre but sweeter with nice lush fruity overtones. Definitely a keeper!

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7: I give this a 4/5 if you love Angel and want a summer fragrance. It misses 5/5 because on me it does not last as long as I like and I've already gone through quite a bit of the bottle in just a month. But this could also be because I love the smell of that top note and can't wait to refresh. I'll be using this one all summer and hoping to see its return.

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7:
This is my first tango with Mr. Mugler, and I was not disappointed! I wanted to try ANGEL since I smelled it on my hair stylist, because it smelled amazing on her. When I raved about it to my husband, he went out to purchase it for me. Unfortunately, he hated it!! Well, I wasn’t about to give up this tango! 

Then, I found ANGEL FRUITY FAIR! My husband loves the way it smells on me, so much so, that he allowed me a dance with Le Mugler!

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7:
First spray was like angel. 
Second spray was like laundry detergent. 
Then wait for it.

The dry down and notes will come and its vanilla, whipped cream, sorbet, berry fruit with a small (and I mean tiny) of the angel DNA. It leans more towards a summer fragrance and almost smells to me like a strawberry daiquiri at a resort. I love it and I am contemplating getting another bottle because I am in love. you have to let it dry down and give it a chance. 30 minutes and you will see. It is not addictive in complexity but it is beautiful and perfect for warm weather. I wear Angel Muse EDP regular basis.

column5: Angel Fruity Fair Eau de Toilette
column7: I have to say this will be my last blind purchase. I love Angel and the Mugler products so much that I thought I would absolutely fall in love with Fruity Fair. Sadly this fragrance does not live up to the Angel expectations I had. It smells cheap, does not last, and seems so one dimensional. On top of that, my box came damaged, not the shipping box, that came perfect. It was the box the fragrance came in, so I know it was packaged that way. The box was crushed. In addition, I'm sad to see the free gift of the Sweet Factory treat, I guess I don't get one for buying too soon. I will be returning the product. I'm very disappointed. But the bottle is beautiful!
The product was not delivered and nobody reply at the customer service center to tell me why....

I’ve worn Angel for years, however, the last few years I was fragrance free ( for no good reason!) . I went to the muglerusa.com website and bought myself a present; fragrance, body creme, shower gel. That day, I received free shipping, 20% off and many free gifts. Great value for my money!!

column7: I bought this for my sister, will her on her wedding day.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Gift Sets

column7:
New fragrance is absolutely captivating.. 
I’ve only worn the Angel scent for years, but I 
Wanted to try something different and I am 
Totally happy..
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Gift Sets

column7: The overall packaging ... The fragrance !!! I originally purchased as a gift ... But when I opened it ... This was one of the gifts I had to keep for myself ...and I am so happy I did !!!!!
Beautiful box! I was extremely pleased! The price was great! I have always loved Angel and always will!

I purchased going by the great reviews. I personally do not love the scent. I did love the sample of the Alien one (purple bottle) and of Alien Essence Absolue Intense Eau de Parfum. If purchasing any of these 3 i would absolutely go with the Essence Absolue one the smell is like a nectar that lasts all day. I cannot describe the scent of Angel, i just am not a fan of it and unfortunately now have a full bottle that i probably will never use.

When shopping with my husband we both walked into the department store and smelled the sweetest scent we have smelled in a while. We had gone in order to purchase a different perfume but when I asked the sales lady what the wonderful scent was she directed me to the Angel Perfume display. I smelled every perfume on that display and immediately fell in love with the scent of Angel! I have never had so many compliments on a perfume until I started wearing Angel. I will not buy another scent again! The fact that is refillable for life is a definite plus also!
I love the bottle and the scent.  I would buy it again :)
I have worn this scent for years!  always get a compliment on it!

I love Angel and have desired the large star for quite awhile. When I saw this bottle I decided to pick this one. Ordered from website for the first time. Service is first rate. It arrived quickly, packaged just beautifully. My Christmas present to myself. Love it so much. Love it even more that I will be able to use this bottle forever. The bottle is substantial. The crystals are pretty but not over the top. Really lovely. And the fragrance is wonderful. Unique, long lasting, delicious. I know this is an investment but I'm very happy with my purchase.

I purchased this as a gift for my daughter. She's just figuring out what she likes for perfumes and lotions. This was a huge success, she loved it! It's was the perfect introduction to Theirry Mugler's Angel line. Thank You!

I am a 'Mugler Addict' and received this great box that's equivalent to a choir of Angels! I'm ordering extras through the private sale,great gifts. I had been seduced by Womanity and the Mugler Addict has me stretching and reaching out in to the universe of Alien. Angel is & will always be my mainstay.
The cases are beautiful plus its added protection for your bottles.

column6: 4 the sexy angel with a attitude
column7:
I have this edition 1.1 oz it is in the beautiful bottle displayed only the perfume is a darker blue.

The 2013 version comes in a silver type bottle that I didn't like as much as this one. It is not as haute or lavish looking. More of a teenage look.

It's beautiful and worth the splurge at least once!

I wear it with my Angel perfuming body oil.

Overall, I'm a very happy and naughty angel.

I'm currently on my last bottle and trying to make it Last! This scent is so unique, as are all Mugler creations, but I would love you to bring this Limited Edition back. Please!!! It's sexy, smells devine and my fave evening scent. Think about seriously reissuing this lovely.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: This is it!! I have been using Angel Eau de Parfum for a very long time but decided to give this Angel rocked out version a try and am I glad I did - an incredible, sexy, deep intriguing 'what is that' fragrance!! I plan on buying more very soon and my current bottle is half full, if that tells you anything. I wish Mugler would make the matching body lotion!! This may not be for everyone, obviously, but I have found my match, will never stop using this version. Total rock n'roll sexy all the way.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: I purchased this fragrance knowing I love Angel.. I have started to pair it with a splash of Alien. Much to my surprise, strangers have stopped me to inquire what I was wearing. And cant forget the bottle. Beautiful. Looks like a shining star.

column7: Purchased 2 & enjoyed them. Next - I would like more projection. Very nice for anyone to wear. I would suggest this for anyone who finds original Angel a bit too powerful. I used it with Angel body products (awesome)

column7: Enjoyed 2 bottles. Would love for you to add a bit more projection and silage
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: Used Angel for years. Started using others but forgot how good the one made me feel. And people always ask what it is. Glad I found this one again.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7:
I was in my place of business a few years ago and a woman came in. She approached me to ask a question and I was enveloped in a fragrance so soft and so seductive I had to ask what it was. She smiled and said," This...is Angel Liqueur. Actually, I put it on about 7 hours ago." It was still potent after all those hours. " You might have a hard time finding it." She said. Well, it did not take long for me to find it.
I am very particular about the fragrance I wear. I like a rich fragrance full of woodsy tones and not too floral. I want it to be different from all the too potent, too overwhelming perfumes that I see everywhere. Angel Liqueur is that fragrance. In all the time I have been wearing it I, like the woman who told me about it, have been asked many times what this fragrance is. I tell everyone. I have never loved any fragrance the way that I love this one. It is my signature fragrance and as long as Thierry Mugler is making it I will buy it. I will say though. It is not easy to find without ordering it from this website. But to me, that exclusivity makes it all the more appealing!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: This perfume is lovely and heavenly to wear. It makes you feel angelic, enticing and sexy and people would exclaim the same remarks when they come in contact with me. They would ask "what are you wearing" I will always wear this fragrance. Angel is forever!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: Angel "Thierry Mugler" was the first fragrance to capture me as a customer. I received it as a sample with my purchase, tried it but find it different, tried it again another time became more impressed, tried again and was sold. I proceeded to the Saks store to purchase a bottle even getting my name engraved on it. From using this fragrance I became more and more interested in the other fragrances. I am totally in love with "Thierry Mugler" line of perfumes. This new "Angel Liqueur de Parfum" steals the cake - Love it, Love it, Love it!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: This is a very complex fragrance very intriguing. For me I receive honey right up front along with cognac, patchouli, and chocolate. Within a few moments of the initial spray, the nose is gifted with interchanging scents. The fact that you can smell the transformations I think is really cool, I would even go as far as comparing the scent arousal to the visual arousal that you get while watching an led light display changing from color to color seamlessly. I don't find the silage to be very wide which makes me think this would actually be a great sexy evening summer scent, even though most reviews consider it a evening fall scent. Longevity lasts pretty long on me about 20-24 hrs even after showering. Great scent, I definitely would recommend to someone who enjoys a little complexity, this scent smells great. I really would like to try the 2009 version as well.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7:
I was intrigued by the description of the limited edition flavors. I was leaning strongly toward the sound and awesome bottle of Angel, leather but found it lost it's power too fast and the cocoa version was similar. This one won and I bought two bottles. I do love it and I am happy to wear it but I wish that the company would add some oomph to this version &the leather version as I love horses but the leather smell didn't stick around. This one is beautiful and It is not as strong on the patchouli as traditional Angel. So, it's something a little different.
Anyway, Buy it, try it, and wear it with no regrets.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: Having been an Angel loyal for years, I was extremely excited to try this Angel version. Sadly, this perfume was a big disappointment. It seemed very watery, the fragrance excessively sweet, without Angel's exotic quality. Furthermore, after a couple of hours I could not even smell it on my clothes.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: I have worn Angel since its creation and this Angel is by far my favorite take on the scent! I love the deeper woody scent and the stronger Patchouli undertone.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column6: I didn't think that Angel could be better!
column7: I was skeptical that "aging" a parfum would make a real difference. I was so wrong. I ordered this liquere version of Angel and wore it while shopping at BCBG's one day. The sales associate stopped me as I walked by and said " you smell terrific, I think it's Angel but it seems different." I informed her that it was a limited edition of Angel aged in casks. She was impressed, and I was elated. Traditional Angel for everyday, and now this "stepped up" edition for special occasions for a little extra impact. I highly recommend this as an addition to your collection.
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her > Liqueurs de Parfums

column7: I received my Angel as a gift from one of my patients. As an oncology nurse, it is important to present yourself in a way that will, give hope to others. I wear it to be thankful...for my friend/patient who gifted me with it, to be a pleasant aroma to others, and when asked what beautiful scent I am wearing, I can say I am clothed as an Angel...

I will not wear anything else. I use the shower gel, hair mist, powder, hand cream and perfume, I use it all!. very happy with this purchase
