column6: Angel Magical Gift Set is Lovely
column7: I ordered this for Christmas. It's really beautiful! The gift box holding the Angel is awesome. The first gift box was torn in the corner, but after a few calls I finally received a new empty box. I was disappointed that the company did not put in any of their free samples in the box, seeing as how much I had spent in the first place and the trouble getting a replacement box. Who knows - maybe I'll get some now. I can only hope.......
column28: Charter Twp of Clinton, MI, USA

column7: Loved buying this as a set! It's so nice to use the same fragrance as shower gel, lotion, fragrance and hair mist. I had people asking me what I was wearing all day.
I am in love with Angel. I wear it everyday, all year around and get compliments on it every day. Please don't ever stop making this Parfum!!!
Unique perfume... Goes on strong but then simmers down to like a chocolate nut... So good!

I have been a loyal fan of Angel Muse since I tried the sample I received a few years ago. I get compliments almost daily from strangers in stores and anywhere I go asking what my perfume is because it smells so amazing! I have referred numerous women to you from just wearing your perfume. I am a lifetime fan!
Love the sent, I get so many complements when I ware this. This time I purchased the stand up bottle I'm so glad I did. Plus this one is a refill bottle.

I received the perfume last year for my birthday. I'm one hundred percent addicted to this signature scent. When it ran out I purchased my own bottle for myself and Angel  Toilette for my sister. Thanks Mugler family.

I recently purchased "Angel Muse EDP to go" after trying a sample. I it is light compared to Angel. The grapefruit serves to blend all the notes. What you are left with is a delicious Vanilla accord. Mugler vanilla is like no other. I love "Muse" for now into the fall.

I have worn Angel religiously for 20 years.... no scent has ever made me want to stray. Except for Muse - Becasue it’s in the same family it has a lot of the notes that I love from Angel but now I have a little variety to mix it up throughout the week!

column6: Gives you something to think about....
column7: Got a sample when we ordered Aura for our daughter's birthday. Loved and had to order for myself.  Still love it.  It's a good balance between Angel and Alien.
I've worn Angel exclusively for 20 years. Then I received a sample of Muse and fell in love with it's earthy fragrance.

Perfect in every way. Love at first spray. I never thought I could wear the original Angel, though now I am in love with it as well. My first was Angel Rose, which I adore. This scent has brought me more compliments than any other scent. Even though I have many favorite scents, this tops the list. I can't imagine anyone not falling in love with Angel Muse.

I am 21 and for years have been using Bombshell from Victoria Secret, because that is what my boyfriend loves on me! The lasting power was horrible but the smell was great! I wanted to try something new and am always weary when it comes to finding a new scent that doesnt make my allergies go insane! I was in Marshalls one day and saw this perfume and I thought I might as well try it and see what it smells like. Immediately I fell in love! Boyfriend absolutely loves it too! Very sexy and feminine...exactly what I was looking for! Not too sweet either. The best part is when it wears down throughout the day and it smells more like a creamy vanilla but still very sexy and not sticky sweet. I would highly highly recommend for anyone who is wanting to try something different!

I am an Angel Girl and have been for as long as I can remember! 
I am now an Angel Muse Girl! 
Beautiful scent! Morphs to a light, intoxicating hint of hazelnut and i am told , chocolate by the end of the day!

column6: great scent different from angel original.
column7: this is by far different. they told me to add the angel cream. they all go well together. it works.

I received a sample of Angel Muse and loved it so much I purchased the large bottle when they where having friends and family sale.I like buying from this site because they give samples of other parfume to try.I receive lots of compliments when wearing this parfume.
I LOVE this Muse!! I wish they would make body cream, hair spray, and oil for Muse. Just like they already do for Angel! Which I also love very much!

My daughter loves the fragrance but when I purchased this item for her for Christmas, I signed up for the free engraving. But when I received your product thru the mail it was not engraved. Disappointed but not with the fragrance. I rated this product a 4 since you advertised free engraving but it wasn’t done.

column6: Angel Muse is literally, "To Die For"
column7: I purchased this fragrance without prior knowledge if it's power! I have received hundreds of compliments. I first wore it to a wedding reception and WoW! Was I ever the most talked about person there!!! Angel Muse is sensational!!
OMG!! I thought Angel was my favortie---just bought 2 bottle of AngleHair mist...got Angel Muse as a sample....blew me away!! PERFECT!!!
I am in love with this scent. I am a fan of all of Mugler scents. I especially like Womanity
Muse makes my top 5 perfumes of all time. The smell is captivating and intoxicating. I always receive compliments and it is a scent that can be worn any time, all the time :-)
I love fragrances that have sweet notes, this is a perfect balance for those who do not love it so much. You can really tell it's high quality. I look forward to trying other fragrances.

A lighter version of Angel and such a delicious scent! I'm waiting for the body lotion or cream to come out and then I'll buy both fragrance and lotion so it lasts on me. It fades out very quickly on me, unlike the original Angel. 

Please create the lotion or cream soon!

After trying Angel Muse in the store, I finally purchased it online. It was one of my best buys yet. It has a lovely spring-time scent that is not overpowering. In addition to wearing this alone, I have layered it with my Angel body creme. For special times, I also spray a scant amount over my bed linens so that I fall asleep in a great smelling surrounding. I can hardly wait until it is popular enough that they make it into a body creme or body powder so I can have it around all the time. Since it is a bit pricey, I use it sparingly but love it just the same. Sometimes I even spray a bit on a tissue and place in my car so that it has that light scent when I transport others around. Everyone comments on my Angel choices so I will continue using Angel as my signature fragrance.

It is the best quality, smell, and authentic perfume I have ever used. I absolutely love my Angel in all different scents. I get so many complements a day, I can not stop telling people how much I love it. I am ANGEL BOUND FOREVER!
I love this new fragrance! Is refreshingly light...have had great compliments when I wear it...people ask what it is...so thanks for making another wonderful scent.

Very unhappy your nor making anymore. I have been wearing since in came out & I 
Love it not happy to try and find a new fragrance. ..
This is what you feel like when you wear this fragrance.i have slot of Thierry Mugler products but get compliments gor from this particular product.You will need t be disappointed!!!

column6: Beautiful Addition to my Fragrance Wardrobe
column7: As a long time user of Angel and Alien I was led to purchase Muse as it was included in your "private sale" and I had chosen it as one of my free samples during a previous purchase. This is lovely and the beautiful bottle looks equally lovely in my collection.
I have had several favorites over the years but Angel Muse is now by far my favorite fragrance.

To be honest, I could not decide if I liked this at first. It really started to grow on me the more I wore it. I could not get enough of it- and everyone around me asked me what I was wearing! It is more subtle and creamy then the original angel... the patchouli and vanilla are still very evident in the dry down. I like that aspect and it makes me want to lick my wrists...

When I wear Muse I get so many compliments on how wonderful my parfum is! Then they next ask the name, and where I bought it. I simply LOVE the new Muse! I'm ready for Mugler to make cream, hair mist, and powder in Muse!! I really, really love it!

column6: I am in love with this Muse!
column7: I layer it over regular Angel and it takes the scent to a new high. A brilliant new "complication."
I absolutely love just adore this perfume lol, it's so perfect for a day time use since it's not as strong as the original one, don't get me wrong I still love the original but more at nights.
Love, love, love this! I get so many compliments! The smell stays with me all day long too.
I tried a sample of this and loved it! Made me think of summer, fresh and free! I thought it would be a good everyday perfume I could wear to work and just out and about.
Love love love love love, love love love love love love love love Thank you
This is an awesome smelling perfume. It's not too over bearing or strong.
This fragrance is so me. It renews itself when my body heats up. Shared the sample with a friend and now it's on the top of her list of must haves.
This scent is fantastic! Soft yet lasts all day. I think this is a unisex scent as it is almost a bit more Fruity than Angel and a bit softer. I get so many compliments on this scent
This smells between Angel and Alien, absolutely amazing. Everyone around me always compliments my smell. Thank you for making all your scents smell so feminine and good.

It has a sharpness that is different than Angel, I don't think they smell alike at all, except in the sweet vanilla factor. Angel has that patchouli punch which is delicious but Muse has a classic pure vanilla sweet cookie scent. I don't get a lot of depth to it and it does not last long at all! But when it does, ( it only lasts about an hour on me) its very bakery like good. I have worn it a lot , out and about, and not ONE person has ever said a word, that bothers me a little. But hey for my own enjoyment, I really like it. Just sorry it is so weak and not long lasting. Overall, I prefer original Angel.
The scent is great and shipping was fast! Love the free samples. I'll be buying here again!

I really liked this fragrance. When I purchased it I had a sample of Over the moon musk which I totally fell in love with! I would love another sample or 2 of that.... I can share with my daughter. I'm sure she would love it too, but I want to make sure before making that purchase.

Thank you, Barb
I bought this for my sister for Christmas and she loved it, she was very pleased with fragrance I tried the samples and I loved it..my sister loved the monogrammed bottle, she was impressed!!!
A wonderful light sent that lasts all day. All of the Mugler fragrances are my very favorite. I am always getting compliments about the fragrances when I am wearing them.

Usually when i like something, i say " i have to buy you" lol. When i smelled a sample of this in a magazine this past summer, i HAD to get this for Christmas. My dad bought it for me and i can't stop sniffing it. Omg this scent is everything and will be my signature scent, please make a body wash or lotion. My body chemistry is so good with Angel Muse, the only one i have experienced to do so for me. Im a happy girl!
I didn't think anything could compete with "Angel", but this does! I received it as a sample, and then had to get the real thing! Love it! Good job Mr. Mugler!

This was the Christmas gift my daughter requested.
It is POWERFUL!
She loved it !. When I opened the small included sample, I got a wee bit on my hand. It still smelled just great after washing my hands a few times with soap.

column6: Great scent but is gone as fast as you spray it!
column7: I'm a HUGE Mugler fan! Have worn angel for years, then alien, now alien essence absolue! Love love love these scents!! Purchase must and it does NOY STAY WITH YOU! Huge waste of money!! Needs more essential oils in this fragrance. The Alien Essence Absloue is amazing and stays on much better than Alien. However, I can only find it online. Also, the alien (either one) smells amazing over the angel lotion or body cream!!!

I received a sample of this in an order that I bought and let me tell you I think this will be my next purchase! When I say this is just so intoxicating, but not overwhelming and heavy, light enough to wear for the day or the spring/summer months or just lounging around the house, I just love it.. I can't review on having it for a long time, but just by using the sample I am hooked.
This is my new fave perfume. The scent stays all day long and I receive so many compliments. Thierry Mugler has created another perfect scent! Bravo

I've been an Obsession girl for many years...my signature scent that my family recognized. I had a sample of Angel Muse in a purchase, tried it, received more compliments than even received with Obsession and had to purchase Angel Muse. Just today, walking into a room two people complimented me on the scent. On me, it's a soft, lovely, feminine scent....not at all overpowering. I'm 66 and we older women tend to overdue with colognes and parfumes. Just a spray on your wrist and rub together is all I need. When family ask what I want for Christmas, this is my answer if it's not too out of their budget. Love Love Love this scent.

I purchased Angel last year in the spring at Macy's in Saugus, MA USA....
I wanted the frosted Angel....I loved it...I wished I could have refilled it but it was an introduction...I recently purchased Angel Eau Sucree/ limited edtion....I love it...So does my boyfriend....I WOULD AND DO TELL OTHERS TO PURCHASE ANGEL.
THANK YOU FOR ANGEL...I WILL PURCHASE NOTHING ELSE.....i MEAN NOTHING
Ms. Grace Pasquariello
I love this fragrance. So many have ask "what is that perfume". It really is nice and I gladly share the name of this delightful scent.Daffy

column6: Just like regular Angel but a tiny bit sweeter
column7: It smells almost exactly like the regular Angel EDP, but only a tiny bit sweeter, and when I say a tiny bit, I mean Very Tiny. The patchouli isn't as potent as in regular Angel, but the difference is barely noticeable
I absolutely love this fragrance. I though the original was good, but Angel Muse is even better!

I got this perfume because one of my friends had it on and she smelled heavenly! Everyone was complimenting her and it was incredible how many people were smelling her and loving it. On the pricy side but for me totally worth it, I would recommend trying the sample first just because to me it seems like it smells a little different on everyone. It lasts forever and even by the end of the day I smell amazing. Beware it is a strong perfume and will last a long time. Smells pretty girly too which is usually not the scent I go for but this perfume has proven me wrong. Will for sure re-buy

10/10 worth every penny!

i'm in love with this fragrance, its intoxicating, warm and sensual. but not overpowering. I've worn Angel since my teens and now that I have Angel Muse it hard to choose a favorite. Its also eco-friendly so can smell amazing while do something good for the planet.

I have loved Mugler's creations since I first discovered them in 2010. Womanity has been my signature scent for 5 years now, so it was a bit challenging for me to switch it up...but when I smelled Angel Muse, I couldn't resist! The creamy nutty goodness has me smelling myself all day! I have always wanted to be an Angel user, but the original Angel has sadly never worked with my body chemistry. Angel Muse is more accessible and a unique fragrance all on its own. For me, it's perfect for Fall; it feels cozy like your favorite sweater you put on as you sip tea (or another hot beverage of your choice!) by the fireplace. A wonderful creation, I'm hooked! But contrary to the promos for this scent ("Hate to Love") I love to love it! Thanks, Mugler Parfums!
I bought this not sure if I would like it or not. This is a great fragrance!! Described perfectly, long wearing and not overpowering!
YUMMY AND DELICIOUS! I get compliments everywhere I go!

after wearing only angel since it was introduced I received a peel and sniff sample of muse and fell in love with the fragrance. angel will always be my favorite but I now have another fragrance to wear.

Love, love, LOVE this fragrance!

I love Angel, and then tried Muse...it is a difficult decision each day now as to which scent to wear!

I fell in love with Muse the first time I experienced it. It reminds
me of Angel but warmer. I immediately purchased it and wear it everyday.

I have worn Angel for the last 3 years and love it! Then I received a sample of Angel Muse and couldn't put it down. I ordered the 1.7 oz. refillable bottle as soon as I got home from work and received it within days. I feel alive and sensuous and sexy and a thousand other feelings when I wear Angel Muse. I even put a little on before I go to bed. I recommend Angel Muse to everyone! I haven't been this excited about a fragrance in 10 years.

I love this scent. I have been wearing Angel for about 3 years and decided to try Muse on a whim. It is distinctive with its spicy notes and offers warm undertones yet the result is soft and edgy. Wearing it makes me feel sexier than I am.

When Calvin Klein retired Sheer Obsession I was devastated. I have been searching for a replacement fragrance for years now. Nothing else measured up UNTIL I discovered Angel Muse! Thank you! (My husband thanks you as well!)
I thought I loved Angel but then I got Muse and I really love this scent. It's not overpowering. a subtle elegant fragrance.
This pefume make you feel and smell pretty. Lots of compliments on this fragrance.
It is the best smelling perfume I have ever had I like the absolute but this one is the best
I love love this scent! I have been a true blue Dolce Vita wearer for years....then I got my hands on the muggler collection...I love them all!
Grat new scent! Love it! Nicely light for summer!!

I have been a fan of Angel limited edition for quite some time. i became a mugler addict to try some different scents. some i did not like so much. Angel muse is a very likeable scent . move over Angel limited edition. and i do have to to say limited edition because angel and angel limited edition are two completely different scents.
I absolutely love Muse, it's a great summer fragrance. Please make a body lotion

I have been a fan of Angel for more than fifteen years. In fact, it has been my signature fragrance. The sample of Muse came with a recent Angel order and I was mesmerized. It has the same notes reminiscent of Angel but a bit sweeter and lighter. It is a beautiful fragrance!
Absolutely wonderful ! I wear it everyday and have received more compliments than I ever have on any other I have worn! Love, love, love it!!
Smells heavenly. Doesn't smell like Angel which is a nice feature, more like La Vie Est Belle de Lancôme. Flowery, sweet, a touch of musk/spice.

It's not awful but this is a very, VERY sweet parfum. Sweet like heavy coco/hazelnut accords, rather then a vanilla and spun sugar accords. Almost overwhelming. It could have benefited from some dirty/musky notes to tone down the incessant sweetness.

I've worn Obsession for many years and it's my signature scent. I used a free sample of Angel Muse and received more compliments from men than I ever received wearing Obsession. Guess Angel Muse is now my signature scent.

I have had more compliments on Angel Muse, and I love it myself. Along with my first order, I received 5 samples. I've tried them all, and I wear well. I am so happy with this company, to have so many perfumes, samples included, each having it's own unique fragrance. I even feel better about me! Thank You
This scent is great. I love all things Angel and this fits, just right. I wear it just about everywhere I go.
This fragrance makes me feel so beautiful. It is light and rich. It smells divine.

Ingredients:
-One woman 
-A source of inspiration
-Appreciation of Greek and Roman mythology
-A "sister-in-kind" of the nine Goddesses, the daughters of Zeus and Mnemosyne, who preside over the arts and sciences
-Muse perfume

Mix together your worldly experiences with the nature, feelings, and characteristics attributed to a woman. 

Waft Muse perfume lightly like a gentle breeze over your body and enjoy the inspiration, creative influence, and the beauty of all that is you. 

Relax, feel divine, and wait for the compliments.

I bought this as a gift for my wife. She (and I) are great Angel fans. And so I was concerned how this would compare. Well, it is a very different fragrance. But it has all of the qualities (emotional impact) of Angel. We are now both fans of Angel and Muse. She now wears Muse during the day and Angel when dressing for night. Either way, I'm a happy guy.

I received a sample in the mail & LOVED it! Ordered online so I received all my samples of other fragrances available.
I have received lots of compliments on the scent!
Muse is my new A gel favorite! I and others love me in it! I think it is the vetiver that makes it so unique! My entire frangran e is from the Mugler universe...out of this world!!

I have used the "Angel" fragrance for years and have never found any scent I liked any better than this tried and true perfume. Recently I received a sample of the Muse fragrance with my last order, thinking I'm sure it will have a pleasant scent, but there is no way that it could come close to my favorite "Angel". Well I have to say, I'm not sure which one I like better, Muse or Angel. What a great problem to have, which just goes to show you, it's a good thing to be open minded. Kudos to Thierry Mugler team, this is a home run!

I have been wearing Angel for over 20 years now...I first got the scent on a woman and asked her what it was...She said it was Angel by Thierry Mugler...It took me awhile back then to find it...I did at Lord & Taylor in NY...and since then I get compliments galore from men and women...Then I got a sample of Angel MUSE and my husband and I fell in love with it. So I ordered a bottle on your website and have been wearing it since...ITs WONDERFUL...a lighter version of angel I think...Not crazy about the bottle cause it lays flat on the table...would prefer it to stand up but who cares...its heavenly...LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! Now if you can make the spray oil version of it...I am in!! Try it you will love it!!

I think this is my favorite fragrance to date :)
There is just something about it. 
My only complaint would be that it doesn't seem to stay as long as some of the others.

Try it...I bet you'll love it!

Angel Muse is quickly becoming my new favorite! Not overwhelming...just a smooth breath of fresh air!

Long lasting fragrance!

Muse = Love
I love the fragrance of this new Angel Muse, but find the fragrance doesn't last long as the original Angel does.
I love Muse so much! It smells amazing and I get so many compliments on it. This is my first Mugler perfume and I love it! I can't wait for them to come out with the body lotion and shower gel!
The scent is so wonderful but I wish it was a bit stronger. I have to put a lot on to smell it myself. The sample that came in the mail was stronger. Either way it is a great perfume.

Amazing scent! I wish it came in a body cream.
I used to wear Angel then graduated to Alien but decided to try this and now it's my go to for the summer! It's more unisex smelling.
I love, love the new perfum Muse! It smell wonderful! I highly reccomend it!
Muse smells absolutely divine and the diffuser bottle is beautiful! Have worn Angel for years but love this equally as much!

I personally do not like the new Muse perfume. The smell does not remind me of a product from Mugler. I brought this item without every smeling it because I knew it would be a hit because of the name attached to it. Very disappointed.
A very strong compliment to Angel. My husband likes it almost as much as Angel. I love it. Can't wait for the body lotion to be available

I have been wearing Angel since it debuted and always try anything new. I adore this new version perfect for summer. Also this is the first time I ordered right from the Mugler website and it was great.
I have been wearing Angle for 9 years and was extremely pleased with the new "Angel Muse" scent! While it is still light it is a bit bolder. I would certainly recommend this product!

I got a card in the mail advertising this new scent. It said I would lose my mind...I did! As soon as it was physically possible to do so I placed my order. If you love Angel you will LOVE Angel Muse. I can't believe anything could smell so good! I just love it! It is utterly delicious!
Decided to try this version, and VERY glad I did! Angel Muse may now become my muse as well! Will definitely be buying more of this!

Had to send back. Fragrance left as fast as I could spray it. I've worn angel for years and will just stick with that! Also, a little too heavy on the vanilla, maybe it's the hazelnut cream? I would not recommend.
Light fragrance and delicate scent. Wears very well. Not over powering, but a lovely waft of femininity. I liked it. My 5 star fragrance will always be the original Angel.
I love this new scent, Muse. I have several different Angel scents and this is now #2. When I put this on, it makes me feel so sexy and daring. And so very feminine.
I am so in love with Angel Muse. I received a scent check in my magazine and I ran out and bought the scent the next day. Love the power and the sexiness of these scents.

Angel has been my Mom's signature scent since the fragrance came out, and I have always absolutely loved it! However, as much as I love it on her, for some reason it doesn't work with my body chemistry - plus at 36, I am always craving something nouveau. 

Enter: Angel Muse. This is the answer I've been waiting for! Thank you Thierry Mugler for releasing a wonderful hybrid of your original Angel with a twist. Much appreciated - and please don't ever discontinue! xo

I remember purchasing Angel when first come out in a little shop in Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy. I'll never forget looking at the mountains while smelling it for the first time...
Angel is like no other! One of the best, unique fragrances ever created. One of the two all time favorite perfumes of mine. Timeless!
The new Muse is warmer, sexier, seductive. I fell in love with Angel all over again!

THANK YOU THIERRY FOR CREATING NEW MEMORIES!

column6: Fellow Angel wearer loving this new fragrance!
column7: I've been wearing Angel about 20 years and have never thought of wearing anything different. I tried a sample of Muse recently and fell in love with the contrasting yet complementary fragrance. LOVE it!

I have been a faithful Angel wearer for decades. Recently I went to Macy's to refill my star and got to sample Muse for the first time before it came out. I fell head over nose! To me this scent is sensual and earthy. I purchased it from here as soon as it was available. Do yourself a favor and try Muse!

My only con is there is no stand for the Muse bottle. It's so pretty and should be displayed like my Angel star! Hopefully that will happen in the very near future.
Thierry can do no wrong, as it relates to fragrances! Everything I have tried is very alluring.
If you are an Angel user, the new scent is great for summer with its lighter notes. Love this!

this is awesome. it smells so good from the get go. don't need to let it calm down.and it lasts! 
would highly recommend. 
the blend of notes is perfect. not too much of any one fragrance.

As another reviewer stated Angel has been my signature scent since I bought it in Paris in 1994. I wear it a lot and always get compliments. I tried Muse and really liked it. Now there will be two favorite fragrances on my shelf.
Great product. Great fragrance love it. I will buy it again. Is now one of my favorites. Great buy.

I have worn Angel for as long as I can remember and as everyone who knows me it's my "signature scent". I love Angel Innocent as well and continue to wear that but I've never been a fan of Alien. I was so excited to try the new Angel Muse but I was disappointed that it smells more like Alien than I would like. I have been wearing a bit of Muse with my go to regular Angel but not sure what to think. 
I know one thing for sure and that's I'll never stop wearing the original Angel!
Just when you thought Angel couldn't get any better, it does. Angel Muse is a such a beautiful interpretation and most definitely full bottle worthy (which is on it's way)!
customer service was not good help order over night shipping but got in 5 days
This is gorgeously gourmand!!!I absolutely adore it! Patchouli,sweet,creamy,vetiver,just sublime!!!! Addictive!
I love the perfume is very very good delicious an additive fragrance
Love the new product. Need and an attractive stand for proper display.
column28: Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, CA, USA

column7:
I love Angel and it always be in my heart , but this one come so close to still that place I can really smell the patchouli as well as the hazelnut cream it really bring so any memories from my early days it really stamps the person that I really I'm .
Thank you so very much , Mr. Mugler for creating this perfume and using such of good quality ingredients.

The combination of the oils used in this combination are simply genius.
As I am a "nose" I can "taste the smells" 
I have Synaethesia, which can literally take over when I smell a fragrance. 
A must buy for those who love to feel powerful, sexy but also confident.
Todas las fragancias Thierry Mugler son excelentes!!

column5: ANGEL MUSE Eau de Parfum Gift Set
column7: I liked the scent but not as strong as my Angel, so I probably won't buy again. Gonna stick to my favorite, Angel

column5: Angel Muse Eau de Parfum Gift Set
column7: Delighted with my gift set. It was my Mother's Day gift to me! Of the fragrances I wear, I receive the most compliments when I wear Angel Muse.
Oh what a lovely smell this Angle Muse is. I renamed it Romusing, because it's romantic aroma is so amusing.

column6: Muse eau de toilette does not disappoint!
column7: This fragrance is beautiful as are all things Mugler. So feminine and long lasting. A wonderful scent to complement the original. Now, how about some body products, Monsieur Mugler?
The addition of vetiver makes this classic Angel upgrade a winner

column6: Great to take on the go!
column7: The fragrance is amazing, and nice to have purse size when on the go! For a long day, great to have a perfume touch up. in smaller size.....wonderful product!
I love Mugler s perfumes. And I am especially happy with the travel size Angel Muse. It makes a delicious, airy, sparkly cloud around you. The bottle is the right size for my purse.
This is a gorgeous perfume! If you are a gourmand lover this is for you. The nutella notes are delicious !
Same great Angel Muse scent, of course, in a wonderful little bottle. Perfect size, a unique shape, and it is refillable!
Another wonderful fragrance from MUGLER.  I love Angel and find this one just as addicting.  I also love the Eau to Go design refillable spray.  Perfect size for purse or travel.
The best sent ever created for woman like me, I have so many people say how wonderful I smell, they love the sent too. Thank you
I am quite pleased with my purchase of Muse. I had to have it. It is such an exciting 5 star addition to the best perfume portfolio in the UNIVERSE. Thank you TM!!!!
missing gift bag and very special personalized note that was supposed to be included.. very disappointed

column6: This A New Scent For Me
column7: I have been an Angel fan for many years and was intrigued by the reviews on Muse. It is a beautiful and lasting scent that will definitely become a favorite. I am already getting many compliments while wearing it. I wish it came with a stand for it like Angel Star but that is a small issue. It is in a beautiful bottle and came with a smaller version to carry in my purse. I am very pleased with this purchase and the ordering and delivery went smoothly.

column6: Warm and Succulent Feeling for the Holidays!
column7:
The Muse is especially yummy now it's late fall early winter. The scent hits the air and intoxicates passer bys. I get stopped all the time and I have only sprayed my pulse point at my neck or one small circle of fragrance.
It just smells yummy. Less is needed in the winter. I loved the miniature in the set as I had given my previous miniature away to someone who loved the Angel Sucree on me. I wish there were body products too. So in love with Muse and the feeling of smelling strawberries . The gift set is a great value.
Dillard’s in my area does not sell the refill so glad I found it on the website.

This was my first purchase of a refill, as I usually refill my bottle at the store. I was pleased with how easy it was to refill. I use both Angel and Angel Muse and love both scents. I often get compliments on the scent

I purchased Violet and Lily many years ago. (I just finished the last of Violet)
Angel is too strong for me, and Alien doesn’t cut it. At Ulta with my oldest daughter, looking for a new scent. Tried the tester of Muse and after my usual 15 minute wait to see if it would change with my body chemistry, I was thrilled! Finally a new Mugler for me! Handed the tester to my daughter to try and she promptly dropped it on the floor, shattering it to bits!
The great part of the fiasco was....the entire store smelled heavenly. Our sneakers will never be the same. Bought the large size. I hope I will have advance warning if you discontinue this perfume. That’s why I had so many bottles of Violet and Lily to last me ten plus years. (And they never lost their scent). Thank you.

column6: Love it but the funnel needs to work better
column7: I love that this saves me some money but I felt more of the product got in my sink and on my hands than in the bottle. The funnel is way too small and doesn't allow the product to dispense evenly into the bottle. Still a great idea, you just might want to figure out a different way to get the perfume into the bottle.
Not a match for womanity. I needed an alternative for womanity but clearly not a match however it is a good note.

This is such a yummy fragrance! Playful and flirty. I usually wear Alien. I love the variety of subtle note changes that make each version in this line noticeably different but yet recognizable as part of the Alien fragrance collection. Whenever I need a pick-me-up, Angel Muse is my go-to fragrance. I wish there was a body wash, lotion, cream, or a mist oil to make a complete collection for fragrance layering. Oh please Mugler R&D! It has been an entire year since this fragrance was introduced and it is obviously a hit!

column6: Love Angel Muse But you need biggerrefills
column7:
Love Angel Muse. You need bigger refills like 3.7 ounces. It's the only perfume I where. Many people want to no what it is. So I sell it for you by word of mouth. Do us a favor and make bigger refills. You could also send me a free refill for the 5 stars and all I sell for you. I'm LOL because i know you won't.
11240 SE Sunnyside Rd
Clackamas Or 97015 APT C 10
Thank You.

Love this scent. However, your discription here on your website does not state the SIZE of the refill. Really? 

It seems these bottles of perfume are too small and I can't wear them all the time because of cost.
I love this scent, I have received so many wonderful compliments on this scent. Please come up with a larger more economic refill please and thank you
This scent is fantastic! Soft yet lasts all day. I think this is a unisex scent as it is almost a bit more Fruity than Angel and a bit softer. I get so many compliments on this scent
Mugler needs to offer a larger ounce refill-for more significant savings. Larger size is available for Angel.
As always Thiery Mugler delivers another great one! I like this even better than Angel!
Nice scent. Handy. I would rather offer the bottle but this eco-refiull recharge is definitely a good idea.
Not fond of the fragrance. I tried it on two different occasions and I don't care for it. Very strong!

As an Angel addict, I fell in love with this version. Received plenty of compliments on the originall, but Angel Muse has become more of my signature favorite. It absolutely intoxicates the men who ask what delicious scent I’m wearing-or just a simple “you smell awesome.” Since test driving Angel Muse, it has taken the front seat to my other fragrances. And now I can take it everywhere-my perfect refillable pebble.

I bought this product while in France. Introduced it to my my wife, and now she can’t live without it. Before it is empty I will get a notice from her. Thank you for making my wife smell fantastic everyday.

I’ve worn Angel for over a decade. This is my signature perfume. I receive compliments from both men and women. Over the years, I have collected various stars and bottles. However, this one is exquisite!!! If you love Angle and are looking for something extra special this one is for you. Enjoy!

Bright, Bold, Brilliant!

A wonderful splash of glitz to my collection!
This perfume was gifted to me and I love it. I am very picky.
Love it! The smaller star that refills is excellent when I take trips. The smaller tubes are great for packing too. Worth the price!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7:
Please, Please, send me one of these.
Never available, I would like the first one off production, I have been trying to order this item for years.
I've tried ordering for well over 5 years, it is never available, I've called, put myself on the mailing list (wishlist) never have heard a thing, yet you always have it on your sight. What's up?

Starting to say that I am an Angel Addict, my sister gave me this bag parfum to bring always with me...it contains also a refill flacon *_* I will use it to refill my star XD i love angel! and now i can bring it with me always....everywere....Tnx mr. Mugler to have gifted women all over the world with this strabiliant parfum!

I purchased this purse spray because although I like the size of the small glass ones at Sephora, they are a bit too fragile for me. This one is great for travel; I don't have to worry about it leaking like my star tends to, no worry about breaking, the case is sturdy, and the cap isn't likely to fall off because of its magnetized closure which isn't mentioned in the description. I love this travel spray!
This is a wonderful travel atomizer with the magnetic top..won't fall off in your purse or get lost..only down side to this product is that it is a little heavier than I would like

I've been wearing "Angel" for 20 years now...have not and will never change...my entire family knows this is my signature...my house, my car and me..I leave a trail of this magnificent fragrance...from hair to body, now NAILS...so my Nephew got married last December in New Orleans around Christmas, and we always like to do a little token gift for the ladies and I was visiting also, so the Party Favors were perfect...and now you have 5 new ANGEL CUSTOMERS...they all love it and I decided to share...even my 5 year old niece got in her Moms car after me and said...Hey is Aunt Linda here...there goes my trail of ANGEL...but please sell the nail polish ...I want to get it for my girls...
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her

column7: My guests were thrilled with the party favor each one had placed on their place setting for Thanksgiving Dinner. Everyone was so surprised and loved the scent of Angel. I am such a die hard fan I wanted everyone to experience how beautiful it smells and have them get acquainted with it! I loved the surprised look on their faces and of course the beautiful scent of Angel in my dining room. What a great idea...Thank you....
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her

column7: Cute gift at the right price, will be giving to my sisters for Christmas! Wish there was a Men's version you can't beat 20.00 each!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her

column7: These came beautifully packaged and were a perfect gift!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her

column7: These are really CUTE! The little pouch is pretty sturdy - bigger than I thought. The only thing that I would change is add a little paper inside so it is like opening two little presents. The items move around a little too much for my liking so I used white tissue. :-) My girlfriends loved them - they always say I smell great so I gave them as a going away present at my 50th birthday party!
column20: Fragrance > Gifts & Sets > Gift Sets for Her

column7: I have this item, and I receive it from one of the exclusive parties I and a friend attended. This Item is truly exquisite. I do recommend it for an elegant party affair. It would be just the icing on the cake.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Sets

column7: I purchased this for my wife as she has loved Angel from the first time I got it for her. Its a warmer smell then just Angel and definitely has hotter and sexier notes to it.
I Am So Happy With My Purchase!!! The Red Bottle Is Beautiful!!! The Engraving Is Perfect!! The Shipping Was Fast!!! Will Definitely Be Ordering Again!!!!

Wow! I’ve been wearing Angel (the Blue Star) for 20 years. The Body lotion, body wash, deodorant, hair mist, body cream and of course the perfume. One can not go wrong with Thierry Mugler scents. 
Angel Passion is fabulous. In my opinion, it seems to be a cross between the Aura Mugler & Angel. No matter, it’s a very sexy scent. Thierry Mugler has done it again. Thanks ♥️
I love Angel Passion!  It is Angel with tropical fruit and a bit of Bergamot. The fruit refreshes and evens out the sweet gourmand. It's a different angel! --lavrose.

I purchased the red bottle for my sister and got her name engraved on it. She was so happy and excited! It's her favorite perfume. I ended up ordering another bottle for myself. The very first day I wore it, one of my co-workers wanted to know what it was that smelled so Good!

I love this gorgeous Red Bottle it is so beautiful fits in my stand perfectly . I wish I had had engraved now. I will order direct from now on I had my package within a week with all the great samples perfect!
I absolutely love ❤️ my Angel and the engraving is wonderful.
I love the bold red bottle and having it engraved made it even better.
Love the perfume , but I didn't get my free gift.. My husband had placed in the order information but I didn't get it..
I bought it last year in Istanbul. although almost the same as the blue star reminds me of something else. something deep and beautiful that I brought home from this trip.
I love this perfume its my all time favorite from the collection yet..Pity you can only buy it in the USA! Hope soon will be available in UK. Smells so good i could bathe in it! :)

I gave myself Angel Passion Star for Christmas and I love it. I also received one as a gift! 
Just Lovely..... New Year more ANGEL!!!

As with ALL Mugler products ,this last purchase was no surprise.The Angel Passion Star is one of my favorites. I feel sexy when I wear it and the scent is no different.A gift from my husband made it even more special.The red bottle and inscription really added to it's esquisiteness.

column6: I've been an ANGEL for a year now!
column7: I have always loved this fragrance on other women for over 8 years. When they would let me try it on, it didn't smell as great on me as it did on them. One day I said, "The heck with it, I'm buying ANGEL because I love the scent! " And boy if it hasn't created it's own special fragrance on me! My daughter, who lives in Boston, exclaims " Mom, you smell like my Mom. I love the scent. It's so you!" So this is my second bottle that I've purchased. I'm hooked on ANGEL forever! Thanks Thierry Mugler.
Got this for the unique red color. Love the perfume scent
As soon as I saw the red bottle with the Angel perfume, I knew I had to have it. I have not been disappointed. Thanks for making a dedicated customer happy.

column6: I am a Angel for life!
column7: I have been wearing Angel for almost 20 years. It is my signature scent. Whoever knows me,they know me by name,face and scent. It is a pleasure to order online with Mugler USA. I am able to order Angel without going into the department stores. Also the stores do not usually have all the Thierry Mugler scents to try out before you buy it. So it is definitely a plus to receive free testers to see how they smell to see if I like it or not.

Since I first wore it years ago. it is the only scent I wear. I love it. I wear the original Angel. Men (strangers) stop me and say "you smell so good". It is unbelievable. I just smile and say "thank you".

I have worn Angel since finding it at Epcot more than 8 years ago. It has become my signature fragrance. When I wear Angel my husband always tells me how good I smell. I have had women in the stores ask what I'm wearing, so of course I tell them Angel.

I first was introduced to Angel perfume in 1996 in Europe before it reached US market. In my opinion, no perfume gets even close to this one. The chemical formula of Angel blends with your own chemistry and creates very unique scent every single time you wear it. One thing - its love it/hate it perfume. If you love it - you will buy it time after time.

I have been a loyal Angel customer for over 10 years and thought buying direct would be the best way to go.However the packaging was embarising and not up to the level that I would expect from Angel or better yet from Thierry Mugler.Please look at what you are doing for on line sales it was very disappointing.
Thank you

Looks really pretty for the holidays and the engraving is nice.
A good buy to put on display
I HAVE BEEN WEARING THIS LOVELY PERFUME SINCE IT FIRTST CAME OUT AND WAS SO GLAD I HAD A NEW ONE BOUGHT FOR ME FOR CHRISTMAS AS I WAS NEARLY OUT OF THE ONE I AM IAM USEING NOW.
I use angel for years I love it.....I hope Santa brings me a new bottle or the body lotion because I m running out soon......

I've worn Angel exclusively for years.......I love to layer the fragrance, body cream and the shimmering powder for the ultimate Angel experience. I had to have the gorgeous passion star for my collection. It is magnificent!

This Angel presents so many delightful fragrances. It starts out like fruit and wood. Then it quickly morphs into a buttery chocolate scent. It then finishes with a soft sweet powdery scent. I love all my Stars from the Sucree to the essence of Angel. I am a big time migraine suffer and none of these ever sets it off. Plus every time I wear Angel, someone says you smell so good! Or that is Angel!

As a long time Angel fan, I enjoy being able to try a different take on the original Angel. Angel Passion Star does this! It is another level of Angel. It has all the sent of Angel, but is a quieter, but somewhat woodier smell, than the original. That means I can spritz a bit at work, without upsetting peoples allergies!!! And I like that! Because, sometimes, you just need to spritz!

I am addicted to anything Angel I absolutely Love (yes capitol L ) this
Eau de parfum and the red bottle is a nice addition, I do however wish the glass bottle was a little clearer like the original shooting star, it is pretty enough, and it is filled with the most beautiful fragrance. I love all of my Stars.

Huntress Angel
I'm disappointed to find out its the same Angel in a different bottled marketed as something new. A supply & demand trick. Give us a brand new scent. Customer service is now a downward trend.
I have been using Angel Body Cream for many years. It makes my skin nice and smooth and the fragrance is wonderful.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Love love this body cream! It’s the only thing I use. Get compliments all the time!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This is my second jar of Angel Perfuming Body Cream and how I love it!  Because I am on a limited income I only use it once or twice a week and consider it one of my favorite luxuries..the fragrance is like all other items in the Angel line - delightful - and the jar is gorgeous...wish it could be engraved!

column7: use before applying Angel perfume....Holds the scent longer
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: The angel perfume that body cream is my signature cream. I don’t wear any other body cream or perfume. Everyone knows that Angel is my signature fragrance. I don’t wear anything else.

column7: This is my third purchase of this particular product item. It's absolutely the best body cream...no comparisons except Alien body cream. I am a loyal customer
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Beautiful fragrance to use alone or layer. I usually purchase the lotion but wanted to try the cream. Both are excellent!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This is my signature scent. At least once a day for the past 10 years, someone tells me " You smell so good! What is that you're wearing?" LOVE Angel
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: Silky, creamy, hydrating, luxurious and lasting!!!
column7: I have been wearing Angel edP since 1994 and 1-2 sprays of the Parfum would last all day.  Over the years (and several re-formulations) Angel no longer lasts on my skin or clothes like is used to (but it still smells amazing).  But...this perfumed body cream LASTS all day on my skin and even my clothes smell like Angel of yesteryear the next day!  I LOVE this cream!  While it is expensive....it is so hydrating, creamy and a little goes a very long way. The jar is beautiful and can be used afterwards for jewelry or trinkets!  I really hope Mugler does not decide to tweak or "improve" this cream!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: The luxurious texture of this body cream is divine
column7:
This body cream is perfect for layering under Angel Perfume. The scent lasts all day, and I always have strangers saying they love my perfume! 
When these gorgeous star jars are empty, 
I use them for storing trinkets! One on the dresser, one on the vanity- just too lovely to discard.
 If you love Angel Perfume, you will adore Angel Perfuming Body Cream!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I always purchase Angel Perfuming Body Cream...It's my favorite go to.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I’ve been using this for a decade and in the winter it really keeps my skin hydrated and smelling great. I always use the perfume after applying the body cream.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: A third of a beautiful trio!
column7: I purchased the Angel eau de toilette and loved it! Then, I received a small perfume as a purchasing gift. It, too, is lovely! And now, the Angel Perfuming Body Creme adds another layer to make it luscious. I’m no expert but it seems that there are subtle differences in each (toilette, perfume and body creme) when layered together turns a good scent to better and a better scent to the best! Thanks for making this amazing fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This is the best body Creme ever. I literally always have two of them. One I’m using, and one in my room ready Incase I run out. It’s that great! i always get so many compliments on it and the texture is so hydrating and nice. This with the hair mist and I’m set for the day with the beautiful Angel fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: My husband bought me this body cream for Christmas. Now, I cannot see myself ever being without it. It's a bit pricey, but it's certainly worth every penny. The product goes on smoothly and immediately dissolves into the skin. I love the way its magnificent scent lingers all day. My clothes even smell like the cream. I highly recommend this product.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: First time buying a mugler product and this has been my favorite lotion/perfume to use! It's fun to use, stays on/smells until the next day and smells soo refreshing! It is rich and great in value! Highly recommend. Oh and the case for this lotion is so beautiful! Something worth having on your dresser. I also get a lot of compliments on the fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This product is exactly as described. Rich, creamy and it does have the fragrance of Angel perfume. And the container is beautiful. It's huge. When I was taking it out of the box I thought what the what is this but I was glad to get a pretty decent amount of cream for what it cost, oh and I will definitely be recycling this jar I don't know what I'll put in it but its to pretty to throw away. Is this a repurchase for me? Eh, as intoxicating as the scent is I can live without it but If there's a sale going on that's to good to pass up I'll indulge. I love fragrances period but my loyalty is to me and I enjoy spending my hard earned money on what I enjoy and I can't see every time I want to treat myself me spending on this one product. So when all my Angel products are gone I will be able to say I've had that. This stuff is to pricey for me to get hung on they don't need my money. So for me on to the next scent I don't want to live in Thierry Mugler's world I'm on my own journey. Peace.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I love the product itself. It’s a great body cream with a beautiful bottle . I tried to contact customer service over an issue, i called , emailed and still no response. Very disappointing
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Angel perfuming body cream is my all time favorite. I always get compliments when I use it almost on a daily basis. The container is attractive and I keep it on my vanity.

column7: I really enjoy the body cream it can be a great light wear by itself, or you can layer it with the perfume for a medium to heavy essence.

column6: Love this- need a refill for this gorgeous jar
column7: I have been using Angel for about 20 years. I received this gorgeous jar of cream last year. I just used the last drop as a little goes a long way. I wish they sold a refill for it like they do for the star perfume jars. I will hold on to it for a while in case I find one.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have been using Angel since it was rolled out in the 80's. I remember the first time I saw the display at Saks. I use the cream daily for my neck and chest area. I have no lines and it keeps my neck soft and silky. I love this product! Shipping was amazingly fast.

column7: I just recently discovered Angel. It is my No. 1 fragrance now. Love the body cream. It lasts all day on me.

column7:
About three or four years ago, after asking a friend what kind of fragrance she was wearing, I decided to go on line and order the same. I'm so pleased with it and will continue using Angel as long as you have it available. I now need a refill for my Parfum Crème so am here to order
another jar.

The body cream is one of the best, if not THE BEST fragrance ever!!! Everyone goes NUTS over it. Strangers ask me what fragrance I'm wearing. I could go on and on..... The body lotion doesn't smell good on me at all. The CREAM is it!!!

column6: This body cream is the best investment I have ever
column7: Pair the shower gel with the body cream scrub and your skin will look and feel fabulous. And the wonderful scent stays all day and night. Why not treat the largest organ of your body with a little indulgence

column7: When Angel first came out my daughter gave me the Perfuming Body Cream and I became hooked. I LOVE this product.J

column7: It's my signature fragrance... I've been wearing Angel for 25+ years. The body cream goes on smooth... you are surrounded by this intoxicating aroma. I like to bathe in the gel, then moisturize with cream... spritz with the oil... after that I spray the parfum in the air then walk into it. I'm in heaven just like an Angel.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Have used his products for years. Anytime anyone says someone really smells good I raise my hand. I have more complements on Angel and love it as it has great staying power on me. I am 86 now. I just wish it was not so expensive as i just lost my husband and now on a fixed income and Angel is now a luxury I can no longer afford. Bummer, I am 86 so i will only use it for some big times when I am out and about.

column7: The body creamis delciious and one of my absolute favorites!!!! However, the bottle is cheaply made, with the tin foil already peeling. The cheap plastic rings also add nothing to the ultimate 'luxurious' experience. Disappointing packaging.

column7: I have used this product for 10 years and constantly get a very good comment on my fragrance. It is described as pleasant and clean. I love it and use it every day. This is my scent "Georgia"

column7: This is a very strong lotion but I love it... the angel smell is strong enough that even after you put your clothes on you can still smell it! I get stopped and told that they love my perfume and it's just my lotion!!!!! It's a amazing lotion, that leaves my skin feeling like silk! This a incredible value for my money i just love how beautiful the container is, it's so perfectly made. Thank you it's my favorite!

column7:

I love it and will NEVER be without !

column7: I am a Angel girl. I use the body cream every day and it last all day, while making my skin feel silky smooth, as well and smelling like the angel that I am. Angel is my signature fragrance.

column7: Highly recommend this body cream. It's luxorious and quick absorbing texture are just a small reason why I love this cream. column7: This is the best very moisturing and the scent is wonderful. Angel is my favorite. I've been wearing for the past 20 years.

column7: I have been using this product for many years and it never fails to impress me how many compliments I get on the scent. It is easy to apply - usually after a shower when my skin is still moist - and it does not take much so it lasts a long time. I am delighted with the body cream!

column7: Long lasting on my skin, it feels soft. and every time I use this product ,friends say to me: "I can tell you are around "
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Angel is my go-to fragrance but I love the Angel Perfuming Body Cream best. A little goes a long way and my first purchase lasted a little over a year. It is long-lasting on the skin and I get compliments all the time. It goes on smoothly and is a lighter scent than the perfume. It lasts all day so I don't have to keep reapplying. I can only say great things about this product. I recently purchased my second body cream and can't wait to purchase the body powder to supplement the fragrance. I have it on my wish list and hope that it is available online by my birthday. By the way, the glass jar that the body cream comes in is a beautiful work of art that I plan to reuse on my display shelf at home.

column7: Love this body cream. Layered with Angel Sucree...I get stopped by strangers asking what parfume I am wearing.

column7: I enjoy layering the scent. The crème is so luxurious and heavily scented. It’s wonderful after an evening shower and then my sheets smell delicious.

column7: From the moment you glide you hand over your body with Angel Cream, you immediately notice the difference, the aroma surrounds you like a cloud and the cream soothes and refreshes your body. It is one of the most delightful experiences in my life. Thank you for this product. I sometimes think you make it just for me!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Angel is my most favorite scent. The perfume, lotion, and body wash are all fantastic!! The lotion makes my skin feel smooth and soft; the fragrance lasts all day.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have used this product before, and love the feel and fragrance.  Perfect complement to the perfume...And it lasts a long time.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body
Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have been using this for years and am so in love with the fragrance. My aunt smelled it and I ordered it for her and she loves it. I always get compliments everywhere I go, its fragrance is not overpowering and lasts all day. I even smell it in my clothes when I do laundry. Love the new bottle!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Hi thought it would have a stronger fragrance of the angel..
