column7: I constantly get compliments on the Angel scent!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I’ve been using Angel for many years, I just received my order of the body lotion.  The new bottle it’s packaged in is awful. It is flimsy at best and I’m sure the flap to close it will break off long before the lotion is done.  The lotion itself is much more watery.  This is the first time I’ve ever been disappointed with my purchase.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: The Angel smell does not stay
column7:
I been buying this Angel lotion for years and this one does not keep the aroma. I am not satisfied with this batch. I would always get compliments, and no one smell it on me. I see the bottle has changed too. What can be done about the smell...or no smell...
Not happy.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I love,love, love this lotion. I layer it with my spray perfume.  Yummy!

I have been wearing this fragrance for over 10yrs.  It's by far the best fragrance I've worn.  You only need a little and it smells great all day.  Always asked what I'm wearing.  Love Angel Perfuming Body Lotion
As always. Wonderful. Great scent that lasts all day.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have a guy friend that says what are u wearing my pheromones are so attracted to you. So sexy.... what more can I say!,,,,
ENJOYING YOUR PRODUCT. LOVE IT.USE IT EVERY DAY.tHANK YOU FOR A GREAT PRODUCT.

I have been wearing Angel for years. The body lotion is enough for day/work. I add a little perfume for evenings out or special occasions. Always get a fabulous compliment or there’s sometimes someone who can identify it. I will occasionally wear Muse over my Angel lotion as well. Wish there was a Muse body lotion!!!
I bought this for my daughter and she loved it. However, given the price, I don't know whether I'll keep buying them once a month.
Chrome was okay enough. It could still be better though.

This is such an amazing scent. I am in love! It compares to nothing else. I’m a new customer of this scent and I’ll be one for life! There are many scents that I can’t wear anymore as they bother me or just don’t smell right to me. Angel is perfect!

I have been using Angel perfuming body lotion since the early 90’s and my grandchildren have associated this scent wit me. Tried other body lotions before but always came back to Angel. Just love it and it cooperates with my body chemistry so nicely!

column6: THE BEST LOTION YOU WILL EVER BUY!
column7: I RECOMMEND EVERYBODY TO TRY ANGEL SCENTED LOTION. I GET SO MANY COMPLIMENTS EVERY TIME I USE THIS.
Angel is my scent. The lotion is perfect for summer months and beach vacations.

Love my Angel, been wearing it forever.
However this past order I didn’t receive any of my Angel samples, which I love to get for anyone who walks by and stops me to ask what I’m wearing, I will give them one.

Could you please send me some?
Thank You
Tammie

This is a fragrance that I've received more compliments on no matter what season and from men and women equally. I prefer the lotion as a scent because it lasts longer throughout the day and it's easy to remember. Buying directly from Mugler's site is rewarding as the company sends so many little thank you presents that make one feel appreciated and special.
Every time I wear this lotion, someone says “oh you smell so good “ great for layering with all the other angel products.
Since I buyed this Angel body lotion, I love it, I always get compliments:)

I love Angel. In the summer I use the lotion and in the winter I use the cream.
Love the scent
Love everything Thierry Mulger.
I am greatly pleased with my lotion and I will continue on buying it. You can't go wrong by purchasing it. I extremely recommend it to all ladies to give it a try.
I really love this lotion it leaves my skin smelling so clean and refreshed I would certainly recommend this lotion to family & friends

I have used the fragrant body cream but wanted the convenience of a pump bottle. The Angel body lotion is heavenly. At night, before bed, I apply the lotion to my forearms and drift off to sleep with the wonderful scent of Angel, my most complimented fragrance. I just love that feeling.
This lotion smells so good and at the same time hydrating. I would recommend it to everyone that uses Angel perfume, because it is an amazing combination.
Awesome body lotion!!!!! I have been using Angel for 20 years!!!! Nothing has compared to it for me!!!!!! Love Angel!!!!!! Thanks, Sonja
I love this lotion. Makes my skin soft and enhances the scent from the Angel perfume.
The lotion is not thick but it does what its suppose to. It moisturizes and it extends the scent throughout the day. I love it and its genuine heavenly Angel scent.

column6: The Angel scent of body lotion.
column7: This lotion leaves your skin silky smooth with the intoxicating scent of Angel. What more could anyone ask for!
I only wear Thierry Mugler products so I'm extremely happy when they have a sale. I put this on in the morning and still receive compliments late into the evening.

In the late 90's, I was introduced to Angel. I am ultra sensitive to smells, often ending up with Migraines from any fragrances. The shop owner of "Perfumania" sprayed Angel on a tester, that I continued to smell for a number of hours. I loved the smell, and no reaction to it, sold me on Angel. It has become my "signature" scent. I have tried other perfumes, only to end up with a headache, and my Grandchildren telling me I smell "funny"! Angel is such a distinctive scent, that even my Grandchildren recognize it! I will wear this perfume until the day I literally die!

I've been wearing Angel since it was introduced in Canada in early 2000. I love the scent and how it makes me feel knowing someone is going to ask what I was wearing or you smell so good. I selfishly tell them it's the scent of a woman. Yvette

I have been using Angel lotion, as a perfume, for years. I put it on, as you would perfume, on my wrists and neck. A little goes a long way. It is an uparalleled scent that lasts all day and into the night. Used this way, a bottle lasts a long time and is worth the money. Personally, I believe to use this as an all over body lotion would be excessive. I have received many compliments from men and women.
I wore this to work without using any perfume. Everyone made comments on how well I smelled. I could hardly stand myself. Beautiful fragrance to this body lotion.

I found Angel over twenty years ago and it is my favorite! I wear the lotion with the perfume and I receive many comments, especially from men! Wearing the lotion helps the fragrance last longer. Merci for creating Angel!!

This is good and long lasting,but this perfume is not my favorite.
I wish there is reasonably priced perfumed body lotion in LES EXCEPTIONS - WOODISSIME
It's last on you for the entire day and still get you feeling fresh.
Love the smell of this and everyone complements me on it.

Everyday when I am out shopping or around other people someone always says you smell so good and sometimes following that statement, they will say whats the name of your perfume. I reluctantly tell them , because I don't want other people to smell as good as I do. lol

I love Angel scent. I have been using this scent for the last 5 years. I received this bottle from my husband and loved it but once you can no longer pump it out then it is impossible to to scoop them out although I can see plenty left in the bottle!
I cannot sign in to order the body lotion I am trying to buy the body lotion called ( angel )
Needs to be more moisturing. I love how just a small amount is needed to get the wonderful fragrance into your skin but more moisturizer would make it an exceptional product/body lotion.
I get asked what I am wearing everywhere I go, or they will ask if I an wearing Angel.
I use this lotion everyday , the only thing is the bottle is hard to get all the lotion out when it gets down to the last of it.
This is by far my most favorite fragrance. People stop me everywhere and ask what I am wearing or that I smell great.

In the heat of the moment or the cool of the night, this body lotion will emit a beautiful, sensual scent that will immediately connect with you personally.
Angel is a memory of the senses that people do not forget. It is my signature. Angel helps to define who I am.
The fragrance of this lotion is subtle and lasting. Absolutely the best!
Love ANGEL! It's the ONLY fragrance I'll EVER wear!
Angel body lotion makes your skin feel so soft and silky. Paired with the shower gel and perfume, you will feel heavenly all day!

column6: THIS BEGINS MY DAY, EVERY DAY!
column7: Angel perfuming body lotion lies at the heart of my daily routine. After I apply this luxurious lotion to my skin, I let it dry and layer with Angel powder and then Angel deodorant. I live in Florida, but for skins sake, prefer not to get too much sun. But if I want to add some color, I add the tanning product to a large hand full of lotion and evenly apply to my skin. It really works... giving me the beautiful scent that only Angel can do; a soft and moisturized skin that only Angel can do...and a tan to boot!! Who knows? Maybe there will someday be an Angel tanning product. I would love it!!

I just love the Angel perfume and decided I needed the body lotion with the same scent. This is the best lotion that moisturizes and definitely makes my skin very soft with the Angel scent that I truly enjoy.
Angel is my all time favorite fragrance. I get complements always when I wear it. I simply love it!!

I love this fragrance and how it lasts all day. Often I am complimented on the lovely scent and asked what I am wearing. The lotion provides a delightful fragrance without leaving you feeling greasy or wondering if you have put too much on.
I am in love with my lotion. I have received many compliments on it

I really love being able to layer this with my eau de toilette. It helps the scent last all day. I also like being able to order this online for the free shipping and 5 samples which are very generous.

This body lotion leaves you feeling soft and beautiful with its lingering fragrance of Angel. The scent is wonderful and just the same as my Angel eau de parfum. Most times I layer the scent by first using the moisturizer usually after a shower. Then, when I'm dressed, a couple of sprays from my star and sometimes top it off with the perfumed hand cream. Nothing better for a woman than having soft hydrated skin along with an alluring scent. It does last all day and even if you feel by evening that you could use a little boost of Angel, just use a bit of body lotion, or the hand cream and I also wipe it on neck as I massage it onto my hands. So many people make positive commemts about my scent. Men have asked me what fragrance I'm wearing...right in front of my husband, but in a respect way of course. Not much more to comment about except that I love this scent. I use the body lotion even if I'm not leaving the house. I enjoy the scent that much that I use it daily whether I'm on my way out or relaxing at home. Lifts my mood as well.
Absolutely love love love!! I always get so many compliments! No improvements necessary!

column6: I love Angel Shower Gel, Body Lotion and Perfume
column7:
I have used Angel perfume,for the past 15 years - love, love, love this product. For the past two years I've been using the shower gel and body lotion. I find using all three intensifies the fragrance which lasts longer. I also find that layering the lotion/perfume reduces the amount used. 

I highly recommend the body lotion as well as the shower gel and perfume.
I love it . When I'm using every body ask me what fragrance I'm using

I love the convenience of ordering from "Mugler USA" and not having to drive to the stores, also the free delivery and 5 complimentary samples. PLUS, I get to register to the circle and get points for what I bought.

Angel Celestial Lotion has been the only scent I have worn for 13 years. Everyone comments on it and so many others have purchased it because they love the way I smell. When I get a new bottle, I smell the box and it is instant heaven. I am in love with this scent & will never stop wearing it.
Absolutely love love this product!!!!!! What else can I say,,,,love the Angel line.
I love the soft fresh smell of the Angel Body Lotion. It is the only body lotion that I use.
My favorite scent and body lotion ever! I have been using it for over 5 years now and continue to get compliments. It leaves your skin feeing like silk! Please never discontinue this product!
I have been wearing Angel for 10 years. I will not use anything else. The lotion is wonderful. I just love it! I get compliments everyday. And I do mean everyday!
This lotion is so nice and soothing . It leaves my skin feeling silky!

I have been wearing Angel perfume for years. I love the original Angel and Angel Innocent. I have preferred Angel Innocent in the summer because it has a much lighter scent and the original Angel on the fall and winter because of its warmer more woodsy scent. Regardless of what Angel product I wear, I ALWAYS receive compliments on the scent. I started wearing Angel Body Lotion a couple years ago and layered it with the original Angel. I quickly realized that I didn't have to layer it when I forogt to use the perfume one day. I received more compliments than ever just wearing the lotion. The scent of the lotion lasts all day and is lighter and a hint more floral. I still layer occasionally but the lotion has become my absolute favorite product!!!
I love the body lotion. It sets off the shower gel with another subtle layer of Angel. I get many compliments about the aroma of Angel

Angel is my favorite scent. It is clean and intoxicating. I have the cologne, oil, lotion and shower gel. Obviously, I love the scent. I have lots of brands and this is by far my favorite. Thus, I use it sparingly; for special occasions or "just because."

I love your perfume, but my most favorite is the Angel Lely and it is no longer sold. Will it ever be back in the stores for purchase? I love it so much. While I like the Angel, my most favorite is the Angel Lely. Please let me know if you will ever sell it again. It makes me so sad that I can't find it in the stores anymore.

column6: The most amazing body lotion ever!
column7: I had never smelled anything like Thierry Mugler Angel until we went to St. Martin in July of 2015. We were eating at a restaurant and sitting outside and every time the wind blew I could smell this amazing smell coming from a woman that at sat down at the table in front of us. My husband smelled it to. I had our waitress find out what that lady was wearing and that is all I have worn ever sense. We had a great time on this vacation and will definitely be going back and you can bet that I am never leaving home again without my Angel. I love, love, love it.
This is so amazing smell I love love this product .

column6: Have been wearing angel for over 20 years
column7:
Love it love it love it.
I can use the body lotion without any perfume and it smells awesome. People stop me to ask me what I am wearing. I mean it. I will be at the grocery store, bank , anywhere,,,, people say I smell awesome. I never leave home without it. Angel is the only fragrance I use. I buy it for my friends.

It wasn't until this past spring that I discovered this product, after a co-worker wore it one day and I absolutely loved the scent! She told me that she always wears the body cream, but I thought I would try the body lotion first. I love the silkiness of this lotion, and the scent lasts all day. Now I have my mom and sister wearing it too! The other day another co-worker asked me what perfume I was wearing, and even before I could tell her, she said "It smells like an angel". She was surprised to find out that it was body lotion, not perfume, and said, "They sure named it right"! I get compliments every time I wear it!

A wonderful lotion that is so smooth and never greasy.
Indulge yourself!
An excellent way to layer Angel over Angel Body Wash and before perfume.

Pricey, but it is a fragrance that is on top of my favorite fragrance list. It will last all day and not over powering at all. Soft, silky, sexy, long lasting and draws many compliments. I absolutely love this product. Perhaps more discounted offers from creator would opt me to use it regularly instead on a special occasion.

As a younger lady a few years back I fell in love with Angel perfume.I would wear it all the time in all kinds of weather. As I grew more and became a mom I saw that the perfume would sting me in the hot summer weather and then I tried the body lotion!!! I was in heaven. It lasts long on the body,at least 24 hours and I love the fact that it lingers on the clothing a bit and I can still smell it the second time I wear it. My only problem is I feel the bottle while pretty is not ergonomic and a lot of product stays in. I do in the end get a strong pair of scissors cut it in half and use the left product. It is so much that I have at least 3 uses after it is cut. Please take that bottle back to the drawing board!!! A forever fan

This is the only fragrance I wear. I love it so much and I always get compliments, when I order and receive the five free samples I always get the lotion and when people compliment me I just give them a sample. I wish everybody would wear this fragrance.
This is the best moisturizing cream and it smells fantastic. I love layering it with body powder and parfume.
This is a great product to properly layer the fragrance.
For days when you just want a hint of that incredible Angel scent, yet moisturize your skin as well. This is the Angel product for you!
The body lotion is not as thick as the body cream, but just as luscious. It is moisturizing with a scent that lasts all day.
Love the lotion just wish it would last a little longer after application. The cream may be the better answer.

Staple in my daily eblution. Layer, layer, layer starting with shower gel then deoderant then body lotion then body cream then powder then perfume. Love the way I smell all day and night long! MY SIGNATURE SMELL since it's inception! I will NEVER CHANGE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This is amazing. I always receive compliments when wearing this lotion.
This is my new scent.

A smooth and non-greasy lotion that smells absolutely divine! This is a great way to begin your day. I love the faint, yet distinct lingering aroma at the end of the day! It makes me smile! You will too!

I first started using Angel lotion after receiving some samples from a friend of a friend. Many women asked about what I ad on and I always gave them a sample. So I have long been a spokesperson for Angel. Included in my recent order of Angel you included a sample of Mugler cologne and I love that too!
not as creamy as body cream but i use them both plus the oil

This product is so nice on my skin. I put it on just after a shower. It makes my skin feel so soft and the fragrance is wonderful. It is a great way to begin layering or use alone and have a light scent of Angel all day. This lotion stays with me all day, I love it !!!!

i use the angel body lotion as my daily "scent". i merely apply a small amount to my chest and it lasts all day. it is my preference over perfume and i am constantly complimented for the scent. it is yummy.

This lotion is very light, not a good one for winter but excellent for summer. The perfume in it is also slightly sweeter than the Angel EDP on my skin, very airy feeling, also great for summer. For winter I'd go with the body cream though.

This isn't a particularly moisturizing lotion, and I find that it makes me feel even drier after I put it on. The scent isn't the best of all the products. It seems quite harsh when compared to the shower gel and powder. It doesn't seem to have that special quality that I love about the Angel fragrance. I do use it, but I have to put an unscented drug store lotion on first, then apply this after, since I do love layering my products. I much prefer the body cream to this.
I just love the angel line. Use this perfumed lotion with both the shower gel and perfume to smell delicious all day long!!
I use it after every shower or bath. I recommend it!
My mother-in-law brought my first bottle of Angel perfuming body lotion back from Paris. This has become my signature scent. People literally stop me and ask, "what are you wearing?"
The fragrance is soft and sensual...... A wonderful lotion to smoothe over your entire body!

I just bought the lotion in this new bottle instead of the body oil, which I love. I must say so far I really like it. Angel is an aroma that makes you feel great in the privacy of your own domain or out on the town. It's always fantastic sharing with someone what the amazing fragrance you are wearing is. I have given many men all of the important info on how to procure this one of a kind scent for the special woman in their life! It literally is a fragrance that men stop you and ask about. I hope the men who have asked about Angel were rewarded for their taste. If men love the smell, well, that's the ticket! Sure we want to smell nice for everyone but we all appreciate and understand the power of a fragrance that stops gentleman in their tracks. It's intoxicating! The lotion is a good product alone or layered with other Angel products.

I do re-call when the Angel line was at least $15 less per item. Sighhhh, I miss those days!
Love this lotion. I get lots of compliments when I were this lotion or perfum.

I love this lotion, however, I wish it were a little thicker but not as thick as the cream. It feels watery and seems to absorb very quickly once it's applied to the body. Although I love the shape of the bottle, it's hard to hold and pump at the same time!
Excellent lotion. Not real heavy but does the job. Excellent addition to the Angel fragrance.

I love the original Angel scent and all the products. I use the lotion in the Summer and Body cream in winter. The lotion is lighter texture. I will always receive compliments on Angel and of all the scents I have worn this is one that a lot of people recognize. Love, love, love Angel.
I love this oil. Its not greasy at all. It goes on so light and soaks right into your skin with a fragrance that lasts all day. Hope this never get discontinued.
This is the best parfumed body lotion!! It smells just like the Angel Parfum and it stays with you. Really worth the price, I love it and get complimented on it all the time!
I LOVE your Angel products. I get compliments all the time. It is the best. Wouldn't trade for it!!!!
I love ANGEL !! I get compliments every time I wear it.

I love this dry oil! Right out of the shower I use this to begin my layering.  It's a dry oil and it absorbs quickly.  It's perfect to use alone when you are just running around during the day!  Later I'll add a spritz of the perfume going out for the evening!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Lightweight and not greasy. Can use alone or to supplement the perfume. Scent lasts all day long
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This is about the fifth time I have purchased this oil. Love the scent and get tons of compliments

column7: Most recent addition to my collection. Love it! Light fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I got this in last week to go with the Angel perfume but the oil alone is enough.... it’s it not oily and gives my skin a glow
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I bought this for my sister after receiving it a month ago.  We both love it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I liked using the Angle Perfuming Body Oil very lite pleasant smell comes on great very pleased

column7:
The oil is very nice I love it and I recommend it 
I love the product
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body
Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have worn Angel since 1995 and I’ll never wear any other fragrance; the oil spray is great for the summer month when you want a lighter scent.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I have used Angel for many years, since it first came out, using just about everything you have. I just started with the oil as we have moved to colder weather and found a wonderful oil and again my favorite fragrance. If you haven't tried it, give yourself a treat.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7:
The title says it all!!!
When I put the oil on it immediately makes my skin so soft and smooth and men often ask me what I am wearing. And this is even later in the day and I get compliments of how I smell. That goes the same for the deodorant.
It's a sexy feeling when you can smell that lovely all day long!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: Thank you for the plastic bottle!
column7: The bottle is plastic thank goodness. Oil makes my hands slippery and I'd sure hate to drop this and have it break--it's too expensive for that! Love the body oil! Smells heavenly by itself and also a good way to layer the fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: What more can be said about the fabulous scent of Angel? That the wonderful scent comes in a bottle of spray misting oil. I use it with my lotion and other Angel products to help moisten and indulge myself everyday in this marvelous scent. The misting oil is not too heavy and goes a long way. Once you try it, I assure that you will never want to be without it again.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: My favorite product in the line!
column7: Love this stuff. I spray this on my arms and legs after the shower. It is a perfect way to get soft skin and the scent of angel in a lighter way. Particularly great during the summer months alone. Layered it is also amazing.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: This item is ok ,not sure if i would but it again.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I love the contents inside the bottle,but you've got to improve the actuator button performance. It needs to be 'beefed up.75% of the time I'm using the product, the button comes off,& I'm scrambling to locate it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: I love this product. I use it after my show and just love the way it feels. I love all of the products I've purchased from Terry Mugler.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: If you love the Angel perfume you might be disappointed by this. It's not very similar at all and the scent is odd, I usually like sweet but this smells like an off sweet, like old rotting blueberries. The only good thing is the oil is very absorbent and non-greasy. I had asked customer service for a return over a month ago but I guess they felt I wasn't worth getting back to. I wish I had bought it in Macy's so I could at least exchange it for something useable. As someone who loved Angel to death I am so disappointed in the product and mostly in how I was ignored. As someone who has worked customer service I made sure to be polite, even a message saying my product could not be returned would have been fine. I won't be shopping from this brand anymore.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: The angel oil is heavenly, however the packaging of the product looks very cheap and not like a high-end luxury product at all. Disappointing.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Anything in "Angel" is #1. Have been using it for 15+ years. I love oils & layering my fragrance. This oil drys quickly while adding moisture, shine and of course the fabulous Angel scent.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7: Got the oil as a free sample. Loved it so much I had to have it. Perfect right after the shower. It lingers for hours. Love the light feeling. Perfect alone or as a base. Best of all one spray into your hand and apply. Thats all you need.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7:
ANGEL perfuming body oil is exactly what the name says it is. 
So fragrant, it can be worn alone on days that you forget or perhaps have run out of Angel perfume. I purchase this at least once a year and us the lotion or body cream on a rotating basis. Works best on clean skin that's just come out Of a hot bath or shower. Another helpful tip - sometimes mixing a few sprays of this body oil with the lotion helps it all soak in for maximum results.

On my now mature skin it has been heavenly in both aroma and texture. i use it immediately after bathing to hold in moisture and layer it with my Angel edp. Long lasting!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column6: Luxurious skin oil with lasting Angel Fragrance
column7:
Fantastic on its own or layered with Other Angel products.
Highly fragrant - long lasting - perfect after hot bath or shower to seal in moisture.
Worth having in your collection as this doubles as a perfume oil too. Dab on pulse points, behind neck for the same effect as perfume oil. 
Advice - use when freshly showered, after exfoliating and or shaving. This will give the oil the best chance to soak into your skin rather than sit on top!

Give it a try
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7:
I have tried other dry oils that were anything but dry. This is so beautiful just sinks into your skin and no greasy residue and leaves you smelling wonderful.. great price for so much
 product. Another winner by Thierry Mugler
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Bath & Body

column7:
This has been a part of my routine for years and will always be, so five stars is what this product deserves. But, the one star is for customer service, shipping was awful and since its free, it appears there using the cheapest and slowest method, product took almost 2 weeks even after I contacted customer service.
I can purchase this oil most places, I only used this company because I thought they treated their customers special and not like every other company. After using Amazon's superior shipping service (sometimes same day) it's very hard to accept such slow service.

This item is so worth it, and the best part, you only need to purchase this big set once, then you can purchase the Thierry Mugler body powder ANGEL refills at at third of the price. SO GREAT! FIVE STARS, NO TEN STARS, THE MAXIMUM STARS!

i so love this powder the fragrance is so subtle and soft a friend of mine had some and i was hooked so i bought some wow ! my husband loved it so i also bought some for my boss for Christmas and she loved it as well ladies you can not go wrong with this angel dust a must try product ENJOY!!!!

love this powder smells great keeps my breaths dry buy it

column6: One for me and one for my sister
column7: Surprised my sister with this delivery. She was thrilled to receive the body powder but as excited to get the free samples.

at first i didn't understand the point of body powder. i just knew that I'm in love with this scent, so i figured what better way to try it out. now i completely understand. it's more of a light, clean feeling with the same sell only crisper and more refreshing feeling. i layer this with the body oil and it last all day, good for summer and casual days. i've only had this product for a couple weeks now but it has quickly become my everyday favorite and my go to for when i want to smell fabulous but still have morning fresh feeling.

I really like this body powder but the container it comes in is a huge pain. The pouf and powder opening are so super tiny that usage becomes a huge bother. For example, Chloe's body powder is actually the width of an average hand to hold and apply. This one is so tiny that it takes three times as long to use. Also, the powder filter/distributer is NOT ATTACHED to the base. So if you try to turn upside down to shake some out make sure you are holding or else you will lose all of the product to the unfortunate forces of gravity. Color and smell are wonderful, container is not so great. I bought a Johnson's Baby Powder just to empty and fill with this so I don't have to deal with the rediculous container.
I love the sparkly Angel Body Powder. I have been using it for a couple of years.

love the sent and the very fine powder. also like the blue shade.
only problem is the puff is to small :( dont know how to address that though
it's a great find ! and I would get again if on sale like it was this time :-)

The closest town that had a real department store is Colorado Springs. I make sure I have my supply of Angel. I don't feel complete without 
Angel.

column6: The BEST High-End Deodorant There Is, Hands Down
column7: I have been HUNTING for THE scented deodorant (not the drug store scented awfulness that's loaded with aluminum, just a true deodorant with enough scent to keep the ... you know what scent at bay without the added so so so bad for you antiperspirant!) for YEARS. I have tried every brand from Tom Ford to LaVanilla to Hermes and basically anything you can name in between. They all fell short. This is truly AMAZING. If you like the smell of "Angel" or like Gourmands/Orientals, this is for you (I just put this on this morning and thought "This reminds me a LOT of what Bond No.9 "Nuits de Noho" SHOULD BE!!"). There is a lot of product in this container and it is scented enough that it really does provide protection all day long. If you're looking for an antiperspirant, i.e., NOT TO SWEAT, this product IS NOT FOR YOU. I prefer to put off the added risk of breast cancer, personally, and this is the only deodorant I have found that is a quick-drying, highly-scented but not too strong formulation that just works wonderfully. Please don't ever get rid of this one, Thierry Mugler!!! Absolute perfection!!

I also appreciate the free samples that I was able to select when I ordered the refills - the small samples are wonderful to take on trips, or to try out (if it's something I haven't used previously). I love Angel, I smell wonderful all the time. I've worn Angel for 15 years.
Eco refills are perfect for those of us that need that fix everyday. I bought my first bottle of Angel at Christmas and won't use anything else.

I am a 79 year old "user" of "Angel" since 1992 where I first found the scent in Saudi Arabia. I still work as a nurse educator and just recently completed a 2 year masters degree. All this leads up to managing my "time." As a very busy professional woman, I have been primarily an online line consumer of "my trademark" perfume and products. What a boon it is to now refill my 5 different stars with the ANGEL ECO-REFILLS from my vanity table! Easy to order...easy to use! Thank you for making the very key stone of all the wonderful products, the Thierry Mugler exclusive Angel Eau de Parfum refills online.

I appreciate being able to order my refill directly from the Thierry Mugler website No concerns ever about service and, more importantly, authenticity. Angel has been my signature fragrance for very many years and the compliments continue - from men (especially) and women and even children. It will be 100 years before I switch!!! Thank you to the Celestial associates that make the exchange such a pleasure.

Purchasing these wonderful refills has made my "Angel Life" so easy!! Ordering on-line is just a bonus for the pleasure I have enjoyed having Angel as my signature fragrance. I love getting all of my bottles filled and back out on my bathroom counter.
Most economical way to keep spouse supplied with her favorite fragrance.

We use the great scent from the practical Angel bottles 3.4 oz. My wife and I are very happy with the pleasant fragrance, over 30 years we are using it and every body that get to close to us, always ask what are you using that smell so good. First time using the page site.
Thanks to Thierry Mugler.
This unforgettable aroma at all times! any woman with this aroma becomes charming, mysterious and desirable!
I have been using Angel for the past 3 years....get so many compliments. The eco-refills are perfect to never run out. Also bought it for my son's girlfriend for Christmas!!

Oh, where to begin?! Have worn Angel Eau de Parfum exclusively since 2001. During the Holiday's of 2014, my 90 year old mother chose to make this her signature fragrance as well. We enjoy it in abundance.

The option of purchasing both sizes within one package - other than saving a few dollars, also helps save our planet - thanks to less waste. As 'pretty' as my former 3.4 ounce glass refill bottles were, am much more aware of the many ways we can remain "environmentally conscious".

Additionally, there's nothing more stressful for a fan of Angel, than to realize - you're nearing your last drops/spritzes. Not a problem thanks to your online option of this duo.

Thank you Thierry Mugler!

The fragrance is exceptional, it embraces you as you apply it. I receive compliments from men and women throughout the day as I pass by. The men will comment on how nice you smell. Women will ask, what are you wearing? My answer is "Angel". How wonderful I feel just knowing that others can receive that memorable "Angel" experience.
I am overjoyed to be able to purchase the eco-refills. Thank you Thierry Mugler.

I love this product!!! I wear Angel all the time, so the Eco-refils make the most sense for me. I also love that I can refil one of my collection of bottles, whenever the whim hits me.
Angel forever
You'll never run out and feel good about the environment too. Comes certified as the real fragrance.
I have been wearing Angel for fifteen years and wouldn't wear another. I love the refill bottles because I have so many of the Angel bottles and save them too. Now I can just refill them

I am in love with this perfume. Everyone says it's the perfect scent for me. The fact that I can purchase this fragrance at a discounted price directly from the manufacturer and save the money of not having to buy the dispenser bottles is complete genius. It's the exact same perfume, no difference from it or buying it in a department store except for the price.

Thank you Thierry Mugler
Every time I wear it, I get compliments that I smell amazing.

column7:
I absolutely love Angel Perfume. I’ve been wearing this scent for 22 years. I always receive compliments on the fragrance. I do not wear anything but Angel. 
Always satisfied ordering from the Website.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Gift Sets

column7: I got a set just like this but from last year and the star is the cutest size just right for your purse and the price is reasonable for on the go and it's so pretty and the fragrance is the classic Angel.. a wonderful gourmand..it's a great refillable gift set..it's not so different from this set and it's a great gift to give to others if your not sure what to get as a beginner intro set to this house for a reasonable price.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Angel > Gift Sets

column7: While I have always used the refillable star, I thought I would try this. I do so love it. The bottle stands tall allowing easier access from the vanity. Plus the fact it holds much more Angel!! A win win combination!!

I agree with other reviewer in that the bottle is almost impossible to use. I am wondering if it is the refillable one. I have the smaller star bottles and they work well so I would like to transfer the perfume to that one. Is there a way to tell? I love Angel perfume and was given a gift of this larger bottle than I normally buy.

The low rating is for the bottle design alone, for the perfume itself, a million stars if I can. I have to agree with the previous reviewer about the bottle design. It is so hard to press the mister top my finger hurts. It absolutely needs two hands in order to operate, spritzing on my wrist while holding it with my other hand is impossible for me. I got my at local Macy's while they are having a free bottle engraving event so my bottle is beautifully hand engraved with my name and a trail of stars, in other words, don't want to return or exchange it! I'm keeping the bottle just for the sake of variety and the beautiful engraving. Maybe a design like this but smaller at the top larger at the bottom would make a difference I don't know, but then it would be called Falling Star lol

I received this as a gift from my wonderful husband and I absolutely LOVE the smell of this fragrance - it is one of my very favorites! A+ here.

However, I absolutely HATE the packaging. This bottle is so ill-designed it makes me want to scream! It is IMPOSSIBLE for me to spray this on with one hand, and if I don't get my husband's help putting it on, then I am struggling, holding this bottle with 2 hands trying to spray it on my clothing! This bottle and that spray button is so extremely frustrating that I just had to write this review and send a message to the customer service team. Whoever designed this bottle had no consideration for those with small hands, weak hands or even those who may have arthritis. F here.

Fragrance - 5 stars / Bottle - 0 Stars - hence the 3 stars! :0(

I LOVE the Angel scent but this candle isn't worth the expense.  if only the jar was the pretty Angel color that's pictured here.  It's not.  It's black with the label slapped on it and it has a very thin wick which I had to dig at to get the candle started because it was embedded in the wax.  The candle is also too small given the price tag.  The scent it throws is decent though which is why I'm giving it 3 stars.  Won't buy again unless they improve the appearance and size.

I was so excited to see the candles back on the site. I hadn’t seen them for a while, I ordered two. When I got them today I was disappointed to see the candle is black! The wax is white, but the glass container is black with some weird leafy picture on it. This is clearly not what is pictured on the website. I was expecting the soft “Angel” blue color candle to arrive. Black is so harsh in my room. You need to picture what is actually going to be sent to you, and picture what you are paying for.

I just love this scent, as I also wear it! The thing I love about this is that I have 18foot ceilings in my living room and I always have a hard time smelling the candle ! But this one is great I can smell it through my home ! The only thing is I wish U had bigger ones! Hint hint ))

I adore the fragrance and the way it makes my room smell. Unfortunately they are small and expensive so when they're gone I can't immediately replace because of the cost. Even Yankee candles are more cost effective.

I love the Angel fragrance! It is a timeless splendor. However, the candle does not measure up. The scent of the candle is weak and overpriced for what you get. I am only giving 2 stars because I am Angel Addict and everyone is allow 1 mistake. Note to Mugler Product Management - either boost the scent of the candle or cut the price in half.
Used it in your home or gift it. It is a great scented candle. A++++++++++++++

It has no scent at all! I thought they forgot to actually put a scent in the candle! I called customer service and wanted to send it back so they could tell me is this really the candle they say has the scent of Angel or one that was defective. They didnt let me send it back and they refused to refund my money. Im a very long term customer and only use Angel. I was excited as soon as the candle came out and bought it. Pricey, yes, but I buy Riguaud candles that are even more expensive, but they have a beautiful aroma. This candle gave off no scent at all. I was very disappointed. Customer service sent me a few samples to try to make me happy. Quite frankly, they should have taken the candle back to test it and see. Ive let many people smell it and they all said they smell nothing.

If you are a fan of Angel perfume, then you will love this sensual candle!
My entire apartment is enveloped with this sexy fragrance. 
Mysterious, dreamy, magical! WoW!
Candle very small and did not pack the punch you would expect from a 50$ candle!!!
The unlit candle smells wonderful. However, when lit, the scent isn't as fragrant as I would have liked considering the cost.
I love it, I bought one for myself and one for a friend of mine and they are perfect just want we expected.
The candle smell wonderful but would be much more useful if the candle was soy.. You could take the melted candle and use as a moisturizer on your skin!
I have not tried them yet but I am sure they are great and would like a sample first before I buy.

I love the perfume so was very excited to order the candle. Smells great out of the box but almost no scent when lit. No code in the box and definitely not worth the price. Did the other reviewers actually light the candle?

I was very very disappointed. The candle was $50 and I expected it to be much larger than what it was. The smell of Angel was at a minimum I was also disappointed with that . Not a good purchase at all for the money.
Smells great-just like the perfume. Definitely would recommend.

Opening the box , the candle smelled heavenly. However once lit, there was very little scent released. I was very disappointed ! I expected much more from a $50.00 candle. The cheaper candles do a much better job of scenting a room then this one.
All I can say is that I love this candle. Will purchase again.
Honestly it smells amazing but I thought it was overpriced and did not even come with a code so I could at least get some points . I would not order it again .
This candle is absolutely yummy!! Smells just like the fragrance and is truly celestial, for sure!! I highly recommend if you are an ANGEL fan!!

After waiting for instruction and not receiving an RMA I gave up and I continued to burn it and then a 2nd wick ( after trimming it ) refused to stay lit...with the detective wicks and it actually burned soot onto the pretty holder ; it was the glass star dish that prompted-me to spend that anount of money for a candle . It is the most expensive candle Ive purchased but due to the customer service or lackthereof ( on two occasions for the same candle) ... I simply wanted to exchange it not return it. But when I am simply placated and they didnt follow through with exchanging it ;I will not purchase this item again and I cannot recommend it. it's unfortunate because I have been wearing Angel religiously since it's launch I have been loyal my Mugler . column6: Pretty, works better for the special editions
column7:
This stand is pretty, and in my opinion should be included with purchase of every 50mL star. Or at the very least, they could include one of those little clear plastic bottle stands you see Angel displayed in at department stores, and have the fancy chrome one available for purchase.

However, I wouldn't put my regular Angel EdP bottle in this - when exposed to light for a while, Angel tends to turn a murky green color, as light damages the stability of the blue dye they use to color the liquid. As such, I have always kept my Angel bottle in a little black satin Thierry Mugler drawstring pouch that I got as a gift with purchase several years ago.

I may use this stand for the special editions, such as the opaque 2014 Eau Sucree bottle or the dark Angel Glamorama, with which it would make no difference if the contained juice turned green. The stand really does make the beautiful bottle stand out in a perfume collection.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Angel Perfume > Fragrances

column7:
A Very unique fragrance. 


Opens up with an intense green elixir-like quality with minty, citrus, vanilla, woody, resinous burst with an enigmatic sweetish-sour quality. 


It does quite well in warm weather with a longevity of more than 12 hours. The creamy vanilla Tonka gourmand quality of this fragrance becomes pronounced as it cools down and the green comes out as the outside heats up.

Unisex.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: So good my gf was hospitalized the staff stole it
column7: It was the 1st time anyone had taken her to get a perfume to match her body natural aura, she is 34 and was hospitalized and the staff had care of her purse she used it when she was hospitalized for almost a month and upon returning home it was not in her purse. The scent is amazing vibrant without being over-powering, unique to each person blending with a floral bouquet, she has being very sad for it being lost and no one of course would own up to its disappearance, it was quite an expense for us, I'm fully disabled and she has been disabled for the last 2 years. I am hoping to be able to get her some more, it was the 1st time that anyone had ever taken her to find something that was special to just her. Something where it wasn't simply off the rack we spent hours going through many scents to find the one that fit her personally. If you wish to purchase this perfume......and love the way roses blend with spring also remember everyone body is different then scent will change and blend with your own natural body oils creating a scent that is particular to only you....a scent memories are made of....

column7: I visited Ulta to purchase Alien because I love and own Angel and Cologne, and wanted something for spring and summer. I saw Aura on display and was drawn to the pretty emerald bottle. Unlike other Mugler scents, my first impression of Aura left me confused as to whether I liked it or not. I immediately detected green tea, and was surprised to discover there isn't a hint of green tea in the formula. Aura reminds me of a green tea latte, which is one of the things I liked about it, but wasn’t sure about the other notes. After circling and sniffing the display a 4th time, I decided I really liked it. The scent is earthy and green, but not a pine scent—more of a damp foresty moss scent. The earthy notes remind me of camping in the Sierra, and the dewey smells that hit your nose when you crawl out of your tent in the morning. All in all, I believe Mugler achieved a new daring fragrance unlike anything else out there. I purchased Alien in-store, but I ended up purchasing this scent online because I couldn’t stop thinking about it. I can’t wait for it to arrive. I tend to enjoy my perfumes best after they've dried down; to me, a quality perfume’s notes should keep changing, and smell better as the day goes on. I’m confident I’ll love this just as much as my other Mugler scents.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The top notes of this fragrance are powerful and complex! The smell is unlike anything I've ever smelled before...very green and earthy if that makes sense. But five minutes later the notes came together beautifully as it morphed into the most unique and mysterious sweet green smokiness. The more it dries down the more pleasant it becomes so don't judge too quickly. The silage is fantastic and lasts a very long time. Just be careful not to over spray because a little goes a long way with this fragrance! Another outstanding creation from Thierry Mugler. I love it!!!

When I first received my famine, I loved the packaging. I loved that beautiful bright green color. I tested it out by spraying it on the card the sample comes in. Ehhh.. I was not too fond of it and was quite disappointed I want liking it too much.

A couple weeks later I was getting ready to leave to go out on the town, I decided to try it on myself hoping it would be different, and it was. I was like wow, and fell in love.


 It is very striking, compassionate and complex, yet refreshing. It starts as an icy bourbon vanilla, and melts into a beautiful woodsy smell.


I would definitely recommend this.

column7: Before opening the box that I received in the mail which included my perfume, I could automatically smell the strong sensation of a woody, manly, scent. Once opening the product, I thought to myself maybe after a use or two it will die down on being so strong of a scent. Nope, didn't happen. This is one of the strongest smelling perfumes that I have ever smelled. I wore it one time just to give it every opportunity to impress me. By the end of the day, I wasn't impressed. The only good quality that I found that this perfume has, is that it lasts all day, probably because it's so strong it takes forever to wear off. In my opinion the scent seems to be more of a manly scent than for women. I will not continue using this perfume for any occasion and I would not reccomend it to friends or family. I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes, thank goodness, because I would not have personally spent my own money on this perfume.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Aura Mugler is quite an intriguing scent. It is at once woodsy & floral with definite musk tones to it. I enjoyed my first impression of the perfume smelling it right out of the bottle, so I would definitely recommend it to others to try for themselves. For me personally, it just did not mesh well with my body chemistry and was too overwhelming/ overpowering of a scent on my skin.

column7:
It's not for me, personally but does remind me of a earthy, woodsy scent. Maybe it's due to the image and colors associated with the marketing of this scent. 

I will say that it's a strong scent. Depending on your tastes that's a positive or negative. But a little spritz goes a very long way. Given the retail price, that's probably a good thing. 

It is a feminine scent without being floral, sugary, or reminiscent of powder. I prefer more sugary scents, but florals can be intense so it's a refreshing change from the overly "girly" flowery powdery scents. 

I'd still prefer vanilla bases over this scent any day though. But if earthy is more your preference, give Aura Mugler a try! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample and was so excited to try this because when I saw it online, all of the other Mugler perfumes have high reviews but I've never actually tried any. This one actually fit the bottle/color very well. There's a smell that matches "Green".. it has rhubarb in it but it's almost a medicinal smell at first. .....but after wearing it it gets better. Give it a try....if at 1st you don't care for it try it a cpl more times, because it gets better.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I'm a huge fan of Angel, but I'm willing to try other fragrances. Rarely do I buy a fragrance that I have not sampled, but I was willing to give Aura a try. I guess I was in a daring mood. Well, it worked to my benefit. It's completely different from Angel, but just as lovely a fragrance in its own right. I'm not a fan of "flowery" fragrances, but I don't find this fragrance to be overly flowery or excessively sweet. It's just a pleasant alternative to Angel. I suppose it's a softer fragrance, very elegant. The bottle itself is quite lovely and makes a wonderful presentation. Angel is still my number one go-to fragrance, but I'd definitely purchase Aura again. It's a nice change of pace for when I'm feeling I'd like to be different and daring.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Instinct? Aura? Feline sensuality?!

I received a sample of this in the mail. I usually don't care for traditional floral or "girly" scents, but I do like fresh, "green" scents, and the first note I got was definitely fresh and green. Then the rest of the complexity kicked in, and I have no idea what to say except it's strong - definitely perfume rather than cologne or Eau de Toilette - and I don't hate it. It doesn't smell like anything else I've tried from Mugler, although it's definitely complex and unusual enough to suit their house style. I want to try it again and again to help me make up my mind about it.

I'm still trying to figure out why the packaging mentions feline sensuality - is one of the "green" notes catnip? - although in the photo the metallic M on the bottle does look a bit like cat ears.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

It lasts all day which I like. It has a very florally smell to it. 
I think it is great that it is a refillable bottle. I am assuming that purchasing a refill will save on money in the long run. The packaging is very pretty and great for gifting. I was sent a free sample of this perfume for reviewing purposes.

column7: I was super excited to receive a sample of this product complimentary for testing purposes. I love perfumes and am always looking for the latest and greatest. Unfortunately, this Aura Mugler perfume is AWFUL. I spritzed the tiniest bit on my wrist and was instantly overwhelmed with an almost chemical smell. It made me nauseas immediately. The scent is very strong floral and chemical mixed, like a really bad smelling cleaning product! I quickly washed my hands, wrists and arms trying to get rid of the smell but to no avail. As I lay on bed that night, I could not escape from it. I was hoping the dry down would be a bit lighter but it wouldn't go away! Honestly, I wish my favorite perfumes would have the same staying power! I will not be purchasing this product ever. I definitely do not recommend to someone who is sensitive to strong smells and anyone that doesn't want to choke those around you. Its horrible.

column7:
I’ve been sitting on this review for the last week because I wanted to see if my opinion would change the longer I was exposed to the perfume. This perfume is one that is very strong and the phrase “a little goes a long way” is apt. I lightly sprayed this on my arm and a couple days later, even after showering, I could still smell it. The scent itself reminds me of something foresty and mystical, with a hint of a minty scent underneath it all. I haven’t been able to find the exact notes that went into this, though the description of the scent says, “blending floral freshness with feline sensuality, the fragrance releases vibrant notes with an assertive personality.” Not entirely sure what that fully represents, but the last bit about assertive personality rings true; this is a perfume to wear if you want to get noticed due to its unique scent and the potency of it. 

Personally, I fully admit that this is not a scent that I would buy, it is just too overwhelming for me, but for those who like stronger, in your face, unique scents this would be perfect. Overall, the perfume isn’t bad, it's just not something that I would buy for myself or someone else.

*I received these products complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

So far, it's not giving me a headache, so I wouldn't mind someone else wearing it near me. It's totally a personal preference, but if you like floral scents, this one is good. Another note is that it has a weird bottom note when it dries down but it goes away after about 10-15 minutes.

column6: Enjoyed it! Just wish I had bigger sample size!
column7:
I admit I was a little wary about this perfume because I had read a few reviews previous to giving it a try and people seemed to have a consensus that the smell was strong and since I don't wear perfume very often (on the day to day I tend to opt for a vanilla and lavender spray I make myself) I was nervous the smell was going to be too overpowering. Thankfully, I did not find that to be the case. The smell is strong when first applied, but mellows out after a little bit and at no point was I completely overwhelmed by it. I rather enjoyed the smell as well! I could definitely get a sense of a vanilla tone which I really liked. I do wish I had received a bigger container to sample because the one I received seemed small to test out. I have used it twice so far, once to work and once to go out at night. I did a small spray on my wrists and then a spray or two to walk through and that seemed like good coverage that lasted a long time.

I received a free sample in exchange for my honest feedback. My opinion is 100% my own.

column6: Very Strong! A little goes a long way...
column7:
When I first sprayed this fragrance on myself, I was overwhelmed by how strong the scent is - so strong that it took an entire day for it to mellow out and blend. When the scent finally settled into my skin, it had a very intense warm vanilla tone with a lingering spicy floral note. I tend to prefer lighter, citrus or fruity scents, so this didn't do it for me personally. I asked my boyfriend and family for their opinion and they said it smelled just 'OK'. Overall, it's not for me, but it is a quality, long-lasting scent. It may smell fantastic on someone else, so I encourage others to give it a try!! I recommend using a tiny amount - a little goes a long way!
