column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This perfume is a great winter scent. It has a woodsy-nature smell, but it is not too heavy. I don't think it could be worn in spring or summer as it would smell almost out of place. The scent did last a long time after I put it on! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This perfume has a very strong scent. It’s somehwere between floral and sweet. A little bit goes a long way. I have sensitivity to very strong scents and this one is one of them.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
The first time I tried it, it seemed like I had put too much on, as the scent was a bit strong. After a while, it did settle a bit to become a nice creamy-floral-citrus. It did last a good bit (about 4 hours) before fading completely away. 

I will not be purchasing a full size however, because I prefer Alien to this. (Oddly enough, my S-O prefers this to Alien on me)

I received a free sample in exchange for my honest feedback. My opinion is 100% my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was pleasantly surprised with this scent. I received a sample of this product for free to review, and I wasn't too sure what it would smell like, but guys, it's pretty! It's floral, so if you aren't a floral person this might not be for you. I love sweet and floral scents, so I was thrilled. Quick tip, don't spray directly onto yourself, spray and walk through it so it isn't too strong. I like the idea of being able to refill it, and when I saw it at Ulta, it looks easy to use.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Tried to love it but too strong for me...
column7: I tried to love this fragrance. I received a sample from influenster. I felt it was super strong. The different notes keep things interesting as they keep you guessing. I could point out notes of vanilla, bourbon, and citrus but there was another scent I could not pinpoint that was a dealbreaker for me. I felt it was sort of an after taste that lingered and I did not like it. If you like diverse, complex scents that last, then I would recommend this fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
This perfume lasts all day long! it's amazing! It can be overpowering if you put on too much. Be very conscious of how much you apply. It has been over 14 hours since I applied and I was just asked what I am wearing that smells so good. I love the oriental notes.

I've received a small sample for testing purposes but wish I had the full size bottle because it looks super cool!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
While this is a bolder scent than I would wear on a daily basis I love the scent for special occasions like date night. Smells amazing and my husband really enjoyed it. 

I was given a complimentary sample in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
This is a nice floral scent that is mature in a good way. As time goes on it settles nicely into the skin. Not too cloying, sweet, or headache-inducing! 
I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: A scent that takes a journey.
column7:
The first note I get is wintergreen when I spray this on, I love wintergreen and wish it lasted a little longer. The wintergreen melts into a boozy vanilla on my skin, which is nice because it's a very wearable vanilla. I find Aura more daytime wearable than other Mugler scents, but I still would consider this a cooler weather scent. I wish I got some of the orange blossom that others have listed in the notes, but with my skin chemistry I just get minty and vanilla. The scent gets better as it wears (becoming a more comforting scent) and I've noticed that it lasts at least six hours on me. I would suggest getting a sample of this perfume and testing it out for about a week before making a decision on whether or not to buy a full bottle, it's a scent that is so unusual at first, but gets better with time. 

I received a complimentary sample of Aura Mugler in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The scent of this perfume is addicting! It's subtle and has an interesting twist between being musky yet feminine. I put it on my wrists and neck before leaving for work and could still smell it when I got home after a long day. It wasn't over powering in the least!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of this and definitely sprayed a little too much the first time that I wore it. It's a little strong but definitely mellows out the longer you wear it. I absolutely love earthy scents so this was right up my alley. It's perfect for cold fall and winter days when you wanna stay cuddled up inside, and musky, so it's very different from all those floral scents that are out on the market. I would absolutely recommend this to a friend
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Wow! being a fan of Angel and Alien for over 5 years, I was so excited to see that they have a new perfume line. 
I just got my sample and it certainly doesn't disappoint. Creamy and delicious - so Mugler. I bought 2 bottles for Christmas - perfect gift for my mom and me!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this as a free sample... I was so excited to open it and try... but as soon as I sprayed it, it gave me a headache, I'm a person who likes mild perfume and this was too strong for me, it has that strong earthy smell as soon as you spray it and it gets mild after 1/2 hours. the smell of this perfume reminded me the earthy smell in the woods but way stronger, eventhough the smell lasted longer than I thought ,sadly this one was not meant for me,,, too strong and musky for my taste.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Received as a free sample. The scent is very strong so I would not recommend for someone that is sensitive to perfumes. It smells nice but I would not purchase the full size, too many other options that are much better in my opinion.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a complimentary sample of Aura Mugler to facilitate my review. It arrived in the mail and sat on our dining room table, and my boyfriend picked it up and thought it was cologne. He ended up spraying it on himself, it smelled pretty good on him, a bit more floral/botanical on the feminine side, but very fitting for his natural musk. I thought the woodiness and botanical essence would smell good on me... it didn't. This is extremely overpowering. It needs dilution. I tried it on myself for work and when I came home, my boyfriend asked if I was wearing cologne. I gave him the rest of the sample because it is way too overpowering and needs a dose of musk to balance this out. On the good side, it makes an excellent cologne for a musky man.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: First, upon looking at the bottle, it is a work of art. The advertisements are gorgeous. This is a collectors dream. However, when I put it on, it smells medicinal, like the tinture my grandmother used to put on me growing up. I tried to like this perfum, all I wanted to do was wash it off. After I put it on to try, I left it on for 24 hrs. After about 3 hrs, it did smell sweeter and less annoying. I don't want to wait 3 hrs for the undernotes to take effect. I tried to like this fragrance. It's a hard pass for me.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I recently received a sample of this perfume and honestly it was not for me. The bottle for the perfume was beautiful but the scent did nothing for me. When I sprayed it the first time it almost had a minty scent to me. I typically like floral and sweet scents but this one I can not describe.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: A little to strong of a smell.
column7: At first when I sprayed the perfume the smell is very strong. I didn’t dislike it. So I gave it a chance and waited for the scent to air out. After a while it still has a strong smell that last a really long time but is not over powering. I would use this a couple of more times to see if I like the smell. It a strong perfume. For me it was a little bit more earthy and flowery. I received this sample for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Was not at all what I was expecting and not in a g
column7: The video for this presume shows a young girl in a jungle. I was expecting this to be for a young crowd. Instead I tried it and it was kind of like White Diamonds potent and the smell wasn’t great. It’s not really sweet or musky. It’s just kind of blah. It sent my nose into overdrive. I was so upset! I feel like an old lady when I wear this. I love scents like SJP Stash and D&D Light Blue but this just smells cheap and old lady. No offense to old ladies, I’m sure I’ll rock this out in 40 yeas but not today. Hard pass for me. Cute color bottle though.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I've tried this scent and I love how it lasts all day. I definitely feel like it's for more mature women, but for sure it's a must try!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I am very happy to have had a chance to try this perfume. Some would say I am a perfume-connoisseur. I have always been obsessed with perfume, and I had heard about this one. It is a very strong and powerful scent. You definitely would not need to wear a lot of it. It is very feminine and my boyfriend said that he liked the perfume I was wearing when I wore it. That is a great compliment! I would recommend it! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
The scent is quite earthy, which isn’t what I would normally go for (florals). It is quite strong and you really don’t need much because a little goes a long way. I found it lingered for a bit but settled down after an hour or so. It definitely is a unique scent and nothing like I have in my collection. If you like deeper richer scents, this would be a good one for you. 

I received a sample of this item for testing purposes, but thoughts are my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Starts of strong but settles nicely
column7: When you first apply this perfume it has an extremely strong citrus and over powering scent, and at first I did not like it, but after it settles into the skin it has a very nice musky, sophisticated scent. It is very long lasting and the packaging is absolutely beautiful. I received this free to sample for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of this product for free through Influenster and I really didn't like it. It was reminiscent of Bengay ointment with a slight floral scent. The smell stuck around for awhile. I was glad when it was gone. I would not purchase and I would not recommend this product to anyone. If I could give this product less stars,I would.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: When I first tried this I was weary because my husband is very sensitive to smell. He thought it was too strong but I liked It! It is very strong at first bit it calms down after like ten minutes. I like that it lasts a long time on your skin. When i first put the scent on ots more strong and spicy smelling but it becomes more fwminine and sweet smelling after a bit.Not something I usually go for but I love it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Nice fragrance with a unique scent!
column7: I received this product free for testing purposes. I really enjoyed this perfume; I like that it has a somewhat unique scent that is unlike other perfumes I own. I like the earthy scent. It feels very fresh. The only thing I did not like about it is how strong it is. The good thing is you can use a lot less than other perfumes and get a lasting scent!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received the Aura Mugler fragrance from Influenster this past weekend, I liked the fragrance - it was a little bit sweet and spicy at the same time. I think that I would wear this out on the town. At the end of the night though the smell kind of reminded me of an old lady. So I don't know that I would go out without having some more to refresh it. I liked the fragrance but I don't know that I would purchase it... I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Received as a free sample. It starts off a little overpowering but it becomes more subtle after a few minutes. A strong, mature and earthy scent. I prefer florals, but I think this would be a nice fall/winter scent.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I really did like it but a little bit goes a long way. I over sprayed it at first and it was to much but then I did it lighter and it was a very nice scent. It lasted all day and I think it's great for the winter. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Instant Headache when I put this on my wrist. I had to wash it off immediately.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I tend to be picky when it comes to perfume. I'm not big on floral scents and I can't handle overpowering scents either. For that reason, I didn't have high hopes for this one. I was very pleasantly surprised. I sprayed it on a sheet of paper first and didn't fall in love with it there but what was interesting was that it smelled totally different on my skin. At first, it was almost a bit of a spicy, woodsy scent but after a while, the scent got sweeter, which I loved. It also lasted a long time and was at no point overpowering! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but my opinions are my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This is the perfect scent for the holidays & everyday really. It has an earthy but bordering on floral scent which I love. The scent lasts all day & one spray is all you need as the scent is quite strong. The dark green color of the bottle is beautiful & has a very rich artsy vibe going for it. I would recommend this scent. It is on the pricier side so I wont be purchasing the full size anytime soon, but if I got the chance I definitely would. I received a sample of this scent in exchange for my honest review. Overall Aura Mugler is a scent that is definitely worth checking out.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a tiny sample of aura from influenster. It has an intense herbal beginning similar to rootbeer kind of a medicinal sensation but not uncomfortable it lasts 2 -3 min and that smell disappears and then remains a warm juicy tropical smell, like a caramelized orange for a dessert.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Let me start by saying this fragrance exceeded my expectations. My first impression was that it took me back to my childhood. I grew up in the countryside in an are with dense evergreen trees and plants.
This fragrance smells like fresh dew in the morning but in a sweet and elegant way.

I received this item as a compliment for testing purposes but will buy in the future.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This scent fits me so well!! I love the bottle design, it’s very modern and sophisticated. I applied the perfume in the morning and I could still smell it that evening. Very long lasting! I love the vanilla undertones , it blended so well with my chemistry! I received a free sample in exchange for my honest feedback. My opinion is 100% my own. Thank you!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This Aura Mugler scent is truly unlike any other scent I've ever experienced before. At the first spray upon my write I was confused and surprised but the strength. Something seemed so strong and unpleasant BUT once the scent settled into my skin it was much more appealing, enjoyable, long lasting and sexy. Youll pick up major hints of vanilla and greenness. This scent is more so appropriate for those who appreciate a more mature scent rather then something innocent. Ive based my review on a generous free sample i recieved.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was really excited to smell this product based on the marketing images and the notes listed. I guess it just wasn't what I was expecting. It smells very earthy but not in a appealing way. It kind of smells like moth balls. It was extremely overwhelming. Overall just not a scent I gravitate towards. Influenster sent me a sample to review and I was pretty bummed it didn't work out for me. Scents are definitely subjective so I would recommend smelling it in person if you were debating getting this perfume.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a free sample in exchange for my honest opinions that are 100% my own. To be honest this scent is not for me. It is a very sweet smell and is way too strong for me. It was very overwhelming. I wore it for a couple days to see if I'd start to love it and to see others reactions. I got a headache and I only wore it on my wrists and everyone that I asked agreed that it was too overwhelming. I did give an extra star for the fact that a little goes a long way and the scent does not fade. I personally would not buy this scent but I can't say that I wouldn't recommend it because there are so many that love it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Amazing Scent! Very Unique and Intriguing.
column7: I give this scent 5 stars. It's simply amazing! It's so unique and unlike any perfumes I have ever smelt before. It a sweet and spicy smell. I smell vanilla at the very end. It's not over-powering but it's not to light either. The smell totally fits the name and the design of the bottle. I honestly can't stop smelling my wrist. I'm honestly just amazed. The last power is great as well. I put it in around 5pm yesterday and when I woke up this morning and got in the car my husband could still smell it! I'm definitely purchasing a full size bottle for myself and would 100% recommend this. A lot of perfumes have similar scents but his one is so unique and different. Because it is such a u ique scent I can imagine not everyone will like it, but it's a scent that you have to smell to at least test out. There is nothing else like it. I do feel it is a scent that leans a little on the mature side, but my 13 year old daughter loved the smell of it. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes but my opinions are 100% my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I love the packaging and the beautiful green color of the bottle. when I first sprayed this perfume I wasn't impressed as it smelled like pines and citrus but as it dried up and kept smelling it, it grew on me and I ended up loving it. If you enjoy a sweeter perfume then this is not for you.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample for this perfume and I definitely fell in love with it because of the sweet scent I have a lot of problems witb so many perfumes because of their strong smell but this one is sweet and soothing. I received this sample for free for testing purposes #Influenster
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The vanilla and orange notes in this are two of my absolute favorite sweet scents. Adding the bourbon also adds a touch of sexy and a bit of elegance. Some scents that are too sweet give off a juvenile scent. Adding just the right amount of sophisticated scent helps this appeal to different demographics. It has a strong alcohol smell when it is first sprayed but that dries down quickly to leave behind the delightful sweet and sultry fragrance. This is long-lasting, but it is not overpowering. Unless you spray too much, you will not be the lady in the elevator making others gag.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product complimentary of influenster. I was very excited to try this as I am a huge fan of various perfumes. I was only disappointed when I finally received my free sample. The vial came in a beautiful box with amazing packaging. The scent was odd.. it was very sweet at first and then turned into a musk, almost a scent that a man would wear. I think the packaging and the shape of the perfume offered a big hype to the perfume that only turned out to be a let down.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: So I recently received a sample of this for free . At first it’s very strong , I usually use very light fresh scents and this one was totally opposite . I did enjoy it after it dies down a little bit. It lasted all day and my laundry basket smelled just like it even after a few days . So it lasts that’s for sure . The scent is very different from other brands but pretty much in the same line of scents as other perfumes from Mugler in my opinion . The scent is sweet and rustic with a peppery end. When I smell it I smell vanilla, licorice , maybe white pepper and minty all at the same time and with a hint of cough syrup scent . I’m not sure what it is but it has it . Over all I enjoyed the difference it gave my daily scent routine. I would wear it again . I don’t think I would personally buy it but I would love it as a gift.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Great sweet smelling scent, lasts a very long time. I love sweet smelling perfumes so this one was right up my alley. Not my favorite but it was pleasant. I feel like its a more floral scent. I received this sample complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This is a very different and unique scent. While I typically like any fragrance, this smelled like fragranced cat litter at first. After you have it on for awhile, it just smells like intense vanilla. Not my favorite, and probably won't purchase. I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Never smelled anything like this one before!
column7: I LOVE Alien and Womanity, so I was very excited to see there's a new member to the Mugler family. I like very different, pronounced fragrances and this one is no exception. It's a little fruity-sweet for the top note, but mellows over time. The first time I wore it I kept wondering if I liked it--but, with time, it softened. It's not overly woody, spicy, or fruity; it's really a blend of those three scent families, which I appreciate. If you're fond of fruity top notes, try this. It strikes me as more of a pear scent, which isn't something I would typically go for, but wait for it...
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: First of all, the bottle is such a stunning shade of emerald green, how can you not want to smell this! When I first spritzed it on I thought it was a little strong, but after a few minutes it tamed down and left me with the most amazing floral/musky/minty scent! It is truly unique and unlike anything I have ever smelled before. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for something a little different.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I have really been enjoying this scent that I received free from Influenster. I think it lasts a long time on my skin, and works well with my body chemistry. I love musky oriental scent in the winter time. I have gotten a few compliments while wearing this as well, which is always a good sign!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Wasn't my thing but it is a very long lasting perfume. I love the way it smells when others have it on! It is a very very strong sweet smelling perfume and that didn't work well with me having migraines since it did trigger one. I have actually never had that problem before with one of my fragrances. I do actually love this on other people tho.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This fragrance was sent to me for review and I was so excited to try it. This fragrance is long lasting and strong, even after washing my hands to try to get the fragrance off, it managed to stay put. The fragrance is very botanical, herb, floral in fragrance and is quite overpowering. I am not a person to get a headache from fragrance but this one gave me one. Because of the strength of the scent, I would hesitate to wear it around anyone who might be sensitive to fragrance. It isn't my cup of tea and isn't something I would wear ever again. If you're a person who likes earthy, botanical, florals and want something that is strong you will probably enjoy this fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I thought this was going to be more of a botanical scent due to the notes. I was expecting it to be more fresh. It reminds me more of a cologne. My husband said he really liked it but also thought it was a cologne. It does last all day as it's a strong scent. I do think it lightens in its notes throughout the day to be a little bit sweeter. Again, if you like strong scents and are familiar with Mugler's other fragrances then you might really enjoy this one.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I really love this fragrance you can notice the essences of orange woods and orange blossom, which I enjoy a lot, it is a very sensual and feminine aroma, it is sweet but not cloying, it is long lasting, after six hours it seems freshly applied, It is fresh, but at the same time it is intense without becoming heavy, the combination is perfect, it is now one of my favorites, perfect to use at night, it is the perfect gift.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this complimentary to try and to review, and honestly I didn’t like this perfume at all. It was sweet but musty at the same time. It smelled cheap or like an old person. I was hoping it would mix with my body chemistry, and get better, but sadly it didn’t. This perfume wouldn’t even be in my top 1,000. It’s strong enough that you smell it all day, which wouldn’t be bad if you actually liked it, but it’s just not good. Sweet, musty, maybe with a dash of vanilla. No thanks.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Aura by MUGLER is definitely a unique scent. I've never come across something that manages to be vanilla, floral, and woody at the same time. Aura has great longevity and decent but not overwhelming sillage. The one down side is there's a slight medicinal note that I can't quite place. But overall it's a very lovely perfume that I can see myself wearing for casual nights out. I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes, but do envision purchasing some more.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Received the tiniest sample of this product for free from influenster and I'm honestly not a fan. The scent is just too overwhelmingly sweet for me. Did a little research on the notes in this fragrance and what I found listed are; Tiger Liana, Rhubarb Leaf, Orange Blossom,Bourbon Vanilla and Wolfwood. Wish I was able to pick up more of the floral notes, but on my skin I seem to only get the bourbon vanilla.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of this, and at first I was unsure if I liked the scent. Its more of a mature scent then I typically wear, but it is absolutely long-lasting. Throughout the day, I started to enjoy it more and more. A little goes a long way, but its part of my daily routine now.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Just discovered this new fragrance, and I just looooove it, so different from other fragrances. The bottle is beautiful, and the fragrance stays on for ever, my fiancé loves it too!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a complimentary sample of this fragrance. I felt that this perfume is quite a musky scent. I didn’t grasp the woody notes and I felt that it smelled a bit minty. The fragrance lasted on my skin all day and my jacket still smelled of it the next morning. So A+ on the longevity!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: When I received the email about the free sample that I would receive from the perfume I was very excited, because I had never received a product like this one for free, its presentation is beautiful and original, a beautiful color like an emerald ... when tasting it the smell is very alcoholic However, once it dries the aroma is divine, like vanilla with a touch of musk and lasts all day, my husband loved it ... looking on the internet note that the perfume is priced at $ 75, what which I think is a little high, although I still love the perfume I received to try for free ... I recommend it, it is excellent for those who like intense perfumes with a vanilla aroma
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of this completely free for testing purposes and honestly I wasn't impressed. The scent was more of a fruit/musk smell and I did not really enjoy it. The scent was very overpowering and not as feminine as I enjoy.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was excited to receive this fragrance complimentary for testing purposes, but unfortunately it wasn't a scent I was fond of. Perfumes are so subjective from one person to the next depending on what you're looking for and how the fragrance matches with the pH of your body. The initial smell for me wasn't something that was pleasant. It was almost medicinal and I couldn't quite explain it until I read another review that compared it to Listerine and I agree. After that fades away, there are some sweet botanical scents and it's definitely more fresh than some other overwhelming fragrances, but I personally did not want to wear this and didn't look forward to spraying it again. If possible, try to test it in a store before purchasing.

I typically wear Blue by Ralph Lauren and prefer more light floral scents. The packaging is really cool; love the green gem theme! I received this product complimentary for review purposes.

column7: While this fragrance is a little strong and sweet for my taste, I do like it better than Alien and Angel, those are fragrances I just don't like. I can see a lot of ladies liking it. Fragrance is so personal and I'd tell anyone to give it a go.

column7: My first impression was that the scent seems wild but also sophisticated. It’s slightly spicy but also sweet. column6: Sweet, with an earthy spiced undertone.
column7:
When I first applied this perfume I was thrown off by the strictly floral scent it had. I didn't think I would like it. After an hour or so it softened into a beautiful and complex smell. Throughout the day I would catch a sweet smell, almost like cotton candy, but it also carries a deeper hint of spice and earthy underneath. I can't stop smelling it now! It's captivating. It's wonderfully balanced. Fresh and sweet, with great depth. Would recommend and will continue to wear.

I received a free sample through Influenster, in exchange for an honest review.

column7: I am absolutely in love with this scent. Its beautiful earthy and sweet and its not super over powering for those who have a sensitive nose. I love that its refillable too. I did still try it out for a week while I was at home and the scent had great staying power. I could still smell it 12 hours after spraying it so the quaility is anazing. column7: I found that the scent was very nice but if you put too much on it can be a little over power so you have to watch how much you put on. column7: I read a few of these reviews before leaving mine, and it's pretty interesting how different scents hit different notes for people. Eventually the scent dissolved and reacted more with my body and it smelled slightly better, but it took too long to get to that stage and I was gagging over the initial scent. Personally, not a fan, and would never purchase.

column6: Not a perfume smell that spoke to me
column7: The packaging and promo graphics are beautiful and very alluring! I received a sample size complimentary for testing purposes so I didn't get to experience the full-size bottle - but looking at the pictures the bottle looks AMAZING! My first reaction to the smell is that it is not notes I typically tend to gravitate towards. This is definitely a more earthy and musky smell, and rather potent and powerful - a little goes a LONG way. I immediately felt that it is a more mature smell and something my mother would enjoy and not my twenty-something-year-old sister. Based on the smell, I would not purchase only because it is not a perfume smell I typically enjoy, but I will be looking to see what other perfumes Mugler creates. - received complimentary for testing purchases - all opinions and thought are my own.

column6: A little too strong, a little too sweet
column7:
I received a sample of this scent for testing purposes.

When I first sprayed this fragrance, I made sure to only spray a very small amount just to get a feel for the scent. Even with that small spray, the scent quickly filled the room. It was very strong, almost overpowering, sweet smell. There was an undertone of something that was almost floral as well, but it was largely overpowered by the sweetness. It is a very bold scent that does settle after a while, but it still remained strong to the point where my head started to ache.

Overall, I think that if you are a fan of sweet scents and are seeking to truly make a statement, this fragrance may be for you. However, if you are sensitive to strong fragrances, you may want to pass on this.
