column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I wasn't sure what to expect when I received this to try out. Read the description and was still unsure of what the scent would be like. When I first sprayed it on I got a wonderful flowery scent, then it changed to a more deep plant/flower scent. I was surprised, but really liked it! For me it wasn't the typical, run-of-the-mill perfume I was expecting. I am really enjoying the smell of this perfume and am excited to keep using it.

I received this complimentary to test out and give my opinion on; the opinions express are fully my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Upon first spray, you get a huge punch to the senses! It has a lot going on in this fragrance. It smells very botanical, with very minuscule hint of mint. It is a very dark and sensual fragrance, it is kind of mysterious and wonderful for evening wear and the winter time in my opinion. It's perfect for anyone who likes earthy/botanical/natural scents. If you are into light and fresh scents, this is not for you! I happen to really love this fragrance. I sprayed once on my wrist, and dabbed behind the ears. It lasted all day long without any retouch which is incredible. I]find that the longer it sits on the skin, the better it smells. It pairs very well with my skin chemistry. I have had compliments all day long! 
I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Very different from other scents I own. Somewhat woodsy but very sweet as well. Very strong bourbon notes so if you don't like that this isn't for you. Not the best scent for me personally as I prefer Alien but think for the right person it would be good. I received this product free for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a free sample of this but I would definitely purchase in the future. The scent lasts the entire day and smells like botanicals. I would recommend this perfume if you're looking for something that lasts the entire day
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product complimentary for testing. This perfume is strong when first applied, but it is not so overpowering after a few minutes. The scent is sophisticated. I picture a strong, successful woman wearing this scent. If you do not like sweet or flowery scents, then this is not the perfume for you. This scent is unique and demands attention.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: In love with this new fragrance, very feminine
column7: This frangance takes you through a journey. From the first spray till it dries down you get different notes.at first it smells so green, fresh and comes strong. Then it airs out to a vanilla scent, strong at first but then to a subtle musky vanilla. Then again the green fresh notes hit you again, but to a softer hint on freshness. The vanilla notes linger and stay till the dry down. It’s very femine, for mature women. The fragrance is amazing!! It’s unique, yet not for everyone, is more of a mature scent. I love how it works with my skin, it’s long lasting and a little goes a long way. I received a complimentary sample for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: this perfume has a unique smell i never smelled before. Definitely has a great flower smell to it with a musk scent to it. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and it was great!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a complimentary sample of this product, and was very excited to try it! Right off the bat, I have to say that I love the packaging! It is gorgeous! The deep, vibrant green tones were very attractive. I was somewhat upset with the fragrance itself. I found it to be very strong, and a little too musky for my taste. I thought that I noticed a hint of citrus, which I really like, but I am more in favor of a floral, tropical scent. This one would be amazing for anyone that is appreciative of something a little stronger and musky. Well done on the scent, but it’s just not the one for me.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I wasn't sure I was going to like this fragrance because I'm not a huge fan of earthy scents, but this one is amazing. It has a beautiful floral, earthy scent that I truly love and the packaging is very cute with the pretty green box and tissue paper. I received this product complimentary for reviewing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Not my inner nature, not my aura
column7:
There is a huge disconnect between how the perfume is marketed and how it actually smells. I love the packaging and the artistic vision of the promos. The promos show green lush tropical jungle and a female Tarzan. But when I smell Aura I imagine an old lady boudoir, full of cats, gowns, wigs and golden mirrors and old men smoking cigars in a cabaret. 
The scent is very strong and lasts very long time. It's very sweet powdery vanilla with masculine musky oriental notes mixed in. This scent is something my old aunts and grandmother would like, not for me.
I received a complimentary sample for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: i do not love the smell.
column7: I received this perfume as a complimentary sample. The packaging of the actual perfume is absolutely beautiful but unfortunately, I do not care for the smell of this fragrance at all. I cant really even explain what the perfume smells like, I just really didn't like it at all. I would not repurchase this in the future.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I love Mugler fragrances. I've worn Alien for years. When I received this from Influenster for sampling purposes, I swear I jumped out of my seat. The smell is so rich and beautiful. I put a small spray on this morning and at 3pm, I can still smell it. It's not overwhelming or anything. It's feminine, spicy, and definitely unique. Definitely consider it for your next fragrance purchase. My last comment is the bottle design. I think the Mugler bottles are pieces of art. The gorgeous emerald color and unique shape should be proudly displayed on your vanity. It's beautiful!
I received a sample of this fragrance for testing purposes from Influenster and Mugler.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was excited to received this complimentary sample. I had read up on the brand and saw many wonderful reviews of their other products. My immediate thoughts after the first spritz was "Woah!", it was borderline overwhelming sweetness with a medicinal after-scent. Very much reminded me of vicks or some other cough medicine. I still decided to give it a few tries. After a few hours the scent relaxes and has a much more pleasant aroma. I just can't get over that initial punch to my nose. I will say, I have received compliments on the scent so it's nice to know others aren't offended by it. I will not be purchasing this in the future, but I am glad I had the opportunity to give it a try. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This is the perfect Winter scent for me. In my opinion AURA is a feminine yet bold scent. I wore this fragrance and it lasted all day. One of my top 5 winter scents for sure. You have to try this one!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Bold and beautiful! My new favorite!
column7: This fragrance draws me in like no other I have ever smelt. The initial scent I got was a lovely citrus sweetness, but it didn't last long. It then started to smell very green, but not a light summer green, a heavier darker mysterious green. Almost smells slightly minty. But that too fades, into a warmer Woodsy, sensual vanilla, with an ever so slight indescribable greenness, that Is so refreshing. Which is where it has stayed on me, the dry down is so beautiful. It's bold but not overpowering! It's very refreshing to smell something so different! This perfume definatley makes a statement! It has great lasting power, it stuck with me through the day, and there was a faint lingering smell the next morning on my wrist. When my husband got off work I asked him to smell my wrist and tell me what he thinks, and he really liked it! It's not something I usually go for, I enjoy a little lighter perfumes. But I don't venture out to far because I'm very sensitive and most give me a very bad headache, or make me nauseous, but this did not! I have really enjoyed smelling this all day long! It's very different and I love it!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received and tried the Aura Mugler perfume today and it smells really nice. It's very sweet and fruity with a floral undertone. It seems to last a very long time because one small spritz hours ago is still pleasant and aromatic. The bottle that the full size product comes in is absolutely stunning and I would love to have it sitting on my vanity just for how beautiful it is. If you like high-quality and fragrant perfumes, this one is really fantastic. It would make an amazing gift with Christmas right around the corner. I highly recommend Aura Mugler based on the free sample I received today. I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product for testing purposes. It is definitely not my cup of tea. While the package was absolutely adorable and something I loved, the perfume in my opinion smelled like sour milk and toothpaste. I would not buy.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Don't judge from sniffing the bottle
column7: At first i didnt think i was going to like this. Smelling it in the bottle, it smells musky and reminded me of men's cologne. Having used three days in a row now, it has really grown on me. I have used two spritz each time, with it lasting several hours, and never too over powering. With Orange blossom notes, this perfume reminds me a lot of a perfume my mom used to wear in the 90s (and i used to use when she wasnt looking) called Tabu by Dana. Both have an oriental smell, however, aura has strong notes of vanilla. Perhaps it is a little nostalgic for me, but I like it and would purchase. It is a nice change from the perfumes I usually wear (black opium and chloe). I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I absolutely love this fragrance!! The juice is a beautiful blend of floral and citrus. Unlike some perfumes this lasted all through the day and I actually grew to like it more as the day went on. On top of that the beautiful emerald green bottle in the shape of a heart looks adorable on my boudoir! Will definitely purchase again!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
It smells beautiful!! Very unique, I haven't smelled anything like this before. Very Mugler! 
Love Aura and I have received many compliments already.
Love the bottle as well.
Well done!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received the Aura Mugler Perfume Free for product testing. The Fragrance is very sweet smelling with a little bit of earthy scent. At first spray the perfume was a little strong but then after it settled it had a overall good aroma. I felt this product was long lasting and performed well through out the day. I love the packaging. I think it is very different and I really love the Green. Overall thought this was a good product
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. I got a small sample and it smells pretty good. This is not the scent I typically purchase but i'm not opposed to it. It has a sweet scent to it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Aura is my new go-to! It's like nothing I've ever smelled before and I LOVE it!
Now I can't wait to get the body lotion! Would definitely recommend this scent if you're looking to stand out from the crowd.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I have newly been introduced to Mugler and got a free sample to try of this new fragrance! Visually love their creative ads and perfume bottles, it’s nice to see something different yet appealing. My initial reaction to the scent was confused! It had an almost candy feel to the aroma but not off putting. I let the scent sink in to my skin a few minutes to get a more accurate opinion as it can change with each person after contact. I have to say I was loving it!! It reminded me of my favorite men’s cologne Burberry Brit but with a sensual feminine touch. I will definitely keep trying this out and possibly purchase a full size in the future!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I love smelling good and love perfume, but this is overpowering! One little spray on my wrist and I was overtaken with the smell!! Even my husband had to clear the room! It's too strong for one thing and I don't like the smell itself. I can't put my finger on what exactly it smells like, but not good. It doesn't smell "pretty" or "sexy" which is what I would like to smell like. Not a fan!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: First I was a little disappointed in the size of the sample. When I smelled it from the bottle it didn’t seem too strong so I thought it would be good for me. I have severe asthma so I can’t do strong perfume. When I first put the perfume on it was very strong. And it stayed strong for a good amount of time. It’s not really something that seems like me. Going try it a few more times. I received this product for testing purposes only.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I really wanted this to be great. The packaging and promotion of this beautiful. I like woodsy tones but not a fan of vanilla or musk. I received this scent complimentary and my husband said I smelled like his dead auntie. Unfortunately, the smell let me down and the price is unreasonable for the quality of this product. I was also not thrilled I had to create an account to even review this. So overall I do not recommend but I do give it average rating for the beauty of the promo and packaging
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
the fragrance smells so good I had my husband smell it and hr thought it was nice as well. It was more of a sweet scent. At first very strong but after a couple minutes the scent settles and I couldn't get enough. I have been using it for several days now an have been complimented on the scent. 

I received this perfumes free complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: My first impression upon receiving this perfume is that it's beautiful. The bottle and packaging look great. I love the green color. The fragrance itself is earthy, and if applied extremely sparingly, it is pleasant. It is too strong of a scent for me to wear on a regular basis, but I am very sensitive to fragrances. I would recommend this perfume to women who love perfume and aren't sensitive when it comes to fragrances. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: I really wanted to like this!
column7: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and looking at the packaging, I was just wowed! I thought I would love the fragrance and immediately run out to buy a full size. NOPE. I sprayed my wrist one time and was met by a strong scent of mold. Whatever combination they put in there mixed with my body chemistry did not mix well. After about 15 minutes the scent calmed down and I tried smelling my arm again. This time it was much nicer. In fact, I may consider wearing it from time to time, but that initial spray was just toxic.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
Aura Mugler is definitely a very unique fragrance. It is very hard to describe and definitely not what I expected, but I love how unique of a scent it is. I wasn't sure at first if I liked it or not, but it definitely grew on me! It smells much different on my skin then it does just out of the bottle. It has some strong floral scents along with some sweeter spices! It is long lasting and I would definitely recommend to others!
I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Beautiful bottle, but the vanilla feels artificial
column7:
The bottle looks great. And if I were to go by packing, I would have definitely purchased it. Luckily I received a sample. The notes are interesting. Floral with a hint of vanilla. However, the vanilla does not feel like the true vanilla flavor but reminds me of the artificial vanilla essence from cakes. The floral notes are too strong for me as well. 
Just to give a reference, J'adore is my favorite perfume and usually prefer slight citrus scents.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: When I smelled it through the small bottle I didn’t think it smelled that bad, but on me it didn’t agree with my body chemistry. It is a very strong perfume. I only put one spray on, I tried to wash it off and hours later I could still smell it so if your looking for a long lasting scent, this is definitely it! They describe it as an assertive botanical scent and I think that’s fairly accurate. I usually prefer a little milder scents for most days. Overall not a terrible perfume, just didn’t work for me. I received this sample for free for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I am very picky with perfumes, I received a sample of this product for testing purposes and honestly I did love it! 
It does has this strong and elegant scent, I do not know how exactly describe it, but there is one thing that I can tell for sure, if you consider yourself a strong, independent, sexy and elegant woman, then this perfume its for you. 
It is perfect to wear on winter and especially on the holidays. You won't regret it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I recieved a sample of this perfume for my honest review. My first impression of this perfume was wow this bottle is beautiful!! I in all honesty was confused by the notes in this, at first it smelled of grapes and tiger balm, then it dried down to a more greener, menthol, bubblegum scent. I need more time to see how I feel about this scent. I really like Angel by Mugler, but not this. I think this is a great perfume for someone looking for a different scent. 
Review your Aura MUGLER Fragrance!
Submit a screenshot of your review!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Aura Mugler is a great new scent. It is a unique fragrance for sure. It is the perfect balance of woodsy meets vanilla. It is long lasting which makes it a great value. The price point is reasonable compared to other quality perfumes. I love to try new fragrances. While Aura may not be a must have for me, it was nice to try a small sample. The sample packaging did win me over because it is a spray tester versus a pop top sample that is messy. I do wish the sample had been a deluxe sample to allow for trying the perfume over a couple of days. I look forward to trying more Mugler products in the future. I received this sample complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I would say this is NOT the right perfume for me. The notes are sweet and a bit of a musk. I LOVE SWEET NOTES! I am more into the summery smells, the tropical flowers, fruits etc. My husband said this smells like his Cuban mother and grandmother which I would have to agree, smells more like a mature woman smell. It didn't adjust to my body chemistry, which is very unusual. It does last a very long time which is very good for a perfume. Most do not last as long. I received this product as a sample for testing purposes. The sample size was very small. A deluxe sample size would have been nice so I could continue to wear it and see if I start to enjoy it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: It’s not my favorite scent MUGLER makes but it’s a very good scent. It does last all day. It is a sweet scent. My husband likes it and I’ve gotten several compliments wearing it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Loved this fragrance. It has a fresh and clean smell and it last all day. The minute I sprayed it on my hand i fell in love with it. I received this perfume for complimentary purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
The packaging is beautiful. Comes in a nice thick box with a green print, has matching green tissue paper inside. My first thoughts on this is that it smelled like a perfume for a more mature lady. It smells very very sweet, almost off-puttingly so. It reminded me of fermented apple.
 As I went about my day the perfume mellowed out and didnt seem as overpoweringly sweet. Although it still seemed like something for an older lady. I would say the scent lasted around 5 hours.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: An earthy/woodsy type of scent with a very sweet back note. It is unlike anything else I have ever smelled. Maybe its the rhubarb that sets it off. Not to my personal preference but not unpleasant, I just prefer more sandalwood type scent for earthy tones. Unfortunately it doesn't mesh well with my body chemistry as it reads almost onion like after a few minutes. But initial scent is very intriguing and I'm sure would smell better on others. I think I prefer the Alien scent much more than this one.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I had never tried Mugler perfumes before, but I received a complimentary sample size for testing purposes, and I am not disappointed! Aura scent is very earthy and smells great. Bonus, the scent literally lasts all day! I got compliments on it throughout the day! I will definitely be recommending Aura Mugler to everyone! I can’t wait to try other scents too!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This perfume is a beautiful bold and unique fragrance with a fruity and floral scent. Best of all, I sprayed this once and it lasted ALL day and night! I even received several compliments from friends. Overall, a great decision if you're looking to splurge on a new signature scent. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: First off, the bottle looks beautiful! I love the green color. I also like the idea of refillable bottles, I had not seen that before. When I saw the description as oriental, that had my hopes up, as I usually steer clear of anything too flowery. I prefer woodsy and dark, slightly musky, scents. The fragrance was way too sweet for me. If you like super sweet, flowery or candy like scents, it could be a hit for you, but it was overwhelming for me. I will say it was strong and lingering which I like because if you’re wearing an expensive perfume you want it to stick around! I received a free sample in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was excited to try this new perfume for free for my honest review. The bottle and color are amazing! One bottle you would want to keep out for a beautiful display. Very earthy but sweet! Hard to explain because it’s very different from anything I’ve used or smelled before. It has a long lasting scent. I have used the Angel from this brand but this is by far a more clean sweet scent. I also like the fact that this brand has refillable which not many perfumes companies offer. I would have given it five stars but I think the price is a bit expensive for my budget.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Love the name but not my scent
column7:
I was really excited to try this, but it's not really my scent. It's a little too heavy/muggy for me to wear everyday. 

However, it has staying power! I put it on right as I walked out the door this morning and nearly 10+ hours later, you can still smell it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: My first impression of the fragrance was that the green color made it seem like it’s going to have a earthy and sweet smell too it. I’m actually getting used to the smell at first it seemed a little bit strong and something I’m not used too because I’m usually more used too fruity and more sweeter smells. I would purchase this fragrance once it comes out. It’s something different for me to add to my collection. I would recommend this fragrance to any lady out there who would like a sweet earthy smell. It gives you like an outdoor sweet feeling. I was grateful to receive this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was very surprised to find a Perfume I actually like,I’m more of a body spray person. The smell is earthy and has notes of musk,it smelled amazing and my boyfriend loved it on me!! I received this for complimentary purposes to try for free
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: If you love Alien you will LOVE this!
column7: I’m a huge fan of all the Thierry Mugler fragrances already. Aura is beautiful! It reminds me of Alien except a little sweeter. It seems to last awhile on my skin and the sweetness fades to a beautiful sweet powdery musk! I definitely recommend checking this one out! And the bottle is a gorgeous emerald green! So unique! I received a sample for testing purposes. But I would have seeked this out on my own!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I'm not sure what the top notes are in this, but the first spritz reminded me of a wet animal. I was starting to regret spraying myself, but it quickly dissipated and the scent is a sweet and musky floral. It still reminds me of something wet, but more like the smell of rain in a garden. It's sweet, but not cloying. It's musky, but not manly. Normally I wouldn't wear this type of scent. Anything musk or spice ends up mixing terribly with my chemistry, but this still smells great on me. I usually expect musky scents to be worn in the evening, but the sweet flowery notes make this scent wearable anytime. I tend to go for florals and sweet scents, so this is different and I'm surprised how much I like it! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and I'm so glad I did!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Strong is definitely the word for this perfume. One spray goes a very long way. It can seem almost overpowering at first, but it does last a long time, so you gotta give somewhere. It’s definitely different than anything else I’ve ever smelt. I received a free sample to try out and review and I agree that’s it’s very feminine but definitely not light. It wouldn’t be a fragrance I’d wear every day, but would be great for a night out. Overall I really like it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and test it I did. I was super excited to get the sample in the mail, opened it up and sprayed it, it smelled a little strong but I put it on my wrist and away I went. The scent is pretty strong and a bit much for myself. I literally only used one spray and it smelled up the entire room. The scent is nice but overpowering. Smells like a Giorgio Armani scent I used to wear but stronger.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Nothing like I have ever smelled
column7: I received a sample from Influenster to test. The scent of this perfume is very different. I haven't figured out yet if I like the scent or not. It's a sweet scent but there is something in it that I can't figure out yet. The scent does last a long time and it is a little over whelming. A little goes a long way. The bottle is beautiful. I would buy it once just for the bottle.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: If you like candy woods, this is for you
column7: This is actually a really nice scent. Woodsy and sweet, with a few floral notes. And it doesn't bother my allergies which is rare and also pretty awesome. But let me warn you. This is definitely a dab will do ya stuff! Instead of spreading it fully on your skin, I recommend spraying it in the air and walking through it. I did it that way about five hours ago and I still smell it just as much as I did then. It's a little strong for sure, and it lasts a good long time. This really isn't for everyone, but I personally dig it. Still have to put it through the boyfriend test to see if he likes it. Luckily the free sample I received to test will last me a while since I'm not a perfume every day person.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I think that the bottle and the concept of this product is very cool. There is not much on the market that looks like this perfume. But sadly that is all of the positive comments I have for this perfume. I do think it is safe to note that every one has different taste and likes for perfume. This is just my opinion on what I like in a perfume. The notes to me smell like a mix of old lady perfume, mint and vanilla. The smell is strong, like really strong. I am not sure who thought this was a good idea to make but it should be marketed to 75+. I feel it smells most similar to the old lady White Diamonds perfume, mixed with a vanilla and mint toothpaste. I will be real and say even if the bottle was free I would not want it. I think that the idea they went for and the smell that came out were not as good. I received a small small sample of this to test and asked 3 people if they wanted it or I would throw it out and no one did.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a free sample of the new Aura Mugler perfume to review. The fragrance comes in a cute, easy to spray, green colored vial which is a nice change from other samples. The scent itself is overwhelming initially but does settle after a short while. It's musky with hints of what smells like mint, vanilla and other earthy elements which isn't generally what I opt for but it does seem to suit the holiday season right now. It's a bit masculine and bold for me, but I'm sure others would enjoy and I will continue to use the sample.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I really like this scent. I had never heard of Mugler before I was offered a sample of Aura, and I'm excited to learn more about them, and to smell more of their scents. The bottle is lovely, and the scent meshed really well with my body chemistry. It was strong at first, but then it melded into my skin and wasn't so "in your face". Nice musky, but still light scent.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Love this scent!! The new Mugler fragrance perfectly blends freshness with floral and I absolutely love the hints of vanilla. I was amazed at how long the scent lasted on skin and actually enjoyed the scent more and more while wearing it throughout the day. Would definitely recommend!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I honestly thought this fragrance was too strong for my liking it has sweet notes and it lasts very long.It would be great for someone who likes this type of fragrance but if you are sensitive to strong fragrances you might want to pass on this one.I received this product in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received the Aura voxbox by Aura Mugler. The advertisement has a nice future look to it. The fragrance has a musky, outdoor, forest deep scent. It stays on after you wash area off with soap. It is very strong I would not recommend you spray more than 1 or 2 sprays at most. and spray away from face. I love a musk scent but this one was way to strong. I was given a sample of Aura Mugler fragrance to try in exchange for my honest review with #influenster.com
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
The Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum was ok. This is definitely not my cup of tea. Im sure others would enjoy it but I didnt realy like the smell.
The color was definitely attractive.
I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Very Nice But Not for Me
column7: This would be perfect for an older woman and the smell is long lasting for sure. The vanilla ending notes are lovely and sweet, however the wood notes are mature and strong. I received this product as a complimentary sample for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
One spritz of this is all you need for a long lasting sensual scent for the day. It is on the strong side, but I really like it. When I sprayed it on, my husband walked in and told me immediately that he liked the way I smell. So if he likes it, thats a good sign! There is a bit of a musky smell, so I can see where some people may think it smells like their grandma. But for me, it wasn't an overpowering musky smell. I am in my mid 30s and really like it!

I received this complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The Aura Mugler fragrance is very sweet and mildly woodsy. The packaging is gorgeous! Although the fragrance is very sweet, it is a mature fragrance, not something I can see a teenager wearing. I recommend this scent if you tend to purchase sweeter scents, with a slight woodsy feel. This fragrance is not overly floral either. I received this complimentary sample in exchange for my honest review
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this #freesample from Influenster to try. This fresh spicy scent was an amazing and invigorating! I loved how long it lasted and how different it was from all my other perfumes! It made me feel alive and refreshed!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Very Strong and Long Lasting Scent
column7: I received a sample of Aura Mugler complimentary from Influester. It was my first time ever seeing this product or hearing the name. The perfume for sure is very very strong may come out at first with a slight muscular smell to it but after a couple sprays you get used to it. It is very good due to the fact that the smell is strong and long lasting, I smelled it all day from morning to night on my clothes which is a good thing. The smell at first for me was very strong but I do enjoy the smell now after having it on all day. Hard to describe the scent but definitely not floral or sweet scented at all. I would recommend people to at least try this product once or twice to see if they like it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This reminds me of a drugstore perfume my grandmother used to wear when I was little. Its both sweet and spicy. Almost like two separate perfumes in one bottle. The scents don't mesh quite as well as I'm sure the company intended them to. The big takeaway from this perfume is that it is STRONG. I had a huge order of chinese food in my car that I was driving home and couldn't smell it over the perfume. That strong.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Scent for a woman of age
column7: I received this sample to review. It is ok for a woman above the age of 50. I feel like it is a scent my grandmother would have loved to wear. It is a strong scent of, I want to call it a powder bit that's not quite it with a hint of mint in there too. It would not be something I would want or would buy for myself or someone in my age bracket.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received the product free for testing purposes from Influenster. I DID NOT like this at all. This smells way too floral and sweet at the same time. The scent lasts forever and is really strong so if you liked the scent it would be a great perfume. I gave it two stars because it is not the worst smell ever, but I would never ever wear this again and certainly wouldn't buy it for anyone else.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: AURA MUGLER Eau de Parfum is amazing. It has a strong but lovely scent and lasts hours. The scent is s wonderful mix, with sweet with hints of vanilla, spices, and yet earthy. It reminds me of being out in the woods with a lovely fall/winter day. I would suggest it is more of an adult scent than something you would purchase for a teenager. I received a sample of this product complimentary for testing purposes, yet I love it to the point that I hope to purchase a bottle of my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. The color and packaging is beautiful but the sent was way too strong for me. The sent lasts a long time but had to wash it off because it gave me a headache. If you like strong scents that lasts a long time then this is for you. If you are sensitive to smells I would stay clear as it did give me a slight headache. It was disappointing because it is a beautiful perfume.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This is a very strong sent. Starts off as a mint that wears away and turns into hints of vanilla and earthy tones. It reminds me of another perfume but I cant place it to a name. I received this as a sample product. I would recommend to someone whom likes strong scents.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Really enjoy wearing this scent. It has a great fresh smell to it and seems to last all day. I love wearing it to work and out with my husband. I kept getting compliments all day on how great I smelled.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I absolutely LOVE the smell of this perfume! My first reaction, well I didn't like it.. I thought it smelt a little like a old lady perfume but after the perfume settled I couldn't stop smelling it! This has a very unique earthy smell to it. I absolutely love it! I received this product for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: If you enjoy sweet fragrances, then I'm sure you'd like this one! Personally, it was too cloyingly sweet for me-- a mixture of butterscotch and bubblegum. The scent was strong and lasted a long time, which is always a positive for any fragrance. I personally did not like the scent since I prefer floral perfumes, but if you tend to like sugary sweet scents then this is definitely for you! I received this as a free sample with Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I thought this perfume would be perfect for me as I can't wear anything floral. However, I find it far too strong and too sweet, far too overpowering. It, unfortunately, reminds me of walking into a store when people have been testing out too many perfumes. The overall fragrance is nice and it's long lasting however it does make my eyes water and I think it would benefit from being a little more subtle. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum is a nice scent, very sweet which I prefer in scents. It has some hint of florals as well. It lasted throughout the whole day and I received various compliments as well. I would definitely consider purchasing this product for myself since I did receive this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I got a free sample thru Influenster to try. It different from what I normally use but I enjoy it for a change the norm. It is long lasting scent and a little goes a long way.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Nice fragrance but not for me
column7: This is a very nice fragrance. Ive never smelled anything like it. Very intriguing scent. It has a combination of earthy and sweet. Definitely exotic. I recieved a complimentary sample. I just dont think this is for me but it really is a truly unique fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Perfect bold scent for a woman of any age!
column7:
This perfume is exactly the way I want to be as a woman- bold, fearless, always in the forefront of your mind yet also feminine and romantic. I was snagged by the layers of scents, from the floral notes to the hint mint and other natural aromas. 
As soon as I sprayed it my teenage daughter wanted to know what I was wearing and did I have one for her also. She took off with it and has claimed it as her own. While wearing it at school she has received multiple compliments from her classmates. They all love Aura Mugler!
The packaging is gorgeous and the darker green goes perfectly with vibe of the perfume. 
I received this complentary product for testing purposes but I highly recommend it and will be purchasing 2 bottles for my household!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: A refillable bottle, how awesome is that!?
column7: I absolutely love the color, style design of the bottle, and ad for this scent. They all tend to stand out on their own. I love the fact that the bottle is refillable, that itself, is amazing! The price is a tad high but it would be highly recommended as one of those "treat yourself" type items. The scent is musky yet feminine, with a slightly sweet hint. Very unique in it's own that I would definitely love to use often. My mother in law is in love with the scent and already wants to purchase some. I received a free sample to try and this review is my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: At first impression, I wasn't a fan. It smells sort of like Vicks cold medicine. After the fragrance settles through, you can pick up on the flowery / oriental / woody type notes. It's a little too smokey for me to select for everyday wear, but I could see myself using this on special occasions! Not quite as good as the Alien or Angel perfumes. I received a sample of this product complementary for testing purposes, but am looking forward to purchasing when it's available!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: When I received the sample I was amazed. The package is truly beautiful and the smell is just amazing. It is an strong smell but the sent combination for me is just perfect. I would consider buying this product in the near future, every strong women love to have a strong and wonderful fragrance always with them. I really recommend this perfume but keep in mind it is strong. My new favorite! I am very happy I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
This vaguely reminds me of the peppermint scent that old people have. It's not bad, but it's definitely not for me. I'm more of a floral, Wildfox girl.
*I received this as a free sample for testing purposes.*
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: A unconventional scent with a beautiful bottle
column7:
I would describe the scent as green, aromatic, woody and genderless. Yes, it is slightly more inclined towards the feminine side but men can pull it off too! It is not overly sweet. 
The top notes are a bit overwhelming with loads of green and a hint of menthol undertone. The menthol disappears in a bit to leave richer and woodier middle notes.
The vanilla is not intense, just a tiny hint, and not sugary. 
Not a conventional scent.

I love the bottle. 

I received a 1.2 ml vial for sampling.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Smells divine! I got a complimentary sample size. Scent is sweet but not overly sweet. Warm and sexy. This would be great for colder months. Sweet, vanilla and whie floral. It’s green aromatic and not too sweet. Long lasting and stays close to m y skin, Not overwhelming. Nothing special and unique though. I smelled something identical before. Just like other mainstream perfumes in the market.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The smell is very nice. A little bit sweet for my taste but if you are into sweet scents it is very appropriate for you. The package is elegant. I really enjoy trying this perfume.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a complimentary sample of the Aura Mugler perfume from Influenster. (I was not compensated for this post; however, I am creating this post as part of a contest) I will start by saying I am a smell snob. My boyfriend calls me "the nose" because I smell everything. This perfume comes in a really neat bottle, and one sample sized spray smells very strong. That being said the smell itself is too overpowering for me,. This product on me smells somewhat musky with a hint of mouthwash. Others may enjoy it as we all have a different smell chemistry. It reminds me of a perfume for an older female. It's not for me but hey, free samples are available so try it for yourself :)
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: What I like about this scent is that it did stay on for a long time and everyone can smell it. What I didn’t like it is there is a odd smell once you keep smelling it but overall it’s a good perfume. The packaging is great and it looks very nice. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. And I would buy this perfume if I got the chance too.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this product free for testing purposes. I think that the product is very attractive, from the pictures I saw online. The scent itself is not my favorite. I feel like it smells like candy/licorice. I usually wear more floral scents. This says botanical, but to me all I can smell is candy/licorice. I will wear the sample, but it isnt something that I would wear all of the time. I definitely would not buy a full size, especially seeing how expensive it is.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I received a sample size of this perfume to try. It is heavy and musky, more then I'm use to. One spray and it does lasts. 

# I received this product complimentary for testing purposes
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a free sample to try and I LOVE it! I am a big fan of fresh fragrances, anyways, and this is one of the freshest! It has some floral, which I know can turn a lot of people off, but it is combined with a clean scent that really helps to life the floral a bit and will likely make it more palatable to those who have floral aversions. I'll be wearing this every day until my sample runs out, and then, I'll be picking up a full sized bottle!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: OMG!!! Need this immediately! Love the way it smells on me!!! My sample is gone!!!!! Never let down with Mugler!!!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This fragrance is so complex and enjoyable, I love it! It's very earthy, but with a fresh kick to it as well that prevents it from being overly woodsy or herbal. It feels modern but universally so, in a way where women of all ages would enjoy this scent. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone who doesn't like overly fruity or sweet perfumes. I was fortunate enough to receive a sample for the purposes of review, but I have a feeling I'll be back to buy a full size bottle!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was in love with Angel before it came out. And was able to test this and I am blown away. It is hard to describe and the scent will change after twenty minutes. It is soft and suble, fresh and feminine. Slightly musky with a cross between spice and floral. I don't like floral and this is amazing. It lasts all day, try it you will love it.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Unfortunately, I did not like this scent
column7:
Upon first spray, I smelled the woodsy, Oriental scent that was advertised. It was not strong, and I thought I might like it. I sprayed one squirt and still managed to smell it the next day, so there is some staying power to this scent. It was a little too sweet for me. I prefer clean airy smells, and this seemed like it was very heavy. I live in the south where we do not really have a winter, so sticky, cloying fragrances are not usually what I choose. I think this would be better suited for someone else. 

I received this product free to sample and all opinions are my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: So, I received a little sample bottle as a tester product to review. I think the scent is nice. It has a soft vanilla scent to it but also a light mint kick to it. It is although too strong for me. I only used one tiny squirt on my wrist and it was very strong. It reminds me of something my Grandmother would love. My favorite color is green so I do LOVE the color of it and the idea of a refillable bottle is genius! I recommend for older ladies to give this a try.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum was ok - strong is one word to describe it. The scent wasn't necessarily for me - it was really sweet, but I will say it did settle over time and I liked it more, and it did last very long, which is always good to see in a fragrance.The sample vile was a bit small, I would have liked to see at least a deluxe sample size to be able to really test the product for a little bit of time. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This fragrance smells so pure and clean. It has hints of a vanilla musk type smell that make you feel super sexy and exotic. It really awakens your senses. I’ve worn it the past two days since receiving it for free for testing purposes and I have received so many compliments! I love it and plan on purchasing it for myself in the future. Although a I received the product sample for free for testing purposes the review is entirely honest and my opinion of the fragrance.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
This perfume is definitely very unique, there is no scent that I have used in the past that I can use as comparison! I wasn't sure at first if I liked it or not, but it definitely grew on me! It smells much different on my skin then it does just out of the bottle. When I wore it the first time it REALLY grew on me. The brand's description is spot on "vibrant notes with an assertive personality"... it definitely has some strong floral with sensual spices as well! It wears well too, I sprayed the first spray on my jacket and it is still going strong 24 hours later! I am definitely a fan of this new fragrance and I would definitely recommend to others!

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: I really wanted to like this.....
column7: I really wanted to like this. The bottle looks beautiful, and I love the shade of green Mugler chose. I read the first two reviews after I tried the perfume to make sure I did not have a biased opinion. I sprayed a little in the air and thought it was not that bad. A little sweet for my taste, but I signed up to try it out so try it out I would. Holy Batman!! I sprayed it on my wrist, ONE SPRAY, and it was like the sap from a tree had settled on to my skin. The smell was very overpowering. The only thing I can compare it to was Prell. That shampoo in a green bottle I used as a kid. I always liked that smell, but this perfume was like Prell times 1000. I waited about an hour and that was all I could still smell. So, I washed it off. Twice. With Dawn dish soap. And I could still smell it. If you are looking for a perfume that has some staying power, this is for you. There is definitely a woodsy botanical smell as advertised, but it also has some licorice and candy smells thrown in there. I know perfumes smell differently on people due to hormones and such, so I am sure I will walk by someone one day and compliment them on their perfume, and they will be wearing Aura, but this just is not for me.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a free sample of this perfume to test out and I'm glad I did! I really enjoy the scent. It's sort of fruity and bit of warmth. I think it smells really good! I typically do go for fruity scented perfume so this is for sure right up my alley. I definitely recommend this perfume to anyone that likes fruity warm scents. Not sure I would purchase it myself as it is very expensive. But if you have the money then go for it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: Aura Mugler is so fresh and sensual. I have been looking for a scent like this for a longtime. It is so grown up and flirty. The scent lasts a longtime. It isn't overpowering or offensive. It is amazing! I received a free sample of it from Influenster complimentry for testing services.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I love this scent, its sultry and feminine. I prefer the more Oriental fragrances like Black Opium and this one is absolutely fantastic. I was sent an advance sample to test out before the official launch date and I am SO happy that I got to test this one out first...This is a definite must for my collection and I would recommend it to anyone who loves Mugler fragrances, like I said sultry, feminine and sexy!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: When I spritzed the product, I was greeted with a fresh, clean and slightly floral scent. It is not over powering, but lasts a nice long time. I enjoyed this scent and will purchase in the future. I received this product complimentary for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I recently received a complimentary free sample of AURA MUGLER Fragrance. The fragrance is described to have notes of rhubarb leaf, tiger liana, orange blossom, bourbon vanilla and wolfwood. While this scent may be enjoyable for some, I don’t think it is the right perfume for me. As a disclaimer, I prefer fresh scents or white floral scents so I may just not fall into the target audience. That being said, the perfume’s initial scent confused me. I smelled forest scents and orange. The mix of citrus and pine was a bit off. As it dried, it strongly smelled of pine and toothpaste. I probably would not purchase this item for myself. It is currently available online at Mugler’s website.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
My first impression was that It smells fresh but sexy at the same time. It has a spicy, oriental note to it that makes me think of warm summer nights, and something I find appealing. A little research told me this fragrance features rhubarb leaves, tiger liana, orange blossom, bourbon vanilla and wolfwood. Personally, I think this fragrance is better suited to spring or summer. It lasted several hours, and I could still smell traces of it after washing it off with soap. I liked it and would purchase a full size of this for the summer.

I received a sample vial of this fragrance for testing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I absolutely loved this scent. I tend to lean more towards musky scents and was completely blown away. It smells incredible and it definitely has some lasting power!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: So I sprayed this on as soon as I received it in the mail. Was not a huge fan but continued to wear it until my husband smelled it and was disgusted by the smell. I don’t know if it just doesn’t work well with my body chemistry or what. It smelled kind of like sandalwood, those citronella candles that keep mosquitos away, and those weird fruity marshmallows that no one really likes. Like I said, maybe just doesn’t go well with my body chemistry. I’d try other fragrances by MUGLER though. This one was just a miss for me.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: It starts out wintergreen sour with vanilla medicinal but it warms up into a lovely evergreen note like pine needles what I wanted Clinique wrappings to be (but sadly wasn’t). All in all a very nice if different off the beaten path frag but TM is known for his unorthodox offerings. I can’t stop sniffing & I’m going to be sad when it fades away. I got this sample To try from influenster
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: This would be great for date night. It smells very good and not too over powering either. My husband thought it smelled good and said he'd like it if I wore it. Very cute packaging too! I got this free from Influenster and I am not disappointed.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a complimentary sample of this fragrance and it is very unique. It is earthy and sweet. It has a spearmint undertone on my skin. It is incredibly strong and lasts a long time. Fragrance is such a personal preference but this one isn’t for me. It’s almost too strong and I don’t find it particularly pleasant. It is intriguing, though.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: It is not my favorite scent but I do not hate it either. 1 spray goes a long way and it lasts a long time on the skin without diminishing the smell either. I would recommend to a lot of my friends who do not like floral scents I received this product complimentary for review purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I honestly am so intrigued by this fragrance, I've never smell anything like it! And I really don't know how to describe it. This smells like the advertising picture looks if that makes any sense lol it smells mysterious, floral but sweet kind of like a sweet musk. My initial thought I didn't think i would like it but that's because when you first put it on the initial smell is very musky and strange so very different but after that note passes is like walking in the woods at dusk lol again i have no idea how to describe it but it's sensual, sweet and mysterious all at once! And my husband loved it! It last all day and as time passes it smells sweeter with subtle musk notes. I'm glad I got to test this fragrance, I got a sample complimentary from Influenster's to test and review!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I personally did not care for this scent. It might be other people's style but I just thought it was overbearing.it had to much of a musky smell to me. I received a sample size vial to try for free and review with my honest opinion.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I was pleasantly surprised with this scent. I have liked the angel perfumes in the past. This one is different, but still great. It has a very fresh smell and on me it blends so well with my skin in that I can't smell it, but others around me are commenting on it. Its not a scent I would usually wear so I'm really happy with it! Bottle is beautiful too. I was given this scent sample complimentary for testing purposes, but I will be purchasing the full size bottle!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of Aura from Influenster. For it being my first sample, I was very happy about this!! I've always known the Angel & Alien perfumes but I've never really liked the smell. I love muskier scents, and even a little sweeter, especially during the fall and winter seasons. When I opened this up and spritzed it on, I was like woah, it's so strong. After a few seconds the scent really showed through, and it was just how I like it.. muskier and sweet. From what I can tell so far, I think it's going to last awhile throughout the rest of the night. I already want the full size and I'm happy to finally find a Mugler perfume to love! The bottles are absolutely gorgeous, a lot of thought goes into these scents. Great job on this one!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received this sample to try and I was pleasantly surprised! The scent is something I've never smelled before. I was concerned it was going to be too sweet ( the kind that makes me sick) and to my surprise it wasn't! Its a more floral scent but don't worry it will not offend anyone! There are some deeper notes in this scent that have me perplexed because I haven't smelled anything like it. I've been wearing this for a few hours and it has not faded. I'm glad I got a change to try this, I would buy I full size bottle!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I actually really liked this scent. It has an outside green like smell, but yet with a tinge of fruit. It smells differently when sprayed in the air compared to spayed on skin. Both smell great. Is recommend
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
I received this product complimentary for testing purposes. 

Perfume scents are definitely a hit or miss depending on your preference, so I can understand why some may not prefer this if they're more for the floral, light, or sweet scents. This is the complete opposite of those types. Personally, I actually really enjoy the scent of this! I'm definitely a combination perfume scent wearer, so I enjoy switching my scents around so I'm won't get sick of the same type of scent every time. Aura Mugler is more on the stronger side of scents--definitely earthy, musky, energetic, with a hint of spice--actually a perfect Winter scent! I would definitely recommend to anyone who likes strong tones & I would purchase the full-sized bottle (which, is also super cute in design).
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: I received a sample of this perfume to try and at first glance the packaging and bottle presentation is gorgeous. I love the jade green they went with. At first spray on me I didn't think I would love the scent. However, after wearing for 5 mins it's really growing on me! I received this product complimentary for testing purposes and all opinions are my own.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
The packaging is absolutely beautiful. But the price point is a bit on the pricey side. The fragrance is nice but not for me. I feel as though it’s to musky, especially for a younger person. This is one fragrance you would think “older women” would like. Also the fragrance is very strong. One light spritz on your arm and you will be smelling it for hours. My husband walked in to the room and asked if his grandma had stopped by. I would not purchase on my own. 

I reicived this product complementary for reviewing purposes.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Fantastic! Definitely a new favorite scent.
column7: I have really enjoyed wearing this new fragrance! Just a little spritz is enough, it is very fragrant and will last all day. Reminds me a little of the Burberry Brit perfume. The oriental notes of the scent make it unique and recognizable, but not overpowering. I will be rotating this in to my perfume selection as a new favorite! I received this product as a free sample from Influenster in exchange for my review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7:
There's no subtlety to this perfume. From the gorgeous packaging of the product to the notes that come out. It's strong and floral. Hits you right in the senses and transports you to an exotic floral garden. 

If you're someone who loves bold scents then this is definitely for you. If you're someone who isn't a top-heavy floral fragrance fan, like me, then I would say that this isn't going to be something you would enjoy. 

*I received a free sample of this fragrance for review. *
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: As soon as I spritzed this on, my senses were exploding with happiness. It’s a scent that is sweet, yet floral and earthy. It’s a combination that I have never smelled before. Unique and delicious. Even my husband noticed that I was wearing something new, and he loves it. I don’t know if I would be able to justify the price point, but if I get the opportunity to purchase a full size, I will jump on it!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column7: The Aura MUGLER perfume is just not for me. At first glance the packaging was nice as it comes in a nice green sample vial. The large bottle on the sample packaging looks beautiful as well. I normally go for fruity fragrances that are not too musky. This perfume is rather strong which doesn’t bother me at all. The downside is the scent just didn’t mesh with me. It smells like candy with a bit of a floral scent and almost smelled musky. It may suit someone else perfectly but it wasn’t for me. I also asked my husband if he liked it and at first he said he didn’t know what to think. After another few minutes he said it smelled like candy mixed with something else and he wasn’t sure he liked it. I received this sample for free for the purpose of providing my honest review.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column5: Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: I ordered the Aura Set I was supposed to get the fallfresh as an added item I did not receive it because they said they ran out.....Should not advertise if they cannot commit to their advertisement. Or at least send them to the customers when they do receive them back in stock very disappointed

column5: Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: This is my fourth time purchasing this fragrance. I love it so much. I receive so many compliments. People just want to keep hugging  me just to take a whiff

column5: Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: I’m always so excited for my package to arrive!! I have never been disappointed!!  Only impressed!!

column5: Aura Mugler Eau de Parfum Basic Set
column7: I LOVE this new scent and so does everyone around me!

column5: Aura MUGLER Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I am very well pleased with the refill size. I also love, love, love the samples. You can make the samples men or women.

column5: Aura MUGLER Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: So easy to use. And I don't have to run to the store to fill up my perfume bottle.

column5: Aura MUGLER Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Love that my bottle is now easily refillable!! It’s so convenient!

Mugler-Aura Mugler Eau de Toilette is fantastic.  I love the earthy yet feminine scent.  The perfume bottle is elegant enough to be left out but careful others will spray once and be addicted.  I have been wearing for a little over a year and nothing compares.  Love my MUGLER!

column7: I just received my Aura fragrances. It is a lovely, light summery scent that I find very pleasing. As all Mugler fragrances, they are packaged in the most exquisite bottles and jars to be found anywhere today. Thank you for continuing a practice that is rarely to be found in todays fragrance world.

column7: I love wearing this fragrance. Every time I put it on it changes my mood. Oh an my husband Loves when I have it on. Great for setting the mood..

column7:
I have had Womanity (my favorite); but Angel and Alien are just as good. I received a post card in the mail regarding Aura and it smelled so good that I cannot wait until xmas so I can have my husband buy for me.

Michele

column7: I just got this Aura for my birthday yesterday and it is the BOMB!!! I love it and it smells so good on me. All of the Muglers smell great. Thanks for making this one too ! :)

column7: Of coarse the bottle is beautiful. The smell of Aura is so lovely. I originally bought the parfum, but this Toilette version is a knock out. I will be wearing this one and Angel Fruity Fair all summer. Theirry Mugler is so generous with samples and they always ship fast. It is better to order from them direct! A++++++++++++++

column7: The pen is so nice to take along in my purse for a quick fragrance explosion!

column7: I loved the sample scent I had of Aura so wanted to try it again with out committing to a bottle yet.  It just doesn't leave the same scent as the perfume.  It's nice, but it's a cheap plastic.  But for the price, okay.  Just doesn't linger in the same way as perfume.

column7: This parfum is powerful yet soft. I love it, but of course Angel is and always be no1

column7: What a brilliant concept! This is so easy to use and takes up such little space in my purse. I have bought two already.

column6: Lovely scent and easy travel size
column7: This is my first purchase of AURA and find the scent refreshing and new.  I wasn't sure what a perfuming pen was, but was pleasantly surprised to find how this solid method was so easy to use and carry along.  Would still like it in a EAU TO GO refillable spray simply because I love the design of that travel size.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Perfumes

column6: Angel is wonderful, but Aura is awesome!
column7: I tried Aura as a sample when I was getting an Angel product. What a surprise, it is my new "go to" perfume. I love it thank you Mugler!!! Audrey
