column7: I keep my Aura candle in my bedroom, so that even when it isn't lit, it still gently perfumes my bedside. The fragrance makes me think of a fresh, exotic forest where magical creatures may reside.
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfumes > Aura MUGLER > Scented Candles

column7: Aura is a wonderful, luscious scent...easily addictive- enjoy this every chance I get!!
Fresh, herbal and not too heavy. This product leaves just enough scent on your skin. It is not overpowering. Lots of bubbles too!
New fragrance for me and I must tell you, it is out of this world good. I can't just pinpoint one item as I got the whole collection. Everyone asks "What do you have on" tells me I have a winner.

Another wonderful yet light scent from Thierry. He is the best! I am an Alien girl but will fall back on this on occasion now that I've tried it. The only thing I wish was a bit different is the price on this and the Alien shower gel. It only takes a little but $50 still seems high.
Just the right sparkle, perfect size. The longest point measures one and an eighth inches long. Well made. I have tons of jewelry and I've already worn this piece four times in the past month.
It's the best because you get to try other scents plus very fair value best of all just toss in pocketbook and head out with a great scent
Make great gifts to introduce others to my favorite scent.
This was a perfect buy for upcoming travel. Just the right sizes!! And, ANGEL is a scent I have found so delicate it offends no one, not even friends with allergies.

I purchased this as a Christmas gift and it was perfect. The recipient got a full line of Thierry Mugler products and could try them all. She loved them so much she purchased one for a gift for someone else. It's catching! 10 starz on this one!

My daughters are always trying to take my expensive bottles of perfume. This was the greatest gift I could have ever given to them for Christmas. Now they will smell just as great as Mom does and have a little bit of everything to try before making their next step to the larger products,
Viva La Thierry Mugler!
Great Product. I recommend it, it helps you gently draw a perfect straight eye line

column6: Not worth it even at half off
column7: I love Angel and have for many yeArs. The free gifts sent to me years ago are more luxurious than this purse. I was very disappointed to receive a plastic purse for that price. I could find better at a discount store. I just can't believe you would make something so cheap looking and charge loyal customers that amount. . I bought a nice leather purse for so much less. I'll stick with Angel Won't branch out again
column20: Fragrance > Fashion Accessories > Leather Goods > Bags

column7: I came across ICE*MEN when a sample was included with my first ANGEL purchase. Monsieur Mugler quickly became my favorite genius of creating a line of undeniable sensual aromas and essences, as well as my husband's. Let the pheromones run rampant. My man smells extraordinary, glorious, and astonishing! Don't deny your loved one (or yourself) the opportunity to experience ICE*MEN. It can be used interchangeably with Mr. Mugler's other scents: i.e. A*Men shower gel or Mugler shower gel. Please be certain to pick up a bottle of ICE*MEN cologne as well as the aftershave. I have been unable to locate it in stores in Tampa, but am very grateful that I have been able to purchase it through the online boutique. Ordering through the Mugler Boutique is very easy. Items arrive quickly, there is a card for the recipient, and more so, I know I am ordering authentic merchandise.
column20: Fragrances > Men > Ice Men perfume > Bath & Body

column7:
A lot of fun. They are up for any occasion.
Easy to wear, nice weight. Can be worn for casual or for an evening out.
I haven't purchased any jewlery yet because I can't find any reference in the descriptions as to what kind of metal is used in the jewlery. For those with metal allergies this is crucial.

column6: She's going to shine like a STAR!!
column7: I purchased these earrings for my niece's High School graduation which doesn't happen till June 2016. I know she's going to love them. They are absolutely beautiful! Thanks so much Thierry Mugler...love ya!
This is my third bottle of Innocent. I still have Angel but love Innocent to mix it up a bit.  Its light and subtle and it just makes me happy when I'm wearing it

I was initially afraid to purchase Innocent due to allergies.  These are so many perfume that I love the fragrance, but it don’t love me.  Angel is the one perfume that I love and it loves me back.  Innocent may be my next favorite. Soft smelll.
Innocent is not so innocent. It is sensual, in your face and femininity in a bottle. I’m so glad I took the plunge...compliments galore!

I have been using Angel Innocent for almost 20 years. I am pleased to still be able to purchase it, as it used to be sold in department stores. after all these years I still have people comment on what I am wearing.
I bought Innocent Natural Spray after having used the body cream ages ago. Not only taken by the beautiful bottle, with it's cut glass and tiny jewel; I love the sweet scent.--"lavrose"

I HAVE BEEN WEARING ANGEL, ALLIEN, INOCENCE AND NOW I LOVE THE BODY CREAM!! I GET A LOT OF COMPLEMENTS IT REALLY SMELLS DELICIOUS. I TRIED THE FIRST TIME ABOUT 15 YEARS AGO AND I ALSO HAD THE PLEASURE TO VISIT THE HOUSE WHEN I WENT TO PARIS. I HIGHLY RECOMEND ANGEL TO ALL MY FRIENDS AND FAMILY I ALREADY GOT MY MOTHER WEARING IT. I WOULD LIKE MY FREE BOTTLE I SIGNED ON THE CIRLCE AND I HAVE MADE 4 PURCHASES EVER SINCE I ALWAYS PUT THE CODE. 
MR MUGLER YOUR PARFUMS ARE THE BEST!! NEVER CHANGE IT.

CONGRATULATIONS FROM ONE OF YOUR FOREVER CUSTOMER

MARIA I. HURTADO

I started wearing Innocent in 1998 when I needed something lighter than Angel to wear in the office. I have loved this scent from day one and I still do! I tried another perfume briefly, but my kids weren't having it. They make sure I always have Angel Innocent on my dressing table and in my purse.

I have used Angel products for many years. I enjoy using Innocent during the hot summer days. It is a much lighter fragrance than Angel which I use also .I get many compliments from people, "You smell good, what are you wearing?"
"I love what you are wearing, it smells wonderful." Love, love, love my Angel.

I've been wearing Angel since it was first sold on the market......Then Innocent came out and Kapow!!! I mixed them and that's the way I've been wearing those fragrances ever since. That's been about uh, let's see, whenever Innocent came out. I can't remember when but it's been a long long time. People will definitely smell the Angel, but some of them will say they know it's Angel but it smells BETTER than Angel. And that's when I say, I mixed the Angel with Innocent and I call it "Innocent Angel". I'm in sales, so when I go in to see people, they ALWAYS say "Maria is here, we can smell her!" Ha Just try mixing the two together and see what happens. It really is a BEAUTIFUL fragrance when you mix the two.

column6: I LOVE LOVE LOVE Angel Innocent!
column7:
Angel Innocent has literally been the ONLY fragrance I've used for at least a decade since a dear-heart first bought it for me. It's that fabulous. I'm intoxicated by the way I smell when I wear it. And I always get compliments. Total strangers will say things like, "Mmm, you smell good!" (women) or "Wow, I want to sit next to you!" (men) 
But when I recently purchased another glorious bottle of this earthly delight, Mugler also sent me some complimentary samples, and I have to say that Angel Muse (the only one I've tried so far) is some kind of terrific, too. It's like wearing a heady, decadent dessert. I never thought I'd find anything that held a candle to Innocent, but I have to tell the truth. If the other 4 samples are in the same ballpark, I may have to sign over half of my disposable income to Thierry Mugler going forward. :-)

column6: Delicious, fun, & flirty my FAVORITE Angel
column7: It has been years since I have worn Angel "Innocent". So long ago actually, that the parfum was in an aerosol type can! I absolutely love this fragrance, definitely unforgettable. It is beautifully fresh, light and romantic and strangers have passed by and then stopped to compliment me on smelling so wonderful! Whenever I wear it I hear people questioning what smells so great and I secretly smile knowing it's none other than, ME! I definitely recommend Innocent to anyone that loves the Angel fragrance line. I also adore my Muse but it is a more sensual, warm and yummy fragrance that I now reserve for evenings and date nights. If only we could get body wash and lotions for these two lines!!!
I love this scent from the Mugler collection! It's a clean and not overpowering scent that lasts all day!

This is the only thing my husband loves for me to wear! Its light and doesn't give me a headache like other smells! I have been wearing this scent for over 10 years. But I'm also in love with the NEW ANGEL MUSE!
I just love this smell and wherever I go people ask what I'm wearing and I always get a lot of compliments. I have tried the other Angels, but the Angel Innocent is classic and elegant.

I have been wearing this parfume every day, for the last many many years. What I like about it is that it's very delicate but also bold in the same time and unique.
I got lots of compliments about this fragrance many times.
Simply love it!
Love all Angel products. I fell in love with Angel and then started uding Angel Innocent

column6: bought the year this came out and still melt
column7: I have never loved any other fragrance as much as ANGEL and ANGEL INNOCENT'S, I switch things up between the two to add variety and every time I wear either, I get one or more persons... men for their wives and other women will stop me to ask what I'm wearing. I love this designers amazing talent for creating heaven for the nose, lol. I do have a confession... I love this so much I'm was hesitant at telling people my secret (..though I always did) because I love it being MY brand. lol, I was younger back then so a little negev but I figure.. I better keep this guy in business! However. there was a time where it was really hard to find... like in 2001-2005, I discovered it when living in LA so when I moved to NY it may not have reached east cost then, but I found it eventually at a MACY. Only Angel but no innocents.. I searched no matter how high or how low and bought as much as I could afford when I did... I am SO happy to see it stronger than ever( by being stronger I mean MUGLER not the fragrance!) I can also remember when Victoria secrets sold it exclusively but by another name.. but knew it was angel right away! you will love this scent but no one can love it more than me... ha ha, kidding... sort of :)
I love the smell of the perfume but I can never find it in any stores and the lotion and other products that go with the perfume are always out of stock.
I LOVE Angel, Angel Innocent and Alien. Always receive compliments when I wear any one of the three.

VERY NICE...used it while on vacation while in the Caribbean as I felt it was a lighter fragrance vs. my angel or alien or eau sucre or muse and it worked well by not being too intense. I'm not sure if I would purchase it again as the orignal Angel and Alien are in fact my favorites.
Is by far my second favorite Thierry Mugler perfume next to Angel.
I love the Innocent spray because it is a little softer than the angel perfume and I like softer scents.
This is a light, but long lasting scent. I love this scent for summer because it is not cloying or heavy.

I have been using Innocent for a long time and really like it. I get many compliments, as to how good I smell. It is light, not overpowering, and works perfectly for me. Ordering on line is easy and quick. I'm very impressed with your company, service and products.
Light and subtle. Not to heavy or over powering. Perfect summer fragarance!
This is my all time favorite summer fragrance. Too bad it doesn't come in more varieties.

I really do like the scent of Innocent, and so does my husband, appreciate the way it smells on me. I was first introduced to Innocent, when I ordered Alien Shower Gel in the past, and Innocent was one of my free samples.
I fell in love with it then, but I wish there was a body lotion and shower gel of Innocent to accompany the cologne. Maybe in the near future.

I have been wearing Innocent for at least seven years and I have yet to grow tired of it. It's vibrant and bright, very cheery to wear, even on dark days...but it's not a child like fragrance. The grapefruit keeps the sweet scents tamed. I get compliments all the time and it's nice to wear something knowing that not everyone else has it. There use to be more products in this fragrance but I see that only the perfume and lotion are available. I hope it won't be discontinued...there's nothing out there that can replace it in my opinion.
Innocent is very unique with a very nice aroma!!!!
This fragrance is wonderful! So light and clean smelling, perfect for the spring and summer. I wish they still sold this in a fragrant body lotion.

I have used Innocent for years. I was so disappointed when I could no longer buy it from the store. I am so happy, now that I can buy it on line. I love this scent. Softer than Angel, and in my opinion, better.
I bought this product based on an online testimonial I read. I haven't received the respose she did, but I am still optimistic that I will.
Angel innocent has been a favorite of mine for years. I will never be without it.

column6: Love Innocent Spray; miss original Angel lotion
column7: I use Innocent as the finishing touch to the Angel perfume spray. I used to use the original Angel lotion (not the perfuming lotion) and REALLY miss it. I never got a reason for why the original Angel lotion was phased out. I even had friends looking for it in France. There are so many of us out there longing for the original lotion. Can the new owners PLEASE bring back the original lotion? I have been lost for a replacement cologne since the original lotion was phased out. The Angel perfume just doesn't have the same impact. I got compliments every day when I wore the original lotion and Innocent spray.

Every time I wear this scent, I get multiple compliments from men and women. I was in a very formal interview panel setting, and head honcho, who is a pretty conservative man, turned to me and said, "You smell intoxicating." Then he realized it was inappropriate apologized and threw out some different adjectives. This scent is intoxicating. I have been wearing it for more than ten years, and I can't imagine wearing anything else. It is versatile for every day and special events.
I wear different perfumes each day, innocent is always in my collection. It is unique and one of my favorites of all time!

I love this fragrance but was disappointed when I learned that you cannot purchase it in stores any more. Would love to see the body cream make a comeback.

Nice fragrance that is light but stays with you. My favorite.......

column6: One of a kind! Please don't stop making this scent
column7: I will just start by saying my only complaint is the scent is not carried in stores anymore. I finally found a scent that is suitable for the office and is a classy scent that just gets better as the day goes on. It's not by any means overwhelming. It's sexy and sophisticated. I only found it by accident about six years ago because my visit to the perfume counter was frequent due to the fact that most perfumes stink after I get them on. The sales person gave me a sample. That was it I was in love ! Trust me, there is nothing on the market even remotely close to the scent!

Angel is my absolute Fav, and I love Womanity - I wanted to try this too, and this is just delightful - stays with you - in a good way like the other fragrances, but is lighter for someone that might want that. Love, Love Love his perfume!!
Now I have to try Alien!!

Wonderfully lovely scent! Fruity clean essence..By far my favorite!
It doesn't have the musk scent that the Angels has. Wish I could find it in more stores...Hard to find. :(

I absolutely love this fragrance! It is my all time favorite. I hope they never stop making it. I have to order this online as the stores no longer carry it. Please always keep it in stock. I will wear this fragrance forever!!!
I'm so glad they brought this back. People ask me what I'm wearing all the time. It's a classic and a people pleaser!!

column6: My fragrance for LIFE!!! (And I am a guy)
column7: About 10 years ago, a friend of mine who worked in retail gave me a bottle of Innocent. Not knowing much about it, I took a whiff, loved it and I started wearing it. I immediately received compliment after compliment on the scent. More compliments that I have ever had in my life. I was shocked, but knew I found my fragrance for life. I was even more shocked when I went down buy another bottle, and found out it was for women. Well, I didn't argue, and bought numerous bottles. I've been wearing this fragrance for 10+ years now, and pray that they continue to make it. It is getting harder and harder to find.

I have never had so many compliments on a fragrance as I've had since I've start wearing Innocent, and the complements are from men and women alike. I only wish I could purchase it in a department store and not have to go online to order it. My concern with the online ordering is the amount of time it is in the mail and the temperatures here can reach 120 degrees plus. I have had to pay extra for the faster shipping option.
I've bern using innocent since it came out - many years ago. I never use anything else I found this perfume. I bought it 1999 (I think) in Paris! That was the best find ever.
I have not been able to locate this particular scent and was very happy when I found it on the website. I knew it would be fresh and unopened. So very happy to be able to use it again.
Innocent is the best perfume.Long lasting, clean fresh fragrance.

What a wonderful scent! I once thought to buy this on EBay and clearly what they were selling was a fake, but at the same price as Thierry Mugler. Don't be fooled by thinking you're getting a bargain online at an auction. Go to the site where you know it's real. Joy Dorando
I have worn Innocent for over 8 years! I love it and get compliments constantly! I hope you don't ever discontinue it!

Best perfume!
Been using Theirry Muglar perfumes for over 10 years and Innocent is by far the best one.
Too bad doesn't sell in Canada!

column6: Great Perfume for individuals allergic to perfume
column7: The sent is spectacular! and most importantly I can wear it without having an allergic reaction. I always avoid perfume counters in department stores because I am severely allergic to perfumes. I stopped wearing perfume many years ago when I discovered my health issues were caused by an allergy to perfumes. Several years ago I received a gift set of Thierry Mugler Angel Innocent from one of my students . I experimented with the lotion first and did not have a reaction then I progressed to the powder still I had no reaction I finally took the plunge and used the perfume and HALELUAH NO REACTION!! Happily I have been wearing Angel Innocent from then on. I always get compliments and am asked what is the name of that lovely scent you are wearing. Thank you for making such a Pure and lovely product

There are no words to describe this scent!! I only wear Thierry Mugler perfumes and I do have ALL of them!! I receive so many compliments on this perfume from men and women!! I've worn many other perfumes and this one is my all time favourite!!! A MUST have for anyone who loves quality scents and very unique on each person!!! Try the lotion, body wash, hair scent and every single perfume by Thierry Mugler!!!!

column6: Oh please make this beauty available in my country
column7: I'm allergical to perfume scent, so it's almost impossible for me to wear any perfume, no matter what brand it is. But it felt so bad without wearing beautiful scent, but i had to go on without wearing any perfume for years. Then some day, my aunt, who's a very fashionable & classy lady, smelled like heaven, i asked her the brand, she said Angel Innocent, but i was very afraid to try. But i did try and since more than 14 years i've been wearing Innocent. Thank you for this beautiful scent :) and i do have to thank you one more time for making someone allergical like me to be able to wear beautiful scent! But one issue i just came across is Innocent is no more available in my country. Please make it available again here in. Turkey, oh please do, i've been looking for it everywhere for days, stores, online shops, it's no more imported. I beg you please bring my one and only perfume back! I dont wanna smell 'nothing', i wanna smell "Angel" Innocent :)

This perfume makes me feel like I am in heaven. It is not a heavy scent, yet it is floral, woody, sensual, long lasting and flirtatious. Many people compliment me when I am wearing it and it has become my signature fragrance. My sweetheart recently said that when he smelled it lingering on my pillow, he didn't want to get out of bed to go to work. That's the effect I like to have by wearing Innocent!
I love Innocent and battling to find it in my country South Africa. This my favourite of all times.

I have a dilemma. Is my favorite fragrance Innocent or Angel? Hmm... At the moment I'm going with Angel for night and Innocent for day.

Innocent is a perfect daytime scent. It's light and feminine and I truly had people stopping me to ask what I was wearing. I love that it lasts a really long time but isn't overpowering. It's also unique. I LOVE Angel and see it everywhere but Innocent is a little harder to find so not everyone is using the same thing I use. I also like that it seems equally appealing to men and women.

I love the Angel Innocent scent because it is light and refreshing. I spray a little on even if I'm going to have an "in-home" day - just for me. I spritz Innocent even if its coffee with friends or a meeting at the library. And, of course, I don't feel ready for an evening out if I haven't walked through a mist of Innocent. It has been over ten years since becoming enamored with Innocent and I love it more every year!
I have been using this scent for many years. Light, sexy, feminine. I ALWAYS get compliments when I wear it. It is my favorite scent. A must have for me.

I love Innocent, which I think of as a lighter, summer scent to Angel. Angel is my "go-to"scent, which so many people love.

Wish Innocent was available at Nordstrom, and that a body cream formula (like Angel) instead of body milk would be created. So many compliments when I wear Innocent. Thank you for a lovely scent.
This is another of the three that I use all the time.

column6: This is what princesses smell like
column7: Innocent has been my all-time favorite fragrance for about ten years now, since I met my sister-in-law wearing it and it instantly reminded me of opening a new Barbie doll box. Unlike other world famous fragrances, there is no scent compared to this, which is particularly frustrating when they stop selling this amazing perfume in your country. It can be worn during daytime - it's not overwhelming and it lasts all day, like most Thierry Mugler perfumes - but I like to save it for special occasions. Either way, you don't go by unnoticed. If you're looking for an elegant, fresh and young, yet sophisticated scent, this is it. I love it and can't live without it.
I LOVE this scent. I was in Dillards last week and they said you were discontinuing this fragrance. I can't believe it!! I get so many compliments on it. Very sad news....

Absolutely love this cologne. I get more compliments on any scent I wear by Thierry Mugler. It is by far, the best cologne on the market. It is expensive, but worth every penny.
Thanks!
My absolute favorite. I want to be remembered for a lot of things...one is for my scent. This is me!

column6: Innocent Is The One For Me
column7:
Innocent is the only perfume I wear for it is so light and refreshing and
last all day and night.
Women ask me all the time what perfume I am wearing and I just tell
them Innocent, then they ask where to buy it, I tell them go on line to
Thierry Mugler, get a great deal, order two for you will enjoy it so much
your partner will want you to wear it all the time.
Diana
I have used Innocent for a long time. It is my go-to scent and perfect for everyday use. I hope you never discontinue it!!!

The scent is no longer as intense. I sent a new full bottle to you I purchased from another source to bring this to your attention and never heard back from you. I am reluctant to purchase what was my favorite again. Joy Dorando

I love Angel Innocent by Thierry Mugler. The smell is sweet but not 'sickly-gag-me-" sweet. The scent lasts all day. I ALWAYS get compliments when I wear this cologne. I would recommened this to anyone who enjoys a soft, feminine fragrance. I have been a fan of Thierry Mugler since 1993. Thank you for the wonderful scent(s) you create!
I LOVE my Innocent Necklace, I wear it everyday, I never take it off.❤ Please make more jewelry.
I thought it would be more like the angel innocent which I have been wearing quite a while. Not fond of the smell
Not the worst but definitely not my favorite scent.
I just got it today, smells wonderful so deep and dark, I am so happy with my purchase
I really love the scent. It's great it smells fruity with a hint of spiciness expected from the mugler perfume.
It’s a very deep almost red wine fragrance! Very nice!
I used my delicious body, hand cream everyday of my life....
Very refreshing fragrance, everyone that I pass by compliment me for the sweetness of it... Love it.

I have been wearing this scent for years. I love this fragrance the best out of all the Mugler scents. It is fresh, clean and very sexy. I get soooo many compliments when I wear it. Everyone tells me how good I smell. You must get it.

Love how small and the texture of the tube. However thought is was more
lighter brown for blue eyes. The color makes a difference for those that
have big light blue eyes. If the color were right, I would love it.

I sampled this fragrance at Hudsons bay in Toronto Canada for the first time! I must say this fragrance is AMAZING! I’ve been wearing Pure Coffee for years. I found my new fragrance in Les Exceptions - Ambre Redoutable

I did buy this at a horrible time living in Fl. 
Unfortunately I ordered this right before Hurricane Dorian and it shipped in high temperature . It then had to sit  for too many days in more heat before i received it . I’m sure that did affect the fragrance a bit. (My fault)
My fav so far (after 3 ) is Over the Musk ! Delicious
It started with a free sample. Now it's ine if my all time favorites!

column7: This product is wonderful; I wish the fragrance had a little more staying power, especially considering the price. I mix it with other Angel and Innocent products for a unique smell of my own. I'm hopeful that the line will grow to include other products for laying of the fragrance like body cream or lotion, and possibly even a bar of soap.
column20: Fragrance > Unisex Perfumes > Les Exceptions > Perfumes

column7: I got the Les Exceptions samples last year and fell in love with Chyprissime. I used it until it was gone but kept that tiny spray bottle around just to smell it. I do NOT understand it, but it evokes a timeless scent of the early 50's to me. It reminds me of hot summer evenings when the lightening bugs came out and women bathed, then dusted on talcum powder and wore a silk nightgown to cool themselves down for bed. It is sophisticated, glamorous, feminine and timeless, a classic. It is much more than just a perfume. That bottle contains the elegance of days we won't ever see again. That's why I broke down and paid more than ever before. I spray it on myself in the morning, after a shower and before bed. Words can't express its magic.
column20: Fragrance > Unisex Perfumes > Les Exceptions > Perfumes

Thank you Thierry Mugler.

column6: Finally a true original new fragrance
column7:
I’m always scouting for new fragrances and all I find are small variations of known smells - and here, something truly original and exquisite.
It’s one of those deep, sexy, musky scents - not obviously feminine but still very sensual, could well be a unisex fragrance although it may have too much geranium and orange for a man.
The early notes can be a bit overwhelming but wait for a short while and see what happens.
If you like Angel and other dark and intense scents from Louis Vuitton Matiere Noire to the old Donna Karan Cashmere, you need to try Fougere Furieuse (not to mention the exquisite presentation if you want to impress someone with a gift)

column6: High Quality "Oriental" Fragrance-Is What It Says
column7: I love this fragrance - it is exactly what it should be if you were to guess the smell based solely on the name - a high-quality "Oriental" fragrance. There is definitely a "Gourmand" element to this fragrance (it's really difficult to discern the vanilla/spices for me in this one they just blend so well together) but it also does have a strong woodsy side (at least on me) and does dry down slightly powdery. I really would consider this more of a "Unisex" fragrance and can imagine a man or a woman wearing this well, depending on his or her body chemistry. It is really a beautiful scent though - it reminds me of a more straightforward and less SWEET version of the OLD Bond No. 9 Andy Warhol "Success is a Job in New York" - it is just a very pleasant-smelling Oriental fragrance.

column5: Magma Fusion - Progressive Color Lip Lacquer
column7:
Best lipgloss EVER. A self proclaimed lipgloss & lipstick junkie & championship nap taker this product delivers & exceeds this harsh critics expectations. I like the slim container that fits comfortably in any wallet for toting when I want to be a diva on the go with minimal accessories.
The far tip applicator is easy to use & feels good on the lips - I don't sorry about gloss product wasting away & being absorbed by applicator. The stain is long lasting - I like the glittery speck & the glossy look is an added bonus. I feel ultra femme when applying magma fusion. Just like clothes & jewelry & fragrances - women gravitate to the products & names that allow them to feel like they look their best. That us how I feel with magma fusion on my lips - like I'm a true diva. Thank u Thierry mugler.

column5: Magma Fusion - Progressive Color Lip Lacquer
column7: Gloss glides on clear and sparkling gradually changing color to a warm, glowing pink bringing life to your lips. Smooth and silky, goes on neat and clean, even in cold temperatures. It's not sticky or messy like some I've tried. Easy to apply, love the silicone applicator It's a little more than I would normally spend but well worth it.

column7: Love this gloss so much! Leaves my lips with a blushing pink glow for hours!

Mugler thrills us with his modern interpretation of a oud/rose scent. Its well blended without any sharp edges. A modern luxe presentation and beautiful bottle. Mugler understands a great fragrance and presentation. I should have bought more than one. Gorgeous!

I ordered both Majesties and Voluptes and can I just say the packaging is to die for? Both bought blind with fingers crossed and both winners (the Mugler house seems to be a hit for me). While Majesties is a warmer fragrance, Voluptes is cooler in feel but hits the nail on the head with with it's magical weave of rose and oud.

Lastability is incredible with over 12+ hours too

I love this perfume! I wore Angel for years and when I met my ex boyfriend, I had to stop wearing it around him because he didn't like it. When he went to Dubai to visit his family he bought me Miroir des Voluptes. I immediately fell in love with it and so did he. I'm so glad I can reorder it online rather than having to take a trip to Dubai every time I need a refill. It's a sexy, exotic scent without being too oudy.
My ultimate favorite!

this is one absolutely stunning fragrance. It is sweet, spicy and warm - a it's cold out and I want to be wrapped in my coziest sweater way. Lastibilty? Off the charts. I can get an easy 12+ hours from wearing this and it doesn't become a skin scent. 

Thank you Mr. Mugler for having such outstanding fragrances that keep me coming back

Every Christmas I treat myself to my beloved Angel and Alien and this year while preparing my order I stumbled upon this actually on sale. I ordered it and what a wonderful surprise.... Delightful fragrance but the bottle is so unique... Actually housed in a mirrored box making it a true collector's item. I splurged and reordered a second bottle!
Love Alien and this is like a softer version with a little bit of oud in it just fantastic. Thank you Mugler for this unique fragrances.
This scent is spicy and deep. As you wear it, it evolves into a nice warm scent. It's a terrible shame they're discontinuing it.

I thought I'd try something different my usual scents run with Angel, Angel innocent, innocent seductive shimmers, Angel Eau Sucree2014 limited Edition, Angel Stardust Eau de Parfum., and muse I like I definitely would recommend knowing what you are buying the packaging was absolutely stunning I want to be able to wear every once in a while I'll put it on it dosen't get the response from people like when I wear Anything Angel. I know different notes and scent are different for every body loveAngel forever

Not good for me, I tried to exchanged it, I did not get an answer for customer service, it will be in my drawer for ever, this fragrance is really weird, I love Angel, this not even a bit..(

I can honestly say I do not go anywhere without it. The bag is perfect for my cosmetics and the liner is unique, effective and gives a consistent look every time. I love the mascara, there are NO messy bristles that bend or get "smushed" when taking it in and out to brush your lashes. All high quality made and beautiful to wear.

I don't usually wear black mascara and eyeliner, but when I do I want it to be ART. This mascara and liner can be applied as bold as gouache or as subtle as a pencil sketch. The unusually-shaped liner allows much more control than the usual pencil or crayon-style liners; it can draw a precise cats'-eye swoosh or it can be smudged and shaded. While there's no brush included with this set, you could use your favourite liner brush for even more special effects. The mascara is easy to apply and comfortable to wear, and doesn't make the lashes get all stuck together.

Compliments are good but.........I wear a fragrance because I like it, I don’t look to be asked every 10minutes, Hey! What are you wearing? Fragrances is a personal thing. Anyway the green petitgrain and the white musk makes this fragrance so very sexy. Got to try it, and yes it’s somewhat an upgrade from the original Mugler Cologne but just done a tad better! Thanks for reading

column5: MUGLER Cologne Fly Away Eau de Toilette
column7:
There's a real disparity between expectations in the USA and Europe where "Cologne" is concerned.  For hundreds of years, Europeans have been splashing themselves with beautiful, fleeting citrus colognes; a moment of freshness in a dirty world.  Somehow, in the USA expectations are that citrus should have tremendous sillage and last for hours...unsure where we Americans got that idea. 

The new Mugler Cologne series somehow manages to have the best of both worlds - joyful, uplifting scents that manage to linger for a couple of hours.  And what fun scents they are!  By far my favorite of the series is the new Fly Away, beautifully balanced between sour fruit and bitter herbal notes, with a wash of white musk over the top.  Fruitier than the typical grapefruit, not as skunky as a headshop "hemp" note, it's novel enough to be exciting and familiar enough to be comfortable in any situation.  Highly recommended.

column5: MUGLER Cologne Fly Away Eau de Toilette
column6: The Best Out Of The Cologne Collection
column7: This scent is a refreshing grapefruit with cannibus...and it's well blended..the grapefruit not only smells fresh and juicy but it also smells like the rinds of a grapefruit and the cannibus blends in with the grapefruit to give off one of the most intriguing scents I have smelled in a long time next to Womanity, Alien, Angel & Pure Tonka. I kept smelling wafts of the fragrance that made me question which fragrance is doing that wow factor for me and it was this one out of all I tried but all of them I think are nice in their own way but this one I love..I do plan on getting a bottle in the future and I highly recommend you test this one! It's a great spring, summer time or casual daytime fragrance perfect during those warmer to fall months.

column5: MUGLER Cologne Fly Away Eau de Toilette
column7: I previously wrote a review on COLOGNE LOVE YOU and mentioned how much I enjoyed the scent, but I must admit Fly Away isn't as catching. I'm not sensing that wow factor you normally would get when you are wearing a Thierry Mugler fragrance. I do like the citrus smell, but it smell more like a tangerine more so than a grapefruit as mentioned in the description. Again the fragrance is decent but I also must agree with other reviewers that the scents for new this line of Cologne does not last long. I would say at best a hour. Because of the missing wow factor and the longevity of the scent I could only give this an average rating. Very surprising for a Thierry Mugler fragrance.

column5: MUGLER Cologne Fly Away Eau de Toilette
column7:
The fragrance itself has a great smell. I love it.

However, it doesn't last more than 90 minutes (in an air conditioned environment). I you walk under the sunlight and the heat.. It will last 45 minutes.

A shame. In mi opinion this fragrance line is too expensive and very poor in quality.

I planned to buy all five... but as soon as i got the first two I realized all this so I returned them.

just saying...

:)

Thank you for creating this scent!!

For myself, it is generally a bit too light to wear out in the evening but I always have a large bottle handy for my daily use. The mix of aromas is ably supported by the subtle hint of bergamot that provides a base for the other scents to build upon. After six or more years, I have not found a fragrance with which I would replace my Mugler Cologne.
This is a great refreshing smell summer or winter it one of my favorites from this house.
The nicest product ever. I purchased this while on vacation a couple of years ago, and have received so many compliments since. Thank you, thank you, and please never stop making it!

All TM perfumes are heavenly to me and this one is no exception! I am a serious perfume collector and my T Mugler collection is one of my most cherished and treasured possessions!! Perfumes touch to a very special place in my psyche & spirit, that makes me feel serene, calm and happy. My olfactory senses are extraordinary! can walk through anywhere and can differentiate 10 different smells that particular place/air carries at that particular time! It's such a shame I realized my gift for that way after I already chose a career that I also am passionate about, otherwise I would be one of those famous noses:-) Anyways-Mr. Mugler; You are a true genius!! Your perfumes are top quality, complex, never the cookie cutter--(you lead, not follow! ) intriguing, authentic, and seductive! They pour themselves into one's pores and become even more extraordinary-a scent that truly belongs to him/her-(because everyone's chemical component is different) With respect, admiration and gratitude for taking me to that wonderful journey each time I wear your perfumes!

I have been wearing this cologne for at least 14 years.
One of my friends, which just happened to work at one of the Bloomingdale's store, in the fragrances section, as I was passing by and was saying hello to him, asked me why I never bought anything from him.
I answered that all those fragrances he was selling ware to strong and to sweet like smell, but I would buy one that felt like as if I just got out of the shower.
He answered: I got you; smell this one.
That was it; I got hooked and when I toke this home and asked my wife and my daughter for their opinion, they told me that it was a wonderful fragrance and that they really, really loved it.
In fact, I have been asked many times after that, what was the name of the cologne I was wearing.
So, I will certainly recommend it to anyone and give it a 5 stars rating, as excellent.
My wife loves it and it is the only one that she wants me to wear.

I visit the website almost everyday just for the joy of being an addict. I love the Les variety as a result of the samples, especially the Musk. And what can I say about Alien.....I am hooked and I just adore the compliments that I receive when I wear a Mugler fragrance. I am soooooooooo happy that I tried the Deluxe Miniatures and look forward to being an addict for a loooooonnnnng time. Thanks for helping me to broaden my horizon with Mugler fragrances, you're the BEST!

column6: Of all the Mugler Secrets, this is the most...

Well, more like other-worldly, as are all the Mugler secrets... It made what was otherwise always an ordeal a light-hearted surprise!! I'm an Alien-classic wearer, and love the sustainability for our fragile planet by the refill opportunity.  But who knew this sweet little floral-number, which I purchased on a lark, would gain me the best compliment!!!

The Jury's still out on this one for me. Angel is such a addictive scent with so many levels to it. I didn't know when I started with the perfume I would be on this merry go round. Reading reviews and comments attached to different scents help like I just read before writing this review which is in the fragrance name (Philter) that I'm supposed to layer this over my favorite Angel perfume to customize the scent. I was doing it wrong putting it on prior to my favorite scent because sandalwood and vanilla by itself didn't do it for me, but this is a learning process. I'll buy something and not like it then at some point find out that I like it. I said I wouldn't buy the shower gel again but I did because I realized it was part of the layering process and it enhanced my fragrance but I had to put in in another gel bottle cause the original bottle was hard for me to squeeze with wet hands because of the design of the bottle. So right now I have to figure out how to include this in my process of enhancing my Angel perfume. I have so much product on my dresser and spray it on every time I go out and sometimes my clothes still have a lingering scent from the last time I applied it but I spray some more on anyway. Welp here's to continuing to smell incredible.

I just received my Angel Philter and I am in love. I knew it would be beautiful but it surpassed my expectations. It is the most beautiful fragrance that I will wear alone and when added to angel it just becomes so warm. I hope this is made into a big bottle, another winner Mugler

Oh at work it is crazy people say ! We know you are here! I say ,why? They say :Rosie because your perfume !!!! I am very happy!!
what a pleasant surprise since i ordered on line site unseen. soft and easy to apply

night. Everyone gave me raving compliments. The main one I really love
is Womanity I wouldn't mind having receiving this once a month as my

column7: These were purchased with my friends in mind. They are stored away for little moments when I want to pamper them with a little treat. I always get compliments when I wear mine and I'm sure they will too.

I JUST LOVE IT♡

I love my new handbag. I love your products. I just wich that I received points like we do when we purchase fragerance. Its a great handbag. I can wear it with everything. I get many compliments when I wear it. I give it 5 stars. 5 being the best!

I've had nothing but compliments since I've worn it. Of all my Thierry Mugler jewelry pieces, this one is one of my very favorite's because it can be worn with anything. 10 Starz & 2 thumbs up!

column6: Amazing and Beautiful Shaped to compliment
column7: I was so happy to be notified when these coveted sunglasses were in stock again, and a 50% discount.! They are shaped to compliment any face and are classy, elegant and well made. So happy that my generous boyfriend let me add these to my Christmas present list. Notes from an Angel Addict
Love it ❤️ I already have one and bought one for a gift. It's so beautiful.
I LOVE THEM, GREAT WAY TO TRY NEW SCENTS!!!!! mY FRIENDS ALWAYS GO THRU MY COLLECTIONS

I love all the product that I have tried by Thierry Mugler. This mini set was an opportunity for me to try some products that were not sold in my local area. They are also great for traveling since they are below the minimum required size for carry-on luggage. Remember to secure lids because I did lose one perfume item due to fact the lid did not close well :-( !!
Fellas..THE perfect gift. Quality! Variety! EXCEPTIONAL!
I'm in love with Mugler... Love it... I'm addicted to the fragrance

column5: We Are All Alien Collector Eau de Parfum
column7: Stunning bottle and a top notch fragrance. I love my purchase!

column5: We Are All Alien Collector Eau de Parfum
column7: I love this fragrance and I have a variety of different shaped bottles on display. This one is very different and stands out. I love it

column5: We Are All Alien Collector Eau de Parfum
column7: I was able to finally get my hands on this..it is so pretty in person and unique because no one has my exact same bottle with the processing they used to make these each one is different and not the same and it smells just like the regular Alien but it feels like a lighter version of Alien.. but I am use to using Alien Essence Absolue which is a stronger version of this and I love that one more but I bought this because it's a collectors edition and I will always treasure it. Yes it has the amazing sambac jasmine that gives it a sophisticated grapey like smell but it is a floral scent. If you got your hands on one of these you will love it because it is refillable but I don't think I will carry it around because I don't want to ever mess up the bottle..it's gorgeous!

column5: We Are All Alien Collector Eau de Parfum
column7: I love Alien perfume, I discovered it recently and I'm making it my signature scent. I bought this bottle but I don't want to use it, it's so beautiful so I stocked up on a couple extra bottles of Alien, can never have too many bottles right?
Was intending to purchase something else, but this is nice, would definitely order again in future.

This is one if my favorite fragrances!
Spray once and it last all day!
Totally will buy the re-fill to this one!
I tried the Womanity for the first time. I didn't like it as much as I like Angel and Alien. Angel and Alien is my favorite. I also had a sample of Mugler. I like that fragrance as well.
The smell is so wonderful and so attractive! I like to use is at the day time. It last so long that I can still smell it act the day end.
I always wore Angel, but I came to the site, took the quiz and it was recommended that I wear this. Awesome choice...love the smell. Thierry Mugler knows what they are doing.
This fragrance is sooo out of this world, it is not even funny! EVERYONE loves it when I wear it; especially MEN! My daughter says, "Ma, I can't even tell you how good that perfume smells!" #bomb.com
Very refreshing, Mugler made me addict to the best fragrance.... Love it

column6: This perfume is my all time favorite
column7: I had never heard of womanity until a friend gave me a little sample she got on the Mugler website. I instantly fell in love and came to purchase it. The only problem is, no one carries it! Its been out of stock on Mugler for a while and I don't want to buy a fake one online. PLEASE restock! and put it in sephora! I know people will buy it! Its not too powdery or floral. Its just right and such a unique beautiful smell. ALIEN is also my top smell. I don't leave the house without wearing MUGLER perfumes! and the bottles are always so gorgeous! The best perfume brand ever!

Absolutely love Womanity, and all of its variations! This is my summer go to scent. It is sensual and sexy without being flowery or powdery like so many fragrances can be. It lasts even in this summer heat and humidity! I love the spicy, woodsy scent!
I love everything about this scent. It's light but lasts all day. I've experienced a few different Mugler perfumes but this one and Innocent are my favorites.
This is one of the most beautiful and unique scents I’ve ever wore. It’s extraordinary! I’ve had people chase me down to ask what perfume I’m wearing. It’s that good!

I have worn this fragrance for 8 years and I can honestly say I get more compliments than any other perfume I’ve worn. I have tried to find something else in fear of not being able to buy Womanity but this perfume is my signature fragrance. I have so many people come and say how awesome I smell. Please continue to make this fragrance. I wore Angel before this but for me my body chemistry definitely works well with Womanity. I love the unique bottle too.

I placed my order on September 11 and status kept showing as processing. I called Mugler on Wednesday and spoke with Colleen who was very nice. There had been a glitch which she untangled. The order is in the way

column6: it lives up to it's name I feel very "womanly"
column7: I love this scent! It has a nice floral and it stays with me most of the day without refreshing. The only complaint I do have is the bottle. It's too big! I do like the intricate design but the lid is not to my liking. In fact, the first shipment, the lid came off and leaked! Mugler did send another though. I loved this so much I bought one for my sister. I wish Mugler sold this in a smaller size so I could take with to travel!
I’ve using it since 2014 and was very sad when was told it’d be discontinued. Thanks a lot for keeping it online for the addicted (lime me) to acquire it and not go crazy

I buy this  perfume long time ago, Omg all my friend ask me about the fragrance, I come back to Bloomingdale's for buy again, and the sales person tell me this perfume no come more for this store.im die. but now I'm found again,im.so happy..I'm use to angel.and alien all my favorite..thanks so much for no discontinue this fragrance.

I can’t explain how I feel about this scent, so let’s just say that I am in love! I put this on the first time and could not stop thinking about it. There is something about it that is trying to conjure a memory from Italy, but I can’t quite grab it. All I can say is, it’s a good thing I can buy refills of this!!
This is my absolute favorite fragrance.  It’s my go tell smell for everyday or any special occasion.  I love it!!!!

I wear this perfume everyday and I cannot tell you how many times I hear "You smell great! What are you wearing?" If I had samples to give out I know sales would go through the roof.  One hot summer day I attended a meeting where the only seat left was between two women. I sat down and at the end of the meeting one lady said, "I was a little annoyed I lost my extra seat, but whatever you are wearing took away my annoyance.  You smell wonderful, please what is that sent you're wearing?" 
I wear this all day and never have to touch it up.  At the end of a long day I stop at the grocery store and people in the check out lane stop me and say, "I must know what you're wearing?"
It makes me feel good knowing others like the fragrance too.
I love Angel and Alien but this is my absolute favorite. Please bring back the lotion and body wash! I also really love Taste of Fragrance Womanity- I like it more than the original!

This is my signature scent. A little lasts all day. It's woodsy yet very feminine. I am super bummed; it appears it is being phased out. The eco refills are no longer available and when I went online this past week to order another bottle (2.7 oz) it is not available. The other sizes indicated 'out of stock'. I will be using this bottle sparingly.

column6: I just love this product soooo very much!!
column7: it's the most amazing perfume in the whole world! It's just a shame you don't have refill for this any more. I don't know if you start to not producing it what I'm gonna do coz I cannot use any other fragrance. My friends say it's Z's smell.

column6: I am a fussy perfume user
column7: This is my most favorite scent I have ever experienced. Friends and strangers stop me and ask about this wonderful fragrance. I can not say enough about this product and just when you think you love this to no end, the bottle arrives and you are floored! This is one of the most unique and beautiful presentations for this red carpet scent. I am very pleased with this Parfum, presentation and such a short time I had to wait to enjoy this product

column6: Unreal this smells!!! WOW so beautiful
column7: This is a smell unlike anything else...please never get rid of this!!!
I am totally in LOVE with this fragrance. I ALWAYS get compliments when I wear Womanity. I feel the fragrance just reflects ME.... I hope it doesn't go away for a very long time.
I've heard this may be discontinued? Please say it isn't so!

Please never discontinue this perfume! It smells heavenly! I get compliments all the time when I wear it. I've noticed there are less and less bottles of womanly on the website. I would really like to refill my womanity refillable bottles but everything is out of stock :( I don't know what I would do if you stopped producing this line of perfume!
I just love womanity, one of my favorite scents! Very unique and appealing!
Love the scent , but it doesn't seem to last, I have to spray several times a day.

column6: Elegant and comfort in one product
column7:
I love all MUGLER collection but WOMANITY is one of my favorites!!!+++ i highly recommend it.
Without hesitation.
Love celestial customer.
Sandy❤
This is a beautiful fragrance! My mother had this as her top gift for her birthday. She gets soooo many compliments when she wears this!
Little pricy, but I love the fragrance; just having a difficult time finding the shower gel and the lotion.

Was trying this one with other samples one night and initially didn't care for it. Over the course of the night this changed into the most alluring odd scent I've ever worn. So unique but so very pretty and wearable. Very strong (you only need a little) and lasts for days. My t-shirt still smelled of this on laundry day. My Mom just adores this so I ordered her a bottle for Christmas. The bottle is gorgeous and will look so pretty in her perfume collection. I would also like to add that Mugler inc packaged this in such a way that all I needed to do was open the box and place this in a gift bag. Major attention to detail and very high street packaging. The whole thing was wrapped up securely but attractively. I also had it engraved which I think is a wonderful touch they are offering. I'm beyond thrilled with my first experience buying from Mugler. I'll return.

I happened upon this parfum at the France pavilion at Epcot in Walt Disney World. When I smelled it I immediately asked the sales associate about it. She was enthusiastic explaining how unique the scent is and let me know it wasn't widely available to purchase in the US. When I returned from my vacation I purchased it here online and have never been sorry! I get SO many compliments when I wear it.....I mean people go out of their way to tell me how much they love it!!! It's been a long time since something worked so well for me! I'm a BIG fan!

I'm so happy that Mugler is still making Womanity! I can no longer get it in any department store. I get so many complements when i wear it! It is truly my signature fragrance!!!!!

Much Love, 
Terri
I LOVE this scent i get numerous compliments & will continue to keep in my collection!!!

When i first put it on..i was like no this isn't for me ..but as it dried into my skin and mixed with my chemistry something glorious began to happen ..i fell in love with it ..Each time i wear this i fall in love with it ..It's intoxicating it wakes up the romantic in me ..No matter where I'm going when i put it on i feel special..For me this is a must have..please try ..you wont regret it

Every time I wear this fragrance I get multiple complements, its clean and spicy and I have to say, I adore the packaging on this one! I highly recommend you check it out, or not, then I will be the one who smells the best lol
I always get remarks about this scent....I love it, others always remark about how clean and fresh it smells. It is very different than any other on the market today.

I love this fragrance, it is my favorite but very hard to find now. It started off at $32.oo for the 3Fl oz bottle, I can't believe that the 2.7 oz is 98.00, wow. I would recommend the fragrance but bring the price back down and restock in the department stores.
I have people stop me every time that I were Womanity just love it!!!!

I bought one for me and my daughter. Great gift! 
The bottle is beautiful, as you can see and the packaging in their delivery was great!
Light, clean fresh scent but not unnoticeable. Leave a hint of you everywhere you go. Love this fragrance.
This is a great scent. Sweet & spicy! I've worn Angel for many, many years but found this one day & bought it on a whim. I won't give up Angel, but I'll get this too.....

Every time I wear Womanity people tell me, "you smell so good". The funny thing is that, I love to smell myself with this fragrance on me. Womanity is my signature scent. It was discontinued at the mall but I'm so glad I can order it online.
I am a Mugler Addict member and i have received some samples of this Perfume and no one in the famly liked the smell...please don't send me samples of this anymore.
Some perfumes are too strong. This one is just perfect. Neither strong nor week. Stays with you all day. Lovely fragrance.
They are the best. This perfume makes me ffeel special. I love it's weird, intoxicating smell.
This is the yummiest scent ever! I will continue to order and use. Hope this product continues!
This is a wonderfully subtle version of Womanity. If you love Womanity, you'll love Womanity Aqua Chic!

column6: everyone loves it on me men and women lol
column7:
I will repurchase but first I wanna say I smelled the original womanity eau de parfum sample SO GOOD

now I'm getting full bottle of parfum so it lasts longer and the strawberry one for elles just out of curiosityyyy

column6: If you love womanity you will love aqua chic
column7: It's not too far off from the original but as another reviewer stated its missing the heavy "saltwater and caviar" notes that the original possesses. These make the original ever so slightly masculine, which can be off putting to some. It's lighter and almsot a little fruitier than the original so it can be used for spring and summer wear. The original is definately a heavier winter fragrance. Womanity is one of those fragrances that you either love or hate. As with all mugler frangrances its sexy and unique and no one will smell like you!! I'm obsessed with womanity and if they ever discontinue it I will die.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I have been wearing this perfume and only this perfume for years. I receive compliments on the scent all the time from women and men. Im so glad it's still available online.

They are the worst company I have ever dealt with.  I feel like I am being harrased by their customer service rep just to receive the product I paid for.  What a disgraceful company!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I love buying the refill. Womanity is such a unique fragrance.  I get compliments every time l wear it!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
