column7: I get compliments on my scent weekly! 3 years wearing Womanity! I’ll never stop! N

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I adore the smell of Womanity!!! I am constantly getting asked "What are you wearing ? It smells so Unique." Whats funny is both men and women will ask. It is the Only perfume I wear. It has become my trademark fragrance. Like one of the other reviewers I will wear it as long as they continue to make it. If you haven't tried it you should. Its like nothing else out there! I hope it will continue to be available! Love Love Love this fragrance!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I already own the bottle of Womanity and more than once..same with the refills with all their bottles..All of Mugler's products are wonderful..Womanity the refill is no exception and it's a great option for those who want to refill their big bottles of womanity and this offers more of the perfume than the bottle which is great...I will keep purchasing or the regular Womanity in the bottle for as long as you sell this..I pray Mugler never stops selling this! There are so many who love this and Alien Absolue...

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Womanity, smells so wonderful. I get so many compliments. When I want to feel sexy and stand out in a crowd this is my go to for sure.. If you can find it, give it a try, you won't be disappointed..

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Originally I bought the spray bottle and I was going to get another one. But I stay on this site looking all the products I want to buy and one day I notice that the spray bottle is 2.7 fl. oz and the refill is 3.4 fl. oz so that's when I realized I need to stock up on the refills and not the unique bottle cause when I got my refill and restocked my bottle I had some left in the refill bottle. So I guess when you get the spray bottle you are paying for the design of the bottle, which I love. It's such a empowering bottle and when I spray it on my person it is incredible to smell. I was at the end of the line in CVS with about five people in front of me when I got to the cashier he told me as soon as I got in line he smelled my fragrance and how incredible I smelled. Well that's what I like to hear. I will buy this as long as they sell it.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column6: Love it! I like this and also Innocent and Angel.
column7: One of my favorites. I use it most days. Alternate this with my other 2 favorites.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I love Womanity. Shipped quickly. Best perfume. Wish it was still available at retailers

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Womanity is my favorite perfume! I get so many compliments….I’ve had strangers comment on how good it smells! Co-workers claim they know I’m at work when they walk past my office from the scent lingering in the air….they love it as much as I do! Please don’t ever stop making it!!!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I simply love this perfume, it is unique original, I leave a trail of this magnificent perfume where I go. I’m happy using it.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column6: Love the fragrance...customer service not so much
column7: I love the Womanity fragrance. Ordered the refill with special code. In attempting to entercode in Circle, says it is invalid. Contacted customer Service explaining issues with special code. Response received asking for receipt info to re-issue new code...done with no response. More time sorting this out? Thank you customer service oerson Iris..not!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: Womanity is perfection! It is one of two fragrances from the Mugler line that I wear as my mood changes. (The other is Angel!) I loved Womanity from the moment I smelled it, because of the combination of salty, sweet, fig scent, which suits me! Very sensual!! I hope this fragrance stays around for a long time!

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: At last I got my refill bottle and I am so happy I did. It is what I expected. True to size and pocket friendly. It was out of stock for a long while- please dont let that happen again. I also want the smaller bottle of womanity back on shelf for my purse. This fragrance is unbeatable.It wears for a long time and smells great. Not over powering but stands out. Its individuality is the selling point. There is none like it.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column7: I have been an avid user of Womanity since 2011, the fragrance is something that goes beyond what you would ever expect. Feminine but strong. As long as I can find this fragrance I will always wear Womanity.

column5: Womanity Eau de Parfum Refill Bottle
column6: So happy the refill is available again!
column7: I love Womanity....my favorite! I get so many compliments on this fragrance. The only thing that was disappointing is that just a couple of days after I ordered it, it went on sale and I could not take advantage of the savings. The next time I order...I will be asking if the price is going down in the foreseeable future....and hopefully you will be honest!

I love it! It’s such a unique scent and perfect for spring/summer. I will order again and am only sticking with Mugler perfumes. They are the only ones that seem to last on me. Alien is my favorite but I’ve been wearing it for years and wanted to try something different and I’m so glad I did.
Not a fan of this at all. Smells like metal. Money wasted.
Although I Love this scent it only lasts a couple hours and no one seems to smell it
Thus is my 2 or 3 order , definitely my go to scent

As weird as this sounds, after smelling a client who came into my work one day wearing this perfume, I knew I had to ask her what she was wearing and buy some immediately lol once I saw the price, I was a little hesitant but Mugler was sweet and agreed to send me a sample so I could try it out myself. I have been buying this perfume ever since and there's no going back. I've tried so many perfumes and even signed up for Scentbird (prior to trying Womanity) and this is by far the best scent in the world. I get compliments daily and I can't say enough good things about this perfume. Fan for life and worth every cent.

This is the most polarizing fig aquatic scent I've ever smelled and I'm tempted to get a bottle of this again very soon..I have owned this before and I have had testers of this and there is nothing like this out there on the market. Mugler never stop making this as I will be a permanent customer. There should be lotions with this or other varieties of this. I remember you had Womanity Pour Elles..that was amazing too when I owned it all filled with strawberries..This is creamy fig and aquatic sea notes..it is my favorite of all the Mugler scents..next would be Alien Essence Absolue, Alien and then Angel which I just got again.

column6: Took a chance & hit the jackpot with this one!
column7: I blind bought this the other day when I having a terrible day and wanted to treat myself. I just received it yesterday evening after getting my post-work shower and immediately sprayed it all over myself. I was having another awful day and this scent lifted my spirits immediately. It is so clean and pleasant. I woke up this morning still smelling like it! To me, it is exactly as Mugler describes it and I regret taking so long to try it! I generally wear the Alien variations and Angel doesn’t work so well with my body chemistry so seeing so many reviews of Angel lovers raving about this worried me a little but it is SO different and unique, much like all Mugler fragrances, and I feel like this one will work for everyone. This is very much my new favorite!

First of all the bottle is real Official Looking in person. So just like the first time I smelled Angel and thought it smelled like some mumbo jumbo crap and was about to return it where I bought it til later on after everything mixed together. Well the same thing with this one. When I first sprayed it I thought fig leaf my foot, but I knew I had to wait for the magic to happen. This scent is Amazing. I love the sweetness of it. I just sit there and inhale myself. That's what I enjoy the most. I mean it's ok if someone compliments me on my fragrance but I like to be able to smell myself and the scent continuously waft up to my nose. I have worn Aromatics for about 25 years and thought I would never never ever wear anything else, but I'm finding some of the most enjoyable fragrances from Mugler. I use them everyday reapplying as much as I want to in one day. I'm not trying to leave not one drop for anybody to find when I'm gone because not everyone enjoys aromas on the same level as I do. This is sweet and magical. I'm so glad I took a roll of the dice and bought it

I bought the smallest size available in this fragrance in 2011. I thought it smelled better in the bottle than on ME, so there it sat in my closet until about a month ago. All that time to give it another chance! Well, go figure, now I LOVE it! Could be my chemistry changed, or something. My husband gave me some favorable comments, also. I'm hoping, like many other reviewers, that the body cream comes back. I love to layer my fragrances! The best way to describe this unusual fragrance is sweet and savory- for SURE! The 2.6 ounce bottle I recently received is more beautiful than the photo, and I had it engraved all the way up the side. This fragrance and Angel Etoile Des Reves are my favorites.

Hi Guys!

Do you know why Womanity is no longer available in Europe?
I am extremely sad as it's may fav :(((

This is my one and only fragrance and it has been for so many years. The scent is so unique and like everyone else who has wrote a review I get stopped in my tracks to ask what I'm wearing; even by husbands asking for their wives. I would wear a Shirt to promote it that's how much I LOVE it.

Thank you Thierry Migler for still making this perfume available online. I would be devastated if it was no longer available.

column6: Let this be the Age of Womenity!
column7:
This is the first fragrance that literally made people stop me on the street and ask what was I wearing? At first, I was like "oh no is it too much?" And their reply has always been "absolutely not!". This fragrance is beautifully unique, it's sexy, it's feminine; long lasting and purely divine. 

I love this fragrance, every time I wear it I received so many compliments. Please never take Womanity away! Actually, this is the time to put her on the forefront! I say let this be the age of Womanity!

I have worn Womanity for eight years now and before that Angel. I get so many compliments about how good I smell. I am disappointed that I can no longer get the Womanity body cream. I do have to say that I’m excited that the refill bottles are available again. Thierry Mugler has the most beautiful bottles for all his products.

I have been wearing Womanity for years!! I have repeatedly been stopped every where I go and asked what I was wearing. It is such a beautiful fragrance . I just wish it was available at Nordstrom again!!!

I love Thierry Mugler perfumes. I started with Angel and gradually upgraded to Womanity. Womanity became one of my ultra favorite perfumes. For Christmas I bought myself two refill bottles, needles to say less than a year later I am almost all out. I tried reordering and restocking but have received no response when or if the refills will be back. I highly recommend this perfume, I always receive a lot of compliments when I wear it. Please OH Please bring back Womanity Refills!!! A very sad customer who would like to be a very happy one.
womanity is my scent now after 6 years of wearing.. just wish 'muglerusa.com' would still carried the refill. bring em back pls
Been wearing this for years! Always get compliments when I have it on. This and Angel are my all time favorites!

I learned yesterday that you are phasing out Womanity, your very best fragrance! Well, guess what? You have lost me as a consumer. None of your other fragrances come close to Womanity in sophistication and subtlety. So sorry you have made this unwise marketing decision. Goodbye, Mugler. Thanks for the memories.

I was very disappointed when my daughter opened her Christmas gift of her favorite perfume Womanity which you can only purchase through ordering online- it was very poorly packed and the perfume had leaked all out! The box smelled wonderful but for the price you have to pay you'd think they would ship more secure. I have to go through the hassle now of returning the empty bottle and try to get a nice bottle of perfume FULL! Wish me luck.
Fun and fresh. This is one of my daily go-to scents and I LOVE it! Another wonderful addition to my Thierry Mugler collection.

I'm in love with Womanity. I decided to take a chance by ordering it because I was so intrigued by the description and bottle design. I love how fresh it smells without being too sweet. It's definitely unique. I hope Mugler keeps making it!
This fragrance is one of my favorites. It blends well with everything and is light enough for summer.
I literally rip open my box! Started spraying it on me and LOVE IT! Ppl always comment on how they love my perfume too which gives me confirmation that I got good taste in the perfume department :)
Absolutely love this fragrance. Have gotten lots of compliments on it.
My absolute favorite fragrance!! How many times can I say Love? Not enough to describe this beautiful, sexy scent!! Been my # 1 for about 5 years. I'll never give it up!!
I was curious to try out womanity, and after all the wonderful compliments I get when approached by family and friends,I am so happy I went ahead and bought it!!! I love it !!
Nice soft, clean smelling fragrance. I love Thierry Mugler products.
I would not buy another brand again. When I find something I like I stick with it and Womanity last all day and the smell is not over powering, I like the soft sent.

I love original Womanity and wanted to try this version just of curiosity and I just fall in love with this one! I crave it all the time, it is like a little sister of Womanity, so flirty, fresh, young ,sweet, a little fruity, a little salty, amazing blend, it became my favorite ! I actually bought 2 bottles just incase, because it is actually not too easy to find. Very long lasting for the eau de toilette ! Great part that it works well with all original Womanity products , I use it with Womanity lotion and deodorant . It is great for younger women of course but I am almost 50 and it fits me great too! Mostly for day time , summer, but also I can see wearing it in a cold winter day, would be fun .

I like it. I am a person who absolutely loves wonderful smells in cologne. I can only rate this one good. However, I would not order it again. I do love the bottle. It is a good decoration in my bathroom.

The scent Angel is the best one. I just love Angel. Thanks.

This version is very sensous and feminine. Men that smell it on me ask me what am I wearing. The regular womanity has to be mixed with the Angel cream to smell more feminine. Thank you for creating this fragrance.
I fell in love with this fragrance when I received my kit from the Addict membership. I wore the fragrance twice and it is "on fire".

I bought Angel in 1993 and since that time have tried Angel Innocent, Angel leather, Angel Aqua Chic, Violette, Lys Lye, Pivionne, Lys Rose, Angel Eau De Toilette, Alien Aqua Chic, Alien, Alien Extradoniare, YOU GET THE PICTURE?? I am truly a FANATICAL FAN...
Now, can I please meet Mr. Mugler???? SEXY SEXY
Very lightly scented,soft and fresh smelling. All men loves the smell.

I love this fragrance i only wish they made this the EDP because i love the strawberry note so much...if they made this an EDP version or an intense version i would buy this instead of regular Womanity i own both and i crave this version more..EDPs are stronger and last longer...but this one is pretty good..love the bottle too...will the eco refills ever be available for this? Please do so for those who want to do refills of this!

I found myself heavily drawn to Womanity at local perfume store about 6 years ago and it became one of my most preferred signature scents. A couple of years ago, I went back to the same store only to learn they no longer carried the scent. Since I had to have my signature, I found the Mugler online site and was overjoyed that they sold refills (even if they were only a little less than the original bottle). However, I discovered the bottle I had purchased in the store was not refillable so my next purchase here online was a bottle I could refill. Today, I came here to purchase the refill to find they are out of stock. I am disappointed! 
Womanity is made for women whose personalities are strong enough to get away with a wearing a complex, assertive frangrance. I find it softens and intrigues the senses of people around me when mixed with my particular chemistry. I love this scent and hope to be notified soon when I can order my refill. Thank you for making Womanity. Please do not stop!

This is a Invigorating fragrance that has the best blends combined to create a heavenly scent. I am very impressed with the fragrances made by Thierry mugler. Womanity is definitely a favorite of mine. A scent that will make you stop and ask excuse me what are you wearing ... simply marvelous. I am always looking forward to experience new mind blown fragrances from Thierry. Innocent is also a great aroma as well so please,I urge you to be the next one to enjoy just as I have .
column28: 65 Crain Ct, Glen Burnie, MD 21061, USA

column7: I love this perfume. It's smells so relaxing. I'll definitely will order again.

Unfortunately I can no longer find places that sell this perfume and it is one of my favorites, and so I was so happy to find out that they still carry the refills online it was great I recommend this service to everyone
Very very good, I love it but was surprise to find out the high price was for the little refill bottle? =(

I've been wearing Womanity for years now.. and every single time I wear it, I have people asking me what I'm wearing. Complete strangers!! I can't live without this fragrance.. have to give it a chance once you spray it on to get the full effect and how it works with your chemistry... An AMAZING scent!!
Love, love this perfume i get compliments everytime i wear it!!!!
Wonderful fragrance! Hard to find. This is a great refill for your bottle.

column6: Word of mouth certainly pays off
column7:
I was introduced to Womanity by a woman walking out of a pet store when I was walking in. I smelled this wonderful light scent and, a long story short, I bought Womanity to use in an antique perfume sprayer. 
It smells wonderful. A slight citrus aroma...light and lovely.
I've always love Angel and Alien, and now Womanity.
Thierry Mugler you competing with my love of Chanel and doing very well!
Have worn this wonderful fragrance since it first came out. Always get compliments. The bottles are far too elegant to throw away so the refills are a big selling point!

column6: It makes you proud to be a WOMAN
column7: This is such a wonderful and warm fragrance that words can never do enough justice. To smell WOMANITY is to fall in love!!!!

I love this fragrance and I'm so glad I was able to purchase this refill. Realistically, I should not buy cologne that costs as much as this does, but I can't help it - I just haven't found anything I like as well as I like Womanity. The refill product was very cost effective and since I already had an empty bottle it was an easy decision. I do hope you will make the lotion again.
Thanks for this product.

Womanity is by far the only perfume I get complimented on daily. Seriously it smells that awesome. Strangers compliment me all the time. I love it!!! And...what's better than refilling the womanity perfume bottle which is very pretty or even simply pouring into a plastic travel spray bottle for on the go. The only downfall is that I used to be able to purchase at the mall department stores like Macy's and refill my bottle but they don't sell it anymore. And because it is so popular online it sells out fast but mugler is great in that they contact u when it has been restocked. Ironically, womanity's sister perfume angel is still sold in department stores. So bottom line this perfume rocks but you must commit to buying it online.
This is the best way to get this wonderful fragrance....unless you need another refillable bottle, that is.....Love this fragrance!!!!

I love this fragrance! I've worn out for several years and get complements on how wonderful it smells all the time. The only complaint I have is that not many places carry it so I have to order it on line in order to continue to use it.

column6: concern over the availability of womanity refill
column7:
I have tried to order this several times , it has been out of stock. This is my very favorite perfume, and I am almost out except for a purse size.

Please tell me that this is not being discontinued. I have purchased this in high end Department stores in the passed, but cannot find it now

column6: Why Are Most Womanity Products Out Of Stock??
column7: It looks as if this product is about to get the axe. Please say it isn't so!

This perfume is a scent that blends with my body chemistry. I am regularly stopped by strangers asking what I am wearing.

My complaint is it is no longer refillable except online. The web link never recognizes my sign in and I have to order by calling customer service. Not sure if I ever get credit on rewards.
I always get complemented on my Womanity perfume. I need a refill stat and they're out of stock! Help me!

column6: A man existing in a Womanity world
column7: I wear Gentleman by Givenchy on my sides and Womanity on my chest. I have never had a day where someone didn't ask me what I was wearing. Womanity is the most alluring and distinct fragrance I have ever smelled. It has a soft smell that lures you in only to be stopped by its undertones of strength and power. I pray this is never out of reach! If there ever was a fragrance that embodies femininity, it's this.
Womanity has a feminine but not overpowering scent that is so beautiful. It makes the wearer feel sexy and confident........I will always buy this.
I live in Argentina and person traveling to the US I charge you to bring me WOMANITY, I love this parfum !!!
I absolutely LOVE IT!!! always get compliments every time I wear it. its my FAVE!!!
This is must!! Stranger stop me serveal times a day to ask me what perfume do you have on!!
Womanity has a great fragrance I wish it was back in stores again get a lot of comments when I wear it
Love this fragrance! Wonderful product, refill is practical and economical.

This is my favorite fragrance! People will stop and ask what you are wearing! I love that it's refillable. I have the larger bottle for home and the smaller one I can take with me-both refillable so it's perfect!
This is the only perfume I wear and I get so many compliments on it. Love it!

I have not receive it yet!
and I'm wondering where is my order?

I love this perfume stumble upon it about 3 yes ago at my hospital gift shop. Have been wearing it ever since. I am so disappointed that it is no longer available in the stores. Wish it could be brought back. I always get complements on this perfume.its the only perfume I wear. I have tried switching it up but always come back to Womanity .
I have been wearing "Womanity" for 5 years.... I love this fragrance... Please consider bringing it back to local stores (e.g., Macy's)... Thanks...
This is my favorite. I get complements every time I wear it.

I really enjoy this fragrance. It is soft, sensual and haunting. Many people, even strangers, have asked what I am wearing. My only complaint is that you no longer sell this fantastic fragrance retail. I began using it as soon as you introduced it. Please reconsider putting in back into Macy's stores.

A loyal Womanity user.

This is my favorite perfume EVER! And I'm so glad there's a refill available for it, rather than having to purchase a new bottle each and every time I run out. I get endless compliments on this perfume when I'm out and about. Can't express enough how much I love this!!!
@@@"I have the plaisir to touch the skin of my body from this "Fragrance" not fragrancy, but Parfume."@@@

I love this fragrance. I don't believe I have ever worn it without getting asked what fragrance I am wearing. Everyone compliments the scent. It is not strong, but sensual, soft, very even tones, and has to be my favorite of all time. I also have Alien, Angel, and Innocent but I always go for Womanity. I love getting stopped, and being told how great I smell. And I do smell great. Love, love this product. Thanks Thierry, this one is a winner.

I also love the perfumed body milk by Womanity, just can't find it any longer.
This is one of three of the Mugler perfumes that I use every day and love.
I love this fragrance was given to me by my husband for our 29th wedding anniversary . He loves it when I wear it.
I adore this fragrance and the bottle it comes in. Thank you Thierry Mugler for making refills available!! I really love that the bottle is refillable.

I have worn Angel for quite awhile, enjoying the scent, but enjoying the compliments even more. I tried Womanity when it came out, and have been using it ever since. To my disappointment, my department stores do not carry it anymore, but I was elated to be able to purchase it online through Thierry Mugler. The compliments continue to come, and I am a happy woman!

I love Womanity. I first purchased it at Macys. I was disappointed when it was no longer available in Department Stores. It's okay now because I can order it directly from Thierry Mugler. I receive so many compliments when I wear this fragrance along with all the other Thierry Muglar fragrances I have. I absolutely love Thierry Mugler fragrances.
Discovered the fragrance about 3 years ago and simply fell in love with it. Very soft but unforgetable fragrance.

I really enjoy wearing Womanity, but I cannot find any stores in Virginia who is selling it or has refills. Can you advise me as to where I could find a store in the Northern VA area who can refill my beautiful bottle?

I am amazed how frequently I am asked what perfume I am wearing when out by both men and women. I will have been out for several hours and no longer smell it myself when someone will take a different sniff, smile and ask me if I am wearing perfume and if I would tell them what it might be. Men have been most charming when asking and even writing the name down saying they would like to get it for their wife. Women have commented on the subtle softness. I have used it as my signature fragrance for about 4 years now and my toughest critic - my daughter - loves it and has begun wearing it herself. I have had other wonderful fragrances through my years, but have never enjoyed wearing a scent as much as Womanity (nor have I spelled a word for others as much as I have this one!) I feel naked without it now.

I use to be more of an Angel fan but over time i have really come to love Womanity the most out of your whole fragrance line and hope you carry not only the fragrance but the Womanity Eco-Refills all the time because i do not wish to buy many bottles when i can just refill...I have Pour Elles as well and wish that came in an Eco-Refill as well..i can't count on hand how many times this year i would of preferred getting a refill of this fragrance over buying new fragrances out there in the market and couldn't because i couldn't get a hold of your Eco-Refills until now and tried other places but the stuff was old..i will only buy it directly from you for now on..non-experienced noses can't tell the difference but i can because i have been using this for years before i even had a Mugler account online..i think the fragrance is genius because it is unique and fresh.. it is aquatic,fruity,savory all at once...i think i will be buying another refill of this soon because it was hard to get this past year and was not available..Please keep this all year round there are many fragrance lovers in the fragrance community that love this still...please do not discontinue it...ever!

I love the refill bottle of this cologne but have been unable to get it lately. The stores in my area quit selling Womanity so I order it on line. That is how much I love the stuff. The bottle it comes in is awesome also. I would love to see this cologne return to the Von Maur, Dillard's or the Younker's stores.

Since I became a woman of age my parfum started to smell different with the changes of my body chemistry. My niece was working for Macy's and brought me a sample of Womanity. From the first moment I put on the scent it smelled delicious! It was like the scent was made exclusively for me. It smells heavenly and I get tons of compliments on the fragrance. I received a bottle for my birthday and when that was finished I brought the refill bottle. I love the fact that I can refill the beautiful bottles and the economy size comes with a tiny funnel to make it easier. This is my signature fragrance now and I wear it everyday.

column6: So glad I found you again
column7: A wonderful twist to the original womanist. I thought it was discontinued so when I saw this on the Mugler website I scooped it up. Love love love this scent. Thank you Thierry for bringing this to market.
FEMINIE AND SOFT AND REALLY A SIMPLE SCENT TO JUST LET YOU BE A LADY ALWAYS
Every time I wear Womanity, someone stops me and asks me what I am wearing! I've been told that I smell AMAZING!!! This is definitely my signature fragrance! I've never had so many compliments!!!
i use this parfume since 2013 this is my most favorite parfumein my life

This is by far once of the best scents that I ever came across. It is now my signature scent. I receive so many complements and even had a guy ask me what I was wearing to purchase it for his wife. I can't believe it is no longer sold in stores.

I absolutely LOVE WOMANITY!! It is definitely my signature scent. I ALWAYS get many, many compliments on how great I smell when I wear it. It has a fresh, feminine scent, with overtones of grapefruit and sweet honey. I love it!!

This perfume takes the original to new heights. It smells amazing and lasts awhile... I love smelling it in my hair and on my jackets the next day. I have two bottles because I never want to be with out it! Take the chance and buy it if you are curious. You will not regret it!

im a 54 year old woman and i love womanity it makes you feel special. every time i wear it i always get stoped in the street to be asked what are you wearing you smell wonderful. its a parfum that is timeless and can be worn by any woman old or young as my daughter who is 15 years old loves it and all her friends comment on it when she wears it. im trying to teach her to wear fabulous parfums to smell wonderful and feel great .and people always remember her because she smells so beautful.please please keep this parfum in production
I absolutely love this fragrance.......it is unique and long lasting. Nice to have people say "oh you smell so good"!
I love this scent so much. Wish it would be available in stores too, because i think that everyone should get a chance to try this beautiful creation. It's amazing, the smell is indescribably good.

column6: A beautiful re-imagining of my signature scent
column7: The original Womanity has been my signature scent for almost 5 years now. This re-imagining smells absolutely wonderful. I can't pinpoint exactly what note is brought to the forefront of this fragrance, but it's delicious and is a nice alternative to the divisiveness of the original. I can't stop smelling myself! I would recommend this to any woman who wants to stand out from the rest, it's an absolutely captivating fragrance!
I love this fragrance so fresh. The scent is just so feminine. Everyone wants to know what you are wearing.

This fragrance is so alluring and sexy, elegant and sophisticated. Wearing this fragrance leaves a noticeable scent behind. One do not pass by
un-noticed wearing this fragrance. It illuminates the "Woman" in you - Strong and confident.

Both Womanity Perfume and Body cream were Thierry Mugler's best fragrances. Crazy compliments and never smelled another fragrance even close to this one. It was totally unique, dye off was amazing, long lasting, and grabbed so much attention. So sad it's gone, she should consider a re-launch.

This is a gorgeous scent and I'm so disappointed I can't seem to find the body cream anywhere.
Please Thierry, bring back our Womanity Body Cream!
I really love this body cream together with the parfume!! but i can't find it anylonger in Italy... :-( what's a pity!!!!

column6: Help!!! Where did my favorite body cream go???
column7: I realy love this body cream but cant get anywhere... please dont tell me its not for sale anymore. I just have to have it in combination with my favorite parfume.

How come it's out of stock?
When will it be available?

I love the luxurious feel of a thick body cream to match the scent of my favorite perfume. I can also combine it with a thinner, unscented body lotion/cream to get all over scent for special occasions. Just wished they made a bath talc with sparkles in the Womanity scent that I could put on after the cream. I love to layer my scents so they last all day and night!
Love, love, love this particular fragrance! I always get compliments and it lasts all day without being heavy or overwhelming!

This product along with it's parfum layered has been a daily wear of mine! I highly recommend. It lasted well over 6 months as I used it sparingly, mixed with vaseline and a light spray of the fragance took me through the day.

It's time to re-order them both.......simply heavenly!
column20: Fragrance > Women's Perfume > Womanity > Bath & Body

column7:
A light and refreshing scent that develops as the day goes on.
This fragrance comes in a beautifully designed bottle.

When I layer my favorite scent it lasts all day and evening. I start with the luxurious shower gel, then the body cream and then the Womanity perfume. I just wished I could get a refillable bottle of the large size perfume instead of buying a large size new bottle each time.
Womanity, the perfect name. I'm in love with this fragrance. I highly recommend it. I will definitely refill my bottle when it runs out.
This is my 1st time using Womanity Roll-On Deodoraant - and I love it! I highly recommend it!
A wonderful addition to the Womanity fragrance line! Keeps me dry while smelling wonderful!

column6: Kid jewelry at an adult price
column7: The concept is great! Who doesn't want a perfume ring??? Here's the problem...the base of the ring is super cute but the jewel on top is a cheap piece of plastic that my little girl might wear. I was so surprised at the price versus the quality of the ring. Not worth it for $60 so it was returned.
excellent fragrance, the smell lis unique, love it!

This is one of the most delicious aromas I've ever smelled. I've received so many compliments on it. I also enjoy the convenience of dabbing a little from my ring when I wear it. It's a must have for any Womanity lover.
very concentrated fragrance requiring very little each time..nothing to spill out and fits easily in any purse

Will be good for travel versus the glass travel pen I do miss the one you had for sale, it was tube shaped, long and skinny. Good for the purse also.     
    Look forward to using your new shapped ANGEL !!    Love Angel, all I ever wear anymore!   Deb Sloan

This is a great little quick and easy to find accessory for my purse. The brush in quite large and heavy so I never have a hard time trying to find it in the bottom of my bag. It’s very convenient however I don’t feel as if it is as efficient as having a bottle. I noticed the scent wears off faster when applied with the brush as opposed to being sprayed on the skin.
Was shipped quickly, and LOVE all the samples. The brush is perfect for travel too, and smells delicious

This is the best way to apply perfume, it comes out as a gel and you brush it on, I am buying more of them to keep in my purse and at work for touch ups (although Angel lasts so long I rarely need to touch up!) please don’t ever stop making this brush on design, it’s the best!!
I just love this perfume . It's so great on me! It was a fabulous gift...
Definitely my favorite frrom the collection, not overpowering and lasts

I purchased this set from Macys in store. When I got it home, I was in Love with this fragrance. I appreciate Mugler for sending me the mini lotion as a gift for registering my purchase, because when I purchased the gift set, the store clerk never gave me not even as much as a sample for spending that kind of money on a fragrance. So Thank You so much!

column6: I have been a loyal customer for 28 years
column7:
One thing that I miss from your line of products is the bubble bath!!!

As I wrote above as my "review Title": I have been a loyal customer to Thierry Mugler for over 29 years! 

Angel is my signature scent! I have been followed by men and women to breathe in Angel and me! Even though I have sinus issues, Angel blends perfectly with MY pheromones that I do not smell anything on me after 2 minutes. I even take the Angel cream and with a noisette of cream I directly apply it into my hair.

I received my set and was very disappointed, this was my first time using this site to order. I have used angel for about 10 years and have never had the scent to fade so quickly, it has always stayed with me all day. I absolutely love this perfume so I hope the replacement set is as it should be.
I am very pleased with the Angel exfoliant. It gently exfoliates and leaves a wonderful fragrance. I will buy again.
So happy to finally have Alien shower gel. It completes the Alien pampering! Wish it were sold in stores! Now I use Alien more often.
So happy to get Alien deodorant! Wish it were sold in the stores!
This is the BEST body cream I have ever used! Luxurious and moisturizing. A small amount goes a long way. Beautifully scented.

This is a great summer (and winter) fragrance for all ages. A great introduction to Angel products for young women and a summer change for Angel devotees.
Thierry Mugler should definitely add Eau Sucree to the standard line of products and not have it only as a limited edition.

Angel is my signature scent. The body cream is thick, emollient and a 24 hour scent fest. I love it and receive so many compliments. People walk in my classroom and always say that "it smells so good in here".

I've personally used A*MEN cologne for approximately five years and when I hear about a new cologne on the market I'll buy it and try it. What's funny is I find myself putting the new cologne in my bathroom drawer and going back to my A*MEN cologne. A lot of the new colognes on the shelf have a immediate WOW factor when other people first smell them but fragrance doesn't seem to last or the aroma is so over powering it drives people away. What I love about A*MEN is how long the fragrancy stays with you and suttle woodsy scent. There's something masculine about A*MEN that women seem to love it amazes me how often I receive complements or inquiry's about what cologne I'm wearing because they want to buy it for there husbands because they just love the sweetness of the scent. Well I say "AMEN" to A*MEN because it meets all the reasons I wear cologne, not to mention the Staff at Mugler will help you in anyway they can to make your purchase as smooth as possible.
Love this fragrance. I am a 100% woman and it gives me confidence wherever I go. I leave this beautiful scent of me for everyone to compliment. Thanks Thierry Mugler
This is a fragrance that is really calm. I would wear it to a meeting or wedding.

I personally have used Mugler products for many years and can honestly say I've never been disappointed in any purchase made. There support staff is excellent and will literally bend over backwards to assist the buyer in any Request that they could possibly have. I would like to give a "SHOUT OUT" to Samantha Epstein who has gone Above And Beyond to assist me in a few requests I had and, made me feel like a VIP, If your in need of any products that Mugler carries you will not find a better Company to do business with!
V/R Thomas Brisse

This perfume is amazing everyone is always asking me what perfume I use and I proudly answer Angel.

Your company really takes care us and cares how we smell.

Thank you so much,

Dora

I prefer to where Angel lotion over the sprays so this is a really good value for me. Wearing the lotion gives it a more powdery scent and I always get compliments on how good I smell. The only complaint I have is that the part that squirts the lotion out isn't long enough so it sometimes gets on the bottle.
Les Exceptions - Chyprissime is one of my favorite

No matter what fragrance of Thierry Mugler I am wearing, I always get stopped or pulled over and ask the questions of~~~ what's on me?, what's that smell?, or what's that you are wearing? I love them all and his fragrance is the only thing I purchase. It give me confidence and make a statement. The scent of a woman!!!!!! You will always win

I always use to buy my regular angel for years and years love it than read a article on someone who bought your limited edition angel with fragrance of leather went on line and order it . I love this one also very very much.

I purchased this as my personal gift for changing my life and making some major lifestyle changes. When I wear this it makes me feel beautiful even though I have a very long way to go. I feel confident wearing this. I've had compliments about this from several people, including my physician. I love the lotion.
Zero projection, the smell wasn't quite what I expected. The fragrance doesn't last long at all! So I was very disappointed, will not going to give up on this house of fragrances yet.
Me and my Girlfriend absolutely love the smell of this fragrance, she just can't get enough of it!
I always feel fresh and ready for the day when I start my day with this body oil. It goes on smooth and silky.

column6: The only fragrance that I use!
column7: I love my Angel!!! Everyone says you smell like an Angel

I loved the variety of scents. Womanity would be my second favorite if I had to pick one of them. My favorite and one and only parfum is the iconic Angel. I have been wearing this for over fifteen years. My day is not complete without me smelling it and putting it on. It doesn't matter if I am going out, staying in, getting dressed or just hanging out in my pj's. I must admit I have tried different scents and that did not last for more than a day, The remainder of those bottles were used as air fresheners. I believe that I must be one of your top fans of Angel. I can not say enough of how much I love this parfum.
This is my absolute favorite perfume. I'm so disappointed that it's not being sold in stores anymore. However, as long as it continues to be available online I'm buying....

column6: Not at all the size I expected!
column7: The bottle is very tine and would not purchase again.
I love this fragrance almost as much as the original- I will be disappointed if it becomes unavailable

This is one of my favorite perfumes. I admit I'm hooked. I love the elegance of the scent as well as the elegance of the web site. It's mesmerizing, and always draws me into buying more! These small bottles carry a powerful scent and they travel in the smallest of bags and purses.

I love body cream and the scent is marvelous. These little packets travel well and last a long time. Thank you, Thierry Mugler for creating these terrific packets. They fit nicely in travel bag or purse, even the small disco bags.
Awesome, thanks for offering such a wonderful collection. I travel a lot and these tuck away nicely and go with me in travel bag or purse. Thank you again for these wonderful miniatures.

Thierry Muglar Pure Malt is simply a wonderful unique, clea, fresh spicy scent. Each of the Angel for men scents are unique and special. They all carry the familiar Thierry Muglar spicy, tobacco, fresh scent.
They are simply the best!

This fragrance has the original A* Men DNA, but has it's own vibe. To me, it smells fantastic, perfect for clubbing or any casual appointmeint. As it's own name sugests, this really smells like bourbon, a sweet bourbon. Not very sweet, nor very boozy, just perfectly in balance. I just wish it had the same longevety and projection the original A* Men has.

When I opened the box it was delivered in smell very strong of colgne. The box the colgne was in looked like the paint had rubbed onto the plastic that wrapped the box. When i opened it up, the lid was loose and some colgne spilled out.
It look so nice on my dresser holding my favorite perfume angel

column6: fine liqueur in a perfume bottle that smells tatal
column7: angel is the perfume for all women. very very sexy and can be smelled miles away. when I walk in a room people ask me what are you wearing? layer it. perfume, liqueur, lotion and oil. it goes and lasts a very long time.
love it! And I have some left over.Well worth the price!

It took me many years and many dollars to find my "Angel". Actually it was my husband that found a sample in a magazine. We went to a Boston store that carried it and have been wearing "Angel" since. Many years.
This is the only perfume that doesn't make me sneeze, my eyes water or make me wheeze! Plus I have gotten so many compliments from people in stores, social events and work. My husband thanks you and I Thank you!

How convenient and eco friendly is it to have your favorite scent at your disposal .and knowing that you are helping the environment.it had to be a heavenly scent, sent by none other than an....Angel!
Angel Eau Sucree 0.04 fl. Oz is a sweet treat! From the very candy cute package, to the super sweet Angel Eau Sucree fragrance, I am tickled pink and overwhelmed with delight! Thank you!
I love it everyone even strangers tell me how nice I smell can't live without it. Don't ever change it, that's what usually happens.
I love this! Every time I wear it I receive a lot of compliments! Just wish it was more available....I have a hard time finding it!
This is the most amazing fragrance I have ever tried! I still love my Angel too though! The best part is that I always smell good!

Everytime I wear Innocent I have a least one person a day tell me I smell amazing! As a teacher, my students tell me they love coming in my room because it smells so good. Strangers stop and ask me what I am wearing. I have had waiters comment on how nice I smell. When friends and family hug me, they tell me they don't want to let go because they love the scent of my perfume.
The perfume is Innocent, but I am genuinely purposeful in applying it to get those compliments I love!

well, this fragrance is smells great. I was expecting a powerful citrus smell BUT you get that citrus smell after a sweet awesome scent. I was like DWAM! So far, I rate this fragrance over most of TM cologne.

Bold - Classy and Unique - if you like sweet and rich dark cocoa with vanilla accents then this is your scent. Long lasting and head turning it is a must to be in every man's collection of scents - for Office - after Five and Evening wear and - it sweats well so even after a moderate workout you'll still know it's there

If you love Angel (A*Men) for it's originality of dark and sweet cocoa and rich vanilla then Ultra Zest will not disappoint as it has the original flair with a hint of citrus that does not take away from the home base - yet it adds a freshness to turn heads. Folk will wonder for a min Is that Angel he has on? because it's familiar with a nuance that sets it apart from the original in a good day. Some have said it's too sweet on me however I think it's no sweeter than the original - maybe the citrus heightens the sweetness - either way you can't go wrong with this one

I am a longtime fan of Mugler and I love their special editions. Next to Havane, this is now my favorite as I enjoy the citrus and spice combination so much. It's got such a nice array of tones to it. People LOVE this scent on me and I got no less than 12 comments the day I put it on and wore it work!
If you enjoy scents for a man that are a tad spicy in nature, pick this one!

Typical long lasting fragrance with the DNA of the original! The name says it all zesty and citrus .Not your usual summer fragrance , but has gourmand appeal along the lines of pure malt and pure Havana . Great fragrance !

column6: A little expensive, but worth it.
column7: This shampoo lays down a great base scent for use with other Mugler products. It is very concentrated, so only a little amount goes a long way and as a result, a bottle lasts a long time.

column6: Like the name implies. Mugler with a bright side.
column7: Massively happy with this. I have become a huge fan of Mugler. I love the base scent associated with each of the different versions, and then accentuated with different overtones for different moods created. I have the main version of A*Men, Pure Malt, Pure Wood and now this one. Really, really happy with it. It has a very bright side initially, and this dies down a little to a very comfortable point. I have found that Mugler products, in general, are long lasting -- this one does too.
I purchased Ultra Zest on a whim and boy am I impressed!!!!! It is so luxurious!! I've recommended this to all of my brothers and they purchased a bottle as well!! I ABSOLUTELY Love this!!!

I absolutely love Womanity... Thought I would like this but it is really awful on me.. The longer I wear it, the worse I think it smells on me... And I never get compliments on it, so I must be correct..
column49:
Thank you for contacting Thierry Mugler!

We wish to ensure your complete satisfaction while shopping on Muglerusa.com and we are sorry to hear you were not satisfied with your purchase. We will gladly accept your return purchased on Muglerusa.com within 30 days of receipt. 

1) On the return form, please print the product item number, description, quantity and reason for each product returned. 
2) Carefully pack your return in the original package with the completed Return Form to prevent damage during transit and ensure the quickest processing. 3) Affix the return label and send the box back to us with a carrier of your choice (we suggest registered email). 

If a return label is not available, please address your package to: 

Thierry Mugler
15 Olympic Drive
Orangeburg, NY 10962 

If the return form is not available, please include your name, email address, order number and item number along with the reason for return.

column6: THE best smell (in my humble opinion)
column7: Womanity is my go to perfume.... There's never a time that I wear it that I don't get tons of compliments.... D

I had purchased the holder a few years ago, and I absolutely loved it. My angel star no longer sits on the dresser. It looks like art sitting on the holder... Purchased this one for my mom and she loves it.
Let's be serious, MT products are the best. Instead of doing a review, just list in order your favorite MT product down. Now that would be a challenge.
This is perfect summer fragrance. Smells of bright orange and smooth vanilla with a nice ginger. Very nice by Mugler.

unfortunately I never received my order.
it was damaged by the carrier & returned to thierry mugler, customer serv.
never advised me of this. I had to call to find out where my order was and
they informed me of the damage. needless to say very disappointed by the
lack of communication regarding this,
nancy mory
I love the fact that I can go to the website and order the innocent, because Boston Store said it was discontinued. I went to every store looking for this fragrance.

column6: I absolutely love the shower gel.
column7: My only negative comment would be on the bottle. I've used this product for years & since the change in the appearance I find it more difficult to squeeze. This does not stop me from using this glorious gel, the smell is so refreshing!

I went crazy trying to find a fragrance for my husband that I would love. I tried a ton of different scents. They were all either bad or just ok... Until I tried pure malt. And I LOVED it, top, middle, and base, I love every whiff of it. It's so different than any other scent I've sampled. I'm not good at describing a scent, but I know when I love a scent, a rarity for me. After sampling pure malt, I tried most of the other A Men scents too. They all have similar notes, but none stacked up to pure malt. It's a very strong scent. You only need one spray, and it lasts on my husband's skin all day. I do smell the malt, but it's not at all boozy, like someone would think you're drunk on whiskey. And a warm and fruity smell to it too, a really amazing combination. Too heavy for summer and spring days, but perfect for the fall and winter. I highly, highly recommend, but always sample before you buy!! BTW, my husband absolutely loves it too.
I get compliments everywhere I go! I love this perfume!
This is my absolute favorite of all the scents. It is light and not too heavy. It actually reminds me of Opium Perfume. But lighter and a little sweeter. I am complemented on it whenever I wear it.
I get so many compliments on how I smell when I wear this stuff! I love it!
This is my favorite fragrance every since I first smelled it. I wish I could buy it in the store, but as long as I can order it I am good. love, love , love this perfume will not wear anything else.
What a treat I love all of them but I think alien is my favorite.
